ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年</a>　郑景望知建宁，作诗酬赠。作品：送郑少卿景望知建宁五首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（据孙衣言《水心文集校注》，郑景望守建宁在淳熙七年。）</span><div id='poem_161759' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161759' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161759?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送郑少卿景望知建宁<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161759")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161759_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_161759_0'>① 按：此诗亦见《水心集》卷七，题作送郑丈赴建宁五首，第四首颔联作“十年长隐吏，一语必惊人”。郑景望知建宁为淳熙七年，时陈傅良于通判福州任被劾罢，味末章“屏弃”等语，当为陈作。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161759'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161759'>海内言华萼，谁名动搢绅。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161759'>岂无当世志，能忍十年贫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161759'>酒兴新来减，交情老更亲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161759'>公馀如促膝，剩把古书陈<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：兼送景元。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161759'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161759_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161757' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161757' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161757?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161757_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161757'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161757'>屏废诚愚分，牢愁更索居。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161757'>若逢知己问，犹解课儿书。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161757'>地僻门长闭，年饥菜自锄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161757'>相望无一字，不是故情疏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161757_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161757'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161757_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年3月</a>　刘春卒，为作祭文。作品：祭刘端木。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘春（温永嘉人，待台州教授阙卒于家）本年闰三月。）</span><div id='poem_1278791' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278791' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278791?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭刘端木文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278791")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278791_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278791'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278791'>呜呼端木，而止于此欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278791_comment'></div>谓其容貌不泽，齿发衰变，而无寿徵欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278791_comment'></div>谓其疾声遽色，太喜怒以干和欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278791_comment'></div>抑谓其强心于事，而敝敝其生欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278791_comment'></div>而端木咸无焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278791_comment'></div>然而止此，将安咎也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278791_comment'></div>呜呼端木！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278791_comment'></div>其心将以仁其三族，其学将以著见当世，而庶几于古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278791_comment'></div>其仪抑抑，其言恂恂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278791_comment'></div>至于居为畏友，出为拂士，而取予之际，能不以不义加乎其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278791_comment'></div>于今之世，吾见亦寡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278791_comment'></div>岂古所谓直谅之益，木讷而近于仁者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278791_comment'></div>晚得一官，无损于贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278791_comment'></div>母老子稚，旁无强亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278791_comment'></div>盖择地而蹈，报效如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278791_comment'></div>此某等所以哀吁之天，莫知所云也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1278791_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年3月</a>　刘春卒，为作挽诗。作品：挽刘端木司户。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘春（温永嘉人，待台州教授阙卒于家）本年闰三月。）</span><div id='poem_161788' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161788' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161788?labeling=true' target='_blank'>挽刘端木司户</a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161788")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161788_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161788'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161788'>十年共语昨来非，长忆初年握手时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161788_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161788'>身世自怜心炯炯，功名犹恐论卑卑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161788_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161788'>民彝亘古非芜没，学者如公好器资。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161788_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161788'>缓辔徐行逢九轨，可堪倏忽九原悲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161788_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161788'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161788_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年</a>　张栻是年去世，为作祭文。作品：祭张南轩。<div id='poem_1278784' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278784' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278784?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭张南轩文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278784")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278784_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278784'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278784'>吁嗟先生，惟以正终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278784_comment'></div>如何叹嗟，四海所同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278784_comment'></div>欲知先生，当观之公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278784_comment'></div>军旅有言：魏公之子，惠我律我，魏公是似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278784_comment'></div>如其即戎，誓与偕死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278784_comment'></div>学士有言：瞻彼洛师，昔在文献，往往阙遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278784_comment'></div>曰惟南轩，尚其嗣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278784_comment'></div>朝廷有言：岂无他人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278784_comment'></div>吏道趋变，经生泥陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278784_comment'></div>必若钦夫，可以致君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278784_comment'></div>去欲其归，病欲其愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278784_comment'></div>及此盖棺，万事永已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278784_comment'></div>亦有咎怨，莫或瑕毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278784_comment'></div>呜呼先生，位曾不隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278784_comment'></div>曾不卑卑，与人为通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278784_comment'></div>抑不立异，收声于躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278784_comment'></div>维学高明，维行粹夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278784_comment'></div>维其待物，一不以疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278784_comment'></div>匪即求之，人实秉彝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278784_comment'></div>君子在世，勿问勿处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278784_comment'></div>譬彼川岳，无兴云雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278784_comment'></div>三农赖之，以艺稷黍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278784_comment'></div>矧惟世臣，乔木勿伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278784_comment'></div>矧惟儒术，不坠一发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278784_comment'></div>生能几何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278784_comment'></div>而堪契阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278784_comment'></div>往岁玉山，前年秣陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278784_comment'></div>二公云亡，令我涕零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278784_comment'></div>又哭先生，我怀实并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278784_comment'></div>念昔从游，为日则浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278784_comment'></div>辱诲辱爱，辱待甚远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278784_comment'></div>自我不见，常惧有腼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278784_comment'></div>有来湖岭，必惠问我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278784_comment'></div>对之翰墨，如在右左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278784_comment'></div>蒙是曷称，罔敢违堕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278784_comment'></div>家有藏书，国有太史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278784_comment'></div>虽微功业，先生不死！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278784_comment'></div>我心哀伤，盖不以此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1278784_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年</a>　为叔祖母作墓志铭。作品：叔祖母韩氏墓志铭。<div id='poem_1278749' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278749' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278749?labeling=true' target='_blank'>叔祖母韩氏墓铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278749")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278749_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278749'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278749'>夫人姓韩氏，乡先生汝翼之兄女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278749_comment'></div>年二十八，归我族叔祖父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278749_comment'></div>归二十一年，而叔祖父卒，葬所居前山之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278749_comment'></div>后二十六年而夫人卒，叔父某以淳熙七年十有一月吉奉其柩祔于山阳之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278749_comment'></div>盖夫人归，比葬，岁复庚子矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278749_comment'></div>叔父泣命某曰：「吾葬以故缓，而今属吾子铭之也，以尚亡悔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278749_comment'></div>某不逮事叔祖父，不尝见夫人为冢妇时事，而见为母久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278749_comment'></div>是时长叔姒亦茕寡，家日落，二小郎鼎盛，门户冷热异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278749_comment'></div>夫人中处与外绝，独教子读书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278749_comment'></div>一女，爱甚，择以妻国子进士韩公禀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278749_comment'></div>妇子或微过，但色不怡，妇子谢已则复常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278749_comment'></div>虽邻，未尝闻语笑声者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278749_comment'></div>而室庐园田，无秋毫损于叔祖父之旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278749_comment'></div>叔祖讳某，字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278749_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1278749'>余叔祖父以善士称，叔父继以善士称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278749_comment'></div>族之愿其妻若母者，必以夫人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278749_comment'></div>如之何勿铭？</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1278749_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年</a>　作诗送沈大经赴任。作品：送沈元诚赴漳浦主簿。<span class='inlineComment2'>（沈大经字元诚，温州瑞安县人。曾授漳浦县主簿，未几辞归。生平见叶适所作《沈元诚墓志铭》。）</span><div id='poem_161745' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161745' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161745?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送沈元诚赴临漳主簿<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161745")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161745_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161745'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161745'>谁说乡先进，能无沈隐侯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161745'>青衫今适越，白发竟依刘<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：时里人刘义夫守临漳）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161745'>道固为名累，人当与命谋。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161745'>三台行渐近，且勿问归舟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161745'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161745_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161746' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161746' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161746?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161746_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161746'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161746'>终藏怀未已，欲去事多违。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161746_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161746'>士友方推毂，乡邻但挽衣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161746_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161746'>冥鸿寒汲汲，霜菊晚晖晖。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161746_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161746'>何限春蜚动，君看果是非。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161746_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161746'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161746_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年12月</a>　除夜作诗抒怀。作品：庚子除夜有怀。<div id='poem_161724' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161724' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161724?labeling=true' target='_blank'>庚子除夜有怀</a><span class='authorDate'>（1180年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161724")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161724_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161724'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161724'>老盆自酌共谁歌，叹息其如此夜何。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161724'>已觉二毛嗔妇问，可堪一饭患儿多。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161724'>关河满眼风尘在，天地藏身岁月过。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161724'>事业文章吾所畏，东阳人亦卧岩阿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161724_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161724'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161724_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年1月</a>　张淳卒，为作祭文。作品：祭张忠甫。<span class='inlineComment2'>（张淳字忠甫，陈傅良妻堂兄，时与薛季宣、郑伯熊齐名。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年7月</a>　郑伯熊七月初三卒于建宁府任上，为作祭文。作品：祭郑龙图。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='82426bbd0e534ee4bd0d59201d847a23_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("82426bbd0e534ee4bd0d59201d847a23");'><span id='82426bbd0e534ee4bd0d59201d847a23_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1187')">1181-1187年</a>，45-51岁</div><div id='82426bbd0e534ee4bd0d59201d847a23' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年9月</a>　章用中卒，为作祭文。作品：祭章端叟。<span class='inlineComment2'>（章用中（字端叟），温州平阳人，受学陈傅良，曾问学吕祖谦。）</span><div id='poem_1278795' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278795' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278795?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭章端叟文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278795")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278795_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278795'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278795'>吁嗟端叟，今孰不如？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278795_comment'></div>问其位年，弗逮彼愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278795_comment'></div>吁嗟端叟，相尔志慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278795_comment'></div>盖达将与当代诸贤在文墨议论之选，而穷亦庶几可祭于社，识曰君子之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278795_comment'></div>中阃无相，寄孥于旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278795_comment'></div>盗骑屋山，田园半荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278795_comment'></div>士而至此，可以悔矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278795_comment'></div>而犹朋师，不以四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278795_comment'></div>谁为夏屋，能置松柏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278795_comment'></div>于何雪霜，不待盈尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278795_comment'></div>安阳之南，岂无士友？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278795_comment'></div>胡独端叟，哭者十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278795_comment'></div>或敛之床，或沐之柩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278795_comment'></div>百尔无恨，何必尔后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278795_comment'></div>余二十年，交满天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278795_comment'></div>自春徂秋，三泣大雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278795_comment'></div>涕曾未收，复奠斯斝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278795_comment'></div>侑可无文，其尚忍写。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278795_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>　冯施叔卒，为作祭文。作品：冯司理墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（冯施叔字孟博，淳熙六年卒。）</span><div id='poem_1278750' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278750' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278750?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冯司理墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278750")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278750_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278750'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278750'>君讳施叔，字孟博，以淳熙六年某月某日卒于家，年六十，以八年十月庚申葬于永嘉县建牙乡桐岭之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278750_comment'></div>娶魏氏，再娶薛氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278750_comment'></div>三男：琳、瑜、璋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278750_comment'></div>五女，适吴仲洽、林谦，馀未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278750_comment'></div>往时，吾乡尚名德、贵门地，士大夫不苟为婚友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278750_comment'></div>永嘉如草堂先生张子充氏、经行先生丁某父氏，瑞安如唐奥先生林介夫氏，皆名家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278750_comment'></div>数家子弟宾客，往往可称数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278750_comment'></div>君考讳光庭，娶介夫之孙女，因林氏君得从草堂诸子学；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278750_comment'></div>复因张氏，得以其仲姊归经行之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278750_comment'></div>君三岁丧母，十五丧父，家益落，而迄以读书属文得官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278750_comment'></div>居有善誉，出有廉绩，盖其所渐习异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278750_comment'></div>府君且卒，召林张氏以其子为寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278750_comment'></div>两家合教十数年，丈人课之，妇女饮食衣被之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278750_comment'></div>比君偕计书上名于礼部，两家奉酒相劳苦，以为可见府君地下矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278750_comment'></div>余每论婚友之不可苟，于君故有感也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278750_comment'></div>余娶草堂仲子思豫之女，则尝教君者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278750_comment'></div>既习闻其所繇成就如是，而琳、瑜又来问学，亦雅驯不烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278750_comment'></div>瑜也将葬，因述君官政、家政累千馀言，以乞余铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278750_comment'></div>余叹曰：士宦不达，志不究见，何足用书？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278750_comment'></div>有以孤儿受教于外氏，致其身，以无辱其父，其可以无传乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278750_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1278750'>维古论人必某出，君克其家谁从得？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278750_comment'></div>亦惟厥考好逑匹，我铭旌之后为则。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1278750_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>　张淳卒，为作墓志铭。作品：张忠甫墓志铭。<div id='poem_1278751' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278751' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278751?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张忠甫墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278751")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278751_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278751'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278751'>忠甫为人严重深博，善忍事镇物，绝有材智，抑不使出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278751_comment'></div>其气貌沈沈，伟然丈人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278751_comment'></div>年方少，连五试礼部，不中，授特奏官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278751_comment'></div>忠甫每自悼不第进士，虽宦达，将不得与文墨议论，亡足以著儒效，遂弃去，以居养其母仪妻子、是正朋友为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278751_comment'></div>盖晚而学诗书，讲诵数年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278751_comment'></div>既大通风人美刺与古丧祭上下之交立教微意，以为天下国家可推此而理，此孔门之所教而传也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278751_comment'></div>益负其学，自刻苦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1278751", 1278751, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>贵爱</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278751_comment'></div>或言诸朝，禄以监岳，忠甫谓徒费县官亡谊，历三任不食其禄，亦不书考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278751_comment'></div>执母夫人黄氏之丧，自饭含至于既窆，凡所以诚信其亲者，自括发至于既祥，凡所以哀恫其身者，质诸《士丧礼》，无不合也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278751_comment'></div>初，忠甫独追古辈，好绳俗以己学，无以寓见，则时时为文章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278751_comment'></div>铭人父祖，有讽有劝，皆不虚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278751_comment'></div>于族姻之丧，为之治衣衾棺竁，绌巫佛，强其为此，禁其为彼，人颇谓怪，至交口哂骂之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278751_comment'></div>忠甫说甚长，而未之服予也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278751_comment'></div>及见其躬行，极人之所难，然后翕然加敬，尊信其说，有从之者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278751_comment'></div>虽不从者，亦内愧莫之敢议也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278751_comment'></div>然而忠甫之言曰：「吾生不免为今人，吾行岂敢为古人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278751_comment'></div>吾于闾里后进，随和唯诺，一若庸庸然，吾何贤哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278751_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278751_comment'></div>忠甫盖已顾避黾勉如此，犹久而后与乡人合，使尽己有耶，人必且大怪，宜愈难合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278751_comment'></div>使得其位施行之，则必怪之者愈众，亦愈流落不偶，不得其志，故忠甫一意忍穷以死，而非其释然不屑于世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278751_comment'></div>忠甫与其友薛士龙、郑景望齐名于时，而二人皆仕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278751_comment'></div>士龙一见人主，语意合且大用，而为政者不悦，去之以卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278751_comment'></div>景望三入朝，二十馀年，其卒也位不过九卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278751_comment'></div>二人尝勉忠甫仕，忠甫不应，久之，而道不行，功业不就也，则未尝不壮忠甫之决，而推逊其高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278751_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278751_comment'></div>是可不谓之贤欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278751_comment'></div>忠甫讳淳，姓张氏，世永嘉人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278751_comment'></div>曾祖某、祖某、父某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278751_comment'></div>娶潘氏，休宁丞蔚之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278751_comment'></div>年六十有一，以岁之元日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278751_comment'></div>以其年十有一年乙酉祔葬于吹台乡桐屿黄夫人之兆，实淳熙八年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278751_comment'></div>二子：凡、几；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278751_comment'></div>三女，适袁州州学教授潘宇、进士刘嗣僖、卢趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278751_comment'></div>将葬，潘氏曰：「吾夫子之友，惟陈君在，且余家婿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278751_comment'></div>铭夫子无以易君者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278751_comment'></div>然则，某其可辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278751_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1278751'>勇避而不趋，人以为为异也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278751_comment'></div>愁苦以行之，人以为为利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278751_comment'></div>我师古人，孰今不弃也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278751_comment'></div>犹有鬼神，殁其宁于地也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1278751_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>　章用中卒，为作墓志铭。作品：章端叟墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（章用中（字端叟），温州平阳人，受学陈傅良，曾问学吕祖谦。）</span><div id='poem_1278752' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278752' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278752?labeling=true' target='_blank'>章端叟墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278752")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278752_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278752'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278752'>淳熙八年九月日，陈子端己使来告章子之丧曰：「端叟不幸旦日卒，凡两邑之诸生走相吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278752_comment'></div>其自今将谁纠合以卒业？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278752_comment'></div>夫子宜闻而哀之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278752_comment'></div>余既泣受辞，即往之其庐会哭，哭皆尽哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278752_comment'></div>越月，端己复来告曰：「端叟不幸，未及有子，以仲兄之子士则后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278752_comment'></div>葬日得十有二月丙午，而士则也幼，不任事，诸生分治其丧纪，而端己实刻其墓，敢请于夫子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278752_comment'></div>余复泣受之，曰：「是宜铭」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278752_comment'></div>端叟讳用中，平阳万全人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278752_comment'></div>考讳某，妣周氏，恣听端叟学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278752_comment'></div>端叟从余游最久，又因余之金华，依吕公伯恭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278752_comment'></div>之霅川，依薛公士龙，而其名遂载于人口耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278752_comment'></div>性温良，汎无不爱于久，故能分酸苦于先生长者，能受其烦辱之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278752_comment'></div>于其徒相厉以学，责难劝义，定为期会程式，稽考有诮，惰游有罚，其人严惮之，则所谓江南书社也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278752_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278752_comment'></div>死生之际，可以观人矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278752_comment'></div>端叟无毫发气力，无父子兄弟可以纳交，又无壮子也，而两邑之士交吊聚哭，为之执事焉，图铭焉，惟恐其有憾且遂磨灭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278752_comment'></div>是可以妄得之耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278752_comment'></div>若是，固不宜铭欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278752_comment'></div>娶叶氏，先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278752_comment'></div>有二女，顾言以季归诸郑氏妹之甥，长托之友，友合谋以余之兄子师宇为之媲，盖端叟之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278752_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1278752'>距江五里，寺曰宝积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278752_comment'></div>循除而西数十步，有壤隆然者，吾端叟之宅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278752_comment'></div>止过其下，考视此石。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1278752_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>　沈大经任满归乡，作诗酬赠。作品：闻沈元诚归自漳浦喜而奉寄。<span class='inlineComment2'>（沈大经字元诚，温州瑞安县人。曾授漳浦县主簿，未几辞归。生平见叶适所作《沈元诚墓志铭》。）</span><div id='poem_161777' class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161777_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161777'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161777'>荔圃班班熟，蚝房个个肥。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年</a>　陈傅良其时主管台州崇道观，作诗送叶适赴任。作品：送叶正则赴浙西宪幕。<span class='inlineComment2'>（叶适任浙西提刑干办公事在淳熙九年。）</span><div id='poem_161962' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161962_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161962'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161962'>频年送行客，酒罄诗不工。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161962'>最晚与君别，柰此百感丛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161962'>曹刘对匕箸，失色一语中。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_161962'>明朝蜀江水，不与灞浐通。<div id='poem_sentence_5_161962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_161962'>人心起毫末，世故关鸿蒙。<div id='poem_sentence_6_161962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_161962'>乃知贫贱交，不下王霸功。<div id='poem_sentence_7_161962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_161962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_161962'>相从自束发，各去随转蓬。<div id='poem_sentence_10_161962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_161962'>今怀欣有合，后会苦未重。<div id='poem_sentence_11_161962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_161962'>鲈鱼直万钱，羊酪醅一钟。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年</a>　刘仲光（字茂实）知奉新县事。作品：送刘茂实宰。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘仲光（字茂实），永嘉人，乾道二年进士，曾知和州。知奉新县事，淳熙九年八月叶适有序送之。）</span><div id='poem_161963' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161963' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161963?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送刘茂实宰奉新</a><span class='authorDate'>（1182年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_161963_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161963'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161963'>远别欲无寐，细论谁有酒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161963_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161963'>今当作剧县，君意亦乐不。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161963_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161963'>江湖吏道僻，岁月民劳久。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161963_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161963'>救之敝精神，自爱终袖手。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161963_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161963'>要中名甚美，用意物所咎。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161963_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_161963_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_161963'>赠言几满车，一字堪皓首。<div id='poem_sentence_7_161963_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年</a>　为朱兴国作圹识。作品：朱君佐圹识。<span class='inlineComment2'>（朱兴国，字君佐，温州永嘉人。其妻陈氏为陈傅良族姑。）</span><div id='poem_1278753' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278753' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278753?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朱君佐圹志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1182年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278753")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278753_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278753'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278753'>公姓朱氏，讳兴国，字君佐，温永嘉人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278753_comment'></div>考永，妣王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278753_comment'></div>享年五十，以淳熙二年十有一月卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278753_comment'></div>君佐娶陈氏，生子辄夭，以汲为己后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278753_comment'></div>晚得光孙，而君佐之丧未练又夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278753_comment'></div>陈氏为君佐之爱光孙也，以拱源为之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278753_comment'></div>三女，适丁子美、项敏中、陈宗渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278753_comment'></div>子美、宗渊皆尝荐国子学，亦辄不第死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278753_comment'></div>盖君佐卒七年，汲始克葬于所居里西山之麓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278753_comment'></div>且葬，陈氏使为志焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278753_comment'></div>陈氏，余族姑，而宗渊之姑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278753_comment'></div>予方哀宗渊呱呱二女莫适，顾托于是，感余姑之经纪朱氏，置孙以绵其祀，乞言以不陨其名也，喜且泣下，而刻藏诸竁，庶几其女不忍弃宗渊如其母然，而亦以解君佐之悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278753_comment'></div>葬以淳熙九年十有二月庚申。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1278753_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年</a>　郑自明卒，为作哀词。作品：郑自明哀词并序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（郑自明名鉴，三山人。为太学诸生时数与陈傅良游。乾道壬辰同试进士不第后三四年以释褐仕于朝。为大木压死。）</span><div id='poem_161946' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161946' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161946?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郑自明哀词<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序（题原缺，据四库本补））</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1182年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161946")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_161946_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161946'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161946'>母曰余儿兮，吾莫知其何尤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161946'>妇曰良人兮，吾曷为罹此忧。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161946'>兄弟不以是咎兮，朋友称其好脩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161946'>恭不得其故兮，庸强名之曰命。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161946'>相彼下堂而贻戚兮，或结缨以顺听。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_161946'>万不同咸自取兮，曾二者孰失其正声。<div id='poem_sentence_5_161946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_161946'>鬼神之所仇兮，人直躬焉是病。<div id='poem_sentence_6_161946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_161946'>胥属镂忽堕其前兮，屈鱼腹以为阱。<div id='poem_sentence_7_161946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_161946'>奇祸作于牖下兮，顾奚悲而宜庆。<div id='poem_sentence_8_161946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_161946'>嗟子何伤兮，独余怀不能以自胜。<div id='poem_sentence_9_161946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_161946'>尚或相尔藐孤兮，天终焉其有定<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《止斋先生文集》卷九）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_10_161946_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_161946'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_161946_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年</a>　郑自明卒，为作祭文。作品：祭郑自明。<div id='poem_1278790' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278790' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278790?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭郑自明文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1182年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278790")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278790_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278790'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278790'>呜呼哀哉，自明！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278790_comment'></div>余与君游久，知君之重其死也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278790_comment'></div>自为诸生，固曰士以一死，何乡不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278790_comment'></div>及其居朝，抗直自喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278790_comment'></div>每一进见，以所闻于宾客、厮役、某小人某小人之说，察察为上言之无讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278790_comment'></div>人数以为甚危，而君益奋然，虽万死无恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278790_comment'></div>然而阅其私，盖卫生甚谨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278790_comment'></div>尝访君爱亭之上，当暑命酒，余食瓜果，而君禁之勿多食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278790_comment'></div>他日过余，羹菌以馈，君曰：畴昔闻有以茹此死者，至今不近也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278790_comment'></div>啜茗饮水，靡不博问，恐以疾伤其母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278790_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278790_comment'></div>君诚重其死，而将有以处此矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278790_comment'></div>乃今死奇祸，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278790_comment'></div>余既甚悲，而莫推其故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278790_comment'></div>且惧知君之不详者，亦为惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278790_comment'></div>天啬其年，人害其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278790_comment'></div>呜呼衰哉，曷为自明？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278790_comment'></div>余故为斯文以哭君也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278790_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年</a>　为杨兴宗后母林氏作墓铭。作品：宜人林氏墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（林氏系林杞之女，杨缜继配，杨兴宗后母。杨兴宗曾考试乾道八年进士，陈傅良为其门下。）</span><div id='poem_1278754' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278754' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278754?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宜人林氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1182年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278754")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278754_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278754'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278754'>建炎间，天子柬拔民誉之士，一日而除台谏官四人：赵鼎、黎确、沈与求，而其一人监察御史讳惇礼者，福州长溪杨君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278754_comment'></div>御史生缜，今以朝奉郎致仕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278754_comment'></div>朝奉生兴宗，尝为尚书郎，出知处州，徙严州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278754_comment'></div>余所为铭林氏宜人之墓者，朝奉之配、严陵后母也，盖名家三世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278754_comment'></div>严州使人谓余曰：「始吾大父连以郎官御史召不起，晚日益窭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278754_comment'></div>兴宗生四岁矣，而吾母死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278754_comment'></div>母贤可赖，大父日夜念之不乐也，而求继于母家，是为宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278754_comment'></div>宜人虽归，不及大父顾托，然竟成其意，有信士不能然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278754_comment'></div>兴宗不善为言，犹能言一二以图铭于子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278754_comment'></div>宜人嫁橐费且尽，而刘氏姑死，吾父至无以买棺歛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278754_comment'></div>哀乱，计不知所出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278754_comment'></div>宜人泣谓曰：『不有吾头上一金钗乎』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278754_comment'></div>鬻之，而棺具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278754_comment'></div>兴宗之为太学诸生也，使遗之金若干两，曰：『吾所纺绩得此，以资汝』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278754_comment'></div>兴宗之得树立其身以答元母者，宜人之赐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278754_comment'></div>吾父从事临安，以其暇问养生于恩州李处士，得其方，一切屏事务自寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278754_comment'></div>宜人故清薄，亦即将顺，毁饰饭菜，为浮屠氏学，以迄偕老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278754_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278754_comment'></div>以大父之不乐念此也，至此而皆如其托言无咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278754_comment'></div>兴宗悲不能铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278754_comment'></div>若遂不铭，岂唯宜人，何以慰大父于土中」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278754_comment'></div>且宜人，余同郡平阳县人、通奉大夫林公祀之季女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278754_comment'></div>严州考试乾道八年进士，而余又辱为门下士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278754_comment'></div>夫论述乡党之美与诸老先生家事，以著之后世，抑余志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278754_comment'></div>宜人二十三岁嫁，又四十五岁卒，卒一岁若干日而葬，实淳熙九年十有一月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278754_comment'></div>女婿陈万章、孙男女四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278754_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1278754'>余尝过括苍，见其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278754_comment'></div>乐道太守之贤，而逮事父母之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278754_comment'></div>龟井之原，今为此铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278754_comment'></div>孰无人心？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278754_comment'></div>其永勿倾！</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1278754_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1182&endYear=1182')">1182年10月</a>　包昂卒，为作挽诗。作品：挽包颙叟。<span class='inlineComment2'>（包昂，字颙叟，乐清人。据叶适《包颙叟墓记》，包昂淳熙九年十月卒。）</span><div id='poem_161786' class='authorDate'>（1183年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_161553_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161553'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161553'>浅杯莫到十分酣，但爱齁齁夜梦甘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161553'>万里桑麻风雨好，一夫尸禄我何惭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161553'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_161553_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161834' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161834' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161834?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢倅生日</a><span class='authorDate'>（1183年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161834")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161834_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161834'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161834'>此夕其如好客何，秋风袅袅水微波。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161834'>渡江公子今无恙，上蔡家声世不多。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161834'>未放清朝空老去，欲谈前事竟谁过。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161834_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161834_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1183')">1183年</a>　任汝弼赴任江阴，以诗送行。作品：送任虞卿教授江阴。<span id='poem_sentence_0_161739'>学省穿杨末，江城振羽端。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161739'>声名人不忌，仕宦意常宽。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161739'>缺月天将曙，孤村岁已寒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161739'>小舟来话别，此道少人敦。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161739_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161739'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161739_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1183')">1183年</a>　方郡小旱汪守祷雨甚急，祷三日而雨至郡人大喜。是日有改刺之命。作品：送郡守汪充之移治严陵。<span class='inlineComment2'>（汪义端充之知温州事失载，淳熙十年知严陵即严州。）</span><div id='poem_161982' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161982' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161982?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送郡守汪充之移治严陵<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1183年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161982")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_161982_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_161982_0'>① 方郡小旱，汪祷雨甚急，祷三日而雨至。郡人大喜，是日有改刺之命</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161982'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161982'>挂梁龙骨经时蛰，井井黄云秋已及。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161982'>十日不雨民未急，使君日膳长蔬湆。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161982'>澄空飒飒云雾入，馌妇休眠儿觅笠。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161982'>村舂化出云子粒，市上明朝升二十。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161982'>农家语圃商语贾，恒愿使君无疾苦。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_161982'>自今一饭吾腹果，健看将母从箫鼓。<div id='poem_sentence_5_161982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_161982'>冯翊扶风天尺五，见说严陵在何所。<div id='poem_sentence_6_161982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_161982'>诏书夺去万舌吐，九重欲扣君门阻。<div id='poem_sentence_7_161982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_161982'>栖鸟护巢驹恋皂，东人自视西人好。<div id='poem_sentence_8_161982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_161982'>那知湛露漙秋草，春意平铺无剩少。<div id='poem_sentence_9_161982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_161982'>有客解事翻然笑，元祐治平诸故老，身要人扶功未了。<div id='poem_sentence_10_161982_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_161982'>谁知青丝络马横门道，应笑江湖华发早。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_161982_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1183')">1183年</a>　为刘端木作墓铭。作品：刘端木墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘春字端木与陈傅良同入太学，且进士同年。）</span><div id='poem_1278755' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278755' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278755?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刘端木墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1183年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278755")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278755_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278755'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278755'>端木，温永嘉人，姓刘氏，讳春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278755_comment'></div>以待台州教授阙，卒于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278755_comment'></div>大父机，父立己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278755_comment'></div>戴氏出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278755_comment'></div>端木性冲约，事后母孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278755_comment'></div>与兄弟无违，于朋友亲故用其情，然所蕴抱贵不为人知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278755_comment'></div>貌言恂恂若庸人，然见之者以为亡异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278755_comment'></div>其试礼部，余尝问所为文何如，但谢不能；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278755_comment'></div>已而擢进士丙科，复谢，是适然耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278755_comment'></div>他日过括苍，端木为其州户掾，问政何如？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278755_comment'></div>亦谢如初；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278755_comment'></div>比谒其守与郡之善士，亟称端木综理之才，所关白感风，凡在官无及之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278755_comment'></div>余与端木同入太学，同为乾道八年进士，议论往复最密，至相好也，自其文辞政事，不欲使余知之，况他人乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278755_comment'></div>顾端木亡矣，意所欲施为，虽余未得尽知之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278755_comment'></div>世多言古今人不同，以余观端木，与书传间所载深厚有德之士异耶同耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278755_comment'></div>端木为吏三年，守蒙其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278755_comment'></div>然往往欲挑动之，使自有言，然后荐举之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278755_comment'></div>近制，选人满岁无举主且再试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278755_comment'></div>端木即怡然，将诣吏部，而竟不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278755_comment'></div>此其视古人特未知孰难也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278755_comment'></div>斯人也而在高位，则士或知耻矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278755_comment'></div>少得疾，良已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278755_comment'></div>比罢司户，时疾复作，明年，淳熙七年闰三月某日卒，年四十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278755_comment'></div>又明年六月某日，后母吴氏夫人卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278755_comment'></div>初娶朱氏，某州司理参军某之女，逾年卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278755_comment'></div>再娶宋氏，故御史台主簿敦书之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278755_comment'></div>生一子，小，赵抱而养之于其父党，今几岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278755_comment'></div>十年闰十有一月某日，宋与其伯氏奉吴夫人与端木之柩，将祔于屋前山之祖垄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278755_comment'></div>卜人曰：「未吉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278755_comment'></div>遂殡焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278755_comment'></div>宋氏之弟昌国主簿某，能左右其女兄，于是殡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278755_comment'></div>又能前事请余而为之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278755_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1278755'>有相其孤，系岂不昌？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278755_comment'></div>有刻其墓，名岂不长？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278755_comment'></div>位若年耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278755_comment'></div>谁尸此者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278755_comment'></div>天耶！</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1278755_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1183')">1183年</a>　受陈子益所托，为作墓铭。作品：陈子益母夫人墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈子益字端己，陈傅良学生。）</span><div id='poem_1278756' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278756' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278756?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈子益母夫人墓铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1183年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278756")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278756_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278756'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278756'>陈子端己自平阳将父天锡之命来，再拜乞铭其母林氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278756_comment'></div>余方铭亡友刘端木，未暇也，乃即馆中，越五六日，请不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278756_comment'></div>顷，尝过陈子之家，见其父子兄弟少长坐立进退秩秩然，无疾呼暴语，无弗友之色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278756_comment'></div>于是，端己请辞曰：「母氏归为冢妇，逮事曾祖姑，奉诸祖母以同居，祖行无在者，又奉吾父与世父母同居，凡五十年矣，一似先生乡所见然，敢以是为铭首」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278756_comment'></div>余曰：「吾得铭而母也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278756_comment'></div>妇德莫如睦，睦莫如能长久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278756_comment'></div>而母处三世之族且六十有四年，而家人无改于其旧，合二难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278756_comment'></div>德如是，人谓之何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278756_comment'></div>铭如是，人谓之何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278756_comment'></div>陈子再拜谢：「幸甚」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278756_comment'></div>其葬日，淳熙十年闰月某日；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278756_comment'></div>其地，所居万全乡管奥之叶原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278756_comment'></div>其婿朱次宣，子明畏、端己、彪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278756_comment'></div>端己从余学，彪为比丘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1278756_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1183')">1183年</a>　吴芾卒，为作挽诗。作品：挽吴明可给事。<span class='inlineComment2'>（吴明可名芾，号湖山居士，台州仙居人。前后守六郡，以龙图阁直学士致仕。宋史有传。）</span><div id='poem_161790' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161790' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161790?labeling=true' target='_blank'>挽吴明可给事<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1183年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161790")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161790_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161790'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161790'>诸老俱沦落，流风日转移。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161790'>独怀忧国意，长说渡江时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161790'>姓字谁如此，功名早不疑。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161790'>却收湖海气，燕坐雪垂颐。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161790'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161790_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161789' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161789' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161789?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1183年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161789_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161789'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161789'>忆上诸生谒，公方薄恙侵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161789'>欣然蒙絮帽，恨不醉花阴。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161789'>自说看人熟，相期晚岁深。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161789'>半天苍岭雪，回首为沾襟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161789'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161789_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_161789'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_161789_0'>⑴ 自注：谒公之夕，宿苍岭下，天大雪，明日岭上深数尺。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_161789_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1183')">1183年</a>　为林民达作墓铭。作品：林民达墓志铭。<div id='poem_1278757' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278757' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278757?labeling=true' target='_blank'>林民达墓铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1183年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278757")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278757_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278757'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278757'>民达讳悦，姓林氏，温瑞安帆游人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278757_comment'></div>祖考讳伯英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278757_comment'></div>考讳植，妣孙氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278757_comment'></div>娶程氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278757_comment'></div>享年七十，卒于淳熙十年六月癸卯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278757_comment'></div>男三人：开、闻、訚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278757_comment'></div>女适章绂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278757_comment'></div>孙男女八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278757_comment'></div>闻早卒，程氏亦先十有四年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278757_comment'></div>初，民达葬程氏于所居里之椒原，已而迁茶原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278757_comment'></div>迁葬之十有九日，而民达卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278757_comment'></div>开以其年十有一月丁酉合竁于茶原，而来乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278757_comment'></div>铭曰：民达善治生，尝为余言，少遭父丧，一日佣者数十辈，立门请所使，久不能遣，吾内惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278757_comment'></div>于是夜为条处，而旦授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278757_comment'></div>日力半而功倍，以故益矜奋，志亦浸长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278757_comment'></div>盖民达治生，以惠为取，以华为俭，以善忍为断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278757_comment'></div>童仆鸡犬，养之各得其欲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278757_comment'></div>树木蔬蓏，艺之各遂其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278757_comment'></div>亭榭门巷，藩溷井堰，治之皆中绳墨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278757_comment'></div>予乡之言生理者归焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278757_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278757_comment'></div>士习为浮辞，以干有司之试，苟中其度，即得为官人，予之州县，辄不理，吏卒抢攘，莫能整齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278757_comment'></div>向使不限科目，以能见推择如民达者陈力于世，曷可少哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278757_comment'></div>民达，余里中人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278757_comment'></div>计天下之大，不但如民达者何限？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278757_comment'></div>然而世常有乏使之患，余所以惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278757_comment'></div>州城之南，距瑞安为路七十里，土石垫陷，行者病溺，更太守数人，欲缮宅之，重其役，不敢起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278757_comment'></div>民达慨然夷十里，所以为式，庶几当官者见知，有气力者相随和，以自托不朽，而亦弗就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278757_comment'></div>余读太史公书，至闾里布衣之士，有节可以见世而不遇者，皆录勿遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278757_comment'></div>故余之铭民达者如是云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1278757_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1183&endYear=1183')">1183年</a>　何恢卒，为作挽诗。作品：挽婺女何茂宏。<span class='inlineComment2'>（何恢字茂宏，陈亮岳父，卒于淳熙十年七月三十日。）</span><div id='poem_161805' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161805' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161805?labeling=true' target='_blank'>挽婺女何茂宏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1183年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161805")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161805_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161805'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161805'>劝驾尝连萼，应门忽二毛。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161805_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161805'>竟于时不偶，吾更晚相遭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161805_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161805'>宿草堪挥泪，丰碑忍泚毫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161805_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161805'>送车今几两，谁最恋绨袍。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161805_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161805'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161805_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1184&endYear=1184')">1184年</a>　差知桂阳军未赴，日覃思于六经，将有所述，以开后学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1184&endYear=1184')">1184年</a>　为同年林季友送别，作诗。作品：送同年林多益丞宁海。<span class='inlineComment2'>（林季友字多益，瑞安人，乾道八年进士，历官浙东提刑。据《台学统》卷五十五《重修黄岩诸闸记》和《宋史·河渠志》，林季友多益淳熙十二年已丞宁海，故此诗当作于淳熙十一年左右。）</span><div id='poem_161964' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161964' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161964?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送同年林多益丞宁海</a><span class='authorDate'>（1184年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161964")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_161964_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161964'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161964'>同里衣冠近阔疏，同年齿发多衰变。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161964_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161964'>美人宜在玉笋班，隐吏亦随花雨县。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161964_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161964'>有杭一苇逢迎可，每食双鱼甘旨便。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161964_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161964'>顾瞻周道竟何如，善为身谋吾岂愿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161964_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161964'>清庙笙镛济济陈，碧梧鸾鹄深深见。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161964_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_161964'>由来盛事岁月晚，谁到脩途肝胆健。<div id='poem_sentence_5_161964_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_161964'>杨花吹水酒摇波，一请加餐再无倦。<div id='poem_sentence_6_161964_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_161964'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_161964_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1184&endYear=1184')">1184年</a>　与陈亮书信往复。作品：答陈同父书三首。<div id='poem_1278422' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278422' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278422?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答陈同父书<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1184年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278422")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278422_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278422'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278422'>某寻常人耳，蒙老兄拈掇最早，而晚又为正则推作前辈行，此二三年间，虽不乡进，而交游殊未散落，皆二兄之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278422_comment'></div>独恨未及与晦庵游，讲求馀论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278422_comment'></div>如人一身血气偏枯，以是脉络未相贯穿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278422_comment'></div>而愚见复谓千书不如一见，终当相就，不欲以纸笔呶呶其间，以辞害意，失之远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278422_comment'></div>老兄悬度，而欲附之下风，此意厚甚，而不敢当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278422_comment'></div>往还诸书，熟复数过，不知几年间更有一番如此议论，甚盛甚盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278422_comment'></div>然朱丈占得地段平正，有以逸待劳之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278422_comment'></div>老兄跳踉号呼，拥戈直上，而无修辞之功，较是输他一著也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278422_comment'></div>以不肖者妄论，功到成处，便是有德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278422_comment'></div>事到济处，便是有理，此老兄之说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278422_comment'></div>如此，则三代圣贤，枉作工夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278422_comment'></div>功有适成，何必有德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278422_comment'></div>事有偶济，何必有理？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278422_comment'></div>此朱丈之说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278422_comment'></div>如此，则汉祖唐宗，贤于盗贼不远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278422_comment'></div>以三代圣贤枉作工夫，则是人力可以独运；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278422_comment'></div>以汉祖唐宗贤于盗贼不远，则是天命可以苟得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278422_comment'></div>谓人力可以独运，其弊上无兢畏之君；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278422_comment'></div>谓天命可以苟得，其弊下有觊觎之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278422_comment'></div>二君子立论，不免于为骄君乱臣之地，窃所未安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278422_comment'></div>以兄之奇伟，适不如《乐毅论》之迂阔，朱丈之正大，适不如《王命论》之浅近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278422_comment'></div>是尚为有益于训乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278422_comment'></div>且朱丈便谓兄贬抑三代，而兄以朱丈使五百年间成大空阔，至于其间颇近忿争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278422_comment'></div>养心之平，何必及此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278422_comment'></div>不得不尽情以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278422_comment'></div>然勿为晦庵言之，徒若犯分也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1278422_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278423' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278423' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278423?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1184年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278423_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278423'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278423'>自七月间病暑几殆，凡事尽废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278423_comment'></div>蔡直之到阙，欲附数字，犹未能自强也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278423_comment'></div>瞻仰叹故，何可胜道？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278423_comment'></div>专人惠书，就审讯后尊候万福，慰怿之至！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278423_comment'></div>各年半百馀，岁不过一再相问劳，无由聚头，又堪懊意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278423_comment'></div>某昔者何所有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278423_comment'></div>今者何所进？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278423_comment'></div>自是老兄诸人，过相拈掇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278423_comment'></div>每自谓人品极是寻常，而亦碍人眼孔，端是友朋捧拥之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278423_comment'></div>近来衰惰，益见天道尚思而好安，无复更有他念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278423_comment'></div>来书方以为课进，岂以为尚妄意当世乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278423_comment'></div>然老兄之论，要是颠扑不破，若得人之伏，不免背去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278423_comment'></div>求一喜之遇，随手败阙，只是侵砌斗合工夫，能有多少光景？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278423_comment'></div>往时曾与东莱语及，非来复安得浸长？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278423_comment'></div>老子极以为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278423_comment'></div>所不识亦与求意略同否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278423_comment'></div>然非劣弟所当言，请置是事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278423_comment'></div>元晦往复诸书，何尝敢道老兄点当得错？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278423_comment'></div>只是书中词气全似衲子当面棒喝之语，不应写在纸上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278423_comment'></div>一便传十，百便传千，岂可不忍耐，特择言语？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278423_comment'></div>却乃信手添起，后生胡乱模画，而元晦亦赶趁出了无限不恰好话。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278423_comment'></div>故亦为修辞之难，而辄进区区之见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278423_comment'></div>老兄既叹作附势，令人不敢再三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278423_comment'></div>且汉唐事业，若说并无分毫扶助正道，教谁肯伏？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278423_comment'></div>孔孟劳忉，与管仲、百里奚分疏，亦太浅矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278423_comment'></div>「暗合」两字，如何断人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278423_comment'></div>识得三两分，便有三两分功用，识得六七分，便有六七分功用，却有全然识了，为作不行，放低一着之理，决无全然不识，横作竖作，偶然撞着之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278423_comment'></div>此亦分晓，不须多论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278423_comment'></div>但老兄任直，不能廉纤，自占便宜，其间时有漏气言语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278423_comment'></div>元晦执以见攻，盖是忠爱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278423_comment'></div>然亦缘要攻老兄漏气去处，遂把话头脱体蹉过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278423_comment'></div>此劣弟愚陋之见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278423_comment'></div>若两家元不是如此，则是智不足以知两家耳，初非有轻重抑扬之论也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1278423_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278424' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278424' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278424?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1184年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278424_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278424'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278424'>自两婿入馆，继以迁徙少定，欲遣人间，应之报有意外之挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278424_comment'></div>方谢绝人事，无从问讯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278424_comment'></div>且道远，不详本末，无着力处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278424_comment'></div>但与老妻日夜悬念，长吁窃叹而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278424_comment'></div>子约来言，事已明白，不堕小人阱中，尽室惊喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278424_comment'></div>嗟乎，怪哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278424_comment'></div>老兄直至此也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278424_comment'></div>天之生才，不遇则亦已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278424_comment'></div>闾巷虮虱之徒，时欲置之罪罟，若非朝家以不杀士为国是，法令明具，有司其能不放手生事耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278424_comment'></div>兄当未易免祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278424_comment'></div>吾辈平时每欲望人度外，□宽绳墨以便功名之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278424_comment'></div>由今观之，□士以此免，不知几人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278424_comment'></div>则议论诚难事耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278424_comment'></div>又况朋友满世，一旦有缓急，束手无策，若衰朽尤荷亲爱，亦不过叫冤叫苦，与坐视者无异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278424_comment'></div>即知老兄负谤负累，奔走乡曲之急，直是枉却。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278424_comment'></div>举此两端，方服前辈遵守三尺，不敢放开一线稳便话头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278424_comment'></div>又居乡如处女，虽亲戚在缧绁之中，或不营救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278424_comment'></div>乃是知时识势，非苟然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278424_comment'></div>老兄数年以来，再脱于祸，目今亦只得还他本朝学者辙样，将秦汉间士大夫公案一切封起，未当其位，屈着头，合着眼，杜门燕坐，以养和平之福而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278424_comment'></div>浙西别业，稍有伦序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278424_comment'></div>渐为择乡之计，尤所愿望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278424_comment'></div>某腐生之说，虽可厌薄，然不到老兄之前，他谁敢言者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278424_comment'></div>急时坐视，慢时以空言相切，某则自知罪矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278424_comment'></div>幸察，至望。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1278424_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1184&endYear=1184')">1184年</a>　为朱黻之父作圹志。作品：朱公向圹志。<span class='inlineComment2'>（朱公向是朱黼父。朱黼字文昭，平阳南雁人，屡举不第，布衣。陈傅良友。）</span><div id='poem_1278759' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278759' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278759?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朱公向圹志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1184年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278759")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278759_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278759'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278759'>初，平阳之俗，以速葬为不坏，而其流入于阴阳家之说，与治宾客之事，俗成则闻见熟，闻见熟则异焉者，乃反以为怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278759_comment'></div>故虽知名之士不能免也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278759_comment'></div>阴阳之说，余不知起何时，而知其不出于三代也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278759_comment'></div>王季之葬也，水齧其墓，见前和而后改葬，重动危其亲也如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278759_comment'></div>由今阴阳家言之，不祥莫大焉，而王季子孙皆圣人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278759_comment'></div>子孙圣与愚，阴阳家固不论，然造周数百年，其不得为不祥也甚著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278759_comment'></div>若必曰改葬而后有此，则文武之生久矣，其造周不待改葬也又甚著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278759_comment'></div>且三圣人者，不知水齧墓之为不祥，而不速改，是不智也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278759_comment'></div>知其为不祥，必见前和而后改，是不仁也，圣人虑不及此焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278759_comment'></div>而今日者曰：「吾虑过圣人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278759_comment'></div>是果足信欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278759_comment'></div>然而举世惑之，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278759_comment'></div>彼委巷之民怵于其言者，妄以其亲徼利然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278759_comment'></div>学士大夫，岂忍以其亲为利，而惑焉者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278759_comment'></div>又何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278759_comment'></div>吾友朱黼使来告葬，曰：「某先君子以隆兴元年某月日卒，祖妣以乾道二年某月日卒，而二伯母、伯兄若弟卒亦若干年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278759_comment'></div>今为淳熙十有一年，某始克以十有二月庚申葬祖妣于邑施岩之西原，以先君子祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278759_comment'></div>去墓百步，得中屿，又以葬诸母、兄弟，凡四柩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278759_comment'></div>黼也大惧不克如礼经，惟先生宠识铭之，以免于罪」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278759_comment'></div>又曰：「先考病且革，有以上世墓不利请迁者，先君泣禁之，曰：『暴吾亲之骨于地上，而苟得活，吾弗如死也』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278759_comment'></div>又曰：「王母之治命曰：『而父生能养，死不可去吾侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278759_comment'></div>他日葬我，必以而父祔』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278759_comment'></div>黼之言云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278759_comment'></div>诚如黼言，其王母以祔葬为是，苟祔葬，虽死乐也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278759_comment'></div>其父以迁葬为非，是苟迁葬，虽生不乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278759_comment'></div>则朱氏盖闻礼者也，不惑于阴阳之说者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278759_comment'></div>黼诵斯言也，以为称首，乞铭若是，而犹缓葬，余故曰：俗成，则知名之士不能免也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278759_comment'></div>余为斯文，既以慰解黼之悲，因以劝人子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278759_comment'></div>朱氏世家平阳杉桥里，黼祖母姓章氏，享年七十八，太学生升之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278759_comment'></div>父讳某，字公向，享年四十四，娶杨氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278759_comment'></div>子男二人，黻早卒，四柩之所谓弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278759_comment'></div>女四人，适某人某人，一为浮屠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278759_comment'></div>公向能教黼，章氏能成公向志，杨氏又世守之，黼故得为知名士云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1278759_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1184&endYear=1184')">1184年</a>　为徐谊父作墓铭。作品：承事郎徐公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1278761' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278761' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278761?labeling=true' target='_blank'>承事郎徐公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1184年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278761")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278761_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278761'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278761'>公讳迪哲，字某，姓徐氏，世温之平阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278761_comment'></div>子谊，吾友也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278761_comment'></div>乾道八年吾友之同第进士者，独余不幸蚤孤，不逮事父母，而诸君之亲尚多无恙，里中人往往以为贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278761_comment'></div>未几，连哭吊三四人，至是，又哭公焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278761_comment'></div>方初第时，三四人者或在甲科，或为礼部第一人，里中之致贺者，谓君旦夕宦达，其及亲宜如何，而其亲亦自喜幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278761_comment'></div>今十三年矣，皆为吏州县，类不满岁以忧去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278761_comment'></div>谊立朝稍久，以太常丞遇大飨明堂，天子加恩群臣，授公京官，而亦命下之逾月以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278761_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278761_comment'></div>士宦达不达，何足道哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278761_comment'></div>而患故交遍至此，余故于铭公悲以感也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278761_comment'></div>公慈惠笃厚，不缘饰辞，终其身，于人怡怡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278761_comment'></div>其子弟厮役，无不意满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278761_comment'></div>而谊复以经明行修、善与人交闻于当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278761_comment'></div>盖州闾长老尝识公者，见谊即喜，以为似公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278761_comment'></div>天下之士识谊者，或见公，又喜似谊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278761_comment'></div>谊年且四十，未有子，公念不释；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278761_comment'></div>已而妇娠，又念万一幸得孙，而客都下，保养乳母未必善视儿也，即挈其妇还乡，得孙而公病矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278761_comment'></div>谊仓皇告归，后盖棺之日始至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278761_comment'></div>公曰：「苟谊有子，虽不在吾左右，甚乐」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278761_comment'></div>谊曰：「苟知公不死于其手，虽卿相不愿也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278761_comment'></div>大父某，父某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278761_comment'></div>娶某氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278761_comment'></div>年若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278761_comment'></div>卒于淳熙十年某月，以明年二月某日葬瑞安来暮乡明教院之后山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278761_comment'></div>长子之仁蚤卒，于是祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278761_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1278761'>夫完而固深，坎而厚封树者，是谁之墓欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278761_comment'></div>其子徐子之父欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278761_comment'></div>惟其孝慈，足以有此，万有千载，谁非人子？</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1278761_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1184&endYear=1184')">1184年</a>　春与堂弟陈武唱和。作品：用前韵招蕃叟弟仍和蕃叟癸卯二绝。<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈武字蕃叟，陈傅良族弟，淳熙五年进士。）</span><div id='poem_161869' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161869' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161869?labeling=true' target='_blank'>用前韵招蕃叟弟仍和蕃叟癸卯二绝<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1184年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161869")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161869_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161869'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161869'>细看物理愁如海，遥想朋从眼欲花。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161869'>逆水鱼儿冲断岸，贪泥燕子堕危沙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161869'>百年乔木参天上，一昔平芜著处佳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161869'>行乐不妨随邂逅，我无官守似蚔蛙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161869'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161869_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161868' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161868' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_161868_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161868'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161868'>落花风雨奈愁何，愁亦不应缘落花。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161868'>尚可流觞追曲水，底须占鵩似长沙<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：孟夏事。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161868'>无人晤语鸟乌落，为我食贫楼笋佳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161868_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161543'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161543'>大飨须三饭，中黄起四维。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161544'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161544'>功名还壮士，道术付诸儒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161544_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161544_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1185&endYear=1185')">1185年2月</a>　乙巳岁首寄赠诗歌与彭仲刚和徐谊。作品：乙巳岁首寄彭子复徐子宜。<span class='inlineComment2'>（彭子复名仲刚，温州平阳人；徐谊字子宜，陈傅良同乡并同年进士，《宋史》有传。）</span><div id='poem_161624' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161624' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_161624'>岁烦士友愁薪米，日见儿童叹鬓毛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161624'>乱卉各随分寸长，新禽已变两三号。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1185&endYear=1185')">1185年2月</a>　吕琰卒，为作挽诗。作品：挽新昌吕修职。<span class='inlineComment2'>（吕琰字德文，子元之、声之等。陈傅良在新昌馆黄度家时，吕氏子弟多从其学。）</span><div id='poem_162004' id='poem_sentence_0_162004'>顷作庵庐客，看公手种莳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_162004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_162004'>溪毛无乱理，宰木有连枝。<div
