target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年2月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_162005_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_162005'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_162005'>不道千山阻，将遗百世名。<div id='poem_sentence_0_162005_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_162005'>有儿能自致，此老已堪铭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_162005_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_162005'>禄岂无三釜，贤谁似一经。<div id='poem_sentence_2_162005_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_162005'>吾词虽未就，应有护幽扃。<div id='poem_sentence_3_162005_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_162005'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_162005_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1185&endYear=1185')">1185年2月</a>　族叔陈方中卒，为作挽诗。作品：挽族叔父。<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈方中字国任，陈傅良族叔。）</span><div id='poem_161804' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161804' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161804?labeling=true' target='_blank'>挽族叔父<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161804")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161804_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161804'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161804'>松竹深围屋，□莲剩种鱼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161804_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161804'>所愁宾客少，不问稻粱馀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161804_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161804'>尽日□相语，盈门手自书。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161804_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161804'>吾儿有名字，万事听何如。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161804_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161804'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161804_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161803' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161803' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161803?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年2月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161803_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161803'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161803'>我怀终古恨，不及奉觞时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161803'>满眼看诸弟，何心赋此诗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161803'>牛羊来蛰蛰，丘墓去累累。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161803'>亦有千钟养，曾无一字碑<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：蕃叟自为尊人埋铭。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161803'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161803_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1185&endYear=1185')">1185年3月</a>　居乡授徒讲学期间，重修石冈斗门。作品：重修石冈斗门记。<div id='poem_1278731' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278731' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278731?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重修石岗斗门记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278731")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278731_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278731'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278731'>元礼四年，宋兴百有馀载矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278731_comment'></div>郡丞赵㞦景仁行县，与令朱素履常、隐士林石介夫赋诗记事，则有《观石岗斗门》之作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278731_comment'></div>是时国家方修农田水利之政，通守与其属邑若布衣巡行阡陌咏歌民事，而郡守李公钧报之以诗，亦相劳苦往还如交游，岂不盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278731_comment'></div>而事何患不集者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278731_comment'></div>然诗不著其所始，则有门旧矣，不知其起何时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278731_comment'></div>绍兴之季年，屋闸俱坏，独两股岸与沟底以巨木为之，长或三丈，而厚径尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278731_comment'></div>有屹然存者，往往朱令之遗迹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278731_comment'></div>余为儿时，逮见父老多喜道斗门事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278731_comment'></div>盖门始附穗丰山之南址，以距海远，泻水不效，而议迁置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278731_comment'></div>三乡之人，聚讼不决也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278731_comment'></div>须时潦至，乃为木鹅数十，即并山诸水所发源纵之，而观其所会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278731_comment'></div>则旦日会于石岗，又患其平壤，不能音耐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278731_comment'></div>岁月，涸而审之，皆硗埆沙碛，与地名不谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278731_comment'></div>穴以锄锸，率人日得土盈斗，于是定迁，则其谋始甚长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278731_comment'></div>虽更元丰之盛，人精其能，虑不可易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278731_comment'></div>浦堙而门废，民久病而官不省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278731_comment'></div>乾道间，莆田刘朔为司户，喜事及物，隐士之孙以告，刘辄率余夜诣门所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278731_comment'></div>迟明，天大寒，垂垂欲雪，招渔舟，泥行数十里，役夫皆冻慄，幸且已，而刘不已，竟遵海堧，引絙以度其浦脩广之数，而归白郡，郡不果听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278731_comment'></div>又三年，故国子司业王公速为守，尝用钱五十万，民夫二万四千，通其故浦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278731_comment'></div>然是役也，浚浦之功居多，而以馀力及门，唯支倾填漏，苟完而已，盖以俟后之人，而复不省，浸趋于废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278731_comment'></div>知州事李公棫与通判谢公杰慨然念之，谓主簿石宜翁能以钱七十万，俾治其役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278731_comment'></div>发视遗址，则股岸之木，蛆食之过半；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278731_comment'></div>沟底板亦浸淫漱啮，穿𡕎百孔矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278731_comment'></div>知县事刘龟从又劝得民钱六十万，而县自助致五万，宜翁因择其乡之秀黄廷瑞者三人以莅匠，以石代木，撤旧而新之，为岸若干丈，为底若干丈，为闸之里蔽若干丈，益其柱若干为若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278731_comment'></div>上为覆屋，旁为辅梁，凡百可久，无不臻极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278731_comment'></div>不惟还吾民之利如初，而又过望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278731_comment'></div>讫事，公以刘、石之请，属其为之记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278731_comment'></div>嗟夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278731_comment'></div>自元丰至于今日，百有馀载矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278731_comment'></div>人多言时不同，吏道相绳切益薄，顾事无可为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278731_comment'></div>惟公惇大乐易，不以独见之明治郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278731_comment'></div>谢公以风流文雅，时出而缘饰之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278731_comment'></div>上下相安，阖境自以无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278731_comment'></div>因以整暇之际，出帑钱四百万，治三邑之道阻，而且为此门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278731_comment'></div>既付之人，则一听其自为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278731_comment'></div>淹速良楛，未尝过问，馈劳时至，无以简书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278731_comment'></div>故其人不以见察为忧，而以欺为耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278731_comment'></div>务趋其难，用情于文具之外，以求追元丰之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278731_comment'></div>尚可以想见承平盛时，为长吏者之意向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278731_comment'></div>使绍兴之末，官与民同患如此，则必不坏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278731_comment'></div>使刘司户之说行，虽坏亦必不极，近十五六年间，有补门事之缺，犹不至如今日大费甚劳而难复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278731_comment'></div>然以积坏之极，费大而劳甚，视元丰特为难，而卒复之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278731_comment'></div>事之废兴，要亦顾其人如何尔，而但曰「时不同，事无可为」者，吾不信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278731_comment'></div>淳熙十二年三月记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1278731_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1185&endYear=1185')">1185年8月</a>　薛良朋卒，为作挽诗。作品：挽薛季益尚书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（薛良朋（1116-1185），字季益，瑞安白门人，绍兴8年第进士，官终吏部尚书，卒赠光禄大夫，鲁国公。）</span><div id='poem_161809' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161809' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161809?labeling=true' target='_blank'>挽薛季益尚书<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161809")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161809_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161809'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161809'>遍试江淮声藉藉，久劳荆蜀鬓苍苍。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161809_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161809'>同时半已登槐棘，卒岁才能足稻粱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161809_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161809'>遗藁不为他日计，佳城尚及此丘藏。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161809_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161809'>岂无后作多文胜，今我怀人泪欲滂。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161809_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161809'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161809_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_162006' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_162006' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/162006?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年8月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_162006_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_162006'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_162006'>州里谁如此达尊，户庭深静最情敦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_162006_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_162006'>不将尺牍通当路，却枉扁舟访杜门。<div id='poem_sentence_1_162006_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_162006'>每见色温如有属，欲书心愧不能言。<div id='poem_sentence_2_162006_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_162006'>从今若祭枌榆社，好配横塘两献樽<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：公与许忠简公居同乡。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_162006_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_162006'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_162006_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1185&endYear=1185')">1185年</a>　与贾俨书信往来。作品：答贾端老书五首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（贾俨字端老，乐清人。叶适有《题贾俨不忘室诗》。）</span><div id='poem_1278416' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278416' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278416?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答贾端老书<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278416")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278416_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278416'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278416'>去载蒙肯来相与于寂寞之滨，荷意不浅浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278416_comment'></div>发齿衰改，无复它觊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278416_comment'></div>傥假之年，获与士友，共图不腐于经术之馀，志愿足已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278416_comment'></div>閒居，须课一书，要当自《古文书》始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278416_comment'></div>踰年便可到《春秋》之末，而及《通鉴》可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278416_comment'></div>益热，未知会期，愿言加爱。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1278416_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278417' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278417' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278417?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278417_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278417'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278417'>别去殊恨匆匆，以循陔之念，不欲奉留，然终不满也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278417_comment'></div>《左传》且熟读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278417_comment'></div>见得隐、桓以前，僖、文之际，哀、定终篇，无虑三变纲目，则成书举矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278417_comment'></div>其它依经为传，文无虚发，优游不迫，而意已独至，盖非二家所能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278417_comment'></div>非一二面剖，难以笔舌尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278417_comment'></div>懿仲诸友已决谋迁书院于先人垄下，以为来岁过从之地，入春便下手，春暮当奉约矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1278417_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278418' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278418' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278418?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278418_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278418'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278418'>蒙恩守垒，交游借誉之力多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278418_comment'></div>幸甚以感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278418_comment'></div>读《左氏》书，颇有条贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278418_comment'></div>疏示于所当报，已一一据见释其左方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278418_comment'></div>有一二条，似不足疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278418_comment'></div>若今年了此书，开岁便可从太史公《史记》下手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278418_comment'></div>陈了翁云：譬如缉麻，忙复暂舍，暇而续之，自成长条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278418_comment'></div>不忘室铭，才就即附上，应不但已也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278418_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278419' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278419' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278419?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278419_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278419'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278419'>近稍为眼昏花，不能苦读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278419_comment'></div>每客去，则玩想向来所诵习自娱，不足为念也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278419_comment'></div>示谕看过《左氏传》，甚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278419_comment'></div>疏问数条，只是小小事目，未是穿贯五霸之变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278419_comment'></div>五霸功罪未分，则东迁之不竞与历年多处未见著落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278419_comment'></div>《春秋》同是圣人经世之用，要其托史见义，以五霸为据案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278419_comment'></div>而《左氏》合诸国之史，发明经所不书，以表见其所书，因五霸之兴衰，究观王道之缺，则战国之事起，周亡而秦汉出矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278419_comment'></div>此其大略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278419_comment'></div>若夫精详，非面莫究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278419_comment'></div>太史公书又以接《尚书》、《春秋》之统绪，而下逮秦汉，其用功略与《左氏》同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278419_comment'></div>而不敢比儗《春秋》，是以变为纪、传、世家、书、表耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278419_comment'></div>何当合并，共讲其指。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278419_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278420' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278420' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278420?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278420_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278420'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278420'>读《史记》甚善，然有猥駮奇怪之疑，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278420_comment'></div>获麟以后，孟、荀推尊孔氏，明礼义之统纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278420_comment'></div>二子死，百氏益乱真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278420_comment'></div>老儒如浮丘伯、伏生之徒，区区于秦楚之际，抱经自□，而其力不足以发挥前绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278420_comment'></div>至汉六七十年间，董大夫始究大业，田何、孔安国、戴圣、戴德、毛苌并出，各有所著，而又未能合群书为一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278420_comment'></div>削其不合，以存其合者，太史谈有意矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278420_comment'></div>然六家之论，犹崇老抑儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278420_comment'></div>迁卒家学，乃尽□百家之精，而断以六艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278420_comment'></div>《易》本田何，《春秋》本董仲舒，《书》本孔安国，《礼》本河间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278420_comment'></div>独恨不见《毛氏诗》耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278420_comment'></div>盖其融液九流，萃为一篇，罢黜杂论，自《五帝纪》以下，盛有依据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278420_comment'></div>荀卿之后，仅见此书尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278420_comment'></div>其论五帝云：「百家言黄帝，其文不雅驯，搢绅先生难言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278420_comment'></div>书缺有间，其轶乃时时见于他说，非好学深思，心知其意，固难为浅见寡闻者道」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278420_comment'></div>则所得多，而自负亦不薄矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278420_comment'></div>惜自班固看渠不过，妄有瑕摘，后生讼习，遂成牢谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278420_comment'></div>千五百年之间，此书湮晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278420_comment'></div>正赖吾党自开只眼，不惑于纷纷之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278420_comment'></div>谨勿容易，便生疑薄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278420_comment'></div>老矣，不能自白于后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278420_comment'></div>常欲落笔，少发所自识破者，为前哲出气，因循未果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278420_comment'></div>近诸友为迁仙岩书塾于屋西偏，今未就工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278420_comment'></div>后月足以奉盍簪之欢，得三两人相助检讨，便可了此一项。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278420_comment'></div>冬间肯来同社，幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1278420_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1185&endYear=1185')">1185年</a>　病馀作诗抒怀。作品：病馀久不趋郡且迁仙岩书院于屋西有怀同志。<div id='poem_161811' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161811' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161811?labeling=true' target='_blank'>病馀久不趋郡且迁仙岩书院于屋西有怀同志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161811")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161811_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161811'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161811'>欲往如天际，相期忽岁华。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161811_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161811'>山空明独树，江晚暗连葭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161811_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161811'>作屋皆三益，藏书可万家。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161811_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161811'>岂无人裹饭，躬自灌园芽。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161811_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161811'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161811_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1185&endYear=1185')">1185年</a>　为陈说作圹志。作品：陈习之圹志。<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈说字习之，陈谦从弟。曾从学于陈傅良。）</span><div id='poem_1278767' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278767' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278767?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈习之圹志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1185年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278767")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278767_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278767'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278767'>吾友陈谦益之之从弟讳说，字习之，娶敷文阁直学士薛公良朋之侄孙女，知芜湖县圭之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278767_comment'></div>生子男五人：蒙、晋、师、贲，其第三子涣为益之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278767_comment'></div>年三十，益之以文字知名当世，所交多闻人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278767_comment'></div>习之雅好修，尝从其兄问师友，讲求古今，益之绝爱惜，欲引而置之诸公之间也，而习之病矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278767_comment'></div>淳熙十有二年正月丙午卒，其卒十有二月二十有二日，薛氏奉其柩，葬于所居里潘塔山之麓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278767_comment'></div>其僚友林载来请余识焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278767_comment'></div>习之故学于余，且益之官中都，余宜以其姓名附于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278767_comment'></div>陈氏世家永嘉县某乡里，曾祖某，祖某，父某。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278767_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年10月</a>　瑞安县学重修，为作记。作品：重修瑞安县学记。<div id='poem_1278733' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278733' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278733?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重修瑞安县学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙十三年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278733")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278733_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278733'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278733'>县学故有记，政和间右丞许公景衡记蔡侯景初徙置学事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278733_comment'></div>绍兴十二年，敷文阁待制宋公之才再记王侯訚修学事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278733_comment'></div>推本国家长育与名教之尊、山川风俗备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278733_comment'></div>二公言语，至今为人贵爱，则二侯固与不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278733_comment'></div>刘侯龟从今更治学，讲堂、廊庑、厨湢皆一新之，讲堂绝巍壮，馀为屋四十楹，凡糜钱二百万，而人不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278733_comment'></div>邦人德侯，属傅良记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278733_comment'></div>顾晚生，何敢次二贤之后？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278733_comment'></div>况侯之政，岂必待余文而传也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278733_comment'></div>盖闻崇宁之际，天下之学盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278733_comment'></div>提学有官，赡学有赋，上之加惠诸生甚隆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278733_comment'></div>而有司方以三经造士，自《春秋》不得设科，非王氏之说，皆为大禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278733_comment'></div>当是时，吾邑已有学，置弟子员如他所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278733_comment'></div>然三舍之兴，无一士能取声名者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278733_comment'></div>始，林石介夫先生不为新经，以《春秋》教授于乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278733_comment'></div>既而许公与沈公躬行、谢公佃偕同郡诸儒，又尝越数千里外，窃从程、吕二氏问学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278733_comment'></div>于举八行也，四方之士有为缪巧应书者，赵公沾乃逡巡愧谢，不欲充赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278733_comment'></div>郡太守强弗能起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278733_comment'></div>后生小子，更益视效，蒸蒸务自修饬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278733_comment'></div>中兴，新美学校之化，嘉与复古，罢三舍还之乡举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278733_comment'></div>列《春秋》学官，使士得各自致其说而无禁讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278733_comment'></div>于是圣天子思所以风厉学士，柬求其人，首得吾许公以参大政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278733_comment'></div>于是娄公寅亮以上虞丞言事，即日拜御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278733_comment'></div>它往往繇布衣召见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278733_comment'></div>温为东南支郡，瑞安又属邑，而一日以多士名天下，天下引领慕向之，岂不盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278733_comment'></div>则吾邑之学，视他所为如何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278733_comment'></div>而岁月久，寖趋于废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278733_comment'></div>以余所逮闻，五经各有师、弟子，非其经师，不辄授人，弟子亦不辄诣它经师受业，岁时会于学，少者拜长者，长者平立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278733_comment'></div>过市必冠带，饮酒不踰三行，一人有过，众人切磋言之，盖遗俗然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278733_comment'></div>而今亦少异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278733_comment'></div>刘侯，公非先生曾孙也，以家学为县，识所先后，又常常乐道吾土风之美，去有日，待士如始至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278733_comment'></div>以所藏《春秋权衡、意林、说例、传》锓之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278733_comment'></div>归负租，访閒田，将以追旧学之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278733_comment'></div>侯之望人厚，人亦宜不自薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278733_comment'></div>余故诵旧闻，表见吾邑学者本末如此，以劝后人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278733_comment'></div>馀已见前记者，则不著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278733_comment'></div>淳熙十三年十月记。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1278733'></div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1278733_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年</a>　重修瑞安县学，为作上梁文。作品：瑞安县学上梁文。<div id='poem_1278843' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278843' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278843?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瑞安县学上梁文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278843")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278843_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278843'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278843'>吾邑有学，繇庆历而来；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278843_comment'></div>诸生置员，于崇宁为盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278843_comment'></div>久矣趋废，谁其嗣兴？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278843_comment'></div>弛百役以独先，弥三时而具举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278843_comment'></div>有严函丈，可以横经；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278843_comment'></div>于粲周庐，可以肄业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278843_comment'></div>共惟圣考，侈庙貌之前观；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278843_comment'></div>显允贤侯，辑儒先之善算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278843_comment'></div>事关风俗，欢动州闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278843_comment'></div>斯抗脩梁，爰申善颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278843_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1278843'>东，吴会修门一苇通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278843_comment'></div>璧海源源流道德，也应泮水日朝宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278843_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1278843'>西，岘首葱葱雨露低。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278843_comment'></div>更上观潮试回首，朝阳合有凤凰栖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278843_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1278843'>南，一曲清江与地参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278843_comment'></div>惊世文章曾不露，横塘居士府潭潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278843_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1278843'>北，闽粤群山来不极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278843_comment'></div>三峰之下可无人，能以功名留翰墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278843_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1278843'>上，阊阖方今开荡荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278843_comment'></div>少微正照斗牛墟，此有隐沦谁与访。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278843_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1278843'>下，七八十翁多在者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278843_comment'></div>自言生不识干戈，长得儿孙皆尔雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278843_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1278843'>伏愿上梁之后，群书充栋，多士填门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278843_comment'></div>相维鬼神，无风雨漂摇之患；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278843_comment'></div>燕及胤祚，皆山河魁磊之英。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1278843_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年</a>　淳熙十三年二月，知瑞安县事刘龟从再作西庙，以祠宣和县令王公经国，为作招辞。作品：西庙招辞并序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（刘龟从是北宋刘攽曾孙，其时知瑞安县。）</span><div id='poem_161887' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161887' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161887?labeling=true' target='_blank'>西庙招辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161887")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_161887_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_161887'>淳熙十有三年二月，知瑞安县事公非先生之曾孙刘龟从再作西庙，以祠宣和县令王公经国。于其落也，邑人陈某为作迎神一章，使工歌之。经国，字公济。其守御事，许忠简公尝识之，故不叙。</div><div id='poem_preface_161887_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161887'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161887'>君昔兮胡不去斯，君今兮胡不来斯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161887'>文栋兮雕楣，岘山之麓兮江圻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161887'>旨酒牲兮洁肥，皓遗老兮须眉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161887'>坎击鼓兮吹篪，君勿来兮迟迟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161887'>山蜿蜿兮榕阴萎蕤，江水清夷兮无蛟与螭。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_161887'>君之来兮可以娱嬉，君不共安兮谁与共危。<div id='poem_sentence_5_161887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_161887'>鸣玉兮衮衣，彼亦君兮一时。<div id='poem_sentence_6_161887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_161887'>莽中州兮为夷，匪冢则庙兮牛羊累累。<div id='poem_sentence_7_161887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_161887'>尚我民兮有知，子子孙孙<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>兮永依。<div id='poem_sentence_8_161887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_161887'>揆之兮以是非，君舍此兮安之。<div id='poem_sentence_9_161887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_161887'>田有畔兮泽有陂，桑稻兮诞弥，怀不报兮忸怩。<div id='poem_sentence_10_161887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_161887'>日早暮兮夜何其，犹容与兮谁须。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_161887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_161887'><span class='label'>按：</span>《止斋先生文集》卷一。<br /><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_161887_0'>⑴ 原缺，据四库本补</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_161887_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年</a>　淳熙十三年二月，知瑞安县事刘龟从再作西庙，以祠宣和县令王公经国。庙落成以薄恙不获预。作品：落成王朝奉庙以薄恙不获预谢刘宰并诸乡丈五首。<div id='poem_161614' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161614' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161614?labeling=true' target='_blank'>落成王朝奉庙以薄恙不获预谢刘宰并诸乡丈五首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161614")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_161614_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161614'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161614'>盗起清溪两浙空，童王亲自帅元戎。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161614'>谁知小邑无亭障，但握空弮有隐功。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161614'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_161614_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161613' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161613' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161613?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_161613_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161613'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161613'>横塘一字比南金，满纸书劳属意深。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161613'>太史不知收拾未，邦人父老泪渐襟<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161613'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_161613_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_161613'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_161613_0'>⑴ 自注：许忠简公尝手疏王公济守御事，欲列诸朝。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_161613_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_161612' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161612' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161612?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_161612_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161612'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161612'>操一豚蹄亦可怜，欲将庙食自旌贤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161612_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161612'>坏墙颓壁神台笠，不见干戈六十年。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161612_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161612'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_161612_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161611' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161611' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161611?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_161611_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161611'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161611'>却向平时念后艰，榱题百尺忽如山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161611_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161611'>谁将西上逢人问，令尹何如此一班。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161611_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161611'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_161611_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161610' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161610' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161610?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_161610_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161610'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161610'>抱病荒村望欲迷，骏奔无数独鸡栖。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161610_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161610'>瞻言鼕鼓何时歇，好听农郊雨一犁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161610_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161610'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_161610_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年</a>　为唐奥林氏作墓表。作品：新归墓表。<div id='poem_1278762' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278762' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278762?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新归墓表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278762")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278762_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278762'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278762'>新归墓表者，为林氏作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278762_comment'></div>初，唐奥先生林介夫葬其考妣于新归、唐奥而庐于旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278762_comment'></div>唐奥在瑞安县治之北二十里，新归在唐奥西三里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278762_comment'></div>繇先生而下再世，葬梓奥，其孙讳松孙，始祔唐奥之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278762_comment'></div>东百步，曾孙讳仲损又祔墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278762_comment'></div>西一里所，凡从先生考妣葬新归者三世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278762_comment'></div>于是玄孙帱载将奉其母柩合焉，余乃为之表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278762_comment'></div>吾乡去京师远，自为吴越，而士未有闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278762_comment'></div>熙宁、元丰之间，宋兴且百年，介夫以明经笃行著称当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278762_comment'></div>以赵清献公与其子㞦景仁所遗诗，次其岁月，则先生名动京师矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278762_comment'></div>自部使者、郡守、丞往往造其庐，问起居况何如、肯仕否耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278762_comment'></div>先生方婆娑泉石之间，作萱堂以养母，未暇出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278762_comment'></div>客至斥床，瓦豆具酒蔌以延之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278762_comment'></div>请与出游，则佳山水无不至者，而特罕趋郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278762_comment'></div>是时《三经新义》行天下，学者非王氏不道，《春秋》且废弗讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278762_comment'></div>先生少从管师常学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278762_comment'></div>师常与孙觉莘老为经社者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278762_comment'></div>先生故不为新学，以其说窃教授乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278762_comment'></div>诸生龚原深之，尝以《易》学行世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278762_comment'></div>比见先生，乃矍然顾恨识《春秋》之晚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278762_comment'></div>于是永嘉之学，不专趋王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278762_comment'></div>其后《春秋》既为世禁，先生竟不复仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278762_comment'></div>而周公恭叔、刘公元承、元礼兄弟、许公少伊相继起，益务古学，名声益盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278762_comment'></div>而先生居然为丈人行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278762_comment'></div>恭叔之铭沈子正也，曰：「河南程正叔、关中吕与叔，与介夫同为世宗师」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278762_comment'></div>少伊亦云尔，且曰：「非《诗》、《书》勿谈，非孔、孟勿为者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278762_comment'></div>以二公所同尊诵如此，然而海内之士，知有程、吕，而先生独教行于其乡，人以其所居里称之，不敢以姓字，他无所概见焉，岂非其居势使然欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278762_comment'></div>要之，永嘉之师友渊源，不曰先生之力哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278762_comment'></div>先生讳石，卒于建中靖国元年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278762_comment'></div>考讳定，妣戴氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278762_comment'></div>三子：讳晞颜，字几老；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278762_comment'></div>晞孟，字醇老；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278762_comment'></div>晞韩，蚤卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278762_comment'></div>几老、醇老皆游京师，从龚氏学，亦不得寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278762_comment'></div>家无壮子弟，失其行事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278762_comment'></div>醇老一子曰松孙字乔年者，最知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278762_comment'></div>乔年少孤，母曹氏改适城南张公子充，尝举八行为国子学录，所谓草堂先生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278762_comment'></div>生张孝恺，字思豫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278762_comment'></div>二子长，甚相欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278762_comment'></div>其尚气节，襟度易直，与人倾尽，仪容修整，又甚相似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278762_comment'></div>然皆事母孝，乔年曰：「吾母也，吾弟盍从以如我」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278762_comment'></div>思豫曰：「吾母也，吾兄盍从以归我」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278762_comment'></div>率不十日半月，必相往还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278762_comment'></div>盖二人者在母旁，伛偻怡怡唯谨，退而论经史或世务，即不相取下，语声惊四邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278762_comment'></div>乔年有《诗》、《易》学，晚而好《尚书》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1278762_comment'></div>其为文雅洁，而善道实事最厚，陈公少南子从之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1278762_comment'></div>女以嫁其友张仲谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1278762_comment'></div>乔年雅不乐举进士，少南先达，复以说《春秋》触忌讳，流落岭表以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1278762_comment'></div>乔年遂与沈东美、谢叔望诸君修先生故事，保丘墓，善风俗，自号兑光居士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1278762_comment'></div>然至感愤为诗，每一篇必曰忧边云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1278762_comment'></div>绍兴之季，后进多宦达，及言高尚有旧隐典刑，但曰乔年，其所蕴抱，人未必尽知之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1278762_comment'></div>娶叶氏、谢氏，皆逮事曹夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1278762_comment'></div>乔年以乾道四年十有一月戊辰卒，享年七十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1278762_comment'></div>叶氏先四十三年而卒，谢氏后十五年而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1278762_comment'></div>各一子，其一人叶氏出者，是为仲损，字炳之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1278762_comment'></div>余及识其人，恂恂而有守，能世其家者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1278762_comment'></div>娶东美之子，夫妇自以家法相宾友，人之见炳之者，则曰「是似乔年」，见沈夫人者，则曰「是似东美」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1278762_comment'></div>其亲戚相驯染，率恩勤似两家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1278762_comment'></div>吾里中人，时节相问馈不绝，有吊庆事，父兄子弟皆至，忻戚尽其情者，必两家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1278762_comment'></div>乔年以事出，母空穷不恤，炳之与妇沈服勤米盐，以尽岁晚之欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1278762_comment'></div>初，萱堂成，士大夫多乐道之者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1278762_comment'></div>至炳之祖子孙，事其亲如一人，谓之萱堂林家云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1278762_comment'></div>炳之以乾道七年三月癸卯卒，年四十有九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1278762_comment'></div>沈氏以淳熙十二年十有一月戊寅卒，年六十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1278762_comment'></div>三子：帱、载、鼎，鼎早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1278762_comment'></div>一女，适新福州古田县主簿徐宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1278762_comment'></div>其一人谢氏出，今仲愚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1278762_comment'></div>二子：昕、充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1278762_comment'></div>盖新归墓，先生之卜葬其父也以嘉祐，母以元符，相距四十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1278762_comment'></div>后七十有一年，为乾道四年十有一月甲申，而乔年祔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1278762_comment'></div>又五年，为乾道八年十有二月丁酉，而炳之祔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1278762_comment'></div>又十有二年，为淳熙十年十有一月乙酉，而谢氏合于乔年之穴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1278762_comment'></div>又四年，为淳熙十有三年四月癸酉，而沈氏合于炳之之穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1278762_comment'></div>凡一百二十有九年之间，三兆六柩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1278762_comment'></div>而几老之子讳寿孙，字推仁，孙兴祖字庆之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1278762_comment'></div>醇老少子讳时可，字叔遇，孙讳诚之，皆以序从葬墓下，而不得其行事，故不著，馀则祔梓奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1278762_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_76_1278762'>陈某曰：元符至今百年间，天下亦多故矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1278762_comment'></div>自公侯将，五世希不失者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1278762_comment'></div>有以布衣而燕及其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1278762_comment'></div>载也从余学，又以文行见推于其友，人以为林氏必大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1278762_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1278762_comment'></div>以势利者如彼，以德者如此哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_81_1278762_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年</a>　为敷文阁直学士薛公作圹志。作品：敷文阁直学士薛公圹志。<div id='poem_1278763' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278763' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278763?labeling=true' target='_blank'>敷文阁直学士薛公圹志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278763")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278763_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278763'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278763'>公姓薛氏，讳良朋，字季益，唐补阙令之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278763_comment'></div>繇闽徙温，其在永嘉则讳弼，官至敷文阁待制；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278763_comment'></div>在瑞安则公，官至敷文阁直学士，盖中兴相望为名臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278763_comment'></div>公治丽水有声，荐入胄监，检法御史台，丞奉常，为尚书郎，选知徽州，将漕江东、二浙，守临安府，擢工部侍郎，迁吏部，以学士出守福、泉、荆南、成都，制置四川，食祠禄于家十年，以淳熙乙巳八月卒，年七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278763_comment'></div>阶通奉大夫，封永嘉郡公，赠光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278763_comment'></div>卒之明年十月，孤某即所居里之子奥原公所自为坟葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278763_comment'></div>前事，二孤与婿校录公言行一编，属某为状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278763_comment'></div>某虽生后，然与公同乡，晚数得及门受教，又雅从子姓游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278763_comment'></div>以所讲闻，视今录尚多阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278763_comment'></div>惟状当上太史氏，谢不敢草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278763_comment'></div>孤泣诉葬日浅，采获故未具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278763_comment'></div>今大事不可乏，请书其概，纳之幽，而状俟他日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278763_comment'></div>于是识曰：绍兴之季年，朝廷更用二三大臣，所汲引皆当世之选，而公由参知政事辛公以进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278763_comment'></div>及今上时，陈福公相，遂班从臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278763_comment'></div>观人莫若观所与，公所与何如哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278763_comment'></div>方扈跸金陵，佐戎淮甸，天子召见无虚岁，人人谓才欲有所拨烦，必曰薛良朋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278763_comment'></div>治且安久，先进多凋落，而公亦老矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278763_comment'></div>归故庐，深与人绝，短衣幅巾，往还樵牧间，公固自忘其为才，而上时时记不忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278763_comment'></div>至其以荒政修，进直龙图阁，三抗章，竟不拜官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278763_comment'></div>同产子二人，而不以及孙，则又过人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278763_comment'></div>曾大父某，大父某，承奉郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278763_comment'></div>父某，累赠正议大夫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278763_comment'></div>母许氏，故右丞忠简公之侄女，赠太硕人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278763_comment'></div>娶章氏，封硕人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278763_comment'></div>子男二人：璆，宣教郎，前知饶州馀干县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278763_comment'></div>琳，宣义郎，新知福州连江县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278763_comment'></div>三女：适林轰，从政郎，新监左藏封桩库门；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278763_comment'></div>章伯奋，迪功郎，前临安府富阳县主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278763_comment'></div>戴闿之，宣教郎，新知绍兴府上虞县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278763_comment'></div>闿之，淳熙二年进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278763_comment'></div>孙五人，及官者二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278763_comment'></div>邑子陈傅良述<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278763_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1278763'>邑子陈傅良述：原无，据《东瓯金石志》补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1278763_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278763'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_1278763_0'>⑴ 《止斋先生文集》卷四九。又见《东瓯金石志》卷七。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1278763_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年</a>　为陈义民作墓铭。作品：陈季阳墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈义民，字季阳，瑞安人，吏部侍郎陈夔之弟。）</span><div id='poem_1278764' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278764' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278764?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈季阳墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278764")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278764_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278764'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278764'>公姓陈氏，讳羲，字季阳，温瑞安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278764_comment'></div>于故吏部侍郎公夔字蕃仲为母弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278764_comment'></div>吾州陈氏族最大，而谱残阙，间相与问系，皆曰闽徙也，或曰本开封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278764_comment'></div>余儿时，诸父尝言故礼部侍郎桷自平阳使来合谱，以两家所自出县乡里皆合，诸父不能祔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278764_comment'></div>自今国子录谦、故尚书郎鹏飞之子六龄、奉国军节度推官柄，始于余聚，少长以齿，如家人，族稍稍合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278764_comment'></div>柄，季阳子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278764_comment'></div>季阳与蕃仲，少小同受学，皆不类凡儿，一为大官，一以布衣老，乡评虽称好，兄弟不以是为次第，然尚多言有幸不幸者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278764_comment'></div>余闻蕃仲立朝时，父大夫公春秋高，雅不便异县，独季阳日侍膝下，左右逢顺无违事，大夫虽不见蕃仲在侧，未尝不乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278764_comment'></div>其卒也，会蕃仲万里使虏中，季阳治衣衾棺椁华好，而哀称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278764_comment'></div>蕃仲虽不得在其亲侧，亦勿有悔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278764_comment'></div>善教子，使从名士游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278764_comment'></div>柄举进士第二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278764_comment'></div>是岁，特有旨高第不待次，得幕府官，遂食其禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278764_comment'></div>遇太上皇后庆寿恩，亦新得初品官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278764_comment'></div>季阳始念不在官与禄，晚顾奄有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278764_comment'></div>死之日，四方士友咸来吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278764_comment'></div>蕃仲亦一幼子登科，然不及见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278764_comment'></div>由此言之，季阳为幸耶不幸耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278764_comment'></div>人何必皆欲仕？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278764_comment'></div>仕不必能行其志，不仕岂必不如志也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278764_comment'></div>蕃仲一失时宰意，竟崎岖衔不得施用以殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278764_comment'></div>季阳居乡，弃负振乏，唯所欲，乡人有善不善，且劝且讽，往往莫之违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278764_comment'></div>年七十，无终日意不自得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278764_comment'></div>向使亦仕，特未知如何尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278764_comment'></div>曾祖智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278764_comment'></div>祖称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278764_comment'></div>父祥，承事郎，赠朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278764_comment'></div>母郑氏，赠宜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278764_comment'></div>娶周氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278764_comment'></div>三子：栻、松、柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278764_comment'></div>二女：长适项赉，幼未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278764_comment'></div>孙男女六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278764_comment'></div>以淳熙十二年十二月癸酉卒奉国官舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278764_comment'></div>先十五年，周氏葬所居帐西乡洋坑之金山，于是合，实卒之明年十有一月己酉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278764_comment'></div>季阳尚多可称事，余但道其为人父子者如此，以解言者之蔽，塞柄等之悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278764_comment'></div>而复以是铭之曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1278764'>养其父之日长，养于其子之日短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278764_comment'></div>匪报之鲜也，斯流之衍也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1278764_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年</a>　为吕琰作墓铭。作品：修职郎吕公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（吕琰字德文，子元之、声之等。陈傅良在新昌馆黄度家时，吕氏子弟多从其学。）</span><div id='poem_1278765' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278765' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278765?labeling=true' target='_blank'>修职郎吕公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278765")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278765_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278765'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278765'>越新昌之姓，石、吕、黄为大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278765_comment'></div>余尝馆黄度文叔家，得与石、吕二氏游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278765_comment'></div>其子弟多从予学，间至郭外所谓报慈庵者，则公父子所尝庐墓处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278765_comment'></div>杉松夹径，钜竹千百竿如拭，有泉琮然出两山谷间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278765_comment'></div>庵在泉上，前有大石立平地，可以相隐避为娱嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278765_comment'></div>石旁置亭，曲栏高下，缘以花卉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278765_comment'></div>公以诸儿，领客危坐，诵佛书，过午始出户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278765_comment'></div>余往来新昌三年，见之如一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278765_comment'></div>盖公之皇考君讳蒙，尝葬其亲于社潭之原，去家三十里，茇舍墓下，久之不返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278765_comment'></div>公忧惧，即所葬皇考妣龙岩之麓，为是庵以悦安之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278765_comment'></div>皇考君终焉，凡蔬食四十年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278765_comment'></div>皇考君卒，公以其丧合葬于是，而悲慕如其考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278765_comment'></div>僧有年七、八十岁，饭此庵，相顾感叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278765_comment'></div>盖晚而后入郭内居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278765_comment'></div>公父子以孝慕称闾里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278765_comment'></div>皇考君坐逝，公享年七十四，亦寝疾五日，盥漱栉縰乃逝，淳熙乙巳二月十日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278765_comment'></div>孤元之将以丙午十有二月某日葬公于郎柯之陈岩，其弟声之来乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278765_comment'></div>铭未就，声之不胜悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278765_comment'></div>余与武弟同郡徐钺、王自中、彭仲刚、徐谊、蔡幼学，皆以诗悼公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278765_comment'></div>是岁天大寒，雨雪甚，声之扶服几千里，空返，既葬，益请不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278765_comment'></div>事死如吕氏父子孙三世亦罕矣，宜为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278765_comment'></div>公讳琰，字德文，以子遇太上皇帝庆寿恩，复遇寿圣太上皇后庆寿恩，封修职郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278765_comment'></div>五子，长元之，连三举乡贡，进士奏官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278765_comment'></div>其第三，声之也，亦两举国子进士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278765_comment'></div>某，某，某，咸克家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278765_comment'></div>二婿：吴敦智、王师望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278765_comment'></div>孙男女十四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278765_comment'></div>公娶王氏，封孺人，赐冠帔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278765_comment'></div>公喜教子，孺人能成就公志，故诸子各有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278765_comment'></div>孺人先公生一岁，后卒一岁，今同穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278765_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1278765'>瞻彼庐矣，龙岩之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278765_comment'></div>公昔在矣，谁无子孙？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278765_comment'></div>瞻彼墓矣，陈岩之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278765_comment'></div>公今亡矣，谁无父母？</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1278765_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年3月</a>　居乡授徒讲学时，受沈持要所托，为重修南塘作记。作品：温州重修南塘记。<div id='poem_1278732' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278732' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278732?labeling=true' target='_blank'>温州重修南塘记</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙十四年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278732")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278732_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278732'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278732'>自中兴，永嘉为次辅郡，其选守盖多名卿大夫矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278732_comment'></div>然境内有宜治者三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278732_comment'></div>间岁贡士，群试且万人，于浮屠宫中草舍托处，一宜治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278732_comment'></div>兵与民杂居，颉颃市人间，要束不行，而斗讼多，二宜治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278732_comment'></div>州城外，南达瑞安，有石塘百里所，不知起何时，而岁积坏，倾者为嵌，陷者为汇，遇时潦，咫尺不得进，往往溺死；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278732_comment'></div>自闽山至于吴会，去来者病之，三宜治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278732_comment'></div>而历年久，更太守几人，皆畏其役，不敢议，议辄弗就；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278732_comment'></div>虽仅就，亦苟简复废者，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278732_comment'></div>吴兴沈公治郡之明年，谓宾佐曰：「上方朝德寿宫为寿，加惠宇内，诏减算钱之半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278732_comment'></div>吾属备数奉诏，何以仰称？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278732_comment'></div>而适无一事可以宣劳效能、广上意者，唯是郡之百废，终将累民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278732_comment'></div>吾幸逢年，帑有币馀，而啬其藏，失今弗图，以烦后来，将安取此也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278732_comment'></div>于是作贡院，于是作五营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278732_comment'></div>盖晚而有以塘事告者，公与通判率两邑大夫，即里居谋曰：役复有大于此者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278732_comment'></div>奈何使吾民锱聚铢歛，窃自支补，甲前而乙却也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278732_comment'></div>苟无愆时，工勿问庸几何；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278732_comment'></div>苟无乏事，石勿问价几何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278732_comment'></div>舆匠肯来，市无强贾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278732_comment'></div>自冬十月至今三月而塘成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278732_comment'></div>凡是役，邦人亟请于州，于部使者，前太守李公以钱三百万，提举勾公、岳公继以米四百斛，倡民兴之，民亦输钱累至四百三十二万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278732_comment'></div>起淳熙十有一年，而事不集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278732_comment'></div>今糜钱一千一百万，而弛民钱六百五十馀万不取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278732_comment'></div>邦人以是役为宜书，而属予焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278732_comment'></div>以予所闻于公者如此，况州县官数易，事弥废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278732_comment'></div>熙宁考课，又削桥道弗拟，世相蒙习，以偷为得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278732_comment'></div>间有兴作，则议者顾曰：是希进务以出名迹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278732_comment'></div>则又曰：是一切厉民为美观尔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278732_comment'></div>则又曰：彼将以为利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278732_comment'></div>长吏虽欲自信，而不得骋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278732_comment'></div>公以法从旧人，起家为郡，且复用矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278732_comment'></div>向使过计，收声养尊，安用事事？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278732_comment'></div>而独意乡不挠愈勇，以今较昔，难易淹速，是皆宜书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278732_comment'></div>然公他所为便民者虽多，而其大者在石塘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278732_comment'></div>水行衔舻，陆行蹑踵，更相和歌，不争以贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278732_comment'></div>夹河老翁，有年七八十者，携持小儿嬉戏于其上，不谓继今民免于死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278732_comment'></div>或为诗谣，或香火以祝公，且乞田二顷，嗣岁积之，盖欲公德与是塘为无穷云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278732_comment'></div>公名枢，字持要，前为太子詹事兼吏部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278732_comment'></div>淳熙十四年三月记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1278732_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年</a>　作《南塘记》郡守沈持要以诗来谢。郡守沈持要以诗来谢次韵奉酬。<span class='inlineComment2'>（沈枢字持要，时为温州郡守。）</span><div id='poem_161888' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161888' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161888?labeling=true' class='inlineComment2'>（沈枢字持要，时为温州郡守。）</span>和沈守持要观潮阁留题。<span class='inlineComment2'>（沈枢字持要，时为温州郡守。）</span>和沈守持要题谢公楼额。<span class='inlineComment2'>（沈枢字持要，时为温州郡守。）</span>沈守生日。<span
