class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161837")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161837_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161837'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161837'>上巳所馀春有几，不堪风雨付春愁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161837'>君能载酒知谁侣，我欲看花不自由。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161837'>倚岸小舟谋未定，隔林斜日故相投。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161837'>莓苔踏遍篝灯去，收拾残红插满头。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161837_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161837'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161837_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年</a>　与瑞安县官员及同好唱和。作品：奉陪王德脩登观潮阁，兼呈邑宰刘伯协。<div id='poem_161722' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161722' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161722?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉陪王德脩登观海阁兼呈邑宰刘伯协</a><span class='authorDate'>（1187年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161722")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161722_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161722'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161722'>观潮阁在东溟上，有客来登自华阳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161722'>不道雪山通老柏，却看朝日上扶桑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161722'>胜游气合南三郡<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，妙画家传晋二王。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161722'>后会不知谁与继，尔江吾海永相望。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161722'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_161722'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_161722_0'>⑴ 自注：荆、扬、益也。刘，江西人。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_161722_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年</a>　作诗为林颐叔送行。作品：送林正仲丞玉山。<span class='inlineComment2'>（林颐叔（正仲），陈傅良弟子。丞玉山在淳熙年间。《送林正仲丞玉山》诗曰君今理征骖，我适卧旧庐。故当在淳熙七年之后，十四年之前。）</span><div id='poem_161972' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161972' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161972?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送林正仲丞王山</a><span class='authorDate'>（1187年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161972")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_161972_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161972'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161972'>去年我为客，持酒送君归。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161972'>君今理征骖，我适卧旧庐。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161972'>人生足离合，仕宦相乘除。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161972'>科名馀十年，丞县亦既迟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161972'>颜色日愈好，绝口无歔欷。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_161972'>自言有时命，岁宴知何如。<div id='poem_sentence_5_161972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_161972'>深藏济人具，不作借势书。<div id='poem_sentence_6_161972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_161972'>虚名多自误，徐步乃疾驱。<div id='poem_sentence_7_161972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_161972'>从兹拭老眼，看君上亨衢。<div id='poem_sentence_8_161972_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_161972'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_161972_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年6月</a>　将赴桂阳拟奏事札子四，丞相王淮取旨免奏事。作品：赴桂阳军拟奏事札子四。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年</a>　冬为徐钺作墓铭。作品：徐武叔墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（徐钺字武叔，娶嘉庆先生沈东美之女。）</span><div id='poem_1278766' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278766' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278766?labeling=true' target='_blank'>徐武叔墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1187年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278766")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278766_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278766'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278766'>余尝惑于太史公以鲁仲连、邹阳并为一传，其世相去远，事甚不类，言语文章亦不相似也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278766_comment'></div>至读所谓「多其在布衣之位，谈说于当世」，盖释然有感于二子，而叹良史之笔，取舍固殊焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278766_comment'></div>夫秦汉之际，士之遭时致身者，不知其几人，往往无闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278766_comment'></div>以太史公所身亲见，开封侯、桃侯而下，卿相数十辈皆略附名申屠嘉后，吝不立传；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278766_comment'></div>二子特布衣尔，他无所概见，徒以书一编关于当世之务，相先后百有馀年，行事言语不同，而牵连书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278766_comment'></div>则古人之不朽，诚有不在彼者，余以是铭武叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278766_comment'></div>乾道之庚寅辛卯，州大饥，米㪷直五六百钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278766_comment'></div>守丞讳言上，且讳人言，遇道殣，即阳不省，众无与画此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278766_comment'></div>武叔以书抵行在所之旧，言之哀痛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278766_comment'></div>张公钦夫为右司郎，得其书，持白丞相虞公并父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278766_comment'></div>诘朝奏事，虞公出武叔书袖中，为孝宗诵之，孝宗矍然变玉色，曰：「永嘉故乐土，柰何使至于此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278766_comment'></div>守丞为谁乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278766_comment'></div>朝罢，趣上其名衔，即日罢去，更用贤守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278766_comment'></div>出浙河东郡常平米以赡吾州，州人获免于死亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278766_comment'></div>当时识者颇乐道其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278766_comment'></div>有以都司肯赍人书诣政事堂白之丞相，丞相肯袖怀书至榻前奏上，上勿问所繇来，从之不移日，可不谓盛时乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278766_comment'></div>而余窃又有感也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278766_comment'></div>虞并父相，钦夫为宰士，微武叔，殆不得事情于千里之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278766_comment'></div>彼守丞何足道，所部官岂无其人，皆务自爱惜，重于请事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278766_comment'></div>武叔书生也，枉于场屋，志不但已，竟以一介之微，而动千乘之听，亡尺寸之柄，而全阖郡之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278766_comment'></div>呜呼，岂非贤哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278766_comment'></div>武叔死，其孤冠来乞铭，余故不辞，而久不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278766_comment'></div>恐佚其事，使武叔之可以不朽者阙焉，则愧于子长之谊，于是次而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278766_comment'></div>武叔讳钺，姓徐氏，其先入闽，家福之长溪赤岸，由赤岸徙温平阳，至高祖始为万全乡尚贤里之族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278766_comment'></div>祖讳隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278766_comment'></div>父讳几，自谓休休翁，与里人作义学，延知名士教子弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278766_comment'></div>比武叔，家益大，交游益好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278766_comment'></div>娶嘉庆先生沈东美之女，有淑行，能治宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278766_comment'></div>六子：冠、宏、𡧎、容、寓、定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278766_comment'></div>冠进《德寿宫赋》，得试礼部；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278766_comment'></div>宏中淳熙八年进士科，今为潭州州学教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278766_comment'></div>六女：适刘嗣尹，太学生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278766_comment'></div>吴璞，刘仪，陈昂，乡贡士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278766_comment'></div>沈伯焕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278766_comment'></div>一尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278766_comment'></div>初，沈夫人卒，葬于瑞安常宁寺之后山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278766_comment'></div>武叔年六十有三，卒于淳熙十有四年七月十有八日，以明年二月二十九日合于夫人之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278766_comment'></div>武叔少颖脱俦伍，博读而豪于文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278766_comment'></div>长而慷慨，好论时事若州里利病，趋义之急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278766_comment'></div>然公于臧否，至众辱人，人慕悦之，而亦畏其闻己之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278766_comment'></div>至于群居，赋诗饮酒，无少长疏戚，辄与倾盖，襟度豁然，无纤芥疵吝，然后知其切磋之意，非欲多上人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278766_comment'></div>余习闻之于郑公景望兄弟间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278766_comment'></div>一日，有邂逅萧寺者，容貌魁梧，伟丈人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278766_comment'></div>意其为武叔，俄而长揖余曰：「子陈子欤」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278766_comment'></div>于是定交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1278766_comment'></div>以武叔人品，晚以庆寿恩授承务郎，再授承奉郎，吾党甚惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1278766_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_1278766'>行修而命违，志大而力微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1278766_comment'></div>有子岐岐，天意其在斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1278766_comment'></div>瞻彼宰木，亦既可围。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1278766_comment'></div>褒大之迟，我独不敢疑！</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1278766_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年</a>　梁克家卒，为作祭文。作品：祭梁丞相。<span class='inlineComment2'>（梁克家，孝宗朝曾拜相，1187病逝于家中。）</span><div id='poem_1278806' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278806' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278806?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭梁丞相文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1187年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278806")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278806_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278806'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278806'>麟凤不挚，帝王瑞之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278806_comment'></div>木德为春，万物善时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278806_comment'></div>维皇龙潜，公为举首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278806_comment'></div>天授之相，有司之手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278806_comment'></div>维皇至圣，维天之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278806_comment'></div>维相休休，嘉靖此民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278806_comment'></div>泽农欲晴，山农欲雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278806_comment'></div>公在相位，高粳下黍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278806_comment'></div>彼有言战，此有言守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278806_comment'></div>公在相位，兵不挂口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278806_comment'></div>人亦有言，谁怨谁德？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278806_comment'></div>公曰赏刑，具在三尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278806_comment'></div>人亦有言，匪同斯异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278806_comment'></div>公何适莫？靡立一意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278806_comment'></div>乾道经略，淳熙无为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278806_comment'></div>从容其间，不竞不随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278806_comment'></div>上之咎言，下之觖望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278806_comment'></div>弗及其身，人自得丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278806_comment'></div>公疾未剧，公归已决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278806_comment'></div>帝曰如何？咨尔同列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278806_comment'></div>至于领祠，至于赐第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278806_comment'></div>宿留经帷，愈好勿替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278806_comment'></div>我观自昔，萧、曹、周、召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278806_comment'></div>经史云云，如公特少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278806_comment'></div>方舜命禹，宜师宜保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278806_comment'></div>薄海有恨，公不寿考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278806_comment'></div>公不寿考，薄海恨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278806_comment'></div>矧如傅良，辱爱辱知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278806_comment'></div>属官穷楚，遭岁之缪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278806_comment'></div>爰及祥琴，文始克就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278806_comment'></div>太常有诔，太史有传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278806_comment'></div>乃如斯文，聊以哭奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278806_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1278806_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1187&endYear=1187')">1187年</a>　与陈岩唱和。作品：和陈仲石韵。<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈岩字仲石，平阳人，淳熙十五年12月卒，时年三十五。淳熙十四年陈傅良赴桂阳任，故诗当作于此年以前。）</span><div id='poem_161703' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161703' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161703?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和陈仲石韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1187年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161703")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161703_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161703'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161703'>久矣怀相与，翩然喜见临。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161703'>清风生案□，短日过墙阴。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161703'>王事何时暇，神州半陆沉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161703'>诸公宣力去，伴我水云深。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161703'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161703_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='3eb01f136fef41c8add176cf25d5885c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3eb01f136fef41c8add176cf25d5885c");'><span id='3eb01f136fef41c8add176cf25d5885c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>，58岁</div><div id='3eb01f136fef41c8add176cf25d5885c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年7月</a>　宁宗除起居郎兼权中书舍人，旋除中书舍人，再辞不受。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年7月</a>　为宋岩老作挽诗。作品：挽宋岩老参议。<span class='inlineComment2'>（据叶适《参议朝奉大夫宋公墓志铭》：宋傅字岩老，其先自闽徙温平阳，绍兴二十四年进士。绍熙五年七月卒。）</span><div id='poem_161791' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161791' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161791?labeling=true' target='_blank'>挽宋岩老参议<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161791")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161791_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161791'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161791'>居然是是亦非非，错处稠中定不疑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161791'>万事过人旁袖手，一生从众自观颐。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161791'>肯为壮县虽尝试，略见周行已逆知。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161791'>尽日杜门佳客至，小槽亲校酒醇漓。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161791'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161791_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161792' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161792' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161792?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年7月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161792_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161792'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161792'>少小修藏近市朝，亦非著意混渔樵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161792'>不为御寇犹争席，好说渊明更折腰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161792'>一饭重违凡子约，千金终却故人招。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161792'>送车几两交相唁，我独难忘最久要。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161792_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161792'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161792_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年7月</a>　上奏辞免再除起居郎。作品：辞免再除起居郎状。<div id='poem_1278362' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278362' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278362?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免再除起居郎状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278362")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278362_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278362'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278362'>温州递铺传送到尚书省劄子一道：「七月八日三省同奉圣旨：陈傅良依旧除起居郎、兼权中书舍人，令疾速前来供职」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278362_comment'></div>臣不胜蝼蚁之诚，仰干宸听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278362_comment'></div>恭惟陛下因天人之心，应帝王之运，属寿皇之丧纪，以圣父之倦勤，禀命慈闱，嗣服大宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278362_comment'></div>虽舜察人伦，武王达孝，孔子圣之时，《春秋》变之正，无以过此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278362_comment'></div>宗祀幸甚，天下幸甚！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278362_comment'></div>臣偶缘末学，尝备劝诵，潜飞之际，攀附何荣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278362_comment'></div>而首被明纶，趣还旧著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278362_comment'></div>维新之命，独先众人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278362_comment'></div>岂臣区区所敢当此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278362_comment'></div>况臣立朝屡年，曾乏涓埃之补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278362_comment'></div>幸蒙上皇矜怜，齿发将近朝露，放还田里，俾全晚节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278362_comment'></div>而陛下顾以簪履之旧，尚欲使令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278362_comment'></div>此臣所以踧踖不遑，须至控免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278362_comment'></div>伏望陛下察臣平昔素非矫饰，念臣衰迟，已是颓惰，特收误恩，以示初政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278362_comment'></div>臣不胜祈天望圣、激切屏营之至！</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1278362_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　上奏辞免中书舍人。作品：辞免中书舍人状。<div id='poem_1278363' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278363' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278363?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免中书舍人状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278363")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278363_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278363'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278363'>准温州递到尚书省劄子一道：「七月十三日三省同奉圣旨：陈傅良除中书舍人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278363_comment'></div>臣闻命震惊，罔知所措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278363_comment'></div>臣窃惟古者设词令之官，初意不过以人主劝惩罢行之政，既与二三大臣共决之矣，至其播告发明，写之简翰，则苟能言者，皆可使奏伎于其间，不必人主一一亲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278363_comment'></div>久之而言益行，官益重，盖命令之有不当于人心者，辄得封还，始与闻政矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278363_comment'></div>至于本朝，遂与谏官、御史、给事中三数人者最用事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278363_comment'></div>如是其人少不称职，往往能为天下患，不但言语工不工也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278363_comment'></div>恭惟陛下龙飞，急于审官，方将博求天下俊良，而如是官者，尤所当谨择也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278363_comment'></div>如臣学术荒落，重以衰惰，独奈何先天下士玷此选也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278363_comment'></div>以为潜藩之旧，则示不广；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278363_comment'></div>以为摄官久，则尝不善于其职矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278363_comment'></div>是皆不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278363_comment'></div>矧兹惟新之命，夷夏属心，不宜除授，令人窃议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278363_comment'></div>臣所以不殚烦渎，仰干天威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278363_comment'></div>伏惟思词臣之重，守家法之严，而先众俊，谨新政，特寝误恩，昭示中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278363_comment'></div>不胜幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1278363_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　再上奏状辞免中书舍人。作品：再辞免状。<div id='poem_1278364' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278364' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278364?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再辞免状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278364")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278364_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278364'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278364'>右，臣昨具奏辞免新除中书舍人恩命事，今月初九日，准尚书省劄子，「七月二十八日三省同奉圣旨不允」者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278364_comment'></div>恩深感极，岂敢固辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278364_comment'></div>伏缘臣昨来所奏文字意指，姑为陛下诵辞令之匪轻，明举措之当谨，而未尝及臣进退之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278364_comment'></div>是以天听未回，俞音不下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278364_comment'></div>须至烦渎，再输恳悃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278364_comment'></div>臣闻潜邸旧臣，号为攀附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278364_comment'></div>其侍御使令之人耶，则不过奉命承旨，故其人志在恩宠，但以畏谨避权，不预闻外事为义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278364_comment'></div>其切磋讲习之人耶，则尝敷陈治道，启迪心术矣，故其人志不在恩宠，而以不徒空言，欲见之行事为义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278364_comment'></div>二者甚不同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278364_comment'></div>臣愚不肖，不谓遭际，备数劝诵，凡向者反覆言之，正有望于今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278364_comment'></div>陛下诚尊所闻，诚行所知，以此荅天心，以此裕民力，则万世之下，臣与有荣耀焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278364_comment'></div>即虽不在左右，死且不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278364_comment'></div>况陛下以睿哲之资，日进不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278364_comment'></div>加以方今百官之富，非特往时二三僚佐之比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278364_comment'></div>如臣陈言不足施行，陛下诚断自今，博求俊良，与图新政，将所闻益高明，所知益光大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278364_comment'></div>即臣虽不在左右，亦死且不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278364_comment'></div>苟惟不然，皆恩宠尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278364_comment'></div>况臣以休致之馀，动关物议，又与见在职者事情不类，所以不敢冒昧于一来也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278364_comment'></div>所有省劄，臣未敢祗受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278364_comment'></div>除已具申尚书省外，谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278364_comment'></div>伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1278364_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　上奏状辞免兼侍讲札子。作品：辞免兼侍讲状。<div id='poem_1278365' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278365' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278365?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免兼侍讲状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278365")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278365_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278365'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278365'>臣昨准尚书省劄子：「备奉圣旨除中书舍人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278365_comment'></div>方具奏辞免次，又准省劄：「八月六日奉圣旨：兼侍讲」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278365_comment'></div>臣正听候前件指挥，故更不辞免兼职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278365_comment'></div>今臣已迫威命，前来供职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278365_comment'></div>所有兼侍讲职事，难以冒处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278365_comment'></div>须至恳祈，冀回渊听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278365_comment'></div>伏念臣向事朱邸，备数劝诵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278365_comment'></div>方当陛下潜龙勿用之初，不过讲明为人臣、为人子之道，此则臣素所肄习者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278365_comment'></div>夫惟素所肄习，尚堪勉强，故阅岁月，幸无罪悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278365_comment'></div>若夫路门经幄，事体绝异，盖非政事之臣，而欲致其主于唐虞三代盛帝显王之业，凡所敷陈，必至德要道，急先之务，一话一言，稍有悟合，则天下国家阴受其赐，非徒指摘章句，累次篇帙而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278365_comment'></div>然则如臣岂足堪此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278365_comment'></div>且以孟子名世之才，犹自谓未学诸侯之礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278365_comment'></div>房、杜亦王佐也，而不能奉礼乐之对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278365_comment'></div>由此言之，苟非所习，虽圣贤不可以强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278365_comment'></div>如臣之愚，实非通识，重以衰晚，无温故知新之益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278365_comment'></div>今谓臣尝为诸君讲矣，当能为天子讲，臣诚不敢自信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278365_comment'></div>臣不敢自信，而过使令之，陛下眷旧之恩则厚，而臣不知惧，是但贪宠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278365_comment'></div>又况府僚限员，固难博择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278365_comment'></div>今陛下有百官之富，贤俊林立，欲求多闻，岂无他士？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278365_comment'></div>何乃眷简独私旧人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278365_comment'></div>所有上件兼职，欲望圣慈特加谨重，改授在庭鸿博之士，庶有裨助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278365_comment'></div>伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1278365_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278365'><span class='label'>按：</span>十月五日奉圣旨不允。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278365_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　上奏状辞免兼直学士院。作品：辞免兼直学士院状。<div id='poem_1278366' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278366' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278366?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免兼直学士院状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278366")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278366_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278366'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278366'>准尚书省劄子：「奉圣旨：陈傅良兼直学士院」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278366_comment'></div>臣闻命震惊，莫知所措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278366_comment'></div>伏念臣以平生辛苦之志，非不欲以文字得名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278366_comment'></div>以垂老攀附之荣，非不欲以论思图报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278366_comment'></div>既居西掖，又直北扉，岂非臣之所甚愿哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278366_comment'></div>重念臣少多忧患，早以衰疾，盖年未六十而齿牙脱落，须发皓然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278366_comment'></div>终日强餐，不能杯饭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278366_comment'></div>未昏就寝，畏见灯火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278366_comment'></div>以此聪明销退，往往善忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278366_comment'></div>况自比年迭为二史，脚力疲于久立，心事困于直前，常恐一旦溘先朝露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278366_comment'></div>幸蒙上皇放还田里，臣自谓得长往之期，更生之幸矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278366_comment'></div>陛下龙飞，首加收召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278366_comment'></div>一月之间，除目三下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278366_comment'></div>臣伏自思念有君如此，虽使高人隐士影响昧昧之人，犹当兴起，奉令承教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278366_comment'></div>况臣尝备官僚，久辱使令，最蒙眷遇者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278366_comment'></div>黾勉此来，实出感激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278366_comment'></div>然自再入脩门，故疾辄作，谒告弥旬，职事俱废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278366_comment'></div>又适当郊霈之后，覃转封赠数倍常时，词命填委，几以百数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278366_comment'></div>日不暇给，下笔甚惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278366_comment'></div>故臣区区方欲稍迟数月，以承天意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278366_comment'></div>别求一官，以便己私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278366_comment'></div>不谓陛下骤宠异之，使兼内制，臣恐自此颠隮无日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278366_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278366_comment'></div>精力不足，则必有弛慢之患；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278366_comment'></div>思虑不强，则必有阙误之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278366_comment'></div>假使隆宽不以为罪，而书问之不酬，请谒之不报，亦必有不理于口之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278366_comment'></div>此臣之所甚惧于颠隮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278366_comment'></div>苟至于此，岂是陛下全度之意？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278366_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈察臣悃愊，实非饰伪，曲垂渊听，将上件兼职特行寝免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278366_comment'></div>伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1278366_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278366'><span class='label'>按：</span>闰十月五日，三省同奉圣旨不允。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278366_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年8月</a>　命兼经筵侍讲。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='f89e873653954ae0990d13c3213a9025_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f89e873653954ae0990d13c3213a9025");'><span id='f89e873653954ae0990d13c3213a9025_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1203')">1195-1203年</a>，59-67岁</div><div id='f89e873653954ae0990d13c3213a9025' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年6月</a>　回乡。以潜邸讲堂官转朝散大夫。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年7月</a>　以潜邸讲堂官转朝散大夫，请辞。作品：潜邸讲堂转官辞免申省状。<div id='poem_1278397' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278397' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278397?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潜邸讲堂转官辞免申省状<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆元元年七月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1195年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278397")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278397_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278397'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278397'>准都进奏院递到朝散大夫告一道，为系潜邸讲堂官转一官者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278397_comment'></div>伏念某一介疏庸，本无学术，偶遭休明，备数劝诵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278397_comment'></div>累年于此，蒙眷甚隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278397_comment'></div>曾乏涓尘，仰裨海岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278397_comment'></div>反以尸素，上累知人之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278397_comment'></div>又况自致烦言，尚叨祠禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278397_comment'></div>窃伏思念，罪重责轻，衔荷恩私，不知所报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278397_comment'></div>岂当复与储僚群贤同在论功行赏之数？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278397_comment'></div>所有上件恩命不敢祗受，除已寄纳温州军资库外，伏候指挥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278397_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278397'><span class='label'>按：</span>庆元元年七月七日，三省同奉圣旨不允。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278397_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年8月</a>　妻张氏卒，为作祭文。作品：祭令人张氏。<div id='poem_1278810' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278810' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278810?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭令人张氏文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1195年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278810")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278810_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278810'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278810'>嗟余与子，于穷相遭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278810_comment'></div>以子洁清，济余之豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278810_comment'></div>何以觞客？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278810_comment'></div>取之衾袍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278810_comment'></div>殆将兼旬，蓬首不膏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278810_comment'></div>矧余力学，往往独旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278810_comment'></div>每兴视夜，青灯在案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278810_comment'></div>于焉劳苦，于焉咨叹！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278810_comment'></div>苟余饥渴，则自涖爨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278810_comment'></div>凡我族居，以私为公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278810_comment'></div>凡我嗣息，以异为同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278810_comment'></div>亦既声名，胡谤是丛？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278810_comment'></div>亦既膴仕，奚归匆匆？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278810_comment'></div>虽则信已，岂余所独？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278810_comment'></div>亦岂无人，共此心曲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278810_comment'></div>知余孰深，爱敬之笃！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278810_comment'></div>子尝有言，舍我无复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278810_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278810_comment'></div>子病之久，余靡所爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278810_comment'></div>顾笑谓余，日月有待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278810_comment'></div>畴昔之梦，云鸾下逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278810_comment'></div>夫岂凡骨，而及斯赉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278810_comment'></div>余亦宵梦，殊庭秘严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278810_comment'></div>有二黄冠，缟衣襜襜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278810_comment'></div>求予食器，与子镜奁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278810_comment'></div>而遂弃余，曾日不淹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278810_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278810_comment'></div>以子生平，死且有守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278810_comment'></div>奈何衰惰，失此益友！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278810_comment'></div>强欲述子，悲掣之肘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278810_comment'></div>尚图能言，托子不朽！</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1278810_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年</a>　为妻张氏作墓铭。作品：令人张氏圹志。<div id='poem_1278779' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278779' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278779?labeling=true' target='_blank'>令人张氏圹志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1195年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278779")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278779_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278779'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278779'>是为陈子傅良之妻令人之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278779_comment'></div>令人姓张氏，讳幼昭，字景惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278779_comment'></div>永嘉人，草堂先生、国子小学录煇之孙，主管礼、兵部架阁文字孝恺之子，扬州泰兴县主簿东野之姊，盖登进士第三世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278779_comment'></div>以乾道七年归于我，庆元元年八月丙子卒，享年五十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278779_comment'></div>以其年十有二月壬申葬于兹屿，去家二百步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278779_comment'></div>生四女：长适进士潘子顺，次适福州闽清县尉薛师雍，次许嫁太学上舍生林子熙、将仕郎徐冲，余同年进士、知信州上饶县事潘君雷焕，户部侍郎薛君叔似，工部侍郎徐君谊之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278779_comment'></div>而子熙父，故直龙图阁林君季仲之族廉夫，又从余游也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278779_comment'></div>令人初得女，遂以余兄子师辙为己子，以进贺太上皇帝登位表，补迪功郎、福州罗源县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278779_comment'></div>次子师朴，以绍熙五年大飨恩补承务郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278779_comment'></div>二幼女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278779_comment'></div>令人穷约时来归我，相从二十有五年，再以台评罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278779_comment'></div>食贫岁月，视食禄为长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278779_comment'></div>深入湖湘，起居饮食非其性，多病所侵，未尝有毫发不满意见言色，余敬如宾友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278779_comment'></div>今亡矣，呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278779_comment'></div>余既走介，乞铭于太府卿叶君适，而自识其略，纳之坎中。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1278779_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年</a>　门人林懿仲卒，为作祭文。作品：祭林懿仲。<span class='inlineComment2'>（学生林懿仲卒于扬州司户任内。）</span><div id='poem_1278811' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278811' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278811?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭林懿仲文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1195年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278811")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278811_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278811'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278811'>我老哭子，云胡不哀？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278811_comment'></div>少却寘之，辟雍蓬莱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278811_comment'></div>而年不逮，公论之开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278811_comment'></div>是悬于天，我哀何哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278811_comment'></div>我怀古人，风凋谊零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278811_comment'></div>匪无群居，谓为友朋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278811_comment'></div>亦既乐推，俄而讥评。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278811_comment'></div>丧归自淮，潸焉曷胜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278811_comment'></div>属我悼内，拊棺未曾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278811_comment'></div>今辞酹之，尚其歆听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278811_comment'></div>有尽之觞，无穷之名！</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1278811_comment'></div></div></div><br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1195&endYear=1195')">1195年</a>　为诸人中第再次韵为诗。作品：再次韵简新第诸人。<div id='poem_161656' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161656' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_161855' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161855' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161855?labeling=true' target='_blank'>止斋曲廊初成</a><span class='authorDate'>（1196年夏）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161855")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_161855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161855'>小廊曲通幽，竹椽亦良好。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161855'>止斋十数间，足以便衰老。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161855'>檐低远风露，地窄易汛扫。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161855'>浅溪浮薄觞，短屏糊旧稿。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_161855'>著书仅玄易，过客多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_161855", 161855, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>韦缟</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_161855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_161855'>于中榜退思，谁其谅深抱。<div id='poem_sentence_6_161855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_161855'>吾思亦已晚，吾退盍更早。<div id='poem_sentence_7_161855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_161855'>怀哉彭泽令，仰止商山皓。<div id='poem_sentence_8_161855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_161855'>维渊有潜龙，维岳有藏宝。<div id='poem_sentence_9_161855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_161855'>煌煌暮春堂，三字落穹昊。<div id='poem_sentence_10_161855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_161855'>昭回际南极，镇抚及东岛。<div id='poem_sentence_11_161855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_161855'>胡然乃在斯，夙夜惧不保。<div id='poem_sentence_12_161855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_161855'>鬼神无世情，呵护必有道。<div id='poem_sentence_13_161855_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_161855'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_161855_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年</a>　兄长生日，作诗寄赠。作品：丙辰寄国举兄。<div id='poem_161645' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161645' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161645?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丙辰寄国举兄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1196年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161645")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161645_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161645'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161645'>是间南极老人星，乔木脩篁亦有情。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161645'>直向朱明为后殿，不随黄落入秋声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161645'>儿孙衮衮看新出，兄弟团团得晚成。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161645'>笑阅世人心事短，却从黄老问长生。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161645_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161645'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161645_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年8月</a>　贺宁宗生日。作品：丙辰贺瑞庆节。<div id='poem_1278302' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278302' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278302?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丙辰贺瑞庆节表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1196年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278302")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278302_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278302'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278302'>长发其祥，自一阳之生子；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278302_comment'></div>诞弥厥月，当六位之成乾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278302_comment'></div>宗社宠嘉，华夷欣颂<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278302_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下聪明时乂，刚健日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278302_comment'></div>省事清心，独冠百王之上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278302_comment'></div>深仁厚泽，丕承列圣之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278302_comment'></div>于万斯年，自今以始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278302_comment'></div>臣顷叨虞侍，最荷简知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278302_comment'></div>属当去极之遥，阻在奉觞之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278302_comment'></div>昭回下烛，常对越于奎文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278302_comment'></div>舞蹈永歌，但熙然于尧壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278302_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278302_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年</a>　为门人林懿仲作墓铭。作品：林懿仲墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（林懿仲字渊叔，陈傅良学生。）</span><div id='poem_1278769' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278769' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278769?labeling=true' target='_blank'>林懿仲墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1196年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278769")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278769_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278769'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278769'>昔者吾党欲相与言，于郡则之郑景元氏，于邑则之林懿仲氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278769_comment'></div>今亡矣，余故哭景元不胜哀，铭懿仲亦不知哀涕之出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278769_comment'></div>懿仲讳渊叔，承事郎文质之子，起家致赀累钜万，而急教子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278769_comment'></div>长颐叔，字正仲，登乾道二年进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278769_comment'></div>懿仲，登淳熙十一年进士第，而林氏遂为儒门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278769_comment'></div>懿仲自城南书社从余学，或之他，则亦僦旁舍不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278769_comment'></div>后二十馀年，非余宦游时不可相就，必其有故不能相就也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278769_comment'></div>间尝虚所居室东偏江月楼之下，集其畴人，以待余卒业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278769_comment'></div>吾州俗尊重师友，前一辈尽，学绪几坠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278769_comment'></div>比懿仲二三子修故事，后一辈趋和之，而复知有师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278769_comment'></div>待星子主簿阙，即不专习举子一经，日自为程，以若干晷课某经，又若干晷课某史，而后诵《楚词》、晋宋间人诗，于《诗》、《礼》、《周官》家掇取其说，间出己意，往往与经意合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278769_comment'></div>盖晚而后诗寖工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278769_comment'></div>懿仲才辨治能处事，但以其才自见，宜宦达有声誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278769_comment'></div>况务学善，不矜衒，善褒讳人短长，与之者众，宜益显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278769_comment'></div>况其学未止乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278769_comment'></div>而以庆元元年九月壬辰卒于扬州司户，年五十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278769_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278769_comment'></div>于是铭，余不特为邑人惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278769_comment'></div>娶陈氏，子四人：子习、子着、子潜、子简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278769_comment'></div>一女，适陈益崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278769_comment'></div>孙男一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278769_comment'></div>子习以二年十月癸丑葬于林岱山，来乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278769_comment'></div>余尝为其母夫人朱氏得铭于今焕章阁待制庐陵杨公万里，叙其世已详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278769_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1278769'>合也者离也，成也者亏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278769_comment'></div>必尝以为慊，则必尝以为悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278769_comment'></div>孰全以归？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278769_comment'></div>蕴而弗施也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278769_comment'></div>于吾子何嗟？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278769_comment'></div>嗟哉时也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1278769_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年</a>　为门人沈昌作墓铭。作品：沈叔阜圹志。<span class='inlineComment2'>（沈昌字叔阜，泉州德化令沈希尹之子，从陈傅良学。）</span><div id='poem_1278770' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278770' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278770?labeling=true' target='_blank'>沈叔阜圹志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1196年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278770")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278770_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278770'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278770'>叔阜讳昌，姓沈氏，温瑞安人，泉州德化令希尹之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278770_comment'></div>母林氏，后母张氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278770_comment'></div>德化公始识余，亟以叔阜相从问学为请，常常语人：「吾儿异日当知名于世」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278770_comment'></div>学者且数百人，叔阜与今提举福建常平茶事蔡行之，年皆少，皆有俊声，而叔阜乃早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278770_comment'></div>故沿海制置参议徐公履少初，天下士也，与德化交，老弥好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278770_comment'></div>德化卒，徐公自通守信州归，不谋于家人，以其女妻叔阜，生三子：建、衍、因；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278770_comment'></div>一女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278770_comment'></div>因为从兄厚之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278770_comment'></div>徐氏守视其孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278770_comment'></div>自淳熙十三年正月十九日，至庆元二年十一月二十一日，克葬于永嘉建牙乡丁公村净名院山之侧，实德化墓下云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1278770_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年冬</a>　为族叔祖陈绍作圹志。作品：族叔祖元继圹志。<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈绍字元继，陈傅良族叔祖。）</span><div id='poem_1278771' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278771' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278771?labeling=true' target='_blank'>族叔祖元继圹志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1196年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278771")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278771_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278771'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278771'>维陈氏自福之长溪县劝儒乡擢秀里徙温州瑞安县帆游乡固义里，谱凡七世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278771_comment'></div>傅良生晚，犹及诸祖父行，皆厚重，不察察，大人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278771_comment'></div>府君讳绍，字元继，于祖行最少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278771_comment'></div>傅良及详其为人，里中有故，或众不能合，族中有故，或独不能支，必须府君至而后集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278771_comment'></div>夫人善助之，日以酒肉饮食人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278771_comment'></div>时出嬉游，冬岁必为具燕，少长至僮仆不遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278771_comment'></div>其用度如不节，而家赀倍于畴昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278771_comment'></div>府君生崇宁二年，卒于乾道二年十月丙戌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278771_comment'></div>夫人生元符元年，卒于淳熙十三年二月丁卯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278771_comment'></div>府君以淳熙五年十二月丙申葬于所居里西尖之麓，至庆元二年十二月庚申，而夫人祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278771_comment'></div>二子：宏中、定中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278771_comment'></div>女适刘宋弼、朱克明、谢邦基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278771_comment'></div>孙男四人：宗诜、宗澹、宗洙、宗汾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278771_comment'></div>诜早卒，宗洙为兄之子方中后，澹、洙皆国子进士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278771_comment'></div>女一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278771_comment'></div>傅良，诸孙也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1278771_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年</a>　为族叔祖陈绎作墓志铭。作品：族叔祖元成墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈绎字元成，陈傅良族叔祖。）</span><div id='poem_1278772' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278772' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278772?labeling=true' target='_blank'>族叔祖元成墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1196年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278772")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278772_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278772'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278772'>府君讳绎，字元成，温瑞安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278772_comment'></div>以乾道七年六月癸丑卒，年六十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278772_comment'></div>淳熙六年十有二月丙申，葬于所居里安仁山之东趾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278772_comment'></div>傅良尝闻之祖妣吴，旧庐盖周显德间所作云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278772_comment'></div>族居二百年，或舍而改筑，府君遂得有其西偏，与先君共一础。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278772_comment'></div>傅良幼也孤，能读书，夜达旦，府君故见爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278772_comment'></div>一日，挈傅良手，至所谓西厅者，问焉，曰：「而欲存此否乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278772_comment'></div>傅良不能仰视，但泣下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278772_comment'></div>府君叹曰：「吾固期汝之有志也，当卒以归汝」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278772_comment'></div>旧庐之全，府君赐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278772_comment'></div>府君行事类如此，终其身不詈不朴不讼，而家事治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278772_comment'></div>死之日，哭之者皆尽哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278772_comment'></div>娶孙氏，生一子，讳孚中，字安国；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278772_comment'></div>再娶潘氏，生一子，讳和中，字敬之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278772_comment'></div>一女，适黄廷谦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278772_comment'></div>孙夫人先三十年卒，不及见其家盛时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278772_comment'></div>潘夫人善视二子，二子又善为兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278772_comment'></div>安国以为然，敬之曰「好」，或敬之少不谓然，安国亦曰「好」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278772_comment'></div>府君旧屋才三间，后二子合为数十间于其旁，奉潘氏夫人居中，意象甚美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278772_comment'></div>有姨之女及从侄之孙女贫，夫人长育至嫁，二子无后言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278772_comment'></div>然安国雅好佛，特谨畏，非习吉，一篑土不敢动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278772_comment'></div>敬之洒落，自适于觞咏，静作惟所欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278772_comment'></div>其性殊不同，而能各护其偏，是尤美也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278772_comment'></div>夫人年七十有三，以淳熙十四年十月癸巳卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278772_comment'></div>安国年五十有五，以绍熙二年八月庚寅卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278772_comment'></div>敬之年四十有九，以庆元元年九月壬辰卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278772_comment'></div>哭三人者，如哭府君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278772_comment'></div>安国娶王氏，生一子宗瀚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278772_comment'></div>二女，适诸葛诜、林昕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278772_comment'></div>敬之娶谢氏，生一子宗沂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278772_comment'></div>一女，许嫁林子卓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278772_comment'></div>初，府君葬孙夫人于茶尖之阳，府君卒，二子改卜安仁，与茶尖对峙，为六竁，他日将以妇子左右象生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278772_comment'></div>时夫人未合，而安国卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278772_comment'></div>绍熙四年十有二月壬寅，从夫人祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278772_comment'></div>庆元二年十有二月壬申，而敬之祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278772_comment'></div>傅良欲铭府君久，以宦游，至是而后铭，故并书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278772_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1278772'>岂不以为利，利至浅也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278772_comment'></div>岂不以为能，能至鲜也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278772_comment'></div>我图后人，种之远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278772_comment'></div>燕及草木，不可剪也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1278772_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1196&endYear=1196')">1196年冬</a>　为族兄陈踰作圹志。作品：族兄际可圹志。<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈踰字际可，娶楼氏。陈傅良族兄。）</span><div id='poem_1278773' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278773' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278773?labeling=true' target='_blank'>族兄际可圹志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1196年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278773")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278773_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278773'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278773'>府君讳踰，字际可，姓陈氏，温瑞安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278773_comment'></div>父讳孚，母史氏，有三子，府君为季。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278773_comment'></div>父卒，府君最善事母，在母傍三十有五年，供养如一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278773_comment'></div>府君性多病，率数岁才一时再出外门，独自以随母为娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278773_comment'></div>年四五十，游戏抱扶如小儿状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278773_comment'></div>母一饭不下咽，辄废匕箸，母为之强饭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278773_comment'></div>年八十有八，以绍熙二年八月癸亥卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278773_comment'></div>府君亦年六十有五矣，以其年十有二月乙卯卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278773_comment'></div>娶楼氏，生三子：师鲁、师济、师复；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278773_comment'></div>一女，嫁许仲淳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278773_comment'></div>三孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278773_comment'></div>楼夫人后三年，以庆元元年八月丁巳卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278773_comment'></div>师鲁初未得卜，藁葬府君于隆平尼院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278773_comment'></div>至庆元三年正月丁酉，遂合葬于西尖之麓。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1278773_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1197&endYear=1197')">1197年夏</a>　兄长生日作诗为寿。作品：丁巳寿国举兄。<div id='poem_161625' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161625' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278303_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下典学光明，性原溥博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278303_comment'></div>澹然无欲，裒六艺以自怡；<div id='poem_content_1278305'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278305'>万年景福，诞膺天授之休；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278305_comment'></div>四海欢心，姑尽臣恭之义<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278305_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下道无偏陂，学有缉熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278305_comment'></div>燕及两宫，增圣图之广大；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278305_comment'></div>陶成多士，粲王度之清夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278305_comment'></div>肇开震夙之期，永享炽昌之寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278305_comment'></div>臣蒙恩至厚，抱衅罙深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278305_comment'></div>积五稔之凌兢，无一毫之觊幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278305_comment'></div>衣冠甚伟，虽阻预于耆英；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278305_comment'></div>畎亩不忘，但欣逢于华旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278305_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278305_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1199&endYear=1199')">1199年</a>　为友人王自中作圹志。作品：王道甫圹志。<span class='inlineComment2'>（王自中字道甫，陈傅良友人。淳熙五年进士。）</span><div id='poem_1278776' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278776' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278776?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王道甫圹志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1199年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278776")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278776_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278776'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278776'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278776_comment'></div>此吾友王君道甫之墓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278776_comment'></div>道甫讳自中，皇曾祖高，皇祖成子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278776_comment'></div>父廷佐，赠朝奉郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278776_comment'></div>母施氏，封太安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278776_comment'></div>道甫登淳熙五年进士第，调舒州怀宁主簿、严州分水令，未上，以枢密使王公蔺荐，除籍田令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278776_comment'></div>未几，罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278776_comment'></div>通判郢州，未上，知光化军、信州，召赴行在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278776_comment'></div>丁太安人忧，服阕，再被召，以论罢，主管建宁府武夷山冲佑观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278776_comment'></div>起知邵州、兴化军，连以论罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278776_comment'></div>兴化之命下，道甫已病，庆元五年七月也，八月二十三日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278776_comment'></div>官至朝请郎，年六十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278776_comment'></div>娶林氏，封安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278776_comment'></div>二子：长曰更生，次幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278776_comment'></div>四女：长适国学内舍生高熙绩，馀许嫁进士曾充宗、周伯麟、林浩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278776_comment'></div>道甫居温之平阳归仁乡，晚徙县之橘庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278776_comment'></div>雅爱仙坛僧屋之后山，因以为坟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278776_comment'></div>十有一月二日，林夫人奉其柩葬于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278776_comment'></div>人皆知道甫少有志当世，尝以布衣上封事，及对，语合上指，除官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278776_comment'></div>才数日，趣举其类奏上，道甫由是绌光化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278776_comment'></div>入觐今上皇，复有「朕得卿名于寿皇」之语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278776_comment'></div>道甫竟由是死云云为恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278776_comment'></div>不知道甫岁晏，抑才为学，去智为恬，假之持久，何造不深？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278776_comment'></div>余欲铭道甫也，以此而未克就，故识其圹云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1278776_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1199&endYear=1199')">1199年</a>　为门人陈子益之父作圹志。作品：陈百朋圹志。<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈天赐字百朋，陈子益之父。）</span><div id='poem_1278775' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278775' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278775?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈百朋圹志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1199年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278775")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278775_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278775'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278775'>陈子端己将以庆元五年十月十有四日癸酉合葬其父于平阳万全乡管奥之华原，来乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278775_comment'></div>余尝铭其母夫人林氏，则又奚辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278775_comment'></div>属衰惰，铭未即就，为书其名字岁月，纳之圹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278775_comment'></div>公讳天锡，字百朋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278775_comment'></div>曾大父伯诸，大父宗庆，父希渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278775_comment'></div>享年八十有六，以是年四月戊辰卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278775_comment'></div>三子：明畏、端己、彪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278775_comment'></div>彪为浮屠氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278775_comment'></div>女，嫁瑞安朱次宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278775_comment'></div>男孙四人：文、武、遇、原；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278775_comment'></div>女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278775_comment'></div>馀语在铭中。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278775_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1199&endYear=1199')">1199年冬</a>　生日作诗抒怀。作品：己未生朝谢莘叟兄送梅二首。<div id='poem_161637' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161637' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161637?labeling=true' target='_blank'>己未生朝谢莘叟兄送梅<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1199年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161637")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161637_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161637'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161637'>无岁探梅不恨迟，缉斋今送两三枝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161637'>也知造物多生意，亦为畸人解笑颐。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161637'>壬子恰同身堕地，庚申还值国开基。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161637'>数家誇道明年好，好在长贫诵系辞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161637'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161637_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161636' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161636' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161636?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1199年冬）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161636_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161636'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161636'>莫笑栽培日月迟，待看老干及孙枝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161636_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161636'>天将臈去春回首，人与花同雪满颐。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161636_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161636'>万里陇头空故迹，孤山篱落但馀基。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161636_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161636'>至今佳句无人继，谁与招魂著楚辞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161636_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161636'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161636_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1200&endYear=1200')">1200年春</a>　上巳日作诗抒怀。作品：庚申上已。<div id='poem_161942' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161942' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161942?labeling=true' target='_blank'>庚申上巳</a><span class='authorDate'>（1200年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161942")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161942_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161942'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161942'>何事□□□，天低雨露悭。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161942'>一□遗晚□，百感又春关。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161942'>墨客山阴竹，骚人洧外兰。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161942'>谁知千古意，不在□游间。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1200&endYear=1200')">1200年冬</a>　为族叔陈方中作墓铭。作品：族叔国任墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（陈方中字国任，陈傅良族叔。）</span><div id='poem_1278777' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278777' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278777?labeling=true' target='_blank'>族叔国任墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1200年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278777")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278777_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278777'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278777'>傅良逮事诸伯叔父，于叔父行以长者称，公为最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278777_comment'></div>聚族为学也，于辈行齿宿而才壮，公为最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278777_comment'></div>晚各务庄重，择交，虽一笑嚬不苟，亦公为最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278777_comment'></div>公，德人也，而竟不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278777_comment'></div>娶朱氏，良配也，无子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278777_comment'></div>作室奉母，门巷深靓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278777_comment'></div>升其堂，如无人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278777_comment'></div>窥其户，吟诵琅然者，公燕私之所也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278777_comment'></div>间肯一出，独过吾庐，时时以「从子某宜后我」为寄，今宗洙是已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278777_comment'></div>于淳熙之十二年二月十日午夜来见速，至则息浸微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278777_comment'></div>某请故，公曰：「子从吾叔母取筦钥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278777_comment'></div>付吾儿」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278777_comment'></div>夫人哭方悲，亟出筦钥复命，则公瞑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278777_comment'></div>公侍母之暇，退即书案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278777_comment'></div>夫人执家政，不以米盐烦其夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278777_comment'></div>自一匕撮，公鲜知其出入有无也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278777_comment'></div>妇德多啬，一夕从顾言，无趑趄意，课佛书，或施舍焉，终其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278777_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278777_comment'></div>公诚知家事与母孰重，故听于夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278777_comment'></div>夫人亦诚知家事与夫孰重，故听于子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278777_comment'></div>是皆宜书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278777_comment'></div>而公，德人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278777_comment'></div>淳熙十有四年十二月壬申，葬于屿山之阳，属傅良之官，未及刻其隧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278777_comment'></div>夫人以庆元四年十二月十九日卒，享年七十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278777_comment'></div>宗洙以六年十有二月丙申合葬于公兆，于是并书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278777_comment'></div>公讳方中，字国任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278777_comment'></div>世次语在公圹志中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278777_comment'></div>宗洙今为太学免解进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278777_comment'></div>女一人，适朱克勤，早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278777_comment'></div>男孙二人：怡老、瑞老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278777_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1278777'>惟亲其亲，必利其嗣人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1278777_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_1278582_comment'></div>荆公熙宁五年帖：运判中允者，杨蟠公济也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278582_comment'></div>公济以是年十一月自光禄丞改太子中允，权发遣永兴等路转运判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278582_comment'></div>明年，司农言：「近诏天下出钱免役，而永兴秦凤比它路民贫役重」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278582_comment'></div>于是始立二分宽饶之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278582_comment'></div>以此帖考之，当是荆公尝有悔意，故农寺敢白上耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278582_comment'></div>馀诗帖不能详其岁月，良愧该洽。</div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1201&endYear=1201')">1201年</a>　居乡。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1202&endYear=1202')">1202年</a>　驰伪学禁，复原官，提举太平兴国宫，作诗送许及之被诏赴阙。作品：鼓琴行送许深父同知被诏赴阙并序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（据《宋史·许及之传》，许及之深父嘉泰二年拜参知政事，进知枢密院事兼参政。）</span><div id='poem_162027' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_162027' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/162027?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鼓琴行送许深父同知被诏赴阙</a><span class='authorDate'>（1202年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_162027")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_162027_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_162027'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_162027'>伯牙非不善鼓琴，指下能写山高而水深。<div id='poem_sentence_0_162027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_162027'>亦有师旷号精绝，蜚雪白昼为重阴。<div id='poem_sentence_1_162027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_162027'>吾琴不以与二子，二子不过衰季愁叹而悲吟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_162027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_162027'>后夔安在九嶷远，南风不竞凤鸟瘖。<div id='poem_sentence_3_162027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_162027'>恭惟高宗复古殿得此，净洗禁昧朱离任。<div id='poem_sentence_4_162027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_162027'>一鼓朝纲日井井，再鼓边柝<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>秋沉沉。<div id='poem_sentence_5_162027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_162027'>桑麻万里皆按堵，笙歌三纪无沾襟。<div id='poem_sentence_6_162027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_162027'>桥山遗此岁月侵，何时雅颂得所籥不僣。<div id='poem_sentence_7_162027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_162027'>宝藏岂爱五重玉，市价敢论双南金。<div id='poem_sentence_8_162027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_162027'>公归旧隐三霜砧，天子恭默思商霖。<div id='poem_sentence_9_162027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_162027'>君臣祥琴适相际，使者十辈来骎骎。<div id='poem_sentence_10_162027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_162027'>白麻已草弄印久，端揆虚左谁当今。<div id='poem_sentence_11_162027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_162027'>我抱此琴病山林，不如送公西归调釜鬵。<div id='poem_sentence_12_162027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_162027'>但愿为作南风音，上以对扬高宗中兴之大业，下以追还虞舜万国之欢心。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_162027_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_162027'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_162027_0'>⑴ 原作拆，据四库本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_162027_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1202&endYear=1202')">1202年闰12月</a>　诏与郡，请辞。作品：辞免与郡申省状。<div id='poem_1278398' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278398' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278398?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免与郡申省状<span class='inlineComment2'>（嘉泰二年闰十二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1202年闰12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278398")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278398_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278398'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278398'>准尚书省劄子：「闰十二月五日，奉圣旨：陈傅良、沈有开并与郡」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278398_comment'></div>拜恩殊特，揣分惊皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278398_comment'></div>伏念某罪戾之馀，惟知循省，骤蒙圣慈还官赋禄，阖门千指叨窃温饱，衔戴隆天厚地之施，莫知称塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278398_comment'></div>曾未改岁，再蒙抆拭，俾司民社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278398_comment'></div>仰惟圣上矜怜簪履之旧，致兹误宠，感铭次骨，誓竭縻殒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278398_comment'></div>伏念某衰病日侵，鞭策不前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278398_comment'></div>矧已试罔功，愆尤素积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278398_comment'></div>不于此时力祈寝免，异日成命遂下，冒昧祗受，必致颠隮，重烦造化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278398_comment'></div>欲望特赐敷奏，许某终满祠禄，庶几少安愚分。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278398'><span class='label'>按：</span>嘉泰二年闰十二月二十七日，三省同奉圣旨不允。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278398_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1203&endYear=1203')">1203年3月</a>　授集英殿修撰。疾笃请谢事。授宝谟阁待制。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1203&endYear=1203')">1203年</a>　诏知泉州，请辞。作品：辞免知泉州申省状。<div id='poem_1278399' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278399' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278399?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免知泉州申省状</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉泰三年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278399")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278399_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278399'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278399'>准尚书省劄子：备奉圣旨，差知泉州，替叶适阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278399_comment'></div>有合奏陈，须至烦渎者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278399_comment'></div>怜贫恤老，君相之恩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278399_comment'></div>量力效官，人臣之谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278399_comment'></div>伏念某生平辛苦，积成痼疾，自岁庚申至今未已，浮肿如水，颤掉如风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278399_comment'></div>神明支干，日就昏塞，不省人事者屡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278399_comment'></div>此岂可尚堪驱使，将以寄千里之命乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278399_comment'></div>况温陵大邦，甲于闽部；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278399_comment'></div>蕃汉杂居，狱市难扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278399_comment'></div>而使衰瘁当之，必见阙误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278399_comment'></div>课以裨报，徒遭罪责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278399_comment'></div>载念臣自叨误恩，畀以祠禄，月有所入，足了医疗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278399_comment'></div>若及满岁，庶保残龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278399_comment'></div>贪恋公朝，岂所觊望？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278399_comment'></div>失此私便，忽然永已，却抱无穷之恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278399_comment'></div>又况此邦比年选牧多处法从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278399_comment'></div>某往者疵衅之深，患在高位，虽循省不为不久，抆拭不为不至，若一日起废，复此逾越，公论不置，且见颠隮，又非所以保全之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278399_comment'></div>欲望朝廷特赐敷奏，收回成命，仍旧奉祠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278399'><span class='label'>按：</span>嘉泰三年三月十三日，同奉圣旨不允。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278399_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1203&endYear=1203')">1203年11月</a>　卒。赠通议大夫。<br /></div>

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1168&endYear=1168')">1168年11月</a>　居乡。作品：祭兑光居士林乔年。<div id='poem_1278780' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278780' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278780?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭兑光居士林乔年文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1168年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278780")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278780_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278780'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278780'>齐鲁两生，视汉功臣为贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278780_comment'></div>列国之千乘，不如洙泗之一言，世固有公论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278780_comment'></div>公名不至仕版，而禀禀乡评，不在诸贤大夫下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278780_comment'></div>夫岂求之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278780_comment'></div>呜呼，士之闻见公者，亦可以兴矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278780_comment'></div>功名一时，典刑千古，形器虽亡，道德如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278780_comment'></div>我等亲旧，今来哭公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278780_comment'></div>三年之丧，于此观礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278780_comment'></div>自今余乡，起孝起敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278780_comment'></div>其谁作之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278780_comment'></div>眷言耆老。<div
