gray;'>▪</span>娶张氏。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>与温州教授楼钥游。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>居乡。作品：祭芮祭酒。<div id='poem_1278783' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278783' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278783?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭芮祭酒煜文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1171年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278783")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278783_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278783'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278783'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278783_comment'></div>欲从先生游十年于兹，盖亦数相遭，卒幸相亲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278783_comment'></div>而受教不少延，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278783_comment'></div>天耶，人耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278783_comment'></div>前年寓会稽，会先生为部使者，有来言，先生将就顾汝，□某□愧焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278783_comment'></div>寻如毗陵，弗敢见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278783_comment'></div>明年东还，先生适长太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278783_comment'></div>是秋将考试，增置生员，又以嫌弗敢见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278783_comment'></div>既幸备数诸生，先生孳孳焉望某来也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278783_comment'></div>比至，相待如宾交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278783_comment'></div>甚者，从二子辱临拜，又命史持立无答拜，为是惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278783_comment'></div>又逾月，弗敢告而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278783_comment'></div>呜呼，谁谓先生欤，而遽止此也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278783_comment'></div>夫苟谓遽止此也，其寓会稽，必无以愧自违也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278783_comment'></div>其还毗陵，必无以嫌自拘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278783_comment'></div>况为诸生，宜旦夕左右侍，而又何忍以过相待，一顷舍去？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278783_comment'></div>夫以位望之殊也，法守之察也，世俗之莫己谅也，顾小而失大，其亦谓之人耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278783_comment'></div>虽然，自知求师友，所得于天下才数人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278783_comment'></div>去年哭刘莆田，今年哭祭酒，彼寿考者何限，胡为于我师友频岁而忽焉亡耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278783_comment'></div>且贤者纵不得大用，独不可留限，遗吾党耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278783_comment'></div>且某也，固无多求于世，无乃亦不获成就其私志，考德而问业耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278783_comment'></div>今夫汎相与，类有幸不至缺绝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278783_comment'></div>是谓天耶，非耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278783_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278783_comment'></div>一忤权臣，白首瘴乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278783_comment'></div>公论既开，时谓□宜何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278783_comment'></div>位不过卿，死无归居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278783_comment'></div>岂惟门人，有泪如雨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1278783_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>乾道六年陈傅良入京时，琚尝执弟子礼。作品：与吴居父直閤。<div id='poem_1278405' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278405' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278405?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与吴居父直阁书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1171年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278405")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278405_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278405'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278405'>某贱不肖，其所与游，皆田野布衣俦类之士，未尝从王公大人之后，盖谓之贵倨，不可就见，况敢望其即我哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278405_comment'></div>来京都，足下独造穷巷，夜叩门而赐见焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278405_comment'></div>其行不以车马，其谒不以爵叙，其简牍不以记□。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278405_comment'></div>凡所以加乎贱不肖者，顾王公大人不能得之于其门人弟子，乃今愧昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278405_comment'></div>甚矣，小人之怀厚诬当世君子也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278405_comment'></div>盖闻□□之化，于贵公子见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278405_comment'></div>外戚立传，自秦汉始；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278405_comment'></div>王道之行，壹□□□之为此也，将有繇然者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278405_comment'></div>君与相急士于其公，贵家□盖为□于其私，而一介之士无遗焉，则国欲无治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278405_comment'></div>不可得也矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278405_comment'></div>一□而关风俗、系治道，则岂仆私幸，亦岂足下之私为□□德不肖，诚谓非仆私幸，且非足下之私为惠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278405_comment'></div>宠光之未，□戒令之不趋，宜弗之罪，是以敢迟迟而往也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278405_comment'></div>虽然，施有所不报，扣有所不荅，将以成其人之贤名，而阴观其向背，战国诸子为之，孔门无是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278405_comment'></div>仆虽不肖，敢不谨于礼，其将择日□戒，拜赐于下风<span class='inlineComment2'>（《止斋先生文集》卷三五。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278405_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1278405'>「居」、「阁」二字原缺，据永嘉本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1278405_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>林安之从陈傅良学最久。作品：与林安之。<div id='poem_1278406' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278406' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278406?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与林安之书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1171年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278406")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278406_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278406'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278406'>中间作懿仲书，极欲如吾安之二三臭味，脱去乡邦，来客山国，庶得淡中之腴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278406_comment'></div>寻承已过岩下，良用缺然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278406_comment'></div>安之饭之粗足，亦屑就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278406_comment'></div>何耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278406_comment'></div>仆久厌此如沐漆，解去无由尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278406_comment'></div>比来新昌，亦欲渐与人疏，稍回鞭策，自警督视，家居良为未便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278406_comment'></div>然每念吕后、刘歆辈，视张子房、扬子云，真自苦者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278406_comment'></div>要之两翁意，未易与儿女道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278406_comment'></div>故虽未便，乐也安之乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278406_comment'></div>子真知味者，南坡茹菜，动踰月无怜色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278406_comment'></div>与友生语，率不十四五，相唯诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278406_comment'></div>惟吾安之，有闻如响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278406_comment'></div>天姿如许，加之小自警督，当入张、扬会中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278406_comment'></div>谨勿为刘、吕辈以儿女语相甘诱，落身杯酌间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278406_comment'></div>某无过人，但知非，辄深悔恨，亦渐去旧习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278406_comment'></div>矧如安之相爱之笃，不知其言之苦亮之否？</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1278406_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>居乡。作品：与郑景望少卿书二首。<div id='poem_1278407' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278407' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278407?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与郑景望少卿书<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1171年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278407")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278407_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278407'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278407'>拜违诲席六七载，百无一进，独幸于毗陵，从百九兄游半年，平生气息为之迟缓，推挽之赐，何敢废忘？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278407_comment'></div>中间托子之命，仰见盛德简在宸衷，可为天下贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278407_comment'></div>簿书之劳，非所以溷儒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278407_comment'></div>比来毂下传闻，传谩详密，不见端□，私用慰释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278407_comment'></div>虽然，百九兄书盖期望不但此，愚见偶合，故未敢深喜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278407_comment'></div>百九兄屡不应书，自敌己犹倦，况违尊者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278407_comment'></div>又从县□请祠，为礼率直，如闻朝论，颇不相然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278407_comment'></div>台符径至，殆非初心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278407_comment'></div>而得书，愿欲一来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278407_comment'></div>舍昨就今，或者胥失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278407_comment'></div>近知扁舟赴约，计已全，并得此消息驰报，千万详审，勿使易来难去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278407_comment'></div>甚善，甚望！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278407_comment'></div>芮祭酒仅及家，易箦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278407_comment'></div>刘大著、王詹事皆竟不疗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278407_comment'></div>海内贤者，相继彫丧，令人丧气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278407_comment'></div>张侍讲方结主知，忽刺远郡，吕博士亦悼亡暂告，未果复入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278407_comment'></div>年来所得师友，亦次第涣散如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278407_comment'></div>剧用无憀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278407_comment'></div>职罢还家了亲事，益远得御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278407_comment'></div>傥怜其不自弃而终教之，时赐尺纸，略去少褒之辞，直下砭针，则千里犹膝下也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1278407_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278408' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278408' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278408?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1171年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278408_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278408'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278408'>拜违诲色忽复旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278408_comment'></div>岁中间两辱坠教，一一具报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278408_comment'></div>后许簿报书，亦尝略布浅漏，以求是正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278408_comment'></div>领令嗣书，缺然不至，左右为之歉然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278408_comment'></div>建宁附问，又尝以大贤推毂不苟之意为请，殆言轻无效，许簿亦不欲复以上闻焉尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278408_comment'></div>垂谕得丧顺正，自是天资顽顿，不甚领会世间羞辱一事，非敢以为学力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278408_comment'></div>见性之诲，敢不从事？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278408_comment'></div>盖读《孟子》「得百里之地而君之，皆能以朝诸侯，有天下」，「行一不义，杀一不辜而得天下，不为」，则学力亦至矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278408_comment'></div>犹以为与孔子异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278408_comment'></div>然则士之任可谓甚重，得其一二，以为尽在是，端不敢也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278408_comment'></div>或蒙索见前二书，他有以警策，毋惜频示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278408_comment'></div>何时扣击，临纸惘惘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278408_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='875c8a86dcb948bc80b0f0e15280ad7a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("875c8a86dcb948bc80b0f0e15280ad7a");'><span id='875c8a86dcb948bc80b0f0e15280ad7a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1173&endYear=1174')">1173-1174年</a>，37-38岁</div><div id='875c8a86dcb948bc80b0f0e15280ad7a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1173&endYear=1173')">1173年</a>　江西运判龚茂良以书币招，不赴。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1173&endYear=1173')">1173年7月</a>　经营薛季宣葬事，为作祭文。作品：祭薛常州先生。<div id='poem_1278785' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278785' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278785?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭薛常州先生文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1173年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278785")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278785_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278785'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278785'>我昔自喜，壁立倚天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278785_comment'></div>见兄梅潭，忽若坠渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278785_comment'></div>梅潭谓何？其要日损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278785_comment'></div>自《易》、鲁《论》，馀勿挂眼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278785_comment'></div>明年会稽，我图西征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278785_comment'></div>匪适会稽，从兄毗陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278785_comment'></div>毗陵何有？聚书千卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278785_comment'></div>曰此百氏，各有攸见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278785_comment'></div>维古相授，待豪杰然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278785_comment'></div>我辱过施，如何克传？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278785_comment'></div>约我博我，有源有涉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278785_comment'></div>譬彼草木，自根徂叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278785_comment'></div>匪我无师，亦既多友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278785_comment'></div>繄兄不逢，岁月空久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278785_comment'></div>我无所愿，没生为役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278785_comment'></div>于兄居游，无以南北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278785_comment'></div>滆湖之上，其乐未央。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278785_comment'></div>为兄食贫，去之他乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278785_comment'></div>兄使淮堧，我客都邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278785_comment'></div>系名春官，驱驰靡及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278785_comment'></div>霅川之招，岂不欲往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278785_comment'></div>有妇方娠，琐琐羁鞅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278785_comment'></div>会兄来归，我栖旁舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278785_comment'></div>当暑之袢，相期秋夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278785_comment'></div>我嗟我命，为此契阔！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278785_comment'></div>矧今为虐，复我中夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278785_comment'></div>鱼亦有依，鸟亦有群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278785_comment'></div>我实何罪？恃无其人！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278785_comment'></div>顾瞻四方，群公日徂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278785_comment'></div>刘不在闽，芮不在吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278785_comment'></div>我居数人，乃眷相顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278785_comment'></div>幸踰其分，罪此之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278785_comment'></div>凡今海内，知兄如林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278785_comment'></div>我虽庸陋，特知之深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278785_comment'></div>我观六艺，师自为的。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278785_comment'></div>《书》不见《诗》，《春秋》无《易》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278785_comment'></div>我观诸子，其说并驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278785_comment'></div>佛老见奇，申、韩每下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278785_comment'></div>我亦观人，鲜不异止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278785_comment'></div>此有遗事，彼有丧己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278785_comment'></div>自兄作兴，廓之大同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278785_comment'></div>以断群疑，匠师涖工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278785_comment'></div>人之见之，于何不一？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278785_comment'></div>可以右左，衡从伸屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278785_comment'></div>我窥度之，惟心之平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1278785_comment'></div>岂惟不亏？抑靡所增。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1278785_comment'></div>天不生贤，生辄不试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1278785_comment'></div>叹无全材，虽全曷谓？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1278785_comment'></div>彼尺寸材，功在夏屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1278785_comment'></div>而弃不顾，徒为乔木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1278785_comment'></div>凡今之人，为此陨涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1278785_comment'></div>我独私忧，皇恤当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1278785_comment'></div>世艰道远，而使我独。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1278785_comment'></div>有书未完，有徒未淑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1278785_comment'></div>诔之以诗，哀哉已而！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1278785_comment'></div>莫知我悲，谓我胡为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1278785_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1278785_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1174&endYear=1174')">1174年1月</a>　陈傅良友人诸葛说卒，为作祭文。作品：祭诸葛梦叟。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='d2f1d36bb17b412aa3713844a236dfaa_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d2f1d36bb17b412aa3713844a236dfaa");'><span id='d2f1d36bb17b412aa3713844a236dfaa_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1175&endYear=1175')">1175年</a>，39岁</div><div id='d2f1d36bb17b412aa3713844a236dfaa' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1175&endYear=1175')">1175年</a>　陈傅良弟子林安之卒。作品：祭林安之。<div id='poem_1278786' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278786' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278786?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭林安之文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1175年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278786")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278786_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278786'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278786'>余游观天下，博交当世之士以自治，盖各有长矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278786_comment'></div>矜畏洁修者，或亡涉事之具；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278786_comment'></div>疏通隽达者，则放乎绳墨之外而不可羁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278786_comment'></div>刳心而趋约者几矣，又自六经百氏，阔略而废遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278786_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278786_comment'></div>安之余固遍阅而仅有焉，引而寘之诸老先生之门，亦不数数焉见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278786_comment'></div>忽今亡矣，余将奚望而谁期？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278786_comment'></div>余游具区，还会稽，栖迟台雁诸山之间，人迹几绝，安之往往先至而后归；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278786_comment'></div>金华之行，积雪埋岭，安之之疾侵矣，而犹不我遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278786_comment'></div>夫十年崎岖，不便于家，不利于有司，不皇宁于其躬，而无怠无悔，是果何求者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278786_comment'></div>此意寂寥，非笃学深思者，未易与知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278786_comment'></div>余年未四十，多病而早衰，自哭薛常州，而百念弛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278786_comment'></div>独将求古人之书，日与吾徒讲玩以卒岁，而安之且死，则吾志焉往而可为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278786_comment'></div>世有公论，于安之自不泯没，而非哭之恸，则不足以塞予悲也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1278786_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
新昌
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ce7589ba8d98429f95e773507965ca20_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ce7589ba8d98429f95e773507965ca20");'><span id='ce7589ba8d98429f95e773507965ca20_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1169&endYear=1169')">1169年</a>，33岁</div><div id='ce7589ba8d98429f95e773507965ca20' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>新昌黄度家坐馆授徒。作品：新昌咏归诗。新昌黄氏老山楼。<div id='poem_161836' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161836' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161836?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新昌咏归</a><span class='authorDate'>（1169年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161836")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161836_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161836'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161836'>回头三十二年非，木落霜空水见涯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161836'>万事自怜多誉早，半生犹幸一官迟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161836'>好将翰墨付侪辈，去与渔樵相尔谁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161836'>还有故人招隐否，寄声橘柚欲黄时。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161836'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161836_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
杭州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ceb2f035e36e470f87e9cbb3b508789f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ceb2f035e36e470f87e9cbb3b508789f");'><span id='ceb2f035e36e470f87e9cbb3b508789f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1170&endYear=1170')">1170年</a>，34岁</div><div id='ceb2f035e36e470f87e9cbb3b508789f' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1170&endYear=1170')">1170年</a>　参加太学补试。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1170&endYear=1170')">1170年秋</a>　国子祭酒芮国器将命为学谕，辞。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='cbed014fec2247f3b1d78f4f5f75a8d3_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("cbed014fec2247f3b1d78f4f5f75a8d3");'><span id='cbed014fec2247f3b1d78f4f5f75a8d3_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1172&endYear=1172')">1172年</a>，36岁</div><div id='cbed014fec2247f3b1d78f4f5f75a8d3' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>登进士第，作谢太上皇表。作品：乾道壬辰进士赐第谢太上皇帝。<div id='poem_1278260' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278260' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278260?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乾道壬辰进士赐第谢太上皇帝表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1172年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278260")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278260_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278260'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278260'>疏愚之对，爰契九重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278260_comment'></div>声教所陶，聿来三纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278260_comment'></div>推本功德，度越古今<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278260_comment'></div>窃迹本朝家法之详，究观列圣心传之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278260_comment'></div>规模一以经术，事业付之书生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278260_comment'></div>皇帝陛下所以载缵大猷，曲垂清问，臣等顾遭逢之幸甚，而循省之缺然，其何称塞招延之休？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278260_comment'></div>徒以生长涵养之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278260_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇太上皇帝陛下道久忘世，仁深入人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278260_comment'></div>光昭斯文，燕及今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278260_comment'></div>退藏于密，资万物于乾元；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278260_comment'></div>长发其祥，生多士于王国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278260_comment'></div>臣等敢不益坚精白，茂对龙光？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278260_comment'></div>言念何繇，庶几无斁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278260_comment'></div>□□□士，将无负虞舜聪明之朝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278260_comment'></div>遐不作人，其敢忘周王寿考之赐？</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1278260_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>新进士廷对。作品：壬辰廷对。<div id='poem_1278380' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278380' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278380?labeling=true' target='_blank'>壬辰廷对</a><span class='authorDate'>（1172年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278380")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278380_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278380'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278380'>臣恭惟陛下发德音，下明诏，博考汉唐已然之效，下问承学之臣，慊然有师古不自用之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278380_comment'></div>顾臣浅陋，何以称塞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278380_comment'></div>抑臣闻自古建议之臣，赴功之臣，翊扶治道之臣，类窃叹曰不遇圣主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278380_comment'></div>如遇圣主，当不自用，则言无难行，事业无难就者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278380_comment'></div>臣亦稽之汉唐，兴王虽六七作，考论君德，鲜能全美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278380_comment'></div>是以规模褊迫，而治效凡近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278380_comment'></div>陛下宽仁神武，对于三五之隆，粤自绍尧，所以剪除文具，脱略边幅，嘉与群臣，洗凡而破陋，以跻至治，以迓宏休，甚盛甚美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278380_comment'></div>臣愚妄自量度，陛下之圣，诚具二美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278380_comment'></div>何谓二美？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278380_comment'></div>臣观比年有大更张，有大施设，造命之初，虑不可夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278380_comment'></div>一旦事状陈露，陛下顿悟立改，曾无留难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278380_comment'></div>天下咸曰陛下之无我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278380_comment'></div>自昔所进，今不知其几何人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278380_comment'></div>其间盖有违诏令，负任使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278380_comment'></div>陛下察见情伪，一予一夺，动中公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278380_comment'></div>天下咸曰陛下之知人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278380_comment'></div>夫以无我之量、知人之明，于汉唐可俯视焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278380_comment'></div>而臣伏读圣策曰：「朕丕承大统，司牧兆人，寅畏严恭，惧德弗类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278380_comment'></div>是以顺考帝王之宪，铺寻载籍之陈，求其可师，以济于治」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278380_comment'></div>盖方慊然师古而不自用如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278380_comment'></div>则臣所谓言无难行，事业无难就者，舍此时尚安须耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278380_comment'></div>然而十有一年于兹，而治绩未进于古，下情犹郁，公论犹沮，士大夫犹有怀不敢尽，独何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278380_comment'></div>或者陛下之所以圣，亦所以累盛德欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278380_comment'></div>不自用之心虽能形之于言，未能充之于事欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278380_comment'></div>臣窃迹前事，曩者创复发运，经营移屯，当时廷臣亦有疏其非是者，而陛下姑惟试之，终于无状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278380_comment'></div>今谋者有谴矣，将命者有谴矣，岂惟朝野诵九重之不吝而服其英断哉，虽陛下将自喜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278380_comment'></div>苟惟自喜，是以为累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278380_comment'></div>夫有去故之喜，则有图新之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278380_comment'></div>抑臣未知来者之献计，果有以异乎此否也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278380_comment'></div>以臣参之舆言，揆之事情，其诞谩苟且，举是类耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278380_comment'></div>陛下舍彼取此，而不察其适相类，臣恐后之悔今，亦犹今之悔昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278380_comment'></div>无乃以大有为之时，徒费而为改过之日月乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278380_comment'></div>夫以天子圣明，春秋鼎盛，何向不立？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278380_comment'></div>今且一纪，历日弥长，岁复一岁，改过不给，可不为惜乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278380_comment'></div>汉元帝、唐德宗宠任群佞，不移如山，遇主如此，政复何恨？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278380_comment'></div>奈何以虚心大度、过不惮改，而仅足以度越庸主，而究竟无所施也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278380_comment'></div>听言之道，亦于误者察之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278380_comment'></div>假如曩者以好边功误，继今言边功者，无遽听可也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278380_comment'></div>反而求之，爱根本可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278380_comment'></div>曩者以徼近利误，继今言近利者，无遽听可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278380_comment'></div>反而求之，识大体可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278380_comment'></div>且陛下何不一思曩者谁为主张是乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278380_comment'></div>时不再来，事且积废，每试不效，曾未决舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278380_comment'></div>已乃数悔而频改之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278380_comment'></div>岂所以图全耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1278380_comment'></div>臣是以妄议陛下虽有无我之量，而累于自喜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1278380_comment'></div>且陛下之所尊信、所宠任，其果以为皆忠实而无欺乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1278380_comment'></div>深谋远虑而无败事乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1278380_comment'></div>若果待之如此，臣知陛下必且举国以授之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1278380_comment'></div>今乃不然，虽已尊信，已宠任，盖至于论人论事之际，陛下类有执而不从，从而不尽者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1278380_comment'></div>然则尚疑之欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1278380_comment'></div>夫尚疑其人，则必既见其情，而犹待遇如故，委寄如故，何耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1278380_comment'></div>岂非圣明之意，自谓吾能知之，吾能驾驭之，彼虽欲为欺不可，虽欲害吾治不可，姑亦纵舍而弗问乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1278380_comment'></div>以此自恃，所患滋大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1278380_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1278380_comment'></div>聪明所加，岂无限极？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1278380_comment'></div>万机之务，乌能遍知？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1278380_comment'></div>陛下之所执拒十不一二，而转移侵窃于冥冥之中，殆不可胜数矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1278380_comment'></div>夫未知犹可耳，既已知之，彼且求固，凡所以自归于君上者，惟有恭顺耳，惟有伺候趋和耳，惟有养交借誉以盖前愆耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1278380_comment'></div>陛下见其如此，因置弗虑，岂知面从者皆所以为背违之地乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1278380_comment'></div>苟无诚悫，岂足凭藉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1278380_comment'></div>今予之事权，假之岁月，足以遂其私矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1278380_comment'></div>徒曰驾驭，阴受其害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1278380_comment'></div>此臣所大惑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1278380_comment'></div>大抵使贪使诈，惟爪牙之贱役可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1278380_comment'></div>股肱心膂，要须忠良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1278380_comment'></div>用人之道，百王一法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1278380_comment'></div>不宜以洞见是非，易此弗守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1278380_comment'></div>臣是以妄议陛下虽有知人之明，而累于自恃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1278380_comment'></div>夫陛下之慊然师古，岂不曰吾将不自用也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1278380_comment'></div>然而陛下以无我之量，而累于自喜，以知人之明，而累于自恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1278380_comment'></div>如臣管窥，陛下之所以师古，是诚不自用耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1278380_comment'></div>抑名曰师古而实自用也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1278380_comment'></div>臣伏读圣策曰：「惟七制之明后，若三宗之显王，固本培基，则有务德之君；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1278380_comment'></div>振旅治兵，则有雄才之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1278380_comment'></div>习闻其号，未睹厥成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1278380_comment'></div>咸有所偏，未臻于极」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1278380_comment'></div>夫乐其号而考其成，患其偏而要其极，诚如所言，信陛下有师古之实矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1278380_comment'></div>抑臣有疑焉，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1278380_comment'></div>臣伏读圣策曰：「若孝文之德，则罪不孥，宫不女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1278380_comment'></div>惜露台之费，除租税之征，可谓仁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1278380_comment'></div>然而恬芒刃之施，释斧斤之用，惟尚宽厚，其威不伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1278380_comment'></div>朕以孝文之文也，而能厉之以武，不亦善乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1278380_comment'></div>臣固知陛下慕文帝之宽仁足以富民，而所阙者武功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1278380_comment'></div>且陛下自度所以富民者何如文帝耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1278380_comment'></div>臣观文帝以钱谷问丞相，而陈平不对，谓是有司事耳，非所以烦庙堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1278380_comment'></div>由是汉之计臣，得以自尽，仓廪之吏，至以氏其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1278380_comment'></div>臣不识今之所谓冢宰制国用，于左藏之外别为南库者何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1278380_comment'></div>且其辞曰：经费一领于大农，而增羡币馀之入，南库受之，其名顾不甚美乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1278380_comment'></div>然而操制国之权，与司农孰为轻重？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1278380_comment'></div>增羡者，遄有迁擢，经赋办否，则莫能黜陟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1278380_comment'></div>厥今漕臣、守臣类多自营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1278380_comment'></div>观此二途，意将安向？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1278380_comment'></div>是以比岁经赋日耗，而南库之积日滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1278380_comment'></div>大农告匮，时捐数百万缗以相补足，比及奏闻，屡有德色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1278380_comment'></div>且均之为国用耳，虚彼盈此，竟何谓耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1278380_comment'></div>夫兵廪如昨，吏禄如昨，凡岁百须如昨，而大农甚匮，将安取？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1278380_comment'></div>此陛下信以为版曹诸臣自卖以取办乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1278380_comment'></div>抑甘受阙额，拥虚数，坐俟乏绝，被诛谴乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1278380_comment'></div>不能为此，必且他为谬巧，以茍逭岁月之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1278380_comment'></div>是以上不加赋而民生嗷嗷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1278380_comment'></div>夫暴征横歛出于朝廷，则群臣得以论列，细民得以赴愬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1278380_comment'></div>今也州县之赋一按故籍，无秋毫加益焉，而有司巧为斡旋，暗相资奉，旁缘科色，诛求锱铢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1278380_comment'></div>群臣欲论列之耶，细民欲赴愬之耶，而独无彰彰之名可以指摘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1278380_comment'></div>所以至仁在上，恻隐至矣，而泽不下流，是可不为寒心？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1278380_comment'></div>夫文帝以司农理财，至于寡取；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1278380_comment'></div>陛下以宰相理财，至于多取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1278380_comment'></div>臣故曰：陛下慕文帝之富民而不由其道，所以评文帝者诚善矣，而无益于治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1278380_comment'></div>臣伏读圣策曰：「若孝武之功，则选明将，讨不服，匈奴远遁，百蛮向风，可谓盛矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1278380_comment'></div>然而积尸暴骨，快心胡越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1278380_comment'></div>财贿耗而不赡，干戈因以日滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1278380_comment'></div>朕以孝武之武也，而能本之以仁，不亦善乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1278380_comment'></div>臣固知陛下慕孝武之雄才足以强兵，而所不取者薄于仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1278380_comment'></div>且陛下选将厉兵，亦尝用武帝故事乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1278380_comment'></div>臣观武帝操纵将帅，最有绳尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1278380_comment'></div>一旦乃以爱故，欲将贰师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1278380_comment'></div>夫以帝之威灵，宠一偏将，其谁敢议？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1278380_comment'></div>而帝也必枚卜诸将，贰师最吉，然后行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1278380_comment'></div>诚不欲以女子之故，弛废家法，抑绝廷议也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1278380_comment'></div>今天下之兵，不属之三衙与边帅乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1278380_comment'></div>或云，近者禁扈之除，专阃之寄，往往由径。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1278380_comment'></div>抑臣疏远，未知信否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1278380_comment'></div>间亦得之防夫走卒，街谈巷议，以为诸将平时所以侵尅廪钱，隐占伍籍，贸易称贷，以谋聚财，大抵将以结交媒进身耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1278380_comment'></div>臣窃愤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1278380_comment'></div>夫以陛下笃意戎事，妙选授钺，虽大臣且不预议，尚安有此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1278380_comment'></div>日夜思念，莫执其咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1278380_comment'></div>或者，左右朝夕积誉之渐，游谈之久，亦足以宿留宸聪而密回天听耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1278380_comment'></div>患生所忽，殆不易知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1278380_comment'></div>陛下习闻姓名，忽不以次用之，当是时，岂敢有诵言论荐者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1278380_comment'></div>盖其于简记之先，借助多矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1278380_comment'></div>夫断自宸衷，恩顾归下，赂入私室，怨在公家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1278380_comment'></div>凡有爱君之心，谁忍闻此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1278380_comment'></div>况又将帅素轻，士不素附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1278380_comment'></div>而欲望其立功靖边，不亦难乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1278380_comment'></div>且武帝以私选将，犹不废公；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1278380_comment'></div>陛下以公用人，柰何不稽于众，顾得以容私耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1278380_comment'></div>臣故曰：陛下慕孝武之强兵，诚得其所长，而择将之理未尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1278380_comment'></div>臣未见其能强兵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1278380_comment'></div>臣伏读圣策曰：「文者帝王之利器，武者文德之辅助也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1278380_comment'></div>文之所加者深，则武之所及者大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1278380_comment'></div>唐之太宗，实惟兼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1278380_comment'></div>观其内平祸乱，外除夷狄，安靖黎元，各有生业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1278380_comment'></div>史氏所以称其功德兼隆，由汉以来，未之有也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1278380_comment'></div>臣又以知陛下小汉家之偏尚，而想贞观之独隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1278380_comment'></div>陛下之志岂不大，而学岂不博哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1278380_comment'></div>然臣据汉鉴今，未能无惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1278380_comment'></div>而折衷诸唐，殆有四未谕焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1278380_comment'></div>夫陛下以古问臣，臣不敢徒以古对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1278380_comment'></div>如陛下诚有慕于唐欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1278380_comment'></div>臣请言今之所以异于唐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1278380_comment'></div>愿陛下审择而更张焉，则岂惟如唐，将有隆于唐者，惟陛下所欲耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1278380_comment'></div>太宗谏官入閤之制，非以求谏耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1278380_comment'></div>而陛下不乐忤意之臣，此臣之所未谕者一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1278380_comment'></div>太宗幕府学士之选，非以崇儒耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1278380_comment'></div>而陛下有轻视儒生之名，此臣之所未谕者二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1278380_comment'></div>太宗感魏徵之言，使群臣不存形迹，陛下乃以近名责臣下，此臣之所未谕者三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1278380_comment'></div>太宗屈意雠臣而不以秦府自卫，陛下乃以合党疑外庭，此臣之所未谕者四也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1278380_comment'></div>臣非但以太宗望陛下者，安敢怀所未谕，而不试陈于前？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1278380_comment'></div>曩者议除发运，议遣泛使，论思之臣一语不合，往往罢斥，甚或流窜，事亦少异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1278380_comment'></div>虽然，是尚有可诿者，曰是非官守言责也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1278380_comment'></div>日近除授，而台谏有所弹奏，舍人不书黄，学士不草诏，是不曰官守言责乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1278380_comment'></div>盖职分常事耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1278380_comment'></div>而夜半一纸忽从中出，或废或逐，曾不淹辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1278380_comment'></div>而吏卒讥诃，不容置辇毂下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1278380_comment'></div>夫震霆不及掩耳，古所以待桀猾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1278380_comment'></div>此皆陛下忠爱臣子，进退惟命，安用若此忽忽，惶惑民听哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1278380_comment'></div>夫陛下有混一夷夏之志，而不能容一二龃龉之臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1278380_comment'></div>将以垂宗社无穷之休，而不能少屈须臾之听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1278380_comment'></div>省闼台掖，虚位几月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1278380_comment'></div>臣窃怪此何景而见于不讳之时也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1278380_comment'></div>太宗独不怒谏臣乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1278380_comment'></div>宫中无发之语，尚能忍之，深知言路开塞，乃人主切身利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1278380_comment'></div>彼纷纷以口舌争者，果谁为也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1278380_comment'></div>臣以为陛下诚慕太宗，当自求谏始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1278380_comment'></div>腐儒空谈，祗乱人听，岂惟人主厌此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1278380_comment'></div>虽稍知务书生，固自厌此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1278380_comment'></div>陛下不与共事，其谁念之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1278380_comment'></div>然而腐儒端不可用，而不可有轻视儒生之名，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1278380_comment'></div>非所以招徕其类也，非所以令众庶见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1278380_comment'></div>脱有真儒，亦其俦辈，或以取轻为愧，而一动「归去来」之心，陛下安能有之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1278380_comment'></div>夫燕昭之礼郭隗，其虚声犹足以致士，焉有圣人抚御，天涵地育，而一旦有弃士之名哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1278380_comment'></div>且以陛下临御以来，凡所谓陋儒，其被戮辱、蒙顿挫者谁乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1278380_comment'></div>盖未之见，而远方之士风传，料想往往过当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1278380_comment'></div>或曰经筵特虚器耳，科诏特故事耳，赐出身特未混流品耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1278380_comment'></div>无乃阙盛美矣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1278380_comment'></div>十八学士，岂尽全才？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1278380_comment'></div>间亦无过区区章句、文墨浅事，而太宗兼取并蓄，厥意不独为缘饰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1278380_comment'></div>臣以为：陛下诚慕太宗，当自崇儒始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1278380_comment'></div>夫好名之士，貌异而心不同，如其浮躁刚愎，掠美于己，而归过于君，诚不足顾惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1278380_comment'></div>以臣泛观，人才无虑数等，盖亦有介直而不隐，疏易而寡虑，其温言似掠美，其愤悱似归过者，要其存心，至拳拳也，至不自为计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1278380_comment'></div>若以好名概视，无乃非所以全爱之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1278380_comment'></div>且陛下亦知其所以失者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1278380_comment'></div>其器度不宏，其所养未厚焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1278380_comment'></div>夫惟容小所以见大，纳污所以成深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1278380_comment'></div>人主固当有远过天下之量也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1278380_comment'></div>傥亦以不推逊为讳，不弥缝为嫌，不几于示天下狭耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1278380_comment'></div>正使不然，而以圣德洪深，责备臣子，稍稍矜露，亦恐凡百在位，俱不足以望清光，佐下风矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1278380_comment'></div>陛下将谁与共理乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1278380_comment'></div>臣故以为：陛下诚慕太宗，惟无以近名责臣下可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1278380_comment'></div>独不观魏徵请以谏稿付史官乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1278380_comment'></div>脱欲争名，将以焚草为贤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1278380_comment'></div>仆碑之谗，乃晚节一恨，又何足法？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1278380_comment'></div>臣窃考自昔党议，多兴于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1278380_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1278380_comment'></div>此人臣相倾之私，而非君上之愿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1278380_comment'></div>盖党成，则大官重权，利归于己，诛戮斩杀，怨在一人，而祸归社稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1278380_comment'></div>若其不成，又将沉浮茍免耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1278380_comment'></div>由此观之，党议成否，一无便于上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1278380_comment'></div>此太宗所以中持衡焉，无所偏倚，以销伏其争而和平其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1278380_comment'></div>臣愚不识近日戒令何为而合党之言累累发也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1278380_comment'></div>以臣观今，群臣大抵外同内异，惟身是计，何暇相党？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1278380_comment'></div>假如议一大政，疏一大臣，甲才谴诃，乙且退缩，其馀立而观之耳，甚者反是而迎合耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1278380_comment'></div>陛下何不审观比年亦有议一事而连章不置，如曩时濮议、新法事乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1278380_comment'></div>亦有用一人，更数年不奉诏，如曩时李定入台，宋敏求、李大临、苏颂之徒乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1278380_comment'></div>亦有逐一人而同列乞与俱坐，如曩时范仲淹、尹洙、余靖之徒乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1278380_comment'></div>正患人臣不同心耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1278380_comment'></div>而陛下方以为党，此人臣私议，于国何利，而可倡于君上哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1278380_comment'></div>臣故以为：陛下诚慕太宗，惟无以合党疑外廷可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1278380_comment'></div>牛李之祸，唐之所以亡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1278380_comment'></div>岂太宗家法乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1278380_comment'></div>臣伏读圣策曰：「瞻言清风，窃所向慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1278380_comment'></div>伊欲规其能事，鼓其成绩，何修何饰而外户不闭，行旅不赍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1278380_comment'></div>何取何营而断狱几刑措，米斗直三钱欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1278380_comment'></div>家给人足，厥道何由？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1278380_comment'></div>仁义功利，四者之宜，当安所施」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1278380_comment'></div>臣以为太宗能事成绩，略尽君道，不越数端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1278380_comment'></div>陛下所为修饰，莫若去其不如太宗，而就其如太宗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1278380_comment'></div>舍是，将有所营取焉，非臣之所敢知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1278380_comment'></div>且陛下试思臣之所未谕者，其与太宗异，果何由欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1278380_comment'></div>岂非恃天资之高明，谓天下可独运而专断欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1278380_comment'></div>昔贞观之初，盖有以独运之说惑太宗者矣，而太宗卒莫之听，是以后功利先仁义，而收家给人足之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1278380_comment'></div>陛下欲比迹焉，而操其所不用之术，臣窃为陛下惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1278380_comment'></div>方今下情犹郁，公论犹沮，士大夫犹有怀不敢吐，而陛下方且顾盼周行，类不适用，慨叹当世殆无其人，非以忤旨而去，则曰是腐儒耳，则曰是好名耳，则曰是党耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1278380_comment'></div>然则陛下临事，腹心将安寄乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1278380_comment'></div>于是乎始有弃文尚武、亲内疏外之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1278380_comment'></div>臣岂不知陛下固非好违经常，率然改图，而徒蒙不韪之议哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1278380_comment'></div>诚以一时闻望之士，历试而甚亡具，十年以来，凡许国者，皆不践言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1278380_comment'></div>大功未立，万绪缺然，展转周回，莫能与济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1278380_comment'></div>是独非人臣负陛下至此哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1278380_comment'></div>虽然，意有所偏，则事有其祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1278380_comment'></div>《诗》不云乎：「无思甫田，惟莠骄骄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1278380_comment'></div>无思远人，劳心忉忉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1278380_comment'></div>臣窃忧陛下之他有所求，将以独运专断，而去道愈远，徒以劳心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1278380_comment'></div>且陛下之所以右武臣，未知何如也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1278380_comment'></div>窃聆近制，削下拜之礼，升杂压之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1278380_comment'></div>夫操驭英雄，亦顾圣略何如耳，安用此琐琐为耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1278380_comment'></div>是固其细者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1278380_comment'></div>彼闺阁宾赞之臣，肺腑之戚，强名曰武，特服饰类焉耳，爵号类焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1278380_comment'></div>欲实安能？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1278380_comment'></div>而陛下优游容与累年之久，而再畀之枢筦之地，岂惟缙绅烦言，韦布丧气？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1278380_comment'></div>下至于老兵悍卒，亦籍籍后议，有侮视不平之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1278380_comment'></div>方当大有为之时，而但曰不必右武，诚迂阔矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1278380_comment'></div>若陛下但以名取，茍服饰爵号仅与文士异，辄取而宠之百僚之上，罢亦不失麾钺，居不足与谋也，出不足与战也，无乃似武而卒非乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1278380_comment'></div>夫以似是而非之人，躐处民上，而曰以作士气，以起戎功，臣恐其去腐儒无几也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1278380_comment'></div>陛下何不因群心之所共违，而察一意之所独向乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1278380_comment'></div>且陛下清心寡欲，不玩细娱，彼侍御仆从之臣，凡所以承间而取怜者，一无惑焉，则陛下岂偏厚内廷者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1278380_comment'></div>或者徒以好事远略，好察臣下，兴利除害之心动乎其中，而或为容悦者所中耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1278380_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1278380_comment'></div>欲击射之便，则不可与外廷共习；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1278380_comment'></div>欲探伺之密，则不可与外廷共议；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1278380_comment'></div>欲用尝试之说，则不可与外廷共施行，势非此曹安用乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1278380_comment'></div>夫陛下用之，才不过此耳，而影响气燄，足以倾人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1278380_comment'></div>不惟容奸，殆且生患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1278380_comment'></div>比年群臣或以言斥，或以事斥者相继也，独侍御仆从未有闻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1278380_comment'></div>岂在位皆浮伪，而彼独无所蔽欺耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1278380_comment'></div>其地密迩，其弥缝之计精也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1278380_comment'></div>陛下手挠指顾，彼因而趋之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1278380_comment'></div>陛下声嗟气叹，彼从而和之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1278380_comment'></div>若是而不能幸免，将谁幸免耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1278380_comment'></div>外议因是谓果亲之也，患且必至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1278380_comment'></div>陛下何不因群心之所共违，而察一意之所独向乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_270_1278380_comment'></div>陛下圣策之末，丁宁于臣曰：「子大夫习先圣之术，明当世之务，合志度义，其知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1278380_comment'></div>其明以启告朕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1278380_comment'></div>悉意正论，无枉执事，朕将亲览焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1278380_comment'></div>臣诚浅陋，无所称塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1278380_comment'></div>区区之愚，独以为陛下有师古不自用之心，而顾恃于独运专断，任一意之所独向，而忽群臣之所共违，是以下情犹郁，公论犹沮，而士大夫犹有怀不敢尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1278380_comment'></div>故于卒篇乎献焉，而不复它云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1278380_comment'></div>《诗》云：「心乎爱矣，遐不谓矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1278380_comment'></div>臣不胜拳拳。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_278_1278380'></div><div id='poem_sentence_278_1278380_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>国子祭酒芮烨卒。作品：祭芮祭酒。<div id='poem_1278783' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278783' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278783?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭芮祭酒煜文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1171年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278783")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278783_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278783'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278783'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278783_comment'></div>欲从先生游十年于兹，盖亦数相遭，卒幸相亲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278783_comment'></div>而受教不少延，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278783_comment'></div>天耶，人耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278783_comment'></div>前年寓会稽，会先生为部使者，有来言，先生将就顾汝，□某□愧焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278783_comment'></div>寻如毗陵，弗敢见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278783_comment'></div>明年东还，先生适长太学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278783_comment'></div>是秋将考试，增置生员，又以嫌弗敢见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278783_comment'></div>既幸备数诸生，先生孳孳焉望某来也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278783_comment'></div>比至，相待如宾交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278783_comment'></div>甚者，从二子辱临拜，又命史持立无答拜，为是惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278783_comment'></div>又逾月，弗敢告而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278783_comment'></div>呜呼，谁谓先生欤，而遽止此也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278783_comment'></div>夫苟谓遽止此也，其寓会稽，必无以愧自违也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278783_comment'></div>其还毗陵，必无以嫌自拘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278783_comment'></div>况为诸生，宜旦夕左右侍，而又何忍以过相待，一顷舍去？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278783_comment'></div>夫以位望之殊也，法守之察也，世俗之莫己谅也，顾小而失大，其亦谓之人耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278783_comment'></div>虽然，自知求师友，所得于天下才数人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278783_comment'></div>去年哭刘莆田，今年哭祭酒，彼寿考者何限，胡为于我师友频岁而忽焉亡耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278783_comment'></div>且贤者纵不得大用，独不可留限，遗吾党耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278783_comment'></div>且某也，固无多求于世，无乃亦不获成就其私志，考德而问业耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278783_comment'></div>今夫汎相与，类有幸不至缺绝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278783_comment'></div>是谓天耶，非耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278783_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278783_comment'></div>一忤权臣，白首瘴乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278783_comment'></div>公论既开，时谓□宜何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278783_comment'></div>位不过卿，死无归居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278783_comment'></div>岂惟门人，有泪如雨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1278783_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='b13a988e00544039ad75494e35c417ed_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b13a988e00544039ad75494e35c417ed");'><span id='b13a988e00544039ad75494e35c417ed_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1178')">1176-1178年</a>，40-42岁</div><div id='b13a988e00544039ad75494e35c417ed' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>　除太学录。作品：除太学录谢宰执。<div id='poem_1278465' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278465' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278465?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除太学录谢宰执启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1176年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278465")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278465_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278465'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278465'>拜命衡门，备官璧水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278465_comment'></div>书生已重，公论谓何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278465_comment'></div>矧如庸虚，有此踰越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278465_comment'></div>窃以祖宗家传之法，学校风化之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278465_comment'></div>于其训迪之臣工，可以考论其世故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278465_comment'></div>傥具员而亡择，欲首善以何繇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278465_comment'></div>永惟韩、范、欧、富诸公当国之间，则有孙、胡、石、李一时作人之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278465_comment'></div>如某者学不足以适用，才不足以及人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278465_comment'></div>固知迂阔于事情，岂敢觊觎于宦达？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278465_comment'></div>营求末第，政未免于为贫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278465_comment'></div>往教遐邦，祗自虞于见短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278465_comment'></div>徒便于此，遑知有他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278465_comment'></div>引而置之荐绅先生之林，从而付之规矩学者之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278465_comment'></div>还观所缺，岂惟独惭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278465_comment'></div>推本自来，或者上累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278465_comment'></div>但揆之进退，小己以无称报为忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278465_comment'></div>然较之重轻，公朝有收疏贱之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278465_comment'></div>徒抱私谊，重违远模。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278465_comment'></div>某官直道事君，清议在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278465_comment'></div>察见颓俗，杜绝倖门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278465_comment'></div>每于斯道寂寥希阔之中，郁有前辈扶持兴起之念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278465_comment'></div>与其妙选以得□，孰若兼收而示公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278465_comment'></div>意有所存，人不暇计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278465_comment'></div>爰俾凡质，亦叨误恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278465_comment'></div>敢不体悉深知，循其素履？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278465_comment'></div>门墙爱博，愿悉略其奔走伺候之文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278465_comment'></div>农马□□，庶少尽于洒扫应对之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278465_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1278465_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>　太学录任上。作品：答释褐黄上舍。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《嘉祐集笺注》卷十六。）</span><div id='poem_1278466' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278466' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278466?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答释褐黄上舍启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1176年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278466")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278466_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278466'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278466'>伏审课最于学，爵命自天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278466_comment'></div>□□推高，旁观嗟异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278466_comment'></div>且取士必多其节目而后进，而授官亦积夫岁月以为劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278466_comment'></div>虽裒然举首之艰，犹越在外服之久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278466_comment'></div>未有□□从于□覆，礼又为之特加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278466_comment'></div>即赐恩纶，遽分师席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278466_comment'></div>某官以□□之彦，收中隽之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278466_comment'></div>因难见奇，凡舍矢以如破；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278466_comment'></div>制胜有道，虽注金而不昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278466_comment'></div>某究观当今科第堤防之详，□□□宠光度越之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278466_comment'></div>尚勉终于远业，用增重于诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278466_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278466_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>　为友人孙叔特夫人赵氏作墓志铭。作品：赵夫人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1278746' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278746' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278746?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赵夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1176年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278746")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278746_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278746'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278746'>余友孙叔特将葬其内赵氏，为余言内所以克相之者，而拜乞铭，曰：「昔吾母早世，诸弟有尚结发者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278746_comment'></div>吾父春秋高，多恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278746_comment'></div>赵氏年二十馀来归，事字尊稚，时节其服食饮药，各以意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278746_comment'></div>禁嗜无堕缺，不自事游饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278746_comment'></div>惟宾祭之馔，腆洁必致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278746_comment'></div>训齐儿女，色庄如丈人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278746_comment'></div>至令僮婢，则以惠及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278746_comment'></div>虽妇氏，其行应铭，敢以请」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278746_comment'></div>按夫人，温瑞安东郭人，乡贡进士耆孙之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278746_comment'></div>生三男：昭子、明子、宣子；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278746_comment'></div>二女，归同郡士朱清、何璠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278746_comment'></div>年五十二，卒于乾道七年七月丙戌，以淳熙三年十有一月壬寅朔，葬于永嘉县建牙乡鹏飞里西华山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278746_comment'></div>余闻东郭与金奥赵，皆清献公之族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278746_comment'></div>熙宁中，清献公之子㞦来丞郡，夫人曾大父岵从公问家法，繇是赵氏子姓有检守，自辟雍正霄以文名天下，登进士第者至今不乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278746_comment'></div>夫人行应铭，有自来矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278746_comment'></div>余娶城南张氏，实金奥出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278746_comment'></div>昭子而下，又从余游，皆辞不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278746_comment'></div>遂铭之曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1278746'>维系之光，维习之臧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278746_comment'></div>式谨妇常，无年乎何伤？</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1278746_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年2月</a>　上幸太学改承奉郎。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>　诸葛说之子三年十二月丙申葬其父，请陈傅良为作行状。作品：福州长乐县主簿诸葛公行状。<div id='poem_1278742' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278742' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278742?labeling=true' target='_blank'>福州长乐县主簿诸葛公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1177年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278742")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278742_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278742'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278742'>曾祖考璿，妣朱氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278742_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1278742'>祖考原，武翼郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278742_comment'></div>祖妣张氏、赵氏，并封孺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278742_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1278742'>考纯，迪功郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278742_comment'></div>妣赵氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278742_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1278742'>公姓诸葛氏，讳说，字梦叟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278742_comment'></div>琅琊诸葛，自会稽内史恢别为浙东之族，后稍徙严陵，永嘉族盖严徙也，或曰新安，谱亡，弗可论次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278742_comment'></div>公大父娶城南张氏，以诸子从其舅学，所谓草堂先生以八行应书者也，繇是阖郡贤士大夫往往多诸葛氏师友姻娅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278742_comment'></div>公幼陶染诸公间，已岐然度越行辈，益自励，读书著文，穷夜旦不辄休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278742_comment'></div>既冠，入太学，再荐登绍兴庚辰进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278742_comment'></div>方待严州司户参军阙，丁迪功公忧，服除，授台之黄岩尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278742_comment'></div>复丁母氏忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278742_comment'></div>公故负当世志，学不为章句训诂浅事，务见于施设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278742_comment'></div>比罹两丧，谓禄养之无逮，命之不偶也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278742_comment'></div>于是名其园曰「艮园」，室曰「傃室」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278742_comment'></div>以其学力行于家，辑柔其族，而厉其乡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278742_comment'></div>久之，上下交孚，子弟无少长，咸视公，习谨而丽于善，莫之或肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278742_comment'></div>里并大海，其商海自给者，率剽悍，乃时以所不平，就公决质之，惟一唯否是定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278742_comment'></div>郡之东南隅，广斥易恐，截然倚公为巨防，而公亦任其戚休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278742_comment'></div>非众同欲，谒不至郡邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278742_comment'></div>凶年艰岁，县官有恤政，为守者率需公至为方略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278742_comment'></div>公白事当若何，费当几何，立听行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278742_comment'></div>然他乡部未有条，而东南隅若干户，少长秩秩然蒙惠矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278742_comment'></div>绍兴之季年也防海，隆兴之甲申视疫，丙戌埋骴，乾道之庚寅、辛卯食饥，壬辰筑埭，皆其小试微见者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278742_comment'></div>往年，余与薛叔似象先、陈谦益之俱会行在所，私相语为授福之长乐簿，公重违吾党意，强起之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278742_comment'></div>是时，前丞相史公帅闽部，丞相阅人熟，不轻以狱讼畀属吏，雅闻公贤，数诿以事，公以理平决，不视大府意所疑信为非是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278742_comment'></div>丞相滋相知，延之幕中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278742_comment'></div>幕中故盛宾游，惟公自一话一言，无裨补不出诸口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278742_comment'></div>丞相自喜晚得士，礼以己敌，且率当路者荐之朝，而公死矣，实淳熙元年正月庚戌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278742_comment'></div>公平生燕寝无惰，待物不矜，庄施交际，语唯恐伤人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278742_comment'></div>闻或为不义，必反覆镌切不但已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278742_comment'></div>虽行百里，从一仆，持被饮食，廑廑无乏，所以周邻里、朋友，则不问费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278742_comment'></div>室事一切勿理，趋公事未尝不勇决也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278742_comment'></div>年且五十，德日加脩，讲问日加切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278742_comment'></div>余尝见公暨张淳忠甫夜论学，自叙读书二十年，得一健字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278742_comment'></div>余辄从旁款公：「健，天德也，盍求其本」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278742_comment'></div>公云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278742_comment'></div>旦日，忽挈余手出，曰：「吾固深省于畴昔之言」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278742_comment'></div>余窃自恨规意之浅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278742_comment'></div>比将殁，犹校雠《仪礼》，家人不知其甚病也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278742_comment'></div>厥明盥栉已，遽索纸，书遗友人，以训其子为寄，更以一纸书：「吾他日将族葬，必择宽地，问法于伯忠甫」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278742_comment'></div>又以一纸书：「吾弟儿女多，以某所田若干亩尽归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278742_comment'></div>适刘氏娣、薛氏妹具有缺，以田若干亩归之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278742_comment'></div>已，呼其子耕来，曰：「汝行之，毋敢违戒」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278742_comment'></div>又曰：「语汝母」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1278742_comment'></div>屏母来前也，一家始大惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1278742_comment'></div>顷之，长乐尉之书至，还答如平时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1278742_comment'></div>又顷，丞相遣客与其子至，亦将迎如平时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1278742_comment'></div>客出大门，公目已瞑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1278742_comment'></div>娶徐氏，一子，耕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1278742_comment'></div>享年五十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1278742_comment'></div>有《易》、《论语》说若干卷，碑志、诗文若干卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1278742_comment'></div>耕卜以三年十二月丙申，奉公葬于黄屿山，以状来请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1278742_comment'></div>始余闻公谊甚高，未之敢请见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1278742_comment'></div>寓城南，有题曰「里弟诸葛某」之谒入，余愧叹，袖谒走出见，遂辱与为忘年交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1278742_comment'></div>将何敢辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1278742_comment'></div>以余所见闻，公居乡试吏，建民利甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1278742_comment'></div>夫人有一事则以传世，要之于公不足道，故道其出处进退死生者为状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_57_1278742_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年</a>　为胡少宾作墓铭。作品：胡少宾墓志铭。<div id='poem_1278747' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278747' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278747?labeling=true' target='_blank'>胡少宾墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1178年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278747")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278747_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278747'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278747'>少宾讳序，姓胡氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278747_comment'></div>胡氏繇婺徙温，至荆湖制置司干办公事君讳褒，通判滁州君讳裒，宗正少卿君讳襄，兄弟始著，累赠其考讳观国中散大夫、妣赵氏恭人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278747_comment'></div>滁州君周氏安人无子，以干办君之子为后，是为少宾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278747_comment'></div>少宾娶薛氏，故起居舍人徽言之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278747_comment'></div>世所称薛士龙者，其妻弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278747_comment'></div>年四十有九，以淳熙五年后六月丁未卒于官所，十有一月辛未，归葬于永嘉县吹台乡梅屿山先兆之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278747_comment'></div>子男五人：宗、宇、守、寅、定，女四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278747_comment'></div>曩余问学于薛士龙氏，往往见少宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278747_comment'></div>已而，与郑纯全真往还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278747_comment'></div>全真雅从隐君子游，间一至城邑，必食寝于少宾之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278747_comment'></div>余固心异少宾，而未之知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278747_comment'></div>前年，官行在所，少宾适赴调，久馆于余师友郑景望氏，则日得与少宾处语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278747_comment'></div>是时，少宾之从弟千秋待湖州监酒阙，年方少，母老矣，不乐其为是官，使来换县主簿若尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278747_comment'></div>少宾念人人择便利，将谁听吾弟？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278747_comment'></div>昔授福州侯官尉，推千秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278747_comment'></div>尝适市，见宜春走卒，问其族子教授时者亡恙乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278747_comment'></div>曰：「既亡矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278747_comment'></div>为之涕泣奔走，以求归宜春之丧与其父母妻孥者累日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278747_comment'></div>余始知少卿之笃行、全真之不苟合，郑、薛二氏之常与居，有以也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278747_comment'></div>其后，益闻少宾生平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278747_comment'></div>少嗜酒倔彊，年三十，尽舍故交，窃聚粮，走千里，见黟人所谓金先生者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278747_comment'></div>先生名梁之，尝为奉新尉，一旦弃官，变衣服，垢面骂市，难近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278747_comment'></div>即所可意，复危坐讲说，若经生学士然者，最善郑全真也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278747_comment'></div>少宾介以见，卒然相欢，饮之于酒家，竟醉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278747_comment'></div>少宾盖留黟数月而后归其所云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278747_comment'></div>怀不以语人，乃更自负恃爱惜，非亲党庆唁，未尝出门巷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278747_comment'></div>独旦暮与士龙、孙处厚子诗相追逐，上下议论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278747_comment'></div>士龙名在天下，士争趋和其言，少宾亦自立我，务不为同，于子诗尤各出奇，不相降下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278747_comment'></div>余顷闻滁州君初读书天庆观，故相秦公在永嘉，闻其名，出不意，杖策来觇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278747_comment'></div>君方读《孟子》，书不为辍也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278747_comment'></div>秦因诵宋勾践一章以感讽君，君讫其去如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278747_comment'></div>旦日，且不还谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278747_comment'></div>秦公再相，有以君为荐者，曰：「是固以三顾望人者耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278747_comment'></div>滁州竟官不达死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278747_comment'></div>干办君以布衣从大将岳飞定群盗，仅得官以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278747_comment'></div>少卿稍贵，亦坐言者谓尚胡寅、赵鼎之学，摈十馀年不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278747_comment'></div>少宾志益壮，连调官，丁内外艰，不赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278747_comment'></div>晚监湖酒，名字才出，未几死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278747_comment'></div>胡氏父子盖如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278747_comment'></div>宗来乞铭，其可无辞叙哀之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278747_comment'></div>宗尽得外氏书，率诸弟力学，或者在兹耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278747_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_1278747'>璞也而或以为珉，似也而或以为真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278747_comment'></div>徒以屈伸，云谁不泯？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278747_comment'></div>吁嗟乎少宾！</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1278747_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年</a>　永康陈志同（字圣嘉）之父。作品：承务郎陈公墓志铭。<div id='poem_1278748' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278748' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278748?labeling=true' target='_blank'>承务郎陈公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1178年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278748")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278748_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278748'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278748'>始余入太学，故右文殿修撰芮公为祭酒，以士之有文行者职掌凡学之事，而永康陈君圣嘉为选首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278748_comment'></div>余繇是与圣嘉往还甚熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278748_comment'></div>尝语余：「吾父春秋高，而吾之室亡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278748_comment'></div>因不复娶，以与吾父同卧起者若干年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278748_comment'></div>岂忍一日离也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278748_comment'></div>而吾犹未免于诸生」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278748_comment'></div>余闻其言而感之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278748_comment'></div>后数岁之官，道过永康，则圣嘉取上第，调处州州学教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278748_comment'></div>遇太上皇庆寿恩，授其亲承务郎，父子盖甚乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278748_comment'></div>明年秋，圣嘉忽访余行都，衰绖面墨，拊膺哭拜，曰：「某不孝！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278748_comment'></div>某不孝！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278748_comment'></div>不能寿先君以及于禄，尚不敢葬，而来乞铭于吾子，以究大事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278748_comment'></div>惟吾子惠存之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278748_comment'></div>余既泣吊，即辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278748_comment'></div>辞未就，会罢官东归，又道其州邑，往往所至以其族子承议郎监左藏南库公亮之状访公之为人，颇合，且得其轶事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278748_comment'></div>盖自熙宁变古役法，不以主户敏愿之士上公给事，而浮食与政者，类皆恶少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278748_comment'></div>州县不胜其敝，里居者同患之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278748_comment'></div>然自好，非诎与齿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278748_comment'></div>公习见前事，独坚忍不屑去，以阴平一县之赋讼，痛自洁谨，虽有督察之长欲求其一二过差，而不可得，故能究其惠爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278748_comment'></div>呜乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278748_comment'></div>使当秦汉察举之法行，其因是以著见，必有足观者，而其志岂但若是哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278748_comment'></div>以余知其子十年，见其休戚之变，又得公行事如是，是宜铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278748_comment'></div>公讳某，字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278748_comment'></div>其先自颍昌徙婺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278748_comment'></div>曾大父某、大父某、父某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278748_comment'></div>公善事亲，不以家事累兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278748_comment'></div>教子不问费，虽事科举业，试不利不愠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278748_comment'></div>与人交，非辈行不辄相字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278748_comment'></div>于童稚，未尝施尔汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278748_comment'></div>家甚贫，犹施及亲故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278748_comment'></div>晚尝杜门读佛书，间一日出，比邻欢迎之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278748_comment'></div>讫年八十，齿发不甚衰变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278748_comment'></div>娶郑氏，先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278748_comment'></div>男四人：志同、志节、志质、志刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278748_comment'></div>二女，适邵去病、倪资深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278748_comment'></div>男孙三人，女四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278748_comment'></div>以淳熙五年三月某日卒，明年正月某日葬县之长安乡西山原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278748_comment'></div>公亮云：「而志同者，圣嘉也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278748_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1278748'>谓为无位耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278748_comment'></div>子姓以贵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278748_comment'></div>谓为无传耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278748_comment'></div>乡党以誉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278748_comment'></div>兹为其藏，后之人易忘也，而我铭著之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1278748_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年</a>　因龚茂良罢政故求外补，吕祖谦在三馆挽留不果，十月添差通判福州。作品：学官乞在外差遣申省状。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1278381_comment'></div>岂不欲勉策驽钝，少图报塞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278381_comment'></div>实以多病旷官，前后以病不与私试凡五个月。<div class='inline'
