href='/Writing/1278314?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吏部员外郎初对劄子<span class='inlineComment2'>（一　绍熙元年正月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278314")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278314_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278314'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278314'>臣恭惟艺祖受命，平定海内，凡所以创业垂统莫非可传之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278314_comment'></div>而深仁厚泽，垂裕后人，则专以爱惜民力为本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278314_comment'></div>臣案故牍，自建隆至景德四十五年，南征北伐，未尝无事，而金银钱帛、粮草杂物七千一百四十八万计，在州郡不会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278314_comment'></div>古所谓富藏天下，何以尚此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278314_comment'></div>当是时，诸道上供，随所输送，初无定额；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278314_comment'></div>留州钱物，虽尽曰系省，而非取之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278314_comment'></div>盖至大中祥符元年，三司始奏立诸道上供岁额，以此承平百年，家给人足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278314_comment'></div>传序九帝，天下尝多故也，而民心不离，迄用中兴，则以祖宗之泽在人深厚故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278314_comment'></div>臣尝惟念艺祖以得民心受天命，比隆三代矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278314_comment'></div>然而以天下逊，不私诸子，才一再传，而万世不祧之宗仅同支庶，则是在天之灵未享其报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278314_comment'></div>高宗遭变，深探其本，由是推正统之自，纳至公之说，而大命复集于寿皇圣帝，爰暨陛下，岂非天哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278314_comment'></div>且天之报艺祖者如此，而陛下以睿圣之资，宽仁之德，诞膺天眷，方当继体之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278314_comment'></div>伏惟夤念高宗推本之意，钦承寿皇付托之训，以推行艺祖在人未泯之泽，为万世无疆之休，今其时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278314_comment'></div>臣不胜至愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278314_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1278314_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278315' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278315' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278315?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吏部员外郎初对劄子<span class='inlineComment2'>（二）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278315")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278315_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278315'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278315'>臣闻熙宁以来用事者，始取艺祖之约束一切纷更之，驯至于今，而民力之困极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278315_comment'></div>盖自祥符奏立诸路上供岁额，熙宁新法增额一倍，崇宁重脩上供格，颁之天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278315_comment'></div>率一路之增，至十数倍，迄今为额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278315_comment'></div>是特上供耳，而其他杂歛，皆起熙宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278315_comment'></div>则以常平宽剩、禁军阙额之类令项封桩，迄今为额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278315_comment'></div>至于元丰，则以坊场、盐酒、香矾、铜锡、㪷秤、披剃之类凡十数色，合而为无额上供，迄今为额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278315_comment'></div>至于宣和，则以赡军、籴本与凡应奉司无名之歛，合而为经制，迄今为额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278315_comment'></div>至于绍兴，则又以税契七分、得产勘合、添酒五文、茶盐袋息之类凡二十馀色，合而为总制，迄今为额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278315_comment'></div>最后又以系省不系省、有额无额上供赡军等钱，均拨为月桩大军，迄今为额，而折帛、和买之类不与焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278315_comment'></div>夫取之之悉如此，而茶引尽归于都茶场，不在州县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278315_comment'></div>盐钞尽归于榷货务，不在州县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278315_comment'></div>秋苗斛㪷十八九归于纲运，不在州县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278315_comment'></div>州县无以供，则豪夺于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278315_comment'></div>于是取之斛面，取之折变，取之科敷，取之抑配，取之赃罚，无所不至，而民困极矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278315_comment'></div>夫艺祖以得民心受天命，而使困穷至此，此天所以复命寿皇，爰暨陛下，将以救民穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278315_comment'></div>《书》曰：「天明畏，自我民明畏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278315_comment'></div>方今之患，何但夷狄？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278315_comment'></div>盖天命之永不永，在民力之宽不宽耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278315_comment'></div>岂不甚可畏哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278315_comment'></div>岂不甚可畏哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278315_comment'></div>陛下知畏，则宜以救民穷为己任；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278315_comment'></div>陛下以救民穷为己任，则大臣不敢苟目前之安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278315_comment'></div>大臣不敢苟目前之安，则群臣陈力，何乡不济？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278315_comment'></div>此艺祖意也，亦天意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278315_comment'></div>惟陛下留神，幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1278315_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278316' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278316' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278316?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吏部员外郎初对劄子<span class='inlineComment2'>（三）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278316")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278316_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278316'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278316'>臣恭惟陛下嗣位之初，诏旨丁宁，皆为宽民力，而下台谏侍从，置局讲究，而臣犹以为民穷未救，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278316_comment'></div>诚以裁抑细微，或蠲空张之数而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278316_comment'></div>议结局，未有以称明诏、大慰民望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278316_comment'></div>臣来自远方，不知朝廷之费、宫掖之奉岁当几何，以所亲见，则天下之力竭于养兵，而莫甚于江上之军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278316_comment'></div>故每欲省赋，朝廷以为可，则版曹以为不可；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278316_comment'></div>版曹以为可，则总领所以为不可；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278316_comment'></div>总领所欲以为可矣，柰何都统司不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278316_comment'></div>陛下亦熟念之欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278316_comment'></div>则以都统司谓之御前军马，虽朝廷不得知；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278316_comment'></div>总领所谓之大军钱粮，虽版曹不得与故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278316_comment'></div>于是乎中外之势分，而职掌不同，事权不一，施行不专矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278316_comment'></div>职掌不同，则彼此不能以相谋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278316_comment'></div>事权不一，则有无不能以相济；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278316_comment'></div>施行不专，则前后不能以相守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278316_comment'></div>故虽欲宽民力，其道无繇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278316_comment'></div>且夫承平关陕已行之久，中兴韩、岳未罢之前，养兵亦甚盛矣，而不见其不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278316_comment'></div>诚在今日，稍仍旧贯，使都统司之兵与向者在制置司时无异，总领所之财与向者在转运司无异，则中外为一体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278316_comment'></div>中外一体，则宽民力可得而议矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278316_comment'></div>凡事断之而有异论，勿断可也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278316_comment'></div>行之而有后患，勿行可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278316_comment'></div>往者元祐至于宣和，尝罢新法矣，则有绍述之说起而为梗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278316_comment'></div>靖康至于绍兴，尝用兵矣，则有讲和之说起而为梗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278316_comment'></div>故上之号令相反而不能定，下之朋党相倾而不能合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278316_comment'></div>若夫宽民力，谁独无是心哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278316_comment'></div>断之而无异论，行之而无后患，莫过此者，而何疑不决？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278316_comment'></div>陛下诚断之，则今之大臣皆足以立纲陈纪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278316_comment'></div>二三大臣诚推行之，则今之人才皆足以受令承教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278316_comment'></div>方当年谷屡丰，边鄙不耸，失此闲暇，后将何及？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278316_comment'></div>《诗》云：「譬彼舟流，不知所届」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278316_comment'></div>臣不胜拳拳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278316_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1278316'>是日上殿，方奏：「臣不肖蒙恩为郎，幸得赐对」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278316_comment'></div>上云：「卿去国几年，朕欲见卿久矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278316_comment'></div>读劄子，至「宽民力」，上曰：「莫急于此，只为处置难」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278316_comment'></div>奏云：「臣第三劄子是处置大略，容款曲敷奏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278316_comment'></div>天颜甚喜，读劄子毕，褒奖再三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278316_comment'></div>奏：「容下殿谢恩」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278316_comment'></div>上云：「且说话。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278316_comment'></div>闻卿在永嘉，从学常数百人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278316_comment'></div>奏：「臣无所长，只与士子课习举业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278316_comment'></div>过蒙清问，不胜悚惧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278316_comment'></div>上云：「知卿学问深醇，著书甚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278316_comment'></div>朕欲一见，可尽进来」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278316_comment'></div>奏：「臣岂敢著书，不过讲说举子所习经义，何足仰尘乙夜之览」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278316_comment'></div>上云：「经说更好，但随所有进来」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278316_comment'></div>奏：「臣来自远外，乍对清光，已踰平生之望，又蒙睿慈曲垂褒谕，令进所习经说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1278316_comment'></div>顾臣何人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1278316_comment'></div>遭逢如此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1278316_comment'></div>然臣委是目下未有成藁，以应明诏，容臣守官之暇，收拾编录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1278316_comment'></div>候成，次第奏乞投进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1278316_comment'></div>欲望圣慈特赐宽假」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1278316_comment'></div>上云：「看撰得几卷，即逐旋进来不妨」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1278316_comment'></div>又奏：「在廷儒臣多是前进，臣一旦入朝，便敢僭越投进文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1278316_comment'></div>以此终是踧踖未安」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1278316_comment'></div>上连声云：「不妨不妨」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_53_1278316_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　朱子书来论学并索诗说。作品：与朱元晦书二首。<div id='poem_1278453' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278453' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278453?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与朱元晦书<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278453")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278453_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278453'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278453'>某逐禄南来，本为温饱，不谓□善，岁晚迁官，至于将漕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278453_comment'></div>然但循故事，无所建明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278453_comment'></div>□□□终当他去，而亦未得其说，何以教之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278453_comment'></div>此专人所为道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278453_comment'></div>□非岂所以事君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278453_comment'></div>□而公论开塞，日异而月不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278453_comment'></div>敢乞安时处与如战兢，自发眉寿，用答海内钦迟之意。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1278453_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278454' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278454' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278454?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278454_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278454'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278454'>某衰惰之迹，几自绝□门庑，而长者□尚教之，便中再拜真翰之贶，感激不可言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278454_comment'></div>承此先施，岂无附报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278454_comment'></div>官事扰扰，及今始遣，辱幸察之，非敢望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278454_comment'></div>来徵《诗说》，甚荷□包。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278454_comment'></div>所见何藁？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278454_comment'></div>岂向时聚徒所为讲义之类？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278454_comment'></div>则削藁久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278454_comment'></div>年来时时讽诵，偶有兴发，或与士友言之，未尝落笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278454_comment'></div>诚有之，当于长者有隐耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278454_comment'></div>区区愚见，但以《雅》、《颂》之音消勺群慝，训故章句，付之诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278454_comment'></div>尊意以为如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278454_comment'></div>每怀企慕，三十年间，不在人后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278454_comment'></div>会并差池，未有瞻侍之幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278454_comment'></div>闻见异同，无从就正，间欲以书扣之，念长者前有长乐之争，后有临川之辨，又如永康往还，动数千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278454_comment'></div>更相切磋，未见其益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278454_comment'></div>学者转务夸毗，浸失本指，盖刻画太精，颇伤易简，矜持已甚，反涉吝骄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278454_comment'></div>以此益觉书不能宣，要须请见，究此衷曲耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278454_comment'></div>不数月还浙，可图即偿此愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278454_comment'></div>尺楮匆匆，但有悁结<span class='inlineComment2'>（《止斋先生文集》卷三八。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278454_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1278454'>就：原缺，据永嘉本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1278454_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　作书答胡大时。作品：答胡季随。<span class='inlineComment2'>（胡季随，名大时，胡宏季子。原为张栻学生，后亦从陈傅良学。）</span><div id='poem_1278445' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278445' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278445?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答胡季随书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278445")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278445_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278445'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278445'>见谕晦庵之语左右也，盖不勇猛，则无愤悱启发之几；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278445_comment'></div>不详密，则无须臾不可离之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278445_comment'></div>无愤悱启发之几，所见皆躯壳之私；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278445_comment'></div>无须臾不可离之实，所得皆□□之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278445_comment'></div>晦庵所以忧叹，而不敢无其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278445_comment'></div>□来省伏读之馀，境界何异？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278445_comment'></div>欲望尽去前辈见成之谈，自转一□，继以见示乃知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278445_comment'></div>衰惰安能印可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278445_comment'></div>或有异同，当奉闻耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278445_comment'></div>《诗》、《礼》奉指不殊前云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278445_comment'></div>若非《诗》无以言，当思吾所言何者为《诗》；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278445_comment'></div>非《礼》无以立，当思吾所立何者为《礼》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278445_comment'></div>寻章摘句，擎跪曲拳，或安《诗》、《礼》之末矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278445_comment'></div>近得晦庵书索《诗说》，某初无《诗说》，亦告者之过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278445_comment'></div>何时肯来，互相扣发？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278445_comment'></div>日月易得，后会良不易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278445_comment'></div>临书钦□之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1278445_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年4月</a>　作诗送丘崇帅蜀。作品：送丘宗卿帅蜀。<span class='inlineComment2'>（据《宋史·光宗本纪》绍熙三年四月以丘崇为四川安抚制置使。）</span><div id='poem_161960' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161960' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161960?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送丘宗卿帅蜀<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161960")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_161960_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161960'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161960'>尝陪诸老后，亦<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>与晚进游。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161960_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161960'>有能一夕话，可洗万古愁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161960_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161960'>昔君尚青衫，今我已白头。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161960_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161960'>阙下何匆匆，蜀江正悠悠。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161960_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161960'>一请工治庖，再请拙操舟。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161960_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_161960'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_161960_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_161960'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_161960_0'>⑴ 原作示，据四库本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_161960_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_161961' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161961' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161961?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span id='poem_content_161961'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161961'>好静从古始，尚恩极今时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161961_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161961_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161961'>我亦欲宴兴，人方乏朝炊。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161961_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161961'>持之讯人杰，人杰良自疑。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161961_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_161961'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_161961_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161959' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161959' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161959?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年4月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_161959_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161959'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161959'>前瞻及河陇，内顾连江沱。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161959'>边筹尚弹压，民瘴须挼挲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161959'>方当上怀远，况复岁荐瘥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161959'>宜公去帆轻，岁月亦易多。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161959'>西人岂不好，奈此东人何。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_161959'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_161959_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年6月</a>　便殿赐对，进周礼说，以吏部郎中兼实录院检讨官擢秘书少监。作品：吏部员外郎初对札子。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　除秘书省少监，辞免。作品：辞免除秘书省少监申省状。<div id='poem_1278383' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278383' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278383?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免除秘书省少监申省状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278383")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278383_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278383'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278383'>准尚书省劄子：「三省同奉圣旨：陈傅良除秘书少监，兼职依旧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278383_comment'></div>窃惟秘书监自古所重，自非时望，不在此选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278383_comment'></div>假如循次而进，亦以待□□□□之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278383_comment'></div>伏念某学术空疏，重以衰惰，视今同进，为日又浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278383_comment'></div>上之不应遴选之科，下之不与久劳之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278383_comment'></div>乃因赐对，有此越擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278383_comment'></div>若遂昧冒，安受不辞，则是哆然弗揆，敢当嘉奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278383_comment'></div>此所以须至恳陈，不容以官小例无辞免为辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278383_comment'></div>重念某顷缘衰惰，尝申祠请，寻趣奏事，遂留为郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278383_comment'></div>乃以重违成命，黾勉效职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278383_comment'></div>则今日之辞，情实可察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278383_comment'></div>伏望特赐敷奏，早回误恩，以安愚分。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278383_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　作宰臣以下跋御制至尊寿皇圣帝圣政序记。作品：宰臣以下跋御制至尊寿皇圣帝圣政序记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（据《南宋馆阁续录》：留正绍熙元年七月以左丞相兼提举编类圣政，陈傅良为秘书少监则在绍熙三年6月后12月前。）</span><div id='poem_1278538' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278538' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278538?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋御制至尊寿皇圣帝圣政序记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278538")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278538_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278538'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278538'>臣上言：臣闻前圣之德业，莫盛于尧舜，后圣之述作，莫盛于孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278538_comment'></div>然二者相须而未能以同时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278538_comment'></div>恭惟至尊寿皇圣帝道本于稽古，功成于协帝，临御二十有八年，仁恩塞穹壤，威闻憺蛮貊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278538_comment'></div>润色中兴之烈，而增光揖逊之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278538_comment'></div>薄海内外，万口同辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278538_comment'></div>以为自舜以来，一人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278538_comment'></div>陛下奉若慈训，克昌丕绪，见之行事，缉熙光明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278538_comment'></div>而且欲以钦承允蹈之馀，布在方册，昭示无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278538_comment'></div>爰命史臣，裒辑《圣政》，铺张表出，作宋一经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278538_comment'></div>于是书成来上，亲洒宸翰，摅发睿藻，冠之篇端，日星有烂，著于天文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278538_comment'></div>而太极之妙，自然陈露，缙绅铅椠之流，又以为是孔氏之作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278538_comment'></div>臣窃惟有虞之书，初与五典并行而无辨，更千五百年而得孔氏断为《书》首，序之百篇之上，然后暴白于万世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278538_comment'></div>由此观之，虞舜虽极治，尝久晦而后彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278538_comment'></div>孔子能祖述矣，盖追诵而不相及，未有父子两朝，圣以继圣，立德立言，自相发挥，皇乎懿哉如今日之盛者也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278538_comment'></div>抑臣次舜之事，以底豫于孝，遭人伦之变也，以予贤于公，因天命之改也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278538_comment'></div>惟我寿皇之事高庙，备极五福，弥历三纪，雍雍穆穆，吻无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278538_comment'></div>曾未倦勤，脱屣万乘，授之主鬯，神人燕宁，累圣一家，世世同德，父子之间，视舜有光焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278538_comment'></div>则陛下之序此书，尤足以垂百王之范，补六艺之缺矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278538_comment'></div>臣以非材，待罪宰事，适董攸司，与托不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278538_comment'></div>而藏之禁严，未写琬琰，无以对扬宏休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278538_comment'></div>臣实甚惧，用是百拜稽首，昧死请以赐本大书深刻，以幸来世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278538_comment'></div>而又百拜稽首，髣髴大旨，敬书于序之下方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278538_comment'></div>太常丞兼国史日历所编类圣政检讨官臣章颖，著作佐郎臣王容、臣李唐卿，著作郎臣沈有开、臣黄由，秘书少监臣陈傅良，左丞相兼提举监修国史日历提举编类圣政。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1278538_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年8月</a>　选兼皇子嘉王府赞读，作诗贺皇子生辰。作品：始生七章章八句上皇子嘉王生辰。<div id='poem_161935' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161935' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_161935_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161935'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161935'>生为帝子贵，本自历数归。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161935'>历数万亿年，帝子寿无期。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161941' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161941?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161940'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161940'>入均此生尔，王生乐无涯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
