class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161939' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161939?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年8月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_161939_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161939'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161939'>吾方贵吾生，相彼多阽危。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161939'>岂伊天地公，而独及我私。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161939'>于焉识仁端，一物岂忍遗。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161939'>当思宇宙间，寿域咸熙熙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161939_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161939'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161939_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161937' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161937' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161937?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年8月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_161937_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161937'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161937'>猎人爱麛麌，渔人爱鲲鲕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161937_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161937'>万物欣自遂，况也民秉彝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161937_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161937'>家有举桉妇，人有应门儿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161937_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161937'>王心至于此，寿不数耆颐。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161937_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161937'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161937_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161938' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161938' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161938?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年8月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_161938_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161938'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161938'>诗人诵稷功，造周本岐嶷。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161938_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161938'>首言民初生，次及稷诞弥。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161938_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161938'>民命系于稷，此语非夸毗。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161938_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161938'>末僚甚拳拳，所愧无周诗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161938_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161938'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161938_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　作诗贺嘉王生辰。作品：上皇子嘉王生辰三章。<div id='poem_161633' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161633' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161633?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上皇子嘉王生辰诗三章<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161633")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161633_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161633'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161633'>两官频燕喜，交举万年觞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161633'>会庆川方至，重明日未央。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161633'>圣贤何继世，孙子更宜王。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161633'>闻说斯干梦，祥占近一阳。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161633'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161633_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161632' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161632' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161632?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161632_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161632'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161632'>造次依儒术，朝回只一经。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161632'>更无他嗜好，端是众仪刑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161632'>符应当良月，声华自妙龄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161632'>帝垣从此日，光焰粲前星。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161632'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161632_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161631' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161631' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161631?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161631_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161631'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161631'>要识皇图永，当观艺祖初。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161631_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161631'>维持今尽是，回复更何如。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161631_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161631'>庸陋谁推毂，衰迟此曳裾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161631_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161631'>惭无为寿具，独袖一编书<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161631_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161631'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161631_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_161631'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_161631_0'>⑴ 自注：方讲《艺祖实录》，故及之。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_161631_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　转对上奏状札子。作品：转对札子。转对论役法札子。<div id='poem_1278318' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278318' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278318?labeling=true' target='_blank'>转对论役法劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278318")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278318_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278318'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278318'>臣不肖顷以备员郎官，蒙恩赐对，尝奏三劄，专论民力之困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278318_comment'></div>然熙宁以来生财之害，粗及梗概，未敢悉数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278318_comment'></div>而玉音嘉奖，至于再三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278318_comment'></div>退切感激，遭际如此，继今可以毕其说矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278318_comment'></div>今者适充转对之员，敢以奏劄数内免役一项先为陛下诵之，而因究役法之弊，庶几采择，以救斯民于不胜其病之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278318_comment'></div>所谓免役钱者，本以恤民，使出钱雇役，而逸其力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278318_comment'></div>自罢募户长，而取其钱，今隶总制<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278318_comment'></div>罢募壮丁，而取其钱，今隶总制<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278318_comment'></div>罢募耆长，而取其钱，今隶总制<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278318_comment'></div>而又以三分弓手雇钱<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>，一分宽剩钱<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>，尽隶总制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278318_comment'></div>而又以罢□□虞候重禄钱<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>，罢诸州曹官、当直散、从官雇钱<span class='inlineComment2'>（宣和五年拘收充籴本。）</span>，罢学事司人重雇钱<span class='inlineComment2'>（宣和五年，拘收充籴本。）</span>，宣和籴本之类，尽隶总制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278318_comment'></div>至于官户不减半役钱<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>，在京吏禄，在京官员雇人钱<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>之类，又令项起发，则免役钱之在州县者日益少，而役人无禄者众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278318_comment'></div>夫使民出钱募役而逸其力，未为非良法也，而反取其钱以赡他用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278318_comment'></div>既取其钱以赡他用，则必且白著，而役法不得不坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278318_comment'></div>何谓役法坏？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278318_comment'></div>今天下州县之胥皆浮浪之人，而乡村催科，专责之保正长是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278318_comment'></div>以州县浮浪之人行遣公事，蠹民诚甚，然未易改也，臣不暇论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278318_comment'></div>若夫乡村保正长任催科之责，破家荡产者，往往而是，独奈何弗救乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278318_comment'></div>且夫保正长催科，非役法也，以保甲法乱役法而行之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278318_comment'></div>臣请言役法与保甲法之异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278318_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1278318'>臣谨按熙宁四年八月十一日，行免役，以乡村第一等人户分为甲乙丙丁戊五等，第二、第三等人户分为上、中、下三等，第四、第五等人户分为上、下二等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278318_comment'></div>耆长于第一、第二等户轮充，一年一替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278318_comment'></div>与免户下本年役钱一十五贯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278318_comment'></div>如本村上等人户数少，即更于第三等内从上轮充，壮丁于第四、第五等二丁以上轮充，半年一替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278318_comment'></div>并不出纳役钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278318_comment'></div>户长于第四等召募有人丁物力者充，一税一替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278318_comment'></div>逐料夫盘缠钱五贯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278318_comment'></div>此役法也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1278318_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278318'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_1278318_0'>⑴ 熙宁五年罢，十年以其雇钱别桩管；绍圣三年再雇，建中靖国元年再桩管；绍兴元年起发，九年罢，十年六月拘收入总制窠名。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278318_0'>⑵ 熙宁七年罢，十年以其雇钱别桩管，绍兴十二年十月拘收入总制窠名。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278318_0'>⑶ 熙宁八年罢，十年以其雇钱别桩管，绍兴五年起发，九年罢，十年九月拘收入总制窠名。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_1278318_0'>⑷ 建炎元年，增置弓手。二年，民户役钱更增敷三分，以赡□□□。三年罢，绍兴五年三月拘收入总制窠名。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_1278318_0'>⑸ □□二年封桩，四年罢。政和三年再对桩。绍兴五年起发，九年罢。十年六月拘收入总制窠名。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278318_0'>⑹ 宣和三年陈亨伯奏罢，五年拘收充籴本，乾道四年拘收入总制窠名起发。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278318_0'>⑺ 建炎二年起催，绍兴五年起发，乾道二年六月拘收，依经总制，赴南库。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278318_0'>⑻ 在京吏禄每岁下淮南两州十二路起一万四千五百贯，政和元年每路量添五百贯。在京官员雇人钱，绍圣元年立一万贯为额，于十四路起发。政和四年每路量添三百贯。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1278318_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年11月</a>　上封事谏光宗朝重华宫。<div id='poem_1278319' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278319' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278319?labeling=true' target='_blank'>封事<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙二年十一月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278319")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278319_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278319'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278319'>臣一介疏远，才不逾众人，而多病早衰，齿发颓变，久无荣进清显之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278319_comment'></div>间者将指湖湘，罢弗胜任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278319_comment'></div>尝上奉祠之请，乞便医药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278319_comment'></div>不谓陛下过听，不以臣为不肖，归以畿节，留之郎舍，赐对便殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278319_comment'></div>初无建明，而天颜开怿，玉音温厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278319_comment'></div>曾不数日，擢贰册府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278319_comment'></div>又未几，用以为皇子嘉王府赞读官，极一时儒者之遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278319_comment'></div>臣诚不自意陛下待之甚宠也，不胜大惧，无以塞遭值之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278319_comment'></div>日夜思念，独有与二三僚友共秉一意，为大王道古今父子君臣之际，人之大伦，天地之正义，以成孝敬，长恩爱，无负任使之意，死且不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278319_comment'></div>盖尝读书，至《文王世子》之记曰：「文王朝于王季者日三，鸡初鸣，衣服至于寝门外，问内侍之御者：『今日安否何如』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278319_comment'></div>内侍曰：『安』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278319_comment'></div>文王乃喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278319_comment'></div>其有不安，则文王色忧，行不能正履」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278319_comment'></div>则必反覆为王诵之，曰：是可以为法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278319_comment'></div>事亲若文王，则受命作周，本支百世，功德见于雅颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278319_comment'></div>愿王慕之仿之，勿以为不可及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278319_comment'></div>至汉戾太子之传曰：「亲戚之路，隔塞而不通，太子进不得见上，退则困于乱臣，独冤结而亡告」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278319_comment'></div>则亦必反覆为王诵之，曰：是可以为戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278319_comment'></div>事亲如汉太子，则交兵阙下，父子不相保，而望思归来之台，天下悲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278319_comment'></div>愿王警之惧之，勿使万一有此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278319_comment'></div>赖天之灵，社稷宗庙之福，而大王姿禀纯明，嗜好鲜少，不自贵倨，喜亲书生，每得僚佐危言极论，则深信而不讳忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278319_comment'></div>至若周之所以得，则歛衽加敬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278319_comment'></div>汉之所以失，则嚬蹙不忍闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278319_comment'></div>迩者王誉日彰，人心日附，臣与二三人者窃相欣贺，以为陛下有子，国家无疆之休也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278319_comment'></div>今窃有惑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278319_comment'></div>会庆诞节，陛下阙上觞之礼而弗讲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278319_comment'></div>长至大会，陛下复阙称贺之礼而弗讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278319_comment'></div>群臣迫怵，妄窥圣意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278319_comment'></div>臣固知陛下自违豫以来，虽及康复，尚弗便于乘舆而怯风霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278319_comment'></div>虽然，非所以为训也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278319_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278319_comment'></div>区区陈说，无过口耳之感，必不能胜躬行之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278319_comment'></div>汎观往古，无过纸上之习，必不能如家传之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278319_comment'></div>今陛下上亏三宫之欢，而下责小臣陈谊于冢嗣，以庶几寡过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278319_comment'></div>则虽抱血诚之忠，未见其补，将以逃斧钺之诛而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278319_comment'></div>楚王有言：「人之爱其子者，亦如余乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278319_comment'></div>陛下以国家无疆之休托在一子，宜如何爱之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278319_comment'></div>而偶不察夫所以仪刑之道如此，顾使讲读皆为空言，名曰辅导，安用臣等？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278319_comment'></div>此所以痛惜此举动非所以为训也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278319_comment'></div>臣以多病早衰，齿发颓变，久无荣进清显之望，方申祠请，以便医药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278319_comment'></div>不忍默默，昧死为陛下一言，以冀省悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278319_comment'></div>伏纸流涕，不知所云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278319_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_1278319'>是时《寿皇圣政》书成，已降指挥十一月十四日进呈，忽长至日驾不出，宰执以下不胜忧惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278319_comment'></div>是日，却付出《圣政序》，内翰李巘献之所撰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278319_comment'></div>翊日，丞相进呈，上云：「可别令人撰入」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1278319_comment'></div>既进入，宸翰遂出，于是过宫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1278319_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年12月</a>　《寿皇圣政》书成，擢起居舍人，辞免。作品：辞免起居舍人申省状。<div id='poem_1278384' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278384' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278384?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免起居舍人申省状<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙二年十二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278384")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278384_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278384'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278384'>准尚书省劄子：「备奉圣旨：陈傅良除起居舍人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278384_comment'></div>某忽拜除命，惧不遑居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278384_comment'></div>伏念某疏庸之资，浅陋之学，重以病馀，齿发衰变，介在众俊，是为陈人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278384_comment'></div>而自再入脩门，叠冒殊渥，甫缀郎曹，遂领册府，才及半载，复有今除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278384_comment'></div>且夫侍立记言，举世之所考信；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278384_comment'></div>直前论事，在廷之所观瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278384_comment'></div>冒而居之，实逾涯分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278384_comment'></div>而亦非所以安数奇之迹，全靖共之操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278384_comment'></div>伏望朝廷特赐敷奏，亟寝误恩，以辑公论。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278384_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278384'><span class='label'>按：</span>十二月二十四，三省同奉圣旨不允。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278384_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年12月</a>　奉诏拟进御制至尊寿皇圣帝圣政序。<div id='poem_1278525' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278525' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278525?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉诏拟进御制至尊寿皇圣帝圣政序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278525")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278525_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278525'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278525'>臣闻乾坤之文不著，无以见太极；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278525_comment'></div>而太极非有待于文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278525_comment'></div>虞夏之《书》不作，无以见尧舜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278525_comment'></div>而尧舜非有蕲于《书》也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278525_comment'></div>恭惟至尊寿皇圣帝以妙道治身，参之三才而无间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278525_comment'></div>以笃行事亲，质之六艺而无缺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278525_comment'></div>以深仁厚泽幸斯世，极之根荄鳞羽而无不被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278525_comment'></div>宜配《雅》、《颂》，宜袭《春秋》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278525_comment'></div>而临御二十八年之间，凡施凡设，归美高庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278525_comment'></div>金石之刻无传，名山大川之藏未睹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278525_comment'></div>夙以神器授于微身，尽遗有迹之累，而退托无名之境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278525_comment'></div>方将渊乎其藏用，冲乎其忘言，尚友太极，法尧而蹈舜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278525_comment'></div>则圣政之书，何容心哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278525_comment'></div>然而宝章玉册希阔之典，储于三宫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278525_comment'></div>庙谟宸断温厚之辞，施于百辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278525_comment'></div>而咏歌休盛，摹写功德之人，又遍天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278525_comment'></div>至于中原之故老，蛮貊之君长，怀好音，归大号者，家有其说，国有盟载也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278525_comment'></div>岂惟史臣，将夫人能记之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278525_comment'></div>岂惟今日，将后世亦能记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278525_comment'></div>则铺陈汇次，以作一经，盖有孺子弗能抑，圣父弗得辞者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278525_comment'></div>矧惟菲薄，膺受重寄，蚤夜震惧，何以嗣服，对天之休？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278525_comment'></div>亦越成书，是训是式，率旧因馀，庶几底乂，是用申命大臣，总领众作，起初潜至于内禅，掇其最，凡得六百四十一条，为五十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278525_comment'></div>一言一动，皆足以经天纬地，垂裕无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278525_comment'></div>猗欤盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278525_comment'></div>昔者，文王演《易》，周公系辞，父作子述，臣实慕焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278525_comment'></div>于是亲序此书之意，以附篇首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278525_comment'></div>上之慈庭，副在禁中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278525_comment'></div>绍熙三年十二月二日，嗣皇帝臣谨序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1278525_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　为潘朝卿作墓铭。作品：承事郎潘公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（潘朝卿，字春卿，陈傅良亲家潘雷焕之父。）</span><div id='poem_1278768' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278768' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278768?labeling=true' target='_blank'>承事郎潘公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278768")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278768_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278768'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278768'>公讳朝卿，字春卿，姓潘氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278768_comment'></div>某先君子与故侍讲陈公鹏飞少南为辈行，以诸叔父从之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278768_comment'></div>少南之门，授经数百人，叔父亟称同舍生，则曰永嘉二潘公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278768_comment'></div>此儿时所常常熟闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278768_comment'></div>少南每过先君子，则馆于叔父之心远堂，尝赋诗焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278768_comment'></div>诸父下世，而诗不存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278768_comment'></div>某盖晚而后识公，因道儿时所闻语，恨不能记所谓心远堂诗者，公欣然为诵之，且及少年时群居事，乃知诸父之言信，前辈尊守其师说不坠忘如此而甚敬公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278768_comment'></div>公学不但为举子业，会撮古今为书，号《经史事统》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278768_comment'></div>然试有司辄不利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278768_comment'></div>秦太师之专也，私场屋，有与其子少保雅故，能不以糊名，即上第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278768_comment'></div>少保者，亦在永嘉时同舍生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278768_comment'></div>尝从容讽公附己，公谢不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278768_comment'></div>已而，少南以忤秦意，逐炎荒，公遂一语不复及场屋矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278768_comment'></div>以其学力行于家及其族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278768_comment'></div>至于昏友乡党，他人德色，公独易易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278768_comment'></div>益好读《易》，一旦课一卦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278768_comment'></div>室以「蒙」名，斋以「复」名，堂以「视履」名，园以「观颐」名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278768_comment'></div>某既甚敬公，又与其子雷焕同为乾道壬辰进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278768_comment'></div>雷焕掾宣城，丁母何氏夫人忧，某适罢丞三山，时时相往还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278768_comment'></div>间从公萧寺中，扣所诣处，令人深省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278768_comment'></div>尝与士友十数人造其门，午夜坐，客醉淋漓，公年已七十馀，独俨然无倦意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278768_comment'></div>五鼓作，雷焕即所馆，治药作粥糜，客问：「夜者公起居状如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278768_comment'></div>得无劳乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278768_comment'></div>则应曰：「大人趣使来焚香课书良久矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278768_comment'></div>由是益敬公父子，始约以儿女为兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278768_comment'></div>绍熙之元，某官衡阳，遣其孙子顺来成礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278768_comment'></div>是年十一月甲寅公卒，享年七十八，以子遇庆典，累封承事郎，致仕，赐绯鱼袋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278768_comment'></div>子一人，待衢州常山县阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278768_comment'></div>一女，为尼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278768_comment'></div>孙三人，长法刚早卒，次子顺也，次蕲老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278768_comment'></div>二女孙：长适直龙图阁故宗正少卿郑伯熊景望第四子处仁，一未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278768_comment'></div>雷焕以三年十二月丙午奉其柩，合于所居乡横塘何夫人之墓，来乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278768_comment'></div>某早衰，苦于文，士大夫求铭其父祖者，率不克即如所欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278768_comment'></div>于公为诸父之执，为同年家丈人，又为息女之尊舅，卒不得临，葬不得遣，且吾女不得一日奉盥匜也，而悲以惭，遂强次之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278768_comment'></div>大父彦先，墓志在忠简许公景衡少伊集中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278768_comment'></div>父安中，墓志在少南集中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278768_comment'></div>二文行世，故不序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278768_comment'></div>其一，潘兄杰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278768_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1278768'>维祖维父，铭在百世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278768_comment'></div>我铭如何，尚亦勿败。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1278768_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　为苏训直作祭文。作品：祭苏训直。<span class='inlineComment2'>（苏比字训直，泉州同安人。苏颂曾孙。）</span><div id='poem_1278808' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278808' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278808?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭苏训直文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278808")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278808_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278808'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278808'>元祐故家，封殖百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278808_comment'></div>百年旧闻，尝失其传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278808_comment'></div>疑将孰问，孰备次诠？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278808_comment'></div>如公几人，庶几像贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278808_comment'></div>然而位不过外郎，而仅止中寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278808_comment'></div>是不谓之天耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278808_comment'></div>累举不第，屈于赏延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278808_comment'></div>崎岖州县，曾讳自言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278808_comment'></div>晚以民庸，著之淮堧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278808_comment'></div>积有令闻，爰始综铨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278808_comment'></div>向使第公之文，少而腾骞，则于史观，则于词垣，何处非宜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278808_comment'></div>而踬莫前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278808_comment'></div>则天之啬公，非适今日然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278808_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278808_comment'></div>魏公之功，鼎彝所镌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278808_comment'></div>比及三世，中更百邅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278808_comment'></div>惟先大夫，义不附权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278808_comment'></div>天下冤之，临汀之迁！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278808_comment'></div>公论既开，忽诣九原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278808_comment'></div>凡是天理，莽不可言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278808_comment'></div>某幸兹为寮，情相后先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278808_comment'></div>即之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1278808", 1278808, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>谦谦</span>，听之便便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278808_comment'></div>一日不见，而我弃捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278808_comment'></div>寓哀斯文，三致意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278808_comment'></div>而哀不胜，有泪如泉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1278808_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1192&endYear=1192')">1192年</a>　为云章阁作记。作品：云章阁记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（文中云寿皇在御二十八年。）</span><div id='poem_1278736' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278736' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278736?labeling=true' target='_blank'>云章阁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1192年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278736")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278736_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278736'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278736'>臣恭惟寿皇圣帝在御二十八年，宇内之士，可谓遭时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278736_comment'></div>臣为布衣，识僧嗣清于行在所之西湖净慈寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278736_comment'></div>清尚年少，土形木质，穷昼夜或累日不饭蔬饮水，一破衲，凡数十寒暑，其徒类讪笑之，士大夫犹未甚有识者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278736_comment'></div>然时时闻被旨入禁中，莫知上访何事，清所对者何语，臣每惑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278736_comment'></div>隆兴、乾道之间，方讲修内外之政，惟日不足，有以作士气、宽民力、足兵、长财之说进，则朝上而夕召见，或不淹时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278736_comment'></div>至达官贵人，而空谈不适用，但习纸上语云云者，往往不录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278736_comment'></div>盖举选人，必考课劳迹果如何；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278736_comment'></div>进士，必习弓矢于殿庭，试中与否，而群臣方病不知当世之务，趋于实学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278736_comment'></div>于是时，上安取于嗣清，而嘉与之如此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278736_comment'></div>后二十年，为绍熙之元，寿皇禅大宝今上适再岁，燕居殊宫，澹然遗事物之累；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278736_comment'></div>恭俭滋甚，玉食日不费万钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278736_comment'></div>而嗣清则亦去江浙，南游湖湘之间矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278736_comment'></div>臣乃释然窥见圣意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278736_comment'></div>乡者凡以博求宇内之士，阴访幽隐，庶几有豪杰者，不但为佛法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278736_comment'></div>虽然，佛法几坠，清于是时能以苦学动万乘，世倾向之，岂不盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278736_comment'></div>其南来也，无一物自随，当暑，行数千里，未尝宿人家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278736_comment'></div>独所受上赐四句赞诗，衔袖不懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278736_comment'></div>始至，寄藏臣所，为之震叠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278736_comment'></div>已而，帅臣赵善俊请住南岳之福岩寺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278736_comment'></div>明年，臣行郡，过山间，既拜稽首，瞻想宸翰，且叹曰：《云汉》之章，足以镇兹山矣，顾未有尊阁之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278736_comment'></div>其徒遂相与作云章阁藏焉，而求记于臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278736_comment'></div>维岳之尊，维宸翰之光，相与为无极也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278736_comment'></div>抑臣何幸，附名碑阴，死且不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278736_comment'></div>又拜稽首书之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1278736_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年1月</a>　除兼权中书舍人，辞免。作品：辞免兼权中书舍人申省状。<div id='poem_1278385' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278385' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278385?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免兼权中书舍人申省状<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙四年正月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278385")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278385_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278385'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278385'>准尚书省劄子：「三省同奉圣旨：陈傅良兼权中书舍人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278385_comment'></div>窃以摄官承乏，暂时使令，力所克堪，不当辞避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278385_comment'></div>惟是掖垣之职关系非轻，盖辞令不工，则不足以发明主德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278385_comment'></div>封还不竞，则不足以慰满公论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278385_comment'></div>苟非其人，难以一朝居也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278385_comment'></div>伏念某才藻衰落，无华国之文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278385_comment'></div>志气销堕，无回天之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278385_comment'></div>若使尝试为之，必见阙误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278385_comment'></div>此所以闻命震惧，须至控免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278385_comment'></div>而况环观在廷，英俊林立，或兼数器，才效一官，则寝此误恩，改畀他士，不惟宽小己共二之忧，亦足成公朝选众之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278385_comment'></div>伏望朝廷特赐敷奏，曲从所乞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278385'><span class='label'>按：</span>四年正月十九，三省同奉圣旨不允。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278385_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　奏状札子。作品：内引札子。再内引札子。<div id='poem_1278347' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278347' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278347?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再内引劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278347")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278347_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278347'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278347'>臣闻人莫难于养其心，而人主之养其心为尤难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278347_comment'></div>共惟本朝列圣养心之道备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278347_comment'></div>臣不敢远引，亦不敢稽深言之，姑诵臣少壮时身所见闻高宗、寿皇两朝时事：每自退朝，于起居食息之暇，无非以礼乐刑政之具务自检束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278347_comment'></div>一日之内，每事有常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278347_comment'></div>以何时刻延见儒臣，以何时刻省阅章奏，以何时刻亲方册，或游戏翰墨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278347_comment'></div>然后以其馀景，燕衎尊俎，娱嬉苑囿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278347_comment'></div>至于暮夜，又必宣召宿直官，从容晤语，间以觞咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278347_comment'></div>如是者皆三二十年，寒暑不渝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278347_comment'></div>忽一日不如是，即内侍以近医药为请，而中外惶惑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278347_comment'></div>夫以尧父舜子，稽古学道，度越汉唐之君，而克勤小物，课为日程，拘拘不废，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278347_comment'></div>意者，虽圣人不可以不持养之故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278347_comment'></div>臣幸遭逢，备员近侍，每见陛下临朝之际，庄敬肃穆，俨然若神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278347_comment'></div>虽执礼名家，无以窃议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278347_comment'></div>于以仰窥圣心，持养必有道矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278347_comment'></div>而比来传闻，往往以为玉音所发，或异寻常；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278347_comment'></div>机务之间，稍失次第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278347_comment'></div>廷臣震灼，莫晓其故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278347_comment'></div>妄意窥度，其说多端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278347_comment'></div>以臣愚见，或者陛下言动偶有此差误耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278347_comment'></div>恭惟至圣至明，动循法则，而又春秋鼎盛，刚健日新，何繇言动有此差误？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278347_comment'></div>无乃起居食息之暇，所以自持养者，愆其常度，而延见儒臣之时少欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278347_comment'></div>省阅章奏，不屑加意欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278347_comment'></div>或亲方册，游戏翰墨等事，暂置弗讲欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278347_comment'></div>不然，则燕衎尊俎，娱嬉苑囿之乐，惟意所适，而无节欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278347_comment'></div>又不然，则是燥湿阴阳之寇，或伤其和，而忽忽不乐以得此也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278347_comment'></div>陛下幸因臣言，试自省察，万一有此，不可不反求之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278347_comment'></div>孔子以终日无所用心为难，而孟子论心，亦曰：「出入无时，莫知其乡」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278347_comment'></div>操存而舍亡，则心之不可以无所系也如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278347_comment'></div>伏愿陛下法高宗、寿皇之所行，存孔、孟之所戒，以其日力，定为常度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278347_comment'></div>非徒以亲政涖民，亦所以尊生介寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278347_comment'></div>惟赦其狂僣，留神财察，社稷幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278347_comment'></div>臣不胜忠爱之情。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1278347_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年2月</a>　权中书舍人任上，作奏状札子。作品：缴奏与刘炜与监司差遣状。缴奏刑部大理寺鄢大为断案状。<div id='poem_1278320' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278320' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278320?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏刘炜与监司差遣状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278320")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278320_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278320'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278320'>准尚书省劄子节文，三省同奉圣旨：「刘炜首议禁戢私钱，今已见效，依旧与监司差遣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278320_comment'></div>臣寮上言，乞赐寝罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278320_comment'></div>二月六日三省同奉圣旨，令以次官书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278320_comment'></div>劄付臣，须至奏闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278320_comment'></div>臣窃以刘炜尝为监司，以言罢去，今既旬岁，循省云久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278320_comment'></div>陛下念之，再与元来一等差遣，此乃朝廷起废之常典，人主弃瑕之美意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278320_comment'></div>求之故事，前后施行，似此非一，盖亦无可争执者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278320_comment'></div>独缘特降批旨，稍关事体，即与寻常行遣不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278320_comment'></div>此后省所以不无疑惑，须至论奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278320_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈特垂天听，收回批旨，将刘炜只依常行起废事例，候有阙次，随宜差使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278320_comment'></div>如此，则虽臣书行而当官之人可以自安，不至再有烦渎，且亦以免刘炜烦言滋至之累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278320_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278320_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278320'><span class='label'>按：</span>二月初九日奏入，留中。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278320_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1278321' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278321' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278321?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏刑部大理寺鄢大为断案状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278321")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278321_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278321'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278321'>准中书门下省送到录黄一道节文，为刑部、大理寺状：「吉州奏：勘到百姓鄢大为说合已断人李一讨合游六等，各持杖行劫朱三家谷物，赃满」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278321_comment'></div>按法寺称其鄢大为准条为绞刑，上定断合决重杖处死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278321_comment'></div>二月十四，三省同奉圣旨，鄢大为依断，令臣书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278321_comment'></div>缘事干人命，须至奏闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278321_comment'></div>臣窃详上件断案，止以鄢大为所带劫谷木檐堪以害人，定为持仗强盗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278321_comment'></div>赃满五贯，合决重杖处死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278321_comment'></div>设若不以木檐为杖，即计赃须满十贯方得死罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278321_comment'></div>死生之分，在于木檐称仗不称仗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278321_comment'></div>毫厘之间，此不可不谨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278321_comment'></div>臣尝习此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278321_comment'></div>在律，「仗」谓兵器、杵棒之属，馀条称仗准此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278321_comment'></div>恭惟本朝列圣继作，刑日益轻，以为杵棒立文，该载未明，则犯法者易，陷刑者众，于是重立两条。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278321_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　起居舍人兼权中书舍人任上所作。作品：右史进故事。资善堂进故事。经筵孟子讲义。僖祖太祖庙议。<div id='poem_1278718' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278718' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278718?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右史进故事<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙四年二月二十二日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278718")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278718_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278718'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278718'>唐《陆贽奏议》：奉圣旨：「频览卿表状，劝朕数对群臣，兼许令论事，辞理恳切，深表尽忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278718_comment'></div>朕本性甚好推诚，亦能纳谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278718_comment'></div>往日将谓君臣一体，都不堤防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278718_comment'></div>缘推诚信不疑，多被奸人卖弄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278718_comment'></div>所致患害，失在推诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278718_comment'></div>朕从即位以来，见奏对论事者甚多，大抵皆是雷同，道听涂说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278718_comment'></div>试加质问，即便辞穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278718_comment'></div>若有奇才异能，在朕岂惜拔擢？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278718_comment'></div>朕见从前以来，事祗如此，所以近来不多取次对人，亦不是倦于听纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278718_comment'></div>卿宜深悉此意」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278718_comment'></div>于是陆贽上疏，极陈其不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278718_comment'></div>有曰：「人之常情，罕能无惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278718_comment'></div>大抵蔽于所信，阻于所疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278718_comment'></div>信既偏，则听言而不考其实，由是有过当之言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278718_comment'></div>疑既甚，则虽实而不听其言，由是有失实之听」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278718_comment'></div>又曰：「众多之议，足见人情必有可行，亦有可畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278718_comment'></div>恐不宜一概轻侮而莫之省纳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278718_comment'></div>又曰：「违道以师心，弃人而任己，谓欲可逞，谓众可诬，谓专断无伤，谓询谋无益，谓多疑为御下之术，谓深察为照物之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278718_comment'></div>理道全乖，颠危可待」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278718_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1278718'>臣尝论之，若德宗，可谓好疑之主；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278718_comment'></div>若陆贽，可谓善谏之臣矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278718_comment'></div>臣比因赐对，亦尝有所建白，而玉音下谕，颇涉疑情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278718_comment'></div>故敢辄陈前鉴，以备采择。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1278718_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278719' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278719' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278719?labeling=true' target='_blank'>资善堂进故事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278719")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278719_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278719'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278719'>太子苦忽忽善忘，不乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278719_comment'></div>诏使王褒等皆之太子宫虞侍太子，朝夕诵读奇文，及所自造作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278719_comment'></div>疾平复乃归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278719_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1278719'>元帝八岁立为太子，尝侍燕，从容言：「陛下持刑太深，宜用儒生」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278719_comment'></div>宣帝作色曰：「汉家自有制度，本以霸、王道杂之，柰何纯任德教，用周政乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278719_comment'></div>乃叹曰：「乱我家者，太子也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278719_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1278719'>弘恭、石显奏萧望之、周堪、刘更生朋党，请谒者召致廷尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278719_comment'></div>上初即位，不省「谒者召致廷尉」为下狱，可其奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278719_comment'></div>后上召堪、更生，曰：「系狱」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278719_comment'></div>上大惊曰：「非但廷尉问耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278719_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1278719'>《元帝纪赞》曰：「上牵制文义，优游不断，孝宣之业衰焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278719_comment'></div>刘元城先生安世云：「萧望之为太子太傅八九年，固深知元帝之为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278719_comment'></div>及元帝即位，乃欲逐去许、史、恭、显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278719_comment'></div>元帝昏庸，岂能去许、史、恭、显哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278719_comment'></div>故恭、显奏堪、更生等下狱，上初即位，不省『谒者召致廷尉』为下狱，可其奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278719_comment'></div>后上召堪、更生，曰：『系狱』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278719_comment'></div>上大惊曰：『非但廷尉问邪』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278719_comment'></div>且望之久为太傅，知太子仁柔，宜辅导之，使洞晓天下之事，然后可以为人主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278719_comment'></div>今乃懵然无知如此，不知望之八九年间所以辅之者何等事也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278719_comment'></div>亦不容无罪矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278719_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1278719'>太子侍燕之语，可谓甚美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278719_comment'></div>既即位，益乡儒术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278719_comment'></div>然不知「召致廷尉」为下狱，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278719_comment'></div>习闻书生之谈，而不通于当世之务故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278719_comment'></div>观其「苦忽忽善忘，不乐」，则其天资固中人以下耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278719_comment'></div>望之、堪辅道各有年，无能改于其德，一旦即位，乃欲劝之去宦官、外戚用事之人，岂不缪哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278719_comment'></div>而望之竟以谮见杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278719_comment'></div>善乎，刘安世论之曰：「望之知太子仁柔，宜辅道之，使洞晓天下之事，然后可以为人主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278719_comment'></div>今乃懵然无知如此，不知望之八九年间所以辅之者何等事也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278719_comment'></div>亦不容无罪矣！</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1278719_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278720' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278720' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278720?labeling=true' target='_blank'>经筵孟子讲义</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278720")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278720_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278720'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278720'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>圣王</span>不作，诸侯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>放恣</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>处士</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>横议</span>，杨朱、墨翟之言盈天下，天下之言，不归杨则归墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278720_comment'></div>杨氏「为我」，是无君也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278720_comment'></div>墨氏「兼爱」，是无父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278720_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>无父无君</span>，是禽兽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278720_comment'></div>公明仪曰：「庖有肥肉，厩有肥马，民有饥色，野有饿莩，此率兽而食人也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278720_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/18/Comments/1")'>杨、墨</span>之道不息，孔子之道不著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278720_comment'></div>是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>邪说</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/20/Comments/1")'>诬民</span>，充塞仁义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278720_comment'></div>仁义充塞，则率兽食人，人将相食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278720_comment'></div>吾为此惧，闲先圣之道，距<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/27/Comments/1")'>杨、墨</span>，放淫辞，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>邪说</span>者不得作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278720_comment'></div>作于其心，害于其事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278720_comment'></div>作于其事，害于其政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278720_comment'></div>圣人复起，不易吾言矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278720_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1278720'>「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/36/Comments/2")'>圣王</span>不作」者，言周之衰，上无明天子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278720_comment'></div>「诸侯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/39/Comments/2")'>放恣</span>」者，言上无明天子，则下无贤方伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278720_comment'></div>凡有国之君，皆得自便，纵欲而专利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278720_comment'></div>「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/45/Comments/2")'>处士</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/45/Comments/3")'>横议</span>」者，言自天子至于诸侯，皆失其道，不复以明教化为务，则天下荡然，学术无统纪，而世之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>处士</span>各横为议论，人自为一说，家自为一书也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278720_comment'></div>「杨朱、墨翟之言盈天下」者，言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>处士</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/55/Comments/1")'>横议</span>者虽多，于其中独有杨朱、墨翟之教盛行而莫之抗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278720_comment'></div>「天下之言，不归杨则归墨」，言从其说者之众也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278720_comment'></div>举天下之能言者，不以杨朱为师，则以墨翟为师，而尧、舜、禹、汤、文、武、周公、孔子之教，□□道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278720_comment'></div>「杨氏为我，是无君也」者，此孟子之所以辟杨朱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278720_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278720_comment'></div>朱之为说曰：「拔一毛而利天下，弗为也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278720_comment'></div>且夫惟天生民，有欲无主，乃乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278720_comment'></div>故人主者，天之所置，非天下徒尊之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278720_comment'></div>葵藿之于太阳，江汉之于海，鸟兽之于麟凤，皆此物也，而谁敢易之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278720_comment'></div>是故天下之士，忘身以为主，忘家以徇国，非直苟利禄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278720_comment'></div>假使世之学者皆操杨朱之心，虽损一毛而不以利物，是无与事君者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278720_comment'></div>故曰：「是无君也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278720_comment'></div>「墨氏兼爱，是无父也」者，此孟子所以辟墨翟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278720_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278720_comment'></div>翟之为说曰：「摩顶放踵，利天下为之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278720_comment'></div>且天之生物也，使之一本，父母是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278720_comment'></div>今夫人有父母，有兄弟，有夫妇，均此爱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278720_comment'></div>而先王立教，每为之差而独隆于父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278720_comment'></div>《记》曰：「为人子者不可不私其父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278720_comment'></div>不私其父，不可以为人子矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278720_comment'></div>是故有东宫，有西宫，有南宫，有北宫」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278720_comment'></div>此言苟私其父，虽其父之伯仲，不可以不异宫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278720_comment'></div>又曰：「资于事父以事母，而爱同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278720_comment'></div>天无二日，土无二王，国无二主，家无二尊，以一治之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278720_comment'></div>故父在为母齐衰期者，无二尊也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278720_comment'></div>此言苟尊其父，虽父之妃不可以不杀服也，是之谓一本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278720_comment'></div>假使世之学者，皆操墨翟之心，爱无差等，是人人而父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278720_comment'></div>故曰：「是无父也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278720_comment'></div>「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/138/Comments/1")'>无父无君</span>，是禽兽也」者，孟子极其弊而言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1278720_comment'></div>人所以相群而不乱者，以其有君父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1278720_comment'></div>有君在，则上下尊卑贵贱之分定；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1278720_comment'></div>有父在，则长幼嫡庶亲疏之分定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1278720_comment'></div>定则不乱矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1278720_comment'></div>苟无君父，则凡有血气者，皆有争心，苟有争心，不夺不厌，是人心与禽兽无择也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1278720_comment'></div>「公明仪曰：『庖有肥肉，厩有肥马，民有饥色，野有饿莩，此率兽而食人也』」者，此孟子举公明仪之语，推广言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1278720_comment'></div>公明仪以为：国君之肥马在厩，而民饥莩在野，是为君者率兽而食人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1278720_comment'></div>「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/166/Comments/1")'>杨墨</span>之道不息，孔子之道不著，是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/168/Comments/0")'>邪说</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/168/Comments/1")'>诬民</span>，充塞仁义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1278720_comment'></div>仁义充塞，则率兽而食人，人将相食」者，盖孟子终言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/173/Comments/0")'>杨墨</span>之害与禽兽无异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1278720_comment'></div>且夫孔子之道所以尊信于万世者，非儒者能强之也，诚以三纲五常不可一日殄灭故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1278720_comment'></div>三纲五常不明而殄灭，则天地不位，万物不育矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1278720_comment'></div>自古及今，天地无不位之理，万物无不育之理，则三纲五常无绝灭之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1278720_comment'></div>三纲五常无绝灭之理，则孔子之道无不足尊信之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1278720_comment'></div>今<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/186/Comments/0")'>杨墨</span>者，自信其私说而不信孔子，故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/188/Comments/0")'>杨墨</span>之道不息，则孔子之道不著，如此则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/190/Comments/0")'>邪说</span>行而仁义废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1278720_comment'></div>今夫人之所以老者相共养，幼者相抚字，敌己者相往来，以其本诸仁义之心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1278720_comment'></div>无君则不义，无父则不仁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1278720_comment'></div>此心苟亡，则私欲横流，弱者之肉，强者之食尔，故曰「人将相食」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1278720_comment'></div>「吾为此惧，闲先圣之道，距<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/204/Comments/0")'>杨墨</span>，放淫辞，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/206/Comments/1")'>邪说</span>者不得作」，此孟子以卫道自任之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1278720_comment'></div>且孟子非好辨也，惧斯道之不明，而人心沦胥，至于□□□□□□□□□□□□□□□□□□谓君不君，臣不臣，父不父，子不子，虽有粟，吾得而食诸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1278720_comment'></div>虽有天下，不能一朝居也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1278720_comment'></div>此圣贤之所大惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1278720_comment'></div>「作于其心，害于其事，作于其事，害于其政」者，言淫辞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_66_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/224/Comments/0")'>邪说</span>之初，亦甚微也，不过其门人弟子转相传授，以为可行而深信之焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1278720_comment'></div>夫苟有是说也，在于人心则不见之于行事，斯已矣，苟见之行事，则必害及于其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1278720_comment'></div>不施之于有政斯已矣，苟施之于有政，则必害及于其政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1278720_comment'></div>孟子逆知二氏之学，一日得志于天下，其害有不可胜言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1278720_comment'></div>「圣人复起，不易吾言矣」者，孟子笃于自信之辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1278720_comment'></div>臣闻之曰：天下未尝一日无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_71_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/243/Comments/0")'>邪说</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1278720_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/244/Comments/0")'>圣王</span>在上，教明而禁立，虽有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/246/Comments/0")'>邪说</span>，而不得行耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1278720_comment'></div>反道败德，侮慢自贤，有苗氏之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/250/Comments/0")'>邪说</span>也，而虞舜迁之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1278720_comment'></div>威侮五行，怠弃三正，有扈氏之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/254/Comments/0")'>邪说</span>也，而夏启征之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1278720_comment'></div>谓祭无益，谓暴无伤，谓己有天命，谓敬不足行，商纣之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/260/Comments/0")'>邪说</span>也，而周武灭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1278720_comment'></div>然则道术分裂，间为异端，自唐、虞、三代有焉，而卒不足以干大中至正之统者，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/266/Comments/0")'>圣王</span>在上故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1278720_comment'></div>今夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/267/Comments/1")'>杨、墨</span>非有王公贵人之势也，非有醲赏以诱率人，严刑以驱迫人也，又未得尝试其术于战国之际也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1278720_comment'></div>而天下翕然从之，不归杨，则归墨，是岂一人之力，一朝一夕之故哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1278720_comment'></div>盖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_79_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/276/Comments/0")'>圣王</span>不作，则教不明，禁不立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1278720_comment'></div>教不明，则曲学之论兴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1278720_comment'></div>禁不立，则朋邪之类胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1278720_comment'></div>及其末流，而莫之救也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1278720_comment'></div>由此观之，凡不本于孔子，而敢为异说者，岂不甚可畏哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1278720_comment'></div>有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_84_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/289/Comments/0")'>圣王</span>者作，岂可不深察哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1278720_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_85_1278720'>昔者禹抑洪水而天下平，周公兼夷狄、驱猛兽而百姓宁，孔子成《春秋》而乱臣贼子惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1278720_comment'></div>《诗》云：「戎狄是膺，荆舒是惩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1278720_comment'></div>则莫我敢承」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1278720_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/298/Comments/0")'>无父无君</span>，是周公所膺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1278720_comment'></div>我亦欲正人心，息<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/301/Comments/0")'>邪说</span>，距<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/302/Comments/0")'>诐行</span>，放淫辞，以承<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_89_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/304/Comments/0")'>三圣</span>者，岂好辩哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1278720_comment'></div>予不得已也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1278720_comment'></div>能言距<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_91_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/307/Comments/1")'>杨、墨</span>者，圣人之徒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1278720_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_92_1278720'>抑，遏也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1278720_comment'></div>兼，并也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1278720_comment'></div>言并治之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1278720_comment'></div>膺，当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1278720_comment'></div>言北当戎与狄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1278720_comment'></div>惩，艾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1278720_comment'></div>言南艾荆楚及群舒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1278720_comment'></div>承，止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1278720_comment'></div>言天下莫敢御之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1278720_comment'></div>闻之曰圣贤之生斯世，必以天下为己任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1278720_comment'></div>当尧之时，洪水为天下害；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1278720_comment'></div>商之末，夷狄禽兽为天下害；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1278720_comment'></div>周之衰，乱臣贼子为天下害；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1278720_comment'></div>战国之际，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_105_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/332/Comments/0")'>邪说</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_105_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/332/Comments/1")'>诐行</span>为天下害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1278720_comment'></div>洪水夷狄之害，则生人不得安其居；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1278720_comment'></div>不得安其居，则不得适其性矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1278720_comment'></div>乱臣贼子之害，则生人不得定其分；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1278720_comment'></div>不得定其分，则不得适其性矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1278720_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/341/Comments/0")'>邪说</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/341/Comments/1")'>诐行</span>之害，则生人不得修其学；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1278720_comment'></div>不得修其学，则亦不得适其性矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1278720_comment'></div>是皆人心之所由纷乱而昏蔽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1278720_comment'></div>圣贤者，天民之先觉，将使之启迪人心而归于正者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1278720_comment'></div>则以生人为己任者，圣贤之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1278720_comment'></div>此正人心以承<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_115_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/351/Comments/0")'>三圣</span>，孟子所以不得辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1278720_comment'></div>是故禹不抑洪水，周公不兼夷狄、驱猛兽，使斯人脱于不安其生之患，而君臣、父子、兄弟、夫妇相保也，则禹、周公之责不塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1278720_comment'></div>孔子不明乱臣贼子之罪，使斯人脱于不定其分之患，而君臣、父子、兄弟、夫妇相保也，则孔子之责不塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1278720_comment'></div>孟子不辩<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_118_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/362/Comments/0")'>邪说</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_118_1278720", 1278720, "Clauses/362/Comments/1")'>诐行</span>之非，使斯人知所学，而君臣、父子、兄弟、夫妇相保也，则孟子之责不塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1278720_comment'></div>禹、周公得君以行其道，则见之立功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1278720_comment'></div>孔、孟不得君以行其道，则见之立言，凡以尽圣贤之责而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1278720_comment'></div>且夫禹、周公，人臣也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1278720_comment'></div>孔、孟，布衣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1278720_comment'></div>夫为人臣，为布衣，不敢不以天下为己任，况尊为天子、富有四海之内乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1278720_comment'></div>今敌国之为患大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1278720_comment'></div>播迁我祖宗，丘墟我陵庙，膻腥我中原，左衽我生灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1278720_comment'></div>自开辟以来，夷狄乱华，未有甚于此者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1278720_comment'></div>高宗崎岖百战，抚定江左，将以讨贼而沮于议和；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1278720_comment'></div>孝宗忧勤十闰，经营富彊，将以雪耻而屈于孝养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1278720_comment'></div>二圣人之责，至今犹未塞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1278720_comment'></div>陛下以仁圣之资，嗣有神器，岂得一日而忘此耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1278720_comment'></div>陛下诚一日不敢忘此，则当以天下为己任，而不敢以位为乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1278720_comment'></div>所谓一日不敢忘此，则不敢以位为乐者，每行一事，每用一人，必自警曰：得无为敌国所侮乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1278720_comment'></div>吾民困穷如此，吾士卒骄惰如此，吾内外之臣背公营私如此，吾父子之间欢意未洽如此，吾将何以待敌国也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1278720_comment'></div>常持此心，常定此计，周公岂欺我哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1278720_comment'></div>则大义可明，大功可立矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1278720_comment'></div>虽然，臣特因「兼夷狄」，发明一事尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1278720_comment'></div>若夫人心不正，岂止于此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1278720_comment'></div>皆陛下之所当讲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1278720_comment'></div>臣不胜拳拳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_139_1278720_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278721' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278721' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278721?labeling=true' target='_blank'>僖祖太祖庙议</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278721")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278721_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278721'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278721'>《诗·清庙》，祀文王也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278721_comment'></div>《执竞》，祀武王也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278721_comment'></div>《天作》，祀先王先公也<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278721_comment'></div>《思文》，后稷配天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278721_comment'></div>《我将》，祀文王于明堂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278721_comment'></div>《雍》，禘太祖也<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278721_comment'></div>《生民》，尊祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278721_comment'></div>《天保》，礿祠烝尝于公先王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278721_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1278721'>《礼记·中庸》：「武王末受命，周公成文武之德，追王太王、王季、文王，上祀先公以天子之礼」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278721_comment'></div>《大传》：「礼不王不禘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278721_comment'></div>王者禘其祖之所自出，以其祖配之<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278721_comment'></div>「系之以姓而弗别，缀之以食而弗殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278721_comment'></div>百世而昏姻不通者，周道然也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278721_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1278721'>《周礼》大宗伯以肆献祼享先王，以馈食享先王，以祠春享先王，以礿夏享先王，以尝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1278721", 1278721, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>秋享</span>先王，以烝冬享先王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278721_comment'></div>典瑞：祼圭有瓒，以肆先王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278721_comment'></div>司几筵：祀先王胙席，亦如之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278721_comment'></div>司服：享先王则衮冕，享先公则𩦉冕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278721_comment'></div>大司乐：乃奏夷则，歌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1278721", 1278721, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>小吕</span>，舞《大濩》，以享先妣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278721_comment'></div>乃奏无射，歌夹钟，舞《大武》，以享先祖<span class='inlineComment2'>（先祖谓先王先公。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278721_comment'></div>天府：掌祖庙之守藏<span class='inlineComment2'>（祖庙，始祖后稷之庙。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278721_comment'></div>守祧：掌守先王先公之庙祧<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278721_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1278721'>《仪礼·丧服传》：诸侯及其太祖，天子及其始祖之所自出<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑹</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278721_comment'></div>若公子之子孙，有为国君者，世世祖是人也，不祖公子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278721_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1278721'>《春秋外传·鲁语》臧文仲曰：有虞氏禘黄帝而祖颛顼，郊尧而宗舜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278721_comment'></div>夏后氏禘黄帝而祖颛顼，郊鲧而宗禹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278721_comment'></div>商人禘舜而祖契，郊冥而宗汤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278721_comment'></div>周人禘喾而郊稷，祖文王而宗武王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278721_comment'></div>幕能帅颛顼者也，有虞氏报焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278721_comment'></div>杼能帅禹者也，夏后氏报焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278721_comment'></div>上甲微能帅契者也，商人报焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278721_comment'></div>高圉、太王能帅稷者也，周人报焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278721_comment'></div>凡禘、郊、祖、宗、报，此五者，国之祀典也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278721_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1278721'>以经传考之，自商而上，以受命之君为宗，而祖其所始生之帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278721_comment'></div>故虞、夏以舜、禹为宗，而祖颛帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278721_comment'></div>商人则异是矣，亦以受命之君为宗，而祖其所始封之君，故商以汤为宗，而祖契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278721_comment'></div>周监二代，郁郁弥文，于是以受命之君为祖，继祖为宗，而郊其所始封之君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278721_comment'></div>故周人郊稷祖文王而宗武王<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑺</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278721_comment'></div>其在《诗·思文》，后稷配天，则稷之郊乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278721_comment'></div>《清庙》祀文王，则文王庙乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278721_comment'></div>《执竞》祀武王，则武王庙乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278721_comment'></div>《我将》祀文王于明堂，则又文王配帝之乐也<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278721_comment'></div>由此言之，后稷固先公之庙也<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑼</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278721_comment'></div>《记》曰：「武王末受命，周公成文武之德，追王太王、王季、文王，上祀先公以天子之礼」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278721_comment'></div>当武王之末，追尊三世，周公《金縢》之卜，但告三王，则太王为祖，而文王犹为穆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278721_comment'></div>考《酒诰》所谓「穆考文王」是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1278721_comment'></div>成王制礼作乐，更定庙制，于是推稷为始祖，文王为太祖，《闵予小子》之诗曰：「于乎皇考，永世克孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1278721_comment'></div>念兹皇祖，陟降庭止」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1278721_comment'></div>则武王祔庙，成王时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1278721_comment'></div>《雍》禘太祖，谓文王也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1278721_comment'></div>其诗曰：「既右烈考，亦右文母」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1278721_comment'></div>则是以文王为祖，而武王为昭考矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1278721_comment'></div>武王为昭考，故文王之子皆第称昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1278721_comment'></div>富辰所谓「文之昭，武之穆」是也<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑽</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1278721_comment'></div>《丧服传》曰：「诸侯及其太祖，天子及其始祖之所自出」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1278721_comment'></div>此始祖、太祖明文也<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑾</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1278721_comment'></div>孔子称之曰：「孝莫大于严父，严父莫大于配天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1278721_comment'></div>周公其人也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1278721_comment'></div>昔者周公郊祀后稷以配天，宗祀文王于明堂以配上帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1278721_comment'></div>以为周公其人，言非周公不足以及此，明非夏商之旧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1278721_comment'></div>周变夏商，非特此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1278721_comment'></div>追王至于三代，前此未有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1278721_comment'></div>系姓至于百世，前此未有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1278721_comment'></div>推其所自出，至于禘喾，又前此未有也<span class='inlineComment2'>（商人禘舜，至周禘喾，世数益远。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1278721_comment'></div>是谓仁之至，义之尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1278721_comment'></div>汉魏以来，诸儒考经不详，或得或失，王、郑二家互相诋毁，要不足深信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1278721_comment'></div>此某所以专以经为断，以赞庙议之决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1278721_comment'></div>共惟本朝，世次弗彰，今当以太祖之所推尊为定，以僖祖为始祖之庙，与太祖之庙皆世世享。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1278721_comment'></div>推广孝思，崇长恩厚，则群臣之议不相抵捂，而大典可就矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_67_1278721_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278721'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_1278721_0'>⑴ 先王谓太王以下，先公谓诸𥂕至不窋。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_1278721_0'>⑵ 禘，大祭也。大于四时而小于祫。太祖谓文王。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278721_0'>⑶ 卢植以禘喾为五年殷祭，以后稷配之。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278721_0'>⑷ 先妣，姜嫄也。周立庙自后稷为始祖，姜嫄无所配，是以特立庙祭之，谓之閟宫。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_1278721_0'>⑸ 庙谓太祖之庙及三昭三穆；迁主所藏曰祧，先公之迁主藏于后稷之庙，先王之迁主藏于文武之庙。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_21_1278721_0'>⑹ 马昭云：诸言祖者，近言太祖，远言始祖。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_36_1278721_0'>⑺ 文王未称王，何以得为受命之君？周公为之也。其在《诗·文王》文王受命作周也，《大明》文王有明德，故天复命武王也。此周公推受命于文王，祖文而宗武之事也。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_40_1278721_0'>⑻ 文、武每庙各有乐章，而后稷庙无专乐，则见周祖文王，而后稷不在七庙之列。于是有先王、先公之庙祧。先王谓太王而下，先公谓后稷而下。其在《诗·天作》祀先王先公，则后稷以至太王、王季之庙乐也。文武每庙各有乐章，文王配帝，又别有乐。假如后稷为太祖，则不应但有郊乐而无庙乐。今《天作》一诗通用之先王先公，则由王季而上，其迁主皆藏于后稷之庙而合享之明矣。在《书·洛诰》：「秬鬯二卣，禋于文王、武王。烝祭，岁文王骍牛一，武王骍牛一，不及后稷，不应每事皆遗太祖，又明验也。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_41_1278721_0'>⑼ 守祧八人，盖以此。以《天保》之诗曰：「礿祠烝尝，于公先王。」先公时祀固同。而《周礼》享先王礼甚备，享先公但用鷩冕，或亦有隆杀之等。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_52_1278721_1'>⑽ 《周礼》：天府掌祖庙之守藏。注云：「祖庙谓后稷始祖之庙」。《诗》禘太祖注云：「太祖谓文王。」王肃《家语》亦曰：「文王自是祖庙。」《孝经》云：「宗祀文王。」宗自训尊，则以后稷为始祖，文王为太祖。王、郑同此说也。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_54_1278721_1'>⑾ 马融云「诸言祖，远言始祖，近言太祖」是也。韦昭曰：「商家祖契，周初亦祖后稷而宗文王。至武王，虽成文王之业，而有伐纣定天下之功，其庙不可毁，而后更祖文王，宗武王。」此说近之矣。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1278721_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　作诗送辛弃疾帅闽。作品：送辛卿幼安帅闽。<span class='inlineComment2'>（据《宋史》本传，绍熙四年癸丑诏辛弃疾知福州兼福建安抚使。）</span><div id='poem_161748' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161748' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161748?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送辛卿幼安帅闽</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161748")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161748_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161748'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161748'>长才自昔恨平时，三入修门两鬓丝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161748'>瓮下可能长夜饮，花间却学晚唐词。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161748'>潸然北顾关河水，简在西清日月迟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161748'>乘雁双凫沧海上，与君从此恐差池。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161748'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161748_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　为高光中作墓铭。作品：高光中墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（高松之父。高松系陈傅良学生。）</span><div id='poem_1278774' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278774' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278774?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高光中墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278774")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278774_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278774'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278774'>闽有隐君子曰高光中，长溪桐山人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278774_comment'></div>光中尝入太学，登乾道五年进士第，试吏州县，非故隐者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278774_comment'></div>以其德足以堪此名，余故从而名之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278774_comment'></div>光中初调馀杭尉，不肯为势家所挠，寻以护细民，不便于屯所官，见中伤罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278774_comment'></div>丁父忧，服阕调同安尉，复丁母忧，遂不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278774_comment'></div>已而，所识为中都官，为授衡州司户参军，光中志已决矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278774_comment'></div>古之人有不仕者，非避地以为高，则玩物以为适，不然则故自污辱，混迹于屠钓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278774_comment'></div>猝有所动于其中，愤惋叹嗟，词气茀然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278774_comment'></div>以孔门所论次，荷蒉、耦耕之伦，皆豪杰之士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278774_comment'></div>而其言盖有所刺讥，是有不自得者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278774_comment'></div>凡不自得者，皆咎根也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278774_comment'></div>曾点之言志，孔子独有取焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278774_comment'></div>夫难平者人心也，易感者物变也，故不仕，必若曾子而后乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278774_comment'></div>光中之不仕，盖有见于此也，而非忻厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278774_comment'></div>彼世所谓夷险名谤，光中初不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278774_comment'></div>萧然退藏，不滞于物，当义之急，常与众同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278774_comment'></div>自衣饭至室庐之节，无或过于人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278774_comment'></div>自家庭至乡党之好，无或不及于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278774_comment'></div>尝择泉石之胜，作无馀堂，小亭三四，所以娱朋来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278774_comment'></div>间从两僮，篝衣赢粮，访幽人于数百里外，意象可观，辄忘岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278774_comment'></div>或违雅致，亦不黾勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278774_comment'></div>年益高，务学益笃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278774_comment'></div>晚而读佛氏书，曰：「是吾易之无思，为《中庸》卒章之旨也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278774_comment'></div>光中由是所造深矣，故光中非隐者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278774_comment'></div>余谓之隐君子，以其德足以堪此名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278774_comment'></div>桐山距永嘉数舍，光中乐其风土之美，时时往还诸僧，坊中莫之识者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278774_comment'></div>庆元之乙卯元日，忽语过客曰：「行且与诸君别，尚须一至永嘉尔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278774_comment'></div>明年，果游永嘉，取举子时所为文稿若干卷，焚之而后行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278774_comment'></div>至则托净光山，踰月乃归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278774_comment'></div>道过姻党，不肯留，私戒其仆曰：「亟归，亟归，无为吾儿累也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278774_comment'></div>归十日，得疾，但不食，家人窃相与谋，强饮食之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278774_comment'></div>语声未出，光中已知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278774_comment'></div>又十日，坐逝于正寝，是岁四月六日也，享年六十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278774_comment'></div>讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278774_comment'></div>娶温州平阳县陈氏，承事郎竑之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278774_comment'></div>一子：松，迪功郎，台州临海主簿，绍熙元年进士也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278774_comment'></div>女：适儒林郎新监行在文思院都门丁执礼，进士陈龟龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278774_comment'></div>孙：峻、屺、崃；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278774_comment'></div>女一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278774_comment'></div>松从予游久，将以四年某月某甲子奉其柩葬于县遥香里之姚奥，来乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278774_comment'></div>予习高氏家积善事，父某自号止堂居士，没之日，设榻于正寝坐逝焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278774_comment'></div>后数年，妣王氏亦逝于居士之榻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278774_comment'></div>光中之逝，复就此榻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278774_comment'></div>声燄赫赫然，世不知几人，父子母不相期，危坐于一榻以正终，则自余省事，未见如高氏者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278774_comment'></div>是宜铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1278774_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_1278774'>陟此山之冈也，相此柏与松也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1278774_comment'></div>其谁不曰是吾畴昔所谓高佛之藏也？</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1278774_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　权中书舍人所拟制诰。作品：皇后归谒家庙亲侄李孝纯孝友各特转右武郎。皇后亲姊李氏等封国夫人。皇后亲侄孙李瑜李璨各转两官。皇后亲侄妇潘氏赵氏亲侄女李氏并特封恭人亲侄孙女李氏特封安人。皇后亲侄女夫韩松特转一官。皇后亲侄之子韩大用大任各循两资。皇后亲属韩大有转承信郎。皇后閤提举官杨舜卿转观察使。皇后干办宅张友直沈植各转一官。皇后閤主管进奉袁佐等该遇皇后归谒家庙并转一官。秉义郎韩侂胄特授閤门舍人。皇伯嗣秀王伯圭合得冠帔并换封孺人赐亲属内将一名与妻妹宋氏封孺人。閤门宣赞舍人游恭落閤职权发遣临安府兵马钤辖。起复文州刺史知凤州郭谞转复州团练使令再任。皇兄多才磨勘转明州观察使。武功大夫和州防御使权知閤门事韩侂胄落阶官臣僚缴奏特与转行右武大夫。入内内侍省副都知张安仁除都知入内内侍省押班李彦正除副都知。带御器械于惟脩杨舜卿并除入内内侍省押班。张祐正补承信郎。郑孝友应奉有劳转一官。殿前指挥使左班年代上名刘成等授官。皇帝多助多能并该磨勘转防御使。入内内侍省东头供奉官霍汝翼转归吏部除带御器械。招箭班殿侍訾彦泽补承信郎仍旧在班祇应。泸州军变守臣张孝芳被害赠三官与二子恩泽。泸州被害官兵赠官及与子恩泽。泸州抚干郭仲溥失觉察虞候张信为乱首特降三资放罢。太史局学生周奕补挈壶正。閤门看班班祇候霍宽夫供职实及二年落看班二字。倪思该修寿皇圣政转一官。著作郎黄由等该修进寿皇圣政各转一官。徐靖等该进寿皇圣政各转一官。降授昌州刺史带御器械霍汝翼该进寿皇圣政转成团练使。宗正少卿郑汝谐奉使回转一官。閤门舍人谯令雍奉使回转一官。奉使属官谯令宪等回各转一官。閤门宣赞舍人宋尧使等该应奉人使十次赏各转一官。浙江潮神善利侯祈祷感应加忠靖二字。袁州仰山神加父母妃及子妇封号。平江府五龙灵济庙加封。进士黎崇礼年百三岁遇大礼恩补迪功郎。翰林医愈邢守忠转额外翰林医痊。给事中兼侍讲尤袤除礼部尚书兼侍读。中书舍人黄裳除给事中兼侍讲。降授朝散郎许及之复朝请郎。忠翊郎前韶州兵马监押周升降成忠郎。文林郎阶州将利县令蔺森失出犯公罪笞特降资。保义郎李珙家遗火烧民屋特降一官。通直郎赵公广追复承议郎。奉议郎知袁州黄劭降一官。承节郎盱眙军指使潘抚权淮河监渡不职降一官放罢。修武郎张世荣管押岁币恣横生事降两官。承议郎常德府通判赵善彦在任不法降一官放罢。奉议郎知成都府郫县郭公谟昏谬降一官放罢。入内内侍省副都知李彦正押班杨舜卿职事不谨各降一官。李彦正杨舜卿复官。入内内侍省副都知李彦正除都知押班杨舜卿除副都知。林亿年除入内内侍省押班。皇兄多才上遗表妻令人高氏特封硕人。多才上遗表亲弟多艺多见乞比换南班并授太子右监门率府率。皇叔祖不儳磨勘转右监门卫大将军。皇叔祖不延授千牛卫将军。权主管侍卫马军司公事张师颜落权字。皇叔祖不呶特换右监门卫大将军。昭宪皇后亲侄孙杜士宝补承信郎。右丞相葛邲赠三代封妻。知枢密院事胡晋臣赠三代封妻。<div id='poem_1277919' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277919' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277919?labeling=true'
