id='poem_content_1277919'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277919'>敕具官某等：朕惟古后妃有求贤审官之志而不私谒，而人主则特隆于肺腑之亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277919_comment'></div>夫惟后妃弥逊，人主弥恩，斯可观已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277919_comment'></div>日者吾后省家庙，尔某、某皆以犹子祗服厥事，朕何爱一横行郎而不以宠汝？<div class='inline' id='poem_1277929' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277929' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277929?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秉义郎韩侂胄特授閤门舍人制</a><span showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277930?labeling=true' target='_blank'>皇伯太师嗣秀王伯圭合得冠帔一十五道并特换封孺人赐亲属内欲将一名与故妻秦国夫人妹宋氏封孺人制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277930")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277930_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277930'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277930'>敕某氏：古者酬勋贤之劳，则及其私人，况所尊敬，自吾寿皇以兄礼之者乎！<div class='inline' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277943'>敕具官某：朕观《春秋》书盗杀某人，夫谓之「盗」，则非死者之罪矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277943_comment'></div>盖喟然叹曰：士大夫或死于不幸，而无所归咎者焉，则其所遭之变，非必有以取之，此仁君之所务白也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277943_comment'></div>国家闲暇，士马饱逸，受命分阃，尊重难危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277943_comment'></div>而尔曾无咎端，独罹不测之祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277943_comment'></div>夷考其治，皆率故常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1277943_comment'></div>则盗起帐下，非《春秋》之所不罪者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1277943_comment'></div>虽然，世无叛兵久矣，庸人为将，高枕有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1277943_comment'></div>尔以名流，顾至于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1277943_comment'></div>恤典之隆，岂但汝哀，亦以使继今者之知惧焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1277943_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1277943_comment'></div></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277945'>敕具官某：帅死于乱卒，而尔为属，顾欲以卑谄自全，可乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277945_comment'></div>削之三阶，尚用中典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277945_comment'></div>继今有耻，亦岂汝弃！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277945_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1277945_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277946' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277946' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277946?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太史局测验浑仪刻漏所学生周奕特补挈壶正制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277946")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277946_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277946'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277946'>敕某：今官类非古称，谓而挈壶氏，见于《周官》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277946_comment'></div>尔以诸生，驯致于此，亦宜知所职矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277946_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1277946_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277948' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277948' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277948?labeling=true' target='_blank'>礼部侍郎倪思该脩至尊寿皇圣帝圣政特转一官制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277948")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277948_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277948'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277948'>敕：昔者仲尼序《书》，断自二典，以为尧、舜揖逊之美，后世弗可及矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277948_comment'></div>矧惟我家，父作子述，不待倦勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277948_comment'></div>亲相授受，盖视帝者有光焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277948_comment'></div>则《圣政》之作，岂不足以匹休《虞书》哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277948_comment'></div>具官某以折衷六艺之学，发明心传，以同风三代之文，扬厉治效，作宋一艺，垂之无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1277948_comment'></div>及此奏篇，朕为之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1277948_comment'></div>日上慈扆，寿皇嘉焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1277948_comment'></div>藉使仲尼在，宜如何表异之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1277948_comment'></div>而有司以故事第赏，爰进一官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1277948_comment'></div>此朕之所甚不爱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1277948_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1277948_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277949' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277949' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277949?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_4_1277949_comment'></div>及此奏篇，朕为之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1277949_comment'></div>日上慈扆，寿皇嘉焉。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277951?labeling=true' target='_blank'>武功大夫降授昌州刺史带御器械霍汝翼该进至尊寿皇圣帝圣政特转成州团练使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1277951_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277951'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277951'>敕具官某：铅椠之劳，繄学士大夫力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277951_comment'></div>而无人乎其间，则安能关乙夜之览？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277951_comment'></div>今也奏牍来上，俞音不迟，慈庭有怿，册府改观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277951_comment'></div>是谁之助欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277951_comment'></div>则以尔靖恭，实与执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1277951_comment'></div>通达中外，其劳实多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1277951_comment'></div>夫以文字得官，皆德赏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1277951_comment'></div>进之遥刺，孰曰不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1277951_comment'></div>其尚勉思，以称殊渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1277951_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1277951_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277952' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277952' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277952?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宗正少卿郑汝谐奉使回特转一官制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277952'>敕具官某：尔以老师宿儒，衔命万里，修邻好于北庭，缙绅往往悯劳汝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277952_comment'></div>朕观《春秋》使骋之际，楚人欲傲晋叔向以其所不知而不能，晋人亦曰：「郑子产，博物君子也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277952_comment'></div>而皆异其礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277952_comment'></div>有以大国，而微老师宿儒专对四方，非所以令远入见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277952_comment'></div>迨兹归报，亶焉无阙，而书劳进秩，但循故事，岂朕所以相劳苦之意哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1277952_comment'></div>尔其少休，嗣有宠数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1277952_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1277952_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277953' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277953' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277953?labeling=true' target='_blank'>閤门舍人兼皇子嘉王府内知客谯令雍奉使回特转一官制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277953")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277953_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277953'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277953'>敕具官某：摈上閤之仪，联朱邸之事，皆华选也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277953_comment'></div>尔以趣操文藻，至于共二，可谓吾亲臣矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277953_comment'></div>是用命尔介于肤使，衔命万里，修岁聘于北庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277953_comment'></div>迨兹归报，亶焉无阙，则朕所以相劳苦之意，何但循故事增秩哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277953_comment'></div>有它抡用，朕不汝忘。<div class='inline' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277955'>敕具官某等：赞仪上閤，能与聘客周旋，十不失一，亦既劳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277955_comment'></div>课效增秩，盖国旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277955_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277956' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277956' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277956?labeling=true' target='_blank'>浙江潮神顺济庙善利侯祈祷感应特加忠靖二字制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277956'>敕某神：朕固不为秘祠专乡其福也，至四方长吏有为吾民请曰：「某山川之神，能惠其境中」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277956_comment'></div>则褒崇之典，朕靡爱焉，以庶几古蜡百神之义。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277957?labeling=true' target='_blank'>袁州仰山神特加父母妃及子妇封号制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277957'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277957'>敕某神等：朕固不为秘祠专乡其福也，至四方长吏有为吾民请曰：「某山川之神，能惠其境中」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277957_comment'></div>则褒崇之典，朕靡爱焉，以庶几古蜡百神之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277957_comment'></div>惟仰山之神，礼以王祀，而自江以西，犹未慰满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1277957_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277958' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277958' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277958?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知平江府沈揆奏五龙灵济庙乞加封第一位龙王封东灵侯第二位龙王封西侯第三位龙王封中侯第四位龙王封南平侯第五位龙王北宁侯制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a id='poem_sentence_0_1277958_comment'></div>则褒崇之典，朕靡爱焉，以庶几古蜡百神之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277958_comment'></div>矧惟五龙以时节雨旸，功著近甸，虽良二千石雅不言禨祥，而具道所以然之故。<div class='inline' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277960'>敕具官某：天官之属，六十而医，命士二十有八人，周家之重医也如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277960_comment'></div>再岁无失，爰进一官，此又吾家法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_1277961' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277961' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277961?labeling=true' target='_blank'>正议大夫守给事中兼侍讲尤袤除礼部尚书兼侍读制<sup class='reference "poem_title_1277961")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277961_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1277961_0'>① 四年正月十一日除礼书，三月二十日兼侍读，二词并行。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277961'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277961'>敕：方朕在东宫时，嘉与僚友切磋经谊，缉熙光明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277961_comment'></div>肆以菲躬托于兆人之上，克奉诒谋，庶几寡过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277961_comment'></div>永怀三益，宜如之何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277961_comment'></div>具官某博极群书，折衷六艺，凡与我言者，于今不忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277961_comment'></div>悯劳琐闼，位之春官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1277961_comment'></div>进读路门，以竟馀论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1277961_comment'></div>昔者甘盘辅高宗于旧劳之时，而无与于中兴纳诲之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1277961_comment'></div>至汉二疏，同傅太子，而亦不在初元酬功之诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1277961_comment'></div>我有故人，始终典学，视昔盖有光焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1277961_comment'></div>尔其辅养精神，陈古以诫今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1277961_comment'></div>惟毋以谢事之年而有遐心，则朕以怿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1277961_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1277961_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277962' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277962' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277962?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝散郎试中书舍人兼皇子嘉王府翊善黄裳除给事中兼侍讲制<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", id='poem_title_1277962_0'>① 四年正月十一日除给事，三月二十一日兼侍讲，二词并行。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277962'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277962'>敕：朕有元子，出就外傅，敷求其人，盖累年于此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277962_comment'></div>晚得三益，聪敬日闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277962_comment'></div>间尝侍燕从容，能道《二南》之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277962_comment'></div>朕嘉其劳，图以自近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277962_comment'></div>具官某习先圣之术，而明于当世之务，凡与吾儿切磋言之者，皆实学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1277962_comment'></div>是用擢之琐闼，劝讲路门，冀发其蕴，并以告朕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1277962_comment'></div>昔四皓调护太子，而不屈于高帝，李泌以布衣交肃宗，而不能安其身于君侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1277962_comment'></div>尔以西州之彦，出入宫邸，为父言慈，为子言孝，是不谓之遭时乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1277962_comment'></div>尚其殚竭，以报简知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1277962_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1277962_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1277963_comment'></div>阅日既久，宜还其初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277963_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1277963_comment'></div></div></div><div class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277974")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277974_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277974'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277974'>敕具官某等：朕惟周制，内宰掌王内之政令，会其属之功事而赏罚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277974_comment'></div>今内宰不设，而尔等不虔于事，实干宫中之罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277974_comment'></div>其上一官，应古经谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277974_comment'></div>继今有悛，亦岂终夺？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277974_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1277974_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277975' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277975' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277975?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李彦正杨舜卿复官制</a><span showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277976?labeling=true' target='_blank'>入内内侍省副都知李彦正除入内内侍省都知入内内侍省押班杨舜卿除入内内侍省副都知制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277976")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277976_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277976'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277976'>敕具官某：昔在周制，内宰以中大夫为之，而隶天官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277976_comment'></div>说者以为禁省之秘不宜属外廷，而本朝爰创北司之长，就择明习靖共，可以率属者以董正之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277976_comment'></div>官最贵近，亦不可不重其选矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277976_comment'></div>尔自辈中，进在四人之数，曾未踰日，能赞内治，进之长官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277976_comment'></div>杨舜卿亦进亚长官，委寄弥重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1277976_comment'></div>其益虔匪懈，以报殊渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1277976_comment'></div>毋使外廷，谓汝不称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1277976_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1277976_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277977' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277977' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277977?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亲卫大夫清远军承宣使提举佑神观林亿年除入内内侍省押班制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277977")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277977_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277977'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277977'>敕：自宣徽院之籍废，而北司之长盖难其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277977_comment'></div>朕既差择之矣，则参伍其间，以弼内治，非识风指、谨宪度者，皆不在此选也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277977_comment'></div>具官某服劳禁近，见谓老成，兹用命汝秩在四人之数，欲俾其属于内肃给，于外靖共。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277977_comment'></div>则尔责重矣，盍亦思报称者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277977_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1277977_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277978' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277978' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277978?labeling=true' target='_blank'>皇兄故吴王府奉利州观察使多才上遗表妻令人高氏特封硕人制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277978")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277978_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277978'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277978'>敕具位某氏：朕所以贲尔夫于幽壤，有加礼矣，而何爱于疏封尔？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277978_comment'></div>使居往皆宠光焉，以塞其悲乞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277978_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1277978_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277979' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277979' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277979?labeling=true' target='_blank'>多才上遗表亲弟二人比换南班训武郎多艺修武郎多见并特授太子右监门率府率制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277979")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277979_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277979'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277979'>敕具官某等：朕以诸卫处宗室子，俾日奉朝请，非苟示私也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277979_comment'></div>以尔多才身后之请及其仲、季，恻然重违之，而并命尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277979_comment'></div>其务靖共，以称德意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277979_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1277979_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277982' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277982' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277982?labeling=true' target='_blank'>武功大夫权主管侍卫马军司公事张师颜落权字制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277982")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277982_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277982'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277982'>敕具官某：朕以金陵形势，襟带江淮，辍吾骑卫，布之屯所，且以壮留钥焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277982_comment'></div>则统驭之才，厥选艰矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277982_comment'></div>尔以名将，往训群驺，方当无事，士马饱逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277982_comment'></div>观者咸谓可以即戎缅怀、武备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277982_comment'></div>于风《驷铁》，于雅《车攻》，或庶几焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1277982_comment'></div>翳尔之力，肆用命尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1277982_comment'></div>自摄为真，班秩益崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1277982_comment'></div>寄任罙重，其尚加懋，以究尔功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1277982_comment'></div>俾周秦之诗，得以专美，则予汝嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1277982_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1277982_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277983' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277983' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277983?labeling=true' target='_blank'>皇叔祖武德郎主管台州崇道观不呶特换右监门卫大将军制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277983")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277983_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277983'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277983'>敕具官某：朕考《周官》，凡卫王官者皆同姓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277983_comment'></div>国朝亦简宗英，寘之环列之尹，盖循周制，属意深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277983_comment'></div>惟尔叔祖，行尊德修，今在选中，应于经谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277983_comment'></div>宜率典常，作宋恭先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277983_comment'></div>有冯有翼，则繄汝赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1277983_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1277983_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277984' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277984' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277984?labeling=true' target='_blank'>昭宪皇后亲侄孙杜士宝特补承信郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277984")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277984_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277984'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277984'>敕某：朕惟艺祖之子孙，自吾寿皇，笃叙之恩备矣，而于母党，顾无世禄，岂昌陵之意乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277984_comment'></div>取之白丁，授以右职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277984_comment'></div>尔其永怀，无忝所自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277984_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1277984_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年5月</a>　权中书舍人任上所作奏状札子。作品：缴奏给事中黄裳改除兵部侍郎状。<div id='poem_1278326' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278326' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278326?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏给事中黄裳改除兵部侍郎状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278326")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278326_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278326'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278326'>臣以楼钥差充御试官，时暂兼摄吏左房书黄事，近者新除郑汝谐权吏部侍郎录黄一道，臣已书行去讫，给事中黄裳不肯书读，辄有论奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278326_comment'></div>臣于郑汝谐有乡曲之好，于黄裳有僚友之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278326_comment'></div>与此二人，初无厚薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278326_comment'></div>郑汝谐之除授，堪与不堪，黄裳之封驳，当与不当，臣不复论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278326_comment'></div>忽奉圣旨，改黄裳兵部侍郎，此臣之所不敢默默也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278326_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278326_comment'></div>给舍封缴，是谓官守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278326_comment'></div>其言行则谓之振职，其言不行则谓之失职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278326_comment'></div>振职谓之功，失职谓之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278326_comment'></div>此百王以来与国家列圣之所务暴白也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278326_comment'></div>今者，黄裳之言，臣不识陛下以为是欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278326_comment'></div>抑以为非欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278326_comment'></div>若以为是，则当听从；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278326_comment'></div>若以为非，则当罢黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278326_comment'></div>今也阴废其言，而阳迁其官，是非不明，赏罚倒置，臣窃以为当今之时，不宜有此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278326_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278326_comment'></div>阴废其言而阳迁其官，古来传记尝有此事，若非猜阻之君喜权任数，以此为盖抹之术，则是奸回之臣嫉贤丑正，以此为中伤之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278326_comment'></div>今陛下宽容乐易，非猜阻之君，二三大臣靖共正直，非奸回之佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278326_comment'></div>不谓清朝，有此过举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278326_comment'></div>臣顷尝奏事，屡言君德当与天同，每蒙渊听，曲加奖纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278326_comment'></div>今夫天发生则为雨露，肃杀则为霜雪，未有明示雨露之恩，而密加雪霜之惨者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278326_comment'></div>由此观之，若裳所言悖理伤道，荧惑聪明，怀奸挟私，变乱事实，则陛下宜出其章，播之公众，明怒而明黜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278326_comment'></div>如此施行，岂不正大？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278326_comment'></div>若裳所言止于为国过虑，无悖理伤道之失，或是求人太备，无怀奸挟私之邪，则以陛下明恕，何所不容？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278326_comment'></div>岂应违忤，遽有迁改？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278326_comment'></div>今乃名为进官，而实夺其当言之职，外示优假，而中不无怒绝之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278326_comment'></div>遂使凡有官守，人人自疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278326_comment'></div>黄裳虽去，何以继之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278326_comment'></div>强颜缄默，谁无愧耻？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278326_comment'></div>随事正救，未知所终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278326_comment'></div>则此除之后，将见给舍竟为虚设，虽有忠贤，无以自明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278326_comment'></div>此臣之所甚忧，而不敢默默也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278326_comment'></div>欲望睿慈少霁天威，收回成命，令黄裳依旧供职，以释在廷之疑，以为来者之劝。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1278326_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　权中书舍人所拟制诰。作品：秘书省正字蔡幼学该修进寿皇圣帝会要转一官。武学博士李兴时知融州。高文虎除将作监丞。范仲壬除武学博士黄袖然除武学谕。利州防御使郭杲除宜州观察使。阎仲持转右武大夫忠州刺史。閤门序班赵弼奏故祖赠太尉赵撙累遇郊祀未曾陈乞加赠开府仪同三司。权刑部尚书京镗兼侍讲。吏部侍郎沈揆兼侍讲。右正言黄艾兼侍讲。知邵州胡澄狱囚多死展二年磨勘。邵州录参柴璿司理李邠狱囚多死各降一资。兴州都统吴挺守本官致仕。吴挺特赠少保。持服祁州团练使吴曦授濠州团练使起复。郭棣授利州观察使致仕。郭棣赠宁远军承宣使。耶律适哩致仕。耶律适哩赠官。正议大夫陈岘磨勘转正奉大夫。合州赤山县至道观冲妙真人加封冲妙灵应真人。潼川府中江县灵感庙善利侯加封善利敷济侯。盱眙军通判****降一官。武节大夫权发遣郢州任世安特转一官再任。从义郎权知思州田祖严特转一官。履正大夫邓从训主管国信所任满无违阙授宣政大夫。额内翰林医痊李九龄转翰林医效。判太史局吴泽等职事不谨各降一官。秀州海盐县显济庙神母庆善夫人加荐福二字。赐进士出身赵善防系濮安懿王近属更转一官。宗子显夫量试不中年四十以上特补承信郎。量试中宗子汝弼等补官。合格取应宗子时信等授官。四川宗子师说等趁赴殿试不及并补宣信郎。宗子师鈜量试不中年四十以上补承信郎展三年出官。宗子汝璺对策中间全写御题降一官推恩补承信郎。德庆府通判权英州张公盖失陷官钱降一官放罢。忠训郎赵师涌在任不职守臣杨祐按罢辄伏阙妄论守臣降一官。知叙州庆符县魏良忠侵刻夷人降一官放罢。成都府录参史定之不亲涖狱降一官放罢。浦江县丞赵大亨不尊提刑司差委辄申任满离任降一官。万州司理向绍祖狱囚系死降一资放罢。慈福太皇太后册宝书册文官知枢密院事赵汝愚转大中大夫。篆宝文官参知政事陈骙转通奉大夫。前导礼仪使并奏礼毕同知枢密院事余端礼转通奉大夫。兵部尚书罗点母太淑人缪氏遇庆典恩封齐安郡太夫人。中书舍人楼钥母汪氏遇庆典恩封太淑人。参政陈骙子臧孙遇庆典恩乞封母。安定郡王子涛遇庆典转官。慈福太皇太后侄吴珽等转官。迪功郎青阳炳文年八十一遇庆典恩封承务郎。儒林郎御史台副引赞官贾忱应奉上册宝了毕转承直郎。武德大夫陈守忠系重华宫淑妃陈氏亲父特与带行遥郡刺史。军器少监黄由除将作监兼嘉王府直讲。<div id='poem_1278000' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278000' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278000?labeling=true' target='_blank'>迪功郎秘书省正字蔡幼学该修进至尊寿皇圣帝会要转一官制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278000")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278000_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278000'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278000'>敕具官某：载笔东观，迄于成书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278000_comment'></div>序进一阶，可谓德赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278000_comment'></div>益修铅椠，以昌尔文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278000_comment'></div>二典三谟，亦其选也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278000_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278000_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278001' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278001' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278001?labeling=true' target='_blank'>忠训郎武学博士李兴时知融州制<span class='inlineComment2'>（七月十二日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278001")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278001_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278001'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278001'>敕具官某：简在右学，诸生咸曰：「贤哉，吾博士也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278001_comment'></div>满岁宜迁官，而自诡治民，将以其淑人者施之行事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278001_comment'></div>融在岭表，尝建旄钺，而荆湖之与邻，视旁郡为善地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278001_comment'></div>爰以付汝，是谓异数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278001_comment'></div>尚其懋哉，以践尔言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278001_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1278001_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278002' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278002' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278002?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高文虎除将作监丞制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278002")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278002_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278002'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278002'>敕具官某：朕旁招俊彦，布列周行，德进言扬，如恐不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278002_comment'></div>矧子太史氏之旧，引疾居家，十有四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278002_comment'></div>昔病今愈，予环可后乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278002_comment'></div>尔博学笃志，承伯父之传，网罗旧闻，述史迁之绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278002_comment'></div>采之公论，佥曰汝贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278002_comment'></div>再转为丞，尚居缮监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278002_comment'></div>职务清简，可以卒汗青之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278002_comment'></div>毋以匠为嫌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278002_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278002_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278003' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278003' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278003?labeling=true' target='_blank'>武学谕范仲壬除武学博士修武郎黄褒然除武学谕制<span class='inlineComment2'>（并七月二十一日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278003")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278003_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278003'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278003'>敕具官某等：国家设武科以取士，有周道焉，所以贯革之射息，说剑、搢笏冕衣裳，在西学，则皆俊游也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278003_comment'></div>矧若尔仲壬、尔褒然，人所亟称者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278003_comment'></div>分以横经之席，从以满户之屦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278003_comment'></div>虽甚宠异，岂曰不宜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278003_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278003_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278004' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278004' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278004?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和州防御使殿前副指挥使郭杲除宜州观察使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278004")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278004_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278004'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278004'>敕：古者六军皆以卿将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278004_comment'></div>「元戎十乘，有玱葱珩」，二《雅》诵之，庸示光宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278004_comment'></div>矧我中权，可无异数？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278004_comment'></div>具官某鹰扬之勇，辐凑之谋，山西将家，今才一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278004_comment'></div>酬劳屯所，晋长周庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278004_comment'></div>训我群驺，壮我中垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278004_comment'></div>累岁于此，士听无哗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278004_comment'></div>日者贝胄三十，来阅庭内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278004_comment'></div>舍矢如破，可以即戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278004_comment'></div>朕图尔功，宜及懋赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278004_comment'></div>枚数勇爵，峻极廉车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278004_comment'></div>礼均从班，视古卿士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278004_comment'></div>是用命汝，盖周旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278004_comment'></div>光对明恩，益思忠报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278004_comment'></div>无使行狩，专美《车攻》；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278004_comment'></div>无使止居，遗恨《祈父》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278004_comment'></div>则予以怿，佥曰汝谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278004_comment'></div>可。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1278004'></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278004_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278005' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278005' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278005?labeling=true' target='_blank'>武略大夫侍卫步军都虞候兼权侍卫马军司职事阎仲特转右武大夫忠州刺史制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278005")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278005_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278005'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278005'>敕：日者，朕重冬狩之役，又不欲乏武事也，而为简之师，试诸廷内，于环列得帅焉，于步旅又得帅焉，皆可以即戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278005_comment'></div>朕甚嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278005_comment'></div>具官某久于行阵，积有战多，枚数壮士，莫与俦伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278005_comment'></div>解朐山之围，殿符离之返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278005_comment'></div>至今言之，令人矜奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278005_comment'></div>顷自遴选，涖我师徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278005_comment'></div>百夫千夫，各习其教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278005_comment'></div>往往营垒庐次之间，无嚣尘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278005_comment'></div>于是阅也，介胄坚好，旌麾光明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278005_comment'></div>坐作进退，动中尺度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278005_comment'></div>朕惟勇爵以横行为右阶之最，以刺郡为遥领之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278005_comment'></div>悉不汝吝，用赏懋功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278005_comment'></div>其对隆恩，益殚忠力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278005_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1278005_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278007' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278007' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278007?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝散大夫权刑部尚书京镗兼侍讲制<span class='inlineComment2'>（四年八月二十三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278007")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278007_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278007'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278007'>敕：朕与贤士大夫切磋经谊之日久矣，而今加意于《春秋》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278007_comment'></div>《春秋》固为夷夏作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278007_comment'></div>盖闻在汉，或申复雠之义，或庶几止戈之武，而皆有大功，号称七制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278007_comment'></div>断之经意，孰得孰失？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278007_comment'></div>朕将安所取此，而谁与茂明之也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278007_comment'></div>具官某简在法从，蔚为名臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278007_comment'></div>修聘北庭，非礼勿听；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278007_comment'></div>往釐西事，无言不酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278007_comment'></div>斯可谓据古而通今者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278007_comment'></div>进之路朝，重席以待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278007_comment'></div>其为朕深探遗经之指，与汉二君行事，以佐取舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278007_comment'></div>尔信不为章句学者，而朕顾不能尊所闻欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278007_comment'></div>往其懋哉，以副延伫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278007_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1278007_comment'></div></div></div><div showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278009?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请郎右正言黄艾兼侍讲制<span class='inlineComment2'>（八月二十三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278009")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278009_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278009'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278009'>敕具官某：谏臣，朕所甚嘉与也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278009_comment'></div>乃者封囊朝奏而夕不下，则言者辄不自得，岂朕意哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278009_comment'></div>劝讲阙员，有司来谂，庸命汝艾，切磋经术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278009_comment'></div>晋陪从班，无所降杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278009_comment'></div>岂惟以尔闻见博洽，宜在选中？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278009_comment'></div>亦使人人晓然知朕嘉与之意，则继此尽言不讳矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278009_comment'></div>尚殚厥心，以副延伫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278009_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278009_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278010' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278010' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278010?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湖南提刑孙逢吉奏邵州狱囚死者二十馀人守臣胡澄特展二年磨勘制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278010")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278010_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278010'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278010'>敕：昔在三朝，每岁盛夏，以一札赐郡长吏，为犴狱丁宁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278010_comment'></div>自长吏不奉此诏，而吾民瘐死者滋众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278010_comment'></div>尔其守邵，亦以狱囚多死见察于部使者，毋乃非朕寄元元之意乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278010_comment'></div>贬损年劳，以示薄罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278010_comment'></div>继此领州，无怠臬事。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278011?labeling=true' target='_blank'>文林郎邵州录事参军柴璿修职郎邵州司理参军李邠狱囚多死各特降一资制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278011")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278011_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278011'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278011'>敕具官某：尔为狱官而不省囚疾苦，至多瘐死，非所谓士师不能治士者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278011_comment'></div>其镌一阶，以警怠事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278011_comment'></div>可。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1278011'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1278011_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278012' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278012' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278012?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太尉定江军节度使兴州驻劄御前诸军都统制兼知兴州吴挺守本官致仕制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278012")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278012_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278012'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278012'>敕：图任世臣，尽护蜀将，貔貅十万，不从中覆，盖五六十年于此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278012_comment'></div>此意安在哉，而欲致其事耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278012_comment'></div>具官某性有忠勇之资，学有韬钤之素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278012_comment'></div>宽我西顾，贤于长城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278012_comment'></div>假以数年，庶底丕绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278012_comment'></div>而一旦以疾来谂，愿上大将军印绶，此朕所以屏奏不省也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278012_comment'></div>虽然，诵《诗》至于勤归劳还，咏叹辛苦，则古者遣将，数日即休，未有以独贤久劳若尔然者，朕岂得不动于心乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278012_comment'></div>姑徇忱辞，使自休养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278012_comment'></div>若属有疆埸之事，强为朕起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278012_comment'></div>何以报我？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278012_comment'></div>尔其勿忘！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278012_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278012_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278013' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278013' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278013?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故太尉定江军节度使兴州驻劄御前诸军都统制兼知兴州致仕吴挺特赠少保制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278013")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278013_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278013'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278013'>敕：朕诞膺圣绪，渴想贤劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278013_comment'></div>方分托重之权，尚阻劳还之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278013_comment'></div>眷惟三世，每兴西归溉釜之怀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278013_comment'></div>胡不百年，遽有东首拖绅之恨？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278013_comment'></div>可为震悼，何以追荣？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278013_comment'></div>具官某为今价藩，视古名将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278013_comment'></div>本之以鹰扬之勇，济之以辐辏之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278013_comment'></div>越在江源，而不忘宗海之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278013_comment'></div>既安蜀道，而常为得陇之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278013_comment'></div>是用倚以大事，付之全师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278013_comment'></div>永惟王室之中兴，皆有世臣而后济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278013_comment'></div>维周复古，则召公是似之功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278013_comment'></div>维汉御天，则耿氏独隆之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278013_comment'></div>期尔晏岁，对于昔人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278013_comment'></div>曾谂疾之亡何，而告哀之已至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278013_comment'></div>朕方深念，莫起于九原；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278013_comment'></div>国有常仪，率加之二等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278013_comment'></div>肆颁涣渥，以慰沉冥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278013_comment'></div>晋陪亚保之班，配食先王之庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278013_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278013_comment'></div>有以勇爵，至于联左棘之华；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278013_comment'></div>虽云悯章，足以示前茅之劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278013_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1278013_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278014' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278014' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278014?labeling=true' target='_blank'>持服前武功大夫祁州团练使吴曦特授濠州团练使起复制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278014")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278014_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278014'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278014'>敕具官某：有金革之事，则三年之丧无辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278014_comment'></div>自伯禽以来，未之有改，而况尔曦世为将乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278014_comment'></div>移孝为忠，朕所以强起汝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278014_comment'></div>又况蜀师十万，听命尔家，西陲晏然，于今五纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278014_comment'></div>方图前烈，宜及后人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278014_comment'></div>则脱尔于寄禄之阶，授尔以戎练之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278014_comment'></div>岂以为利？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278014_comment'></div>其毋固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278014_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278014_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278015' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278015' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278015?labeling=true' target='_blank'>提举江州太平兴国宫郭棣授利州观察使致仕制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278015")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278015_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278015'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278015'>敕：悯劳将帅，畀以真祠，尚复抗章，勇于忘禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278015_comment'></div>重违雅志，俾遂归休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278015_comment'></div>爰进崇阶，以劝廉退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278015_comment'></div>具官某奋自将种，卓有俊声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278015_comment'></div>荐更辕门，晋尹环列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278015_comment'></div>累岁于此，六军不哗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278015_comment'></div>方笃邦交，久无疆事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278015_comment'></div>斗士虽倍，战功不多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278015_comment'></div>然中权屹然，大敌知惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278015_comment'></div>繄卿之力，简在朕心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278015_comment'></div>所冀壮猷，不忘王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278015_comment'></div>胡为解组？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278015_comment'></div>遽此垂车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278015_comment'></div>岂非以行百里者，末路之难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278015_comment'></div>而三世功名，道家所忌乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278015_comment'></div>勉从忱请，良咈眷怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278015_comment'></div>尚服宠荣，益绥寿祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278015_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278015_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278016' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278016' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278016?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故利州观察使致仕郭棣特赠宁远军承宣使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278016")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278016_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278016'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278016'>敕：听垂车之请，亦既永叹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278016_comment'></div>闻易箦之言，可胜遐想？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278016_comment'></div>宜举恤典，以酬旧劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278016_comment'></div>具官某自束发之初，有裹尸之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278016_comment'></div>方其贾勇于宣威沙漠之间，竟尔收声当偃伯灵台之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278016_comment'></div>然而我有万乘，如周畿兵，我有千庐，如汉中垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278016_comment'></div>举以副托，究其设施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278016_comment'></div>历年弥长，课效为最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278016_comment'></div>往者，以厌直之请，践更于边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278016_comment'></div>虽分州符，亦以寄重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278016_comment'></div>反即祠馆，从其惮烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278016_comment'></div>曾鸣剑之未酬，何挂冠之已决？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278016_comment'></div>朕方有感德，非忘《杕杜》之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278016_comment'></div>今顾不然，乃是迫桑榆之景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278016_comment'></div>览此遗奏，为之衋伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278016_comment'></div>爰锡使名，视唐留务，以华身后，盖国旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278016_comment'></div>其尚钦承，用自宽慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278016_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278016_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278017' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278017' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278017?labeling=true' target='_blank'>耶律适哩致仕制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278017")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278017_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278017'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278017'>敕：有能厌毡毳之习，蹈不测来归我，可谓壮士矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278017_comment'></div>胡为谂疾，欲自便乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278017_comment'></div>具官某耻事朔庭，义不携汉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278017_comment'></div>观光中国，誓将灭胡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278017_comment'></div>盖寿皇之所宠嘉，而朕待之勿替者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278017_comment'></div>夫鸣剑之志未酬，而挂冠之请已决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278017_comment'></div>岂其以两国方欢，贾勇不售，将退处以自娱暇乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278017_comment'></div>抑膂力既愆，自视非昔人，而不复感概然也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278017_comment'></div>不然，果疾病耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278017_comment'></div>重违忱请，听致尔事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278017_comment'></div>若以疾辞，则岂庸释？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278017_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278017_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278018' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278018' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278018?labeling=true' target='_blank'>耶律适哩赠官制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278018")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278018_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278018'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278018'>敕：挂冠有请，良恻余衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278018_comment'></div>华圹有恩，盖绥尔后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278018_comment'></div>具官某以幽燕任侠之气，怀江汉朝宗之心，万里来归，甚欲宣威于沙漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278018_comment'></div>而两君为好，适当偃伯于灵台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278018_comment'></div>竟尔收声，至于赍恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278018_comment'></div>盖闻华夷之分，《春秋》所严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278018_comment'></div>有能择衣冠于介鳞之间，而顾执干戈于社稷之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278018_comment'></div>眷此壮志，令人永怀！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278018_comment'></div>爰疏锡命之封，庸示饰终之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278018_comment'></div>尚歆殊渥，以妥英魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278018_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278018_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278019' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278019' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278019?labeling=true' target='_blank'>正议大夫充显谟阁待制提举江州太平兴国宫陈岘磨勘转正奉大夫制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278019")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278019_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278019'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278019'>敕：夫循次非所以待劳能也，计年非所以处法从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278019_comment'></div>而有司以告，重违旧章，宜有命书，且见明陟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278019_comment'></div>具官某以名臣之子，自托于儒生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278019_comment'></div>以夕郎之官，践更于州组。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278019_comment'></div>奉祠累岁，益见靖共。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278019_comment'></div>序进一官，曾非特典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278019_comment'></div>朕不敢废，姑慰永怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278019_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278019_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278020' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278020' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278020?labeling=true' target='_blank'>合州赤山县多山至道观冲妙真人祈祷感应加封冲妙灵应真人制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278020")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278020_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278020'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278020'>敕具某神：朕虽不令祠官祝釐，专乡独美，至四方长吏有为吾民请曰：「某山川之神，能惠其一方」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278020_comment'></div>则褒崇之典，朕靡爱焉，以庶几古蜡百神之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278020_comment'></div>今蜀部使者来言，尔神惠及阖境，求之掌故，则建炎之所表章也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278020_comment'></div>爰锡命书，申衍称号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278020_comment'></div>所以宠嘉神贶，以从民欲者何如哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278020_comment'></div>尚终惠之，俾世世享。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278020_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1278020_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278021' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278021' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278021?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潼川府中江县灵威庙善利侯祈祷感应加封善利敷济侯制</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278021'>敕具某神：朕虽不令祠官祝釐，专乡独美，至四方长吏有为吾民请曰：「某山川之神，能惠其一方」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278021_comment'></div>则褒崇之典，朕靡爱焉，以庶几古蜡百神之义。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1278021_comment'></div>爰锡命书，申衍称号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278021_comment'></div>所以宠嘉神贶，以从民欲者何如哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_1278022' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278022' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278022?labeling=true' target='_blank'>盱眙军通判□□□□降一官制</a><span id='poem_sentence_1_1278022_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1278022_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278023' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278023' class='poemTitle
