class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278042_comment'></div>免官镌秩，是不谓之宽典乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278042_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1278042_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278043' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278043' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278043?labeling=true' target='_blank'>文林郎婺州浦江县丞赵大亨不遵依提刑司差委推勘公事辄申任满离任降一官制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278043")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278043_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278043'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278043'>敕具官某：士而不事事，是欲素餐也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278043_comment'></div>尔方丞县，而再却宪臣之檄，以自择便，岂非不事事欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278043_comment'></div>按章来上，姑镌一秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278043_comment'></div>继今知惧，斯可从政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278043_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278043_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278044' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278044' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278044?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知万州季圭奏修职郎万州司理参军向绍祖狱囚系死降一资放罢制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278044")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278044_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278044'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278044'>敕具官某：尔为狱官，而不省囚疾苦，至于堕指，至于死而不以告，岂非所谓「士师不能治士」者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278044_comment'></div>其镌一阶，以警怠事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278044_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1278044_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278045' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278045' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278045?labeling=true' target='_blank'>慈福太皇太后册宝书册文官中大夫知枢密院事赵汝愚转太中大夫制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278045")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278045_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278045'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278045'>敕：十有一月癸未日南至，朕帅中宫，从以妇子，朝于重华，获陪亲尊，上显号于王母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278045_comment'></div>永惟一朝四世非常之休，则亦二三股肱克相孝治，以辑威仪，可无茂恩，昭示褒律？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278045_comment'></div>具官赵汝愚任重而道远，经明而行修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278045_comment'></div>瞻言累朝，笃叙同姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278045_comment'></div>然自熙宁以进士对策，而卿始以谠议冠群英；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278045_comment'></div>自治平以儒臣本兵，而卿始以雅望位三事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278045_comment'></div>卓尔大雅，百年而复见之，朕甚嘉焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278045_comment'></div>属兹成礼，盍图尔功？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278045_comment'></div>维昔太任，仪刑姜姒，功在「十乱」，德在《二南》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278045_comment'></div>于是周公推本圣子，作《思齐》之诗以歌之，而仲尼定为六艺，传信万世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278045_comment'></div>朕今逮事过于成王，繄卿特书，曾不在周公之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278045_comment'></div>酬劳进秩，实应经谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278045_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278045_comment'></div>继自今卿其家人，陪朕岁上万年之觞，顾不伟欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278045_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1278045_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278046' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278046' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278046?labeling=true' target='_blank'>篆宝文官通议大夫参知政事陈骙转通奉大夫制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278046")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278046_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278046'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278046'>敕：乃者具法驾，以日南至，朝慈福宫，寿皇拜乎前，寿母拜乎后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278046_comment'></div>朕帅中宫，从以妇子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278046_comment'></div>搢圭稽首，奉上宝章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278046_comment'></div>亦惟辅臣克相钜典，可无褒律，以示同休？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278046_comment'></div>具官某直内而方外，博文而约礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278046_comment'></div>及见故老，在绍兴文献之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278046_comment'></div>蔚为儒宗，极重华侍从之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278046_comment'></div>眷言旧学，简在初潜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278046_comment'></div>所谓独抱遗经，能断大事者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278046_comment'></div>晋预机政，益行所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278046_comment'></div>俾予孝治，度越千古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278046_comment'></div>盖周颂太任，而不及子孙逮事之荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278046_comment'></div>汉尊长乐，而不备父母俱存之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278046_comment'></div>洪惟我家一朝四世，自有载籍，未之前闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278046_comment'></div>繄卿特书，尽善具美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278046_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278046_comment'></div>朕式克至于今日休，岂惟两宫，将高庙亦宠嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278046_comment'></div>序进一官，匪以为报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278046_comment'></div>可。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1278046'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1278046_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278047' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278047' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278047?labeling=true' target='_blank'>前导礼仪使并奏礼毕通议大夫同知枢密院事余端礼转通奉大夫制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278047")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278047_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278047'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278047'>敕：日奉宝册，上之慈福也，乘舆所过，观者万人夹道，率皆归美于朕躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278047_comment'></div>朕岂敢专也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278047_comment'></div>则亦有宅心知训之臣，克辑盛事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278047_comment'></div>可无褒宠，用以示劝？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278047_comment'></div>具官某直谅而多闻，明哲而匪懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278047_comment'></div>盖退然如不胜衣，而道任天下之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278047_comment'></div>谦谦鞠躬，而勇过孟、贲矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278047_comment'></div>从游潜邸，陈谊最高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278047_comment'></div>晋翊鸿枢，临机必断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278047_comment'></div>朕嘉赖焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278047_comment'></div>乃者导予，有仪可象，肆于竣事，盍图尔功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278047_comment'></div>朕诵《思齐》之诗，推尊文王，本之太任，于是盖四世矣，而周公始作大雅，考引功德，以昭前人，未必逮事王母，亲周旋揖逊乎其间也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278047_comment'></div>以今况古，孰与朕休？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278047_comment'></div>如卿遭时，亦曰鲜俪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278047_comment'></div>继自今卿其以予万亿年对天之休，将书劳进秩，不一而足焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278047_comment'></div>尚其懋哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278047_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1278047_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278048' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278048' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278048?labeling=true' target='_blank'>兵部尚书罗点母太淑人缪氏遇庆典恩特封齐安郡太夫人制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278048")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278048_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278048'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278048'>敕：朕观鲁诗颂僖公之有道，及其寿母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278048_comment'></div>于以知吾卿大夫之贤，其母氏不可以无报礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278048_comment'></div>具官某母具位缪氏，克相君子，种德云迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278048_comment'></div>是生贤嗣，为邦司直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278048_comment'></div>以点之议论风操，过鲁侯远甚，则尔母视鲁夫人贤何如也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278048_comment'></div>义不贰其夫，而善祥集于晚年；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278048_comment'></div>教行于子，而淑誉闻于斯世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278048_comment'></div>肆朕嘉与，荐锡赞书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278048_comment'></div>秩以小君，疏封名郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278048_comment'></div>抑与鲁人请命于周，而后作颂者异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278048_comment'></div>尚服宠光，以绥寿祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278048_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278048_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278049' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278049' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278049?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中书舍人楼钥母太硕人汪氏遇庆典恩特封太淑人制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278049")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278049_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278049'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278049'>敕：朕观鲁诗颂僖公之有道，及其寿母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278049_comment'></div>于以知吾卿大夫之贤，其母氏不可以无报礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278049_comment'></div>具官某母具位汪氏，克相君子，为名大夫，是生贤嗣，世济其美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278049_comment'></div>以钥之议论风操，过鲁侯远甚，则尔母视鲁夫人贤何如也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278049_comment'></div>爵虽从其夫，而善祥集于晚年；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278049_comment'></div>教行于子，而令誉闻于斯世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278049_comment'></div>逮兹邦庆，荐锡赞书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278049_comment'></div>抑与鲁人请命于周，而后作颂者异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278049_comment'></div>尚服宠光，以绥寿祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278049_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1278049_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278051' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278051' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278051?labeling=true' target='_blank'>安定郡王子涛遇庆典恩转官制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278051")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278051_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278051'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278051'>敕：维建隆磐石之宗，泽流后裔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278051_comment'></div>维慈福奉觞之庆，燕及高年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278051_comment'></div>兼二者以有言，进一官而何吝？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278051_comment'></div>具官某为今属籍，视古典刑，以孝恭友兄弟，如周君陈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278051_comment'></div>以谨重率宗室，如汉刘德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278051_comment'></div>至于试吏，允也过人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278051_comment'></div>信抱负之不群，况行藏之无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278051_comment'></div>比观掌故，谁其逮事于四朝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278051_comment'></div>强起袭封，兹谓慭遗之一老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278051_comment'></div>可以华国，岂惟奉祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278051_comment'></div>方钦想于达尊，宜亟蒙于殊渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278051_comment'></div>假如老老，亡元日之诏书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278051_comment'></div>祗以亲亲，亦盛时之恩意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278051_comment'></div>明扬进律，晋陟承流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278051_comment'></div>其茂对于宠光，用永绥于眉寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278051_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1278051_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278052' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278052' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278052?labeling=true' target='_blank'>慈福太皇太后侄淮东总领吴珽特转一官制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278052")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278052_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278052'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278052'>敕具官某：朕尝从上皇后恭上慈福之册，亲聆慈训，勉之以学，至今心不敢忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278052_comment'></div>而施恩外家，久不予决，甚失朕意，爰趣有司上之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278052_comment'></div>而尔某方饟淮师，序进一秩，以称太后训朕之意，则尔亦宜自好修，以成《思齐》太任之美矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278052_comment'></div>可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278052_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1278052'>吴璹<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>吴瑊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>吴璿、吴琯、吴锜<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>吴钧、吴镗、吴铸<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑷</sup>吴铨等一十二人<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑸</sup>燕棨等九人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278052_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278052'><span class='label'>按：</span>各以姻联，进官一秩。<br /><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278052_0'>⑴ 方令奉常，序进。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278052_1'>⑵ 方分郡符，序进一秩。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278052_4'>⑶ 寓直延阁，序进一秩。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278052_7'>⑷ 方为属外台，序进一秩。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278052_8'>⑸ 序进一阶，浸即膴仕。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1278052_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1278053' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278053' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278053?labeling=true' target='_blank'>迪功郎前金州司户青阳炳文年九十一遇庆典恩特封承务郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278053")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278053_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278053'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278053'>敕具官某：在《易》之《晋》：「受兹介福，于其王母」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278053_comment'></div>而朕身亲见之，岂不盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278053_comment'></div>馀庆溥将，燕及人老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278053_comment'></div>俾尔晏岁，齿于初官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278053_comment'></div>尚服宠荣，益绥寿嘏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278053_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1278053_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278054' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278054' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278054?labeling=true' target='_blank'>儒林郎御史台副引赞官贾忱应奉上尊号册宝了毕转承直郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278054")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278054_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278054'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278054'>敕具官某：典礼行于上而泽下逮，盖广爱之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278054_comment'></div>尔适幸会，亦与进秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278054_comment'></div>尚务肃给，毋愆于仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278054_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1278054_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278056' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278056' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278056?labeling=true' target='_blank'>武德大夫带御器械干办皇城司陈守忠系重华宫淑妃陈氏亲父久在殿陛特与带行遥郡刺史制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278056")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278056_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278056'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278056'>敕具官某：于重华为掖庭之亲，于广内为属鞬之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278056_comment'></div>矧惟肃给，济以靖共，出入两宫而无违，周旋四姓而不竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278056_comment'></div>爰酬劳于岁籥，俾借重于州麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278056_comment'></div>以欢庭帏，以壮轩陛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278056_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278056_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278055' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278055' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278055?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝散大夫军器少监兼实录院检讨官兼权考功郎官黄由除将作监兼嘉王府直讲制<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月二十日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278055")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278055_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278055'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278055'>敕具官某：朕有元子，爱之固深，而教之惟恐不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278055_comment'></div>一时宾僚儒学之选，尔以魁伦之彦，久仪群玉之府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278055_comment'></div>侃侃正色，抗论不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278055_comment'></div>自少匠而为长，盖亦宠矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278055_comment'></div>技巧精能，非所以望汝也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278055_comment'></div>横经朱邸，使吾儿有直谅多闻之益，是惟休哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278055_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1278055_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　权中书舍人任上，作奏状札子。作品：缴奏内侍张安仁转官状。乞补外申省状。内引札子。论史官札子。缴奏陈源除入内内侍省押班状。缴奏白身彭焘补官状。缴奏閤门承受赵铨乞将转官回授封赠状。缴奏张子仁除节度使状二首。<div id='poem_1278323' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278323' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278323?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏内侍张安仁转官状<span class='inlineComment2'>（三月十三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278323")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278323_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278323'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278323'>准中书门下省送到录黄一道，枢密院关：「二月三十日奉圣旨，已降指挥，张安仁该进呈安奉《至尊寿皇圣帝圣政》、《会要》了毕，两局推恩，得转一官，并昨该解带合转一官，未曾收使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278323_comment'></div>今来为系入内内侍省副都知，可将上件两官特与依黄迈昨任省官日例，于阶官上转行一官」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278323_comment'></div>令臣书行，须至奏闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278323_comment'></div>右，臣窃详祖宗以来，文武官磨勘立为止法，二百馀年守之旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278323_comment'></div>至武功大夫不可转横行，则尤为严密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278323_comment'></div>前后臣僚论奏非一，臣不复悉数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278323_comment'></div>今来张安仁指挥，用安奉《寿皇圣政》、《会要》推恩得转一官，并昨该解带合转一官，将上件两官与阶官上转行一官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278323_comment'></div>若遂转行，即径入横行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278323_comment'></div>盖其陈乞之词，以为两官转一官不为踰越，而陛下俯从其请，亦以为两官而转一官不为侥倖云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278323_comment'></div>检准隆兴元年四月二十四日敕，诸军立功将士转官碍止法人，缘经战阵，与杂功轻重不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278323_comment'></div>若令一例回授，无以激劝，于是始立武功大夫三官转行横行一官之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278323_comment'></div>恭惟寿皇爱惜名器，独不吝于战功，岂不欲径许转行横行，以厉斗士？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278323_comment'></div>而诏书谆谆，特示优异，必累三官方转一官，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278323_comment'></div>诚以二百馀年遵守止法，而一旦创为异恩，不但回授，亦必以战功三官方得转行，则上不废祖宗之制，而下可以劝将士之心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278323_comment'></div>今也安仁乃欲以进书、解带两官比之战功，又少一官而转横行，岂不破累朝之成宪，紊隆兴之新法，启庸人之觊心，沮壮士之斗志乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278323_comment'></div>且今来指挥引用绍熙元年七月十八日黄迈事例，臣窃谓黄迈事例已是失错，自合改正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278323_comment'></div>若已曾经施行，便为永制，则臣所未之闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278323_comment'></div>窃见绍熙元年张国珍以武功大夫任统制官及十年，有旨许用赵圭例转遥郡，臣寮论之，竟寝前命，即不以赵圭为例放过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278323_comment'></div>此不以例废法，陛下之所已行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278323_comment'></div>又郑大亨以武功大夫干办御药院，职事修举，有旨许用王公昌例转遥郡，臣寮论之，亦寝前命，即不以王公昌为例放过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278323_comment'></div>此不以例废法，又陛下之所已行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278323_comment'></div>仰见圣心本无适莫，何独此等却但因循？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278323_comment'></div>此臣所以敢为陛下言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278323_comment'></div>臣愚欲望睿慈将上件指挥特赐寝罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278323_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278323_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1278323'></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1278323_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278387' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278387' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278387?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞补外申省状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278387")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278387_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278387'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278387'>某一介疏远，素无荣望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278387_comment'></div>不谓叠冒恩渥，备员右史，兼职西掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278387_comment'></div>书生所愿，不过及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278387_comment'></div>极欲勉强庸驽，少效尺寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278387_comment'></div>伏念某将指湖湘，尝得心脾之疾，痛不可忍，至于失汗，大肉消陷，几死者再矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278387_comment'></div>每念此疾唯不复作，作且即死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278387_comment'></div>忽自今春，日痛一日，心甚惧之，服食俱废，不惟职司弛慢难安，亦恐朝谒僵仆非便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278387_comment'></div>欲望朝廷特为敷奏，与在外待阙合入差遣一次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278387_comment'></div>或检会前请，与之祠禄，以便医理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278387_comment'></div>倘未朝露，当有归班图报之日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1278387_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278328' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278328' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278328?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论史官劄子<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙五年十一月二十八日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278328")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278328_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278328'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278328'>臣尝具奏，窃见唐大顺二年二月敕吏部侍郎柳玭等修宣宗、懿宗、僖宗实录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278328_comment'></div>始，丞相、监修国史杜逊能以三朝实录未修，乃奏吏部侍郎柳玭、右补阙裴廷裕、左拾遗孙泰、驾部员外郎李彻、太常博士郑光庭等十五人修之，踰年竟不能编一字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278328_comment'></div>臣以此知史事至重，不宜以他官兼领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278328_comment'></div>今史院检讨皆是兼局，更出迭入，有同传舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278328_comment'></div>至修撰，亦以从臣兼之，往往多近上眷渥之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278328_comment'></div>率不淹久，去掌机政，大槩一年之间，方议立条例，均分卷帙，而出院多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278328_comment'></div>则一朝钜典，无由就绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278328_comment'></div>事大体重，岂容空过岁月？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278328_comment'></div>提领大臣须至取旨，立限奏篇，臣恐未免逐急率课，取具临时，草草逃责，而无以发明盛德大业，传信万世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278328_comment'></div>要亦非秉笔者稽故之罪，而其势必至此者，无专官故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278328_comment'></div>近年李焘、洪迈，以待制相继修史，不领他事，而后《四朝国史》方及成书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278328_comment'></div>以臣愚见，两制臣僚位望已贵，若委以史事，见谓冷局，不过一二年间，朝廷须更迁除，虽曰专官，未必久任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278328_comment'></div>今职名中有秘阁修撰、右文殿修撰，并旧有史馆校勘等，正是三馆修书官名目，自郎察卿监补外之人，皆得除授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278328_comment'></div>若将此二三职名置为史官，以二年为任，自史馆校勘之类供职，稍迁秘阁修撰，又稍迁右文殿修撰，在院少亦已五七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278328_comment'></div>俟有劳迹，虽就迁次对如李焘、洪迈，兼领可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278328_comment'></div>则是史官与郎察卿监可以驯至从班，事体略同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278328_comment'></div>有专官之效，无冷局之嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278328_comment'></div>庶几大典责成有人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278328_comment'></div>况在祖宗朝，虽谏议大夫以上，皆带出为寄禄官，而以供职谏院者为谏官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278328_comment'></div>则今以修撰为贴职，而以供职史院者为史官，盖旧章也，有何不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278328_comment'></div>臣愚不自度，妄论史事，唯陛下裁幸。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1278328_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278329' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278329' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278329?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏陈源除入内内侍省押班状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278329")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278329_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278329'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278329'>臣去国日久，初不详陈源得罪之由，及考之有司，见得尝投寘远外，没入家产，一时同恶相济之人，如徐彦达、李庚辈，亦各编管估籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278329_comment'></div>及许逐便以来，间有恩命，则给舍臣寮节次论奏，然后知陈源得罪于高宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278329_comment'></div>盖服用或儗于乘舆，声色不下于宫禁，禁路钤正使实供厮役，所谓小人之无君上者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278329_comment'></div>故自寿皇及陛下初政至于今日，凡群臣有言，悉蒙开纳，前后施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278329_comment'></div>已降指挥，有司所共遵守也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278329_comment'></div>今者押班之除，后省封还，迫于天威，黾勉书读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278329_comment'></div>而臣适暂摄西掖，若亦书行，便当命词臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278329_comment'></div>不知若陈源者，将何以为之词也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278329_comment'></div>若采群臣前日之言因为之词，则是暴其罪状于天下，适以彰圣明擢用之失；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278329_comment'></div>若但揣陛下今日之意别为之词，是以寿皇及初政以来施行群臣之言所降指挥驳而不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278329_comment'></div>即为此词，将进退或戾于君父矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278329_comment'></div>臣必不敢奉诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278329_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈少霁威严，追寝除目，勿以蝼蚁之微敢遏风雷之命而加之罪，则臣之幸也，圣时之盛事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278329_comment'></div>臣不胜拳拳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278329_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278329_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1278329_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278329'><span class='label'>按：</span>七月二十五日，谢深甫为给事中，已书枢密院劄子去讫，奏入不报。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278329_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1278330' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278330' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278330?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏白身彭焘补官状<span class='inlineComment2'>（八月八日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278330")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278330_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278330'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278330'>准中书门下送到录黄，奉圣旨，御前书写文字、白身彭焘上等实及一十年，依已降指挥与补承信郎，令臣书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278330_comment'></div>右，臣伏睹今年五月四日枢密院劄付臣寮上言，枢密院送到录黄一道，为御前书写文字薛淙补官，臣茫然不知所从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278330_comment'></div>欲乞行下薛淙所属官司，取见入役年月据实保明，委及十年，方与取旨补官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278330_comment'></div>则臣有凭据乃敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278330_comment'></div>伏候敕旨：「睿思殿库供到『本库契勘薛淙于淳熙十年正月十一日差充御前上等书写文字，睿思殿库掌管官物，祗应至今，实及十年已上，即无在假不在司月日，保明是实申闻』事，五月四日奉圣旨依已降指挥与书行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278330_comment'></div>其薛淙已书行补授去讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278330_comment'></div>今来彭焘即未见得本人应得上项指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278330_comment'></div>臣愚欲乞检照五月四日圣旨指挥，行下所属保明施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278330_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278330_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1278330_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278331' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278331' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278331?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏閤门承受赵铨乞将转官回授封赠状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278331")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278331_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278331'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278331'>准中书门下省送到录黄一道，为成忠郎、閤门承受赵铨用因该人使到阙应奉及一十番得转一官公据，乞将回授封赠父母，令臣撰词给告，须至奏闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278331_comment'></div>右，臣据吏部供到状：「契勘赵铨见系閤门承受，所授成忠郎，系该遇皇帝登宝位，引用绍兴三十二年指挥预行补授成忠郎，其馀应于合得转官恩例酬资，即无许收使条法指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278331_comment'></div>又据司封供到状：『检准淳熙六年九月十一日臣寮上言，三省同奉圣旨：今后封赠，并依司封见行条法施行』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278331_comment'></div>本部除有曲全礼、钟阐已放行回授封赠父母体例外，自淳熙六年已降指挥之后，别无命官带吏职放行封赠体例」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278331_comment'></div>臣愚欲望睿慈将赵铨所乞回授封赠指挥特赐追寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278331_comment'></div>所有告词，臣未敢撰行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278331_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1278331_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278332' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278332' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278332?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏张子仁除节度使状<span class='inlineComment2'>（八月十一日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278332")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278332_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278332'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278332'>臣恭睹数日以来一二明诏，讲庆寿之礼，足以欢两宫之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278332_comment'></div>除鬻田之令，足以快四海之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278332_comment'></div>中外小大之臣，莫不手额欣抃，延颈以企，曰近者二三大臣进退哀荣之典，久未予决，意者自今圣心豁然，如天开霁，必次第处分矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278332_comment'></div>忽奉宸旨，张子仁除节度使，果有以见九重燕閒，未尝不轸怀勋旧而及其后人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278332_comment'></div>诚举斯心而加诸大臣，则一指挥之顷耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278332_comment'></div>然而人之关系有重轻，则事之施行有先后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278332_comment'></div>今二三大臣进退哀荣之典，宰执台谏屡尝奏请，方留未下，而遽加恩于勋臣之子，则是轻重不伦，先后失序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278332_comment'></div>臣窃未晓，不敢不为陛下条陈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278332_comment'></div>且夫留正辅相初政，于今四年，言听志行，曾未有君臣之间，而仓卒不审，便出脩门，揆之经义，未为中节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278332_comment'></div>然而待放郊外，屏居山樊，省咎陈情，亦既累月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278332_comment'></div>陛下诚怒之欤，则策免旧章，皆可覆视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278332_comment'></div>诚不欲其亟去欤，则或以少保归班，但解机政，或以内祠领使，间奉朝谒，则为正者，进退唯命，夫复何辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278332_comment'></div>若犹鞅鞅觖望，禀命不虔，则持宪臣寮，岂容但已？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278332_comment'></div>然则今置正弗问，而遽加恩于子仁，独何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278332_comment'></div>恩足以及勋臣之后，而念不至上相，此臣之所未晓者一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278332_comment'></div>非特此也，赵雄以抱痾不痊，均佚乡郡，陛下强起之以帅江西，雄之逊牍亦一再上，而重违天威，当暑出峡，竟以旧恙卒于官下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278332_comment'></div>万里旅衬，道路恻然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278332_comment'></div>虽雄勋业不敢望过厚之礼，而有司常度安用损益，何为恤典迟迟至今？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278332_comment'></div>至如尤袤，三朝老儒，而陛下之潜邸僚友也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278332_comment'></div>最蒙睿简，行且大用，而其致仕遗表之章，亦数月未报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278332_comment'></div>然则今置雄等弗问，而遽加恩于子仁，又何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278332_comment'></div>恩足以及勋臣之后，而念不至故老，此臣之所未晓者二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278332_comment'></div>非特此也，关陕对垒，今六十年，国家以十万貔貅，付之吴氏，父子三世，全蜀晏然，不烦西顾者，吴挺之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278332_comment'></div>陛下方将召见阙庭，行《采微》、《杕杜》之礼，曾未及讲，挺复致仕故，尤以为传闻失实，屏申奏而不信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278332_comment'></div>岂非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1278332", 1278332, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>托重</span>于挺，爱之欲其生乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278332_comment'></div>陛下之意则厚矣，而非其事情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278332_comment'></div>以挺之威望，敌国之所窥觎，则择代不可以不谨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278332_comment'></div>以挺之恩信，士卒之所怀感，则恤终不可以不至；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278332_comment'></div>以挺之事权，海内偏重，则一旦而收之，又不可以不深加思虑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278332_comment'></div>方今急务，未有过此，然则今置挺弗问，而遽加恩于子仁，抑又何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278332_comment'></div>恩足以及勋臣之后，而念不至大将，此臣之所未晓者三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278332_comment'></div>虽然，臣所云云，特谓轻重不伦，先后失序，物论沸腾，因事而进言耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278332_comment'></div>若夫张子仁者，介在闲散，人不称数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278332_comment'></div>虽少长将家，而无横草之劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278332_comment'></div>虽久缀班行，而无涓埃之补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278332_comment'></div>不知何故，得此殊渥？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278332_comment'></div>且夫开府建旄，非叙迁之官也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278332_comment'></div>告廷孚号，非私昵之赏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278332_comment'></div>无故而取之，则交结之谤，在子仁适足以祸己；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278332_comment'></div>无故而予之，则非汎之恩，在圣朝不足以劝人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278332_comment'></div>况张子仁尝使令姚德打死命官欧阳安中，又有外宅婢阿关用炮烙刀刃之刑虐害阿郑等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278332_comment'></div>盖尝经法寺定断，台官觉察矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278332_comment'></div>又皆以议功，仅从追夺，即其怙势奸法，见于奴婢，罪状明白，不当除授，大略如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278332_comment'></div>其他妨碍，臣未暇数以烦天听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278332_comment'></div>臣不胜拳拳，欲望圣慈下采公论，将张子仁无故恩数速赐罢寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1278332_comment'></div>于以光华主德，尊重名器，而亟因群情，举行体貌大臣之礼，则社稷之福也，搢绅之愿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1278332_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1278332_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1278332_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278333' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278333' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278333?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏张子仁除节度使第二状<span class='inlineComment2'>（八月十三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278333")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278333_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278333'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278333'>今月十二日恭奉御笔，付下臣昨奏缴张子仁除节度使事，奉御笔：「为系勋臣之子，特除节度使，可与书行」，须至再有奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278333_comment'></div>右，臣昨不揆愚贱，尝缴奏张子仁除节度使事，退惟蝼蚁辄抗雷霆，言虽当理，死有馀罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278333_comment'></div>今者恭奉御笔，令臣书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278333_comment'></div>仰惟圣度如天，曲赐容忍，而又亲洒宸翰，明示风旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278333_comment'></div>顾臣何人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278333_comment'></div>尚敢违忤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278333_comment'></div>虽然，臣闻脩当行之政者，足以慰傒望之情；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278333_comment'></div>施无故之恩者，足以来谤讟之口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278333_comment'></div>臣前所奏，固知子仁之为勋臣子也，但方群情嗷嗷，延颈累月，皆以留正待放，而罢命未闻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278333_comment'></div>赵雄告终，而恤典不及；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278333_comment'></div>凛然西陲，拥兵十万，吴挺物故，阙无主者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278333_comment'></div>当此时也，而授钺于闲散庸缪之臣，宜先者反后，宜缓者加急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278333_comment'></div>则是舍当行之政，而推无故之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278333_comment'></div>臣恐傒望者惶惑，而谤讟至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278333_comment'></div>此所以深为圣明惜此事体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278333_comment'></div>且夫报答旧劳，孰与辅初政者之为亲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278333_comment'></div>矜怜后裔，孰与专帅阃者之为重？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278333_comment'></div>此事理晓然，岂唯群臣？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278333_comment'></div>虽子仁固知之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278333_comment'></div>使子仁稍有念虑，则亦于此恩数跼蹐不安矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278333_comment'></div>臣是以不敢隐嘿，须至再三，庶几熙朝不以无故之恩而先当行之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278333_comment'></div>恭惟陛下聪明仁厚，远继三五，傥蒙少霁威严，下采狂瞽，而今而后，天意豁然；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278333_comment'></div>万几之间，群疑冰释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278333_comment'></div>事关廊庙，则立见施行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278333_comment'></div>忧在疆埸，则便须处置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278333_comment'></div>上以承两宫之志，下以尽百辟之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278333_comment'></div>人无后言，事无后患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278333_comment'></div>如是则国家尊荣，朝野忻豫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278333_comment'></div>虽勋旧子孙，凭藉宠灵，穷极富贵，亦物议之所不及矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278333_comment'></div>至如张子仁，有罪无功，自是不当有此除授，则臣不暇论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278333_comment'></div>所有元御封付下臣奏状一件，连粘在前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278333_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1278333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278333'><span class='label'>按：</span>八月十三日奏入，留中。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278333_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年9月</a>　引裾力谏光宗过重华宫。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年9月</a>　权中书舍人任上，作奏状札子。作品：缴奏傅昌朝转官状。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年秋</a>　上嘉王札子。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　奏状札子。作品：直前札子。直前札子。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　上奏状乞外任。作品：乞补外状。<div id='poem_1278336' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278336' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278336?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞补外状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278336")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278336_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278336'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278336'>臣昨不度疏贱，妄有建白，今月十六日，伏准尚书省聚厅宣谕，令臣不得说出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278336_comment'></div>伏念臣只是建议，若行不行，自在陛下，则臣决自不敢传布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278336_comment'></div>但缘当来曾蒙圣训，令臣传旨与宰执大臣，则知者已非一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278336_comment'></div>若万一有人说出，忽达天听，即臣当坐漏泄之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278336_comment'></div>臣于此时，无以自明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278336_comment'></div>臣不胜惶惧，投诚君父，欲乞圣慈与臣在外差遣或祠禄一次，稍俟日久，孤踪明白，别赐收用，实臣至愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278336_comment'></div>除已具劄子经朝廷陈乞外，谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278336_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1278336'>〔贴黄〕所是臣经朝廷陈乞劄子，只如寻□□□补外体式，更不说及此意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278336_comment'></div>伏乞睿照。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278336_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年10月</a>　中书舍人任上所作奏状札子。作品：缴奏南班多庆转官状。<div id='poem_1278338' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278338' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278338?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏南班多庆转官状<span class='inlineComment2'>（十月二十一日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278338")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278338_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278338'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278338'>准中书门下省送到录黄一道节文，三省同奉圣旨，多庆特与转行一官，令臣书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278338_comment'></div>右，臣照得在法，南班磨勘实及十年，方许转行一官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278338_comment'></div>其多庆所乞，系□多方淳熙七年体例，止及八年，欲转行一官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278338_comment'></div>检照得绍熙二年正月二十一日指挥：「臣僚奏陈，其有法者止当从法，不得更引非法之例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278338_comment'></div>令御史台觉察，必罚无赦」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278338_comment'></div>自后有司常切遵守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278338_comment'></div>今来多庆转官，正碍前项指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278338_comment'></div>自降前项指挥以后，即无援例陈乞放行事例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278338_comment'></div>假如放行，即御史台必须觉察闻奏，适为多庆之累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278338_comment'></div>臣欲望圣慈将上件已降指挥特赐收寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278338_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278338_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278338_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　权中书舍人所拟制诰。作品：朝散郎守司农少卿詹体仁除太常少卿。朝散大夫尚书户部员外郎赵谧除军器监兼权户部郎中。<div id='poem_1278026' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278026' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278026?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝散郎守司农少卿詹体仁除太常少卿制<span class='inlineComment2'>（十月三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278026")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278026_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278026'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278026'>敕具官某：奉常惟礼乐是司，而去古浸远，放逸尚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278026_comment'></div>非得博物洽闻、学有根据者，未易轻畀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278026_comment'></div>尔少明经术，务为有用，探赜索隐，耻一物之不知，总饷之久，盖已由郎省而贰大农矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278026_comment'></div>召对雍容，效忠无隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278026_comment'></div>其为朕典礼乐之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278026_comment'></div>钟鼓玉帛，抑末也，尚求其本，而釐正之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278026_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1278026_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278027' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278027' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278027?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝散大夫尚书户部员外郎赵谧除军器监兼权兵部郎中制<span class='inlineComment2'>（十一月十八日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278027")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278027_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278027'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278027'>敕具官某：戎监之设，本以严饬武备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278027_comment'></div>而休兵岁久，缮修之职各有司存，长贰亦惟揔其凡而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278027_comment'></div>以尔旧弼之孙，克自抑畏，久在郎省，能寡悔尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278027_comment'></div>序进为长，仍摄民曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278027_comment'></div>往其祗钦，无替于旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278027_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1278027_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年11月</a>　为光宗朝重华宫作诗。作品：癸丑冬车驾过宫留相还朝。<div id='poem_161729' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161729' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161729?labeling=true' target='_blank'>癸丑冬车驾过宫留相还朝</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161729")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161729_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161729'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161729'>一声警跸接天齐，驰道无尘马不嘶。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161729'>月御顺行随日毂，乾端和气匝坤倪。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161729'>三槐相继归公衮，细柳还须听将鼙。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161729'>老矣尚能歌二圣，不应专美在浯溪。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161729'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161729_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年12月</a>　迁起居郎，请辞。作品：辞免起居郎申省状。<div id='poem_1278339' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278339' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278339?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免起居郎申省状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278339")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278339_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278339'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278339'>准尚书省劄子：「备奉圣旨：陈傅良除起居郎，日下供职」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278339_comment'></div>不胜惭惧，须至烦渎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278339_comment'></div>伏念某衰朽罢驽，误玷班列，久无补报，实不遑安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278339_comment'></div>昨尝累具奏申，乞从罢免，或与在外及祠禄差遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278339_comment'></div>俟命累月，未准指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278339_comment'></div>今乃求去得迁，若更冒然就职，则是前请皆非真情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278339_comment'></div>欲望朝廷特赐敷奏，追寝新恩，以安愚分。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1278339_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278339'><span class='label'>按：</span>十二月三日，三省同奉圣旨不允，兼职并依旧。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278339_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年12月</a>　权中书舍人所拟制诰。作品：朝请大夫起居郎兼玉牒所检讨官兼权中书舍人楼钥除中书舍人。太府寺丞曾三聘除秘书郎。王宁刘崇之并除太府寺丞。<div id='poem_1278028' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278028' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278028?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请大夫起居郎兼玉牒所检讨官兼权中书舍人楼钥除中书舍人制<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月二日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278028")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278028_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278028'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278028'>敕：寿皇初策在廷之士，盖极一时之选矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278028_comment'></div>朕阅名籍，得为相臣者二人焉，枢臣者一人焉，从臣而下以声绩著见者，迨不可枚数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278028_comment'></div>具官某于是时尝褒然为举首，而偶不中有司之度，然至今海内士所乐道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278028_comment'></div>议论文章，风流蕴籍，则未尝不在称首也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278028_comment'></div>间者，旁招时望，寘之本朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278028_comment'></div>尔以摄官属笔，能道朕德意与其人才美之所宜，文字之上下，简书之长短，皆足用劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278028_comment'></div>而佥言不同，往往不奉吾诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278028_comment'></div>仁者之勇，见于封章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278028_comment'></div>肆用命尔，为真词掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278028_comment'></div>除书之出，国人皆曰贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278028_comment'></div>《诗》不云乎：「假以溢我，我其收之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278028_comment'></div>朕于是蒙寿皇得人之福矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278028_comment'></div>昔者郑为辞命，终属国侨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278028_comment'></div>唐掌帝制，实先韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278028_comment'></div>尔其懋哉，称此优异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278028_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1278028_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278057' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278057' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278057?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉议郎太府寺丞曾三聘除秘书郎制<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月二十三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278057")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278057_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278057'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278057'>敕：道山蓬莱，图籍钜万，士夫仰望，真有飙车羽轮之隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278057_comment'></div>游其中者，皆天下选也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278057_comment'></div>以尔力学自奋，持论不阿，忧国之心，如饥如渴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278057_comment'></div>擢自外府，径登清贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278057_comment'></div>益读未见书，以昌远业；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278057_comment'></div>且使四部，秩然有序，是为称职哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278057_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1278057_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278058' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278058' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278058?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大理寺主簿王宁新知信阳军刘崇之并除太府寺丞制<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月二十三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278058")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278058_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278058'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278058'>敕：寺监皆有丞，而外府设官特详焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278058_comment'></div>盖欲上裨版曹之调度，下托有司之出纳，不可以非其人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278058_comment'></div>以尔宁文辞蔚然，明习吏道，勾稽棘寺，平反为多，爰俾序迁，以酬劳勚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278058_comment'></div>尔崇之声称籍甚，蚤登著庭，出守边方，召对尤敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278058_comment'></div>使还朝迹，以慰公言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278058_comment'></div>所贵于儒者，谓其能通世务，以其所学，见之事功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278058_comment'></div>勉哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278058_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278058_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　上奏状乞祠禄。作品：乞祠禄归展墓焚黄状。<div id='poem_1278337' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278337' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278337?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞祠禄归展墓焚黄状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278337")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278337_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278337'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278337'>臣辄有迫切之恳，仰干天听：伏念臣九岁而□，□□贫贱，养生丧死，皆有永恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278337_comment'></div>前此幸值郊霈，始得赠父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278337_comment'></div>□□□而久官湖湘，远离坟墓，今七八年，不获展省，以行焚□。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278337_comment'></div>□□每一念下，为之心折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278337_comment'></div>万一溘先朝露，即两亲竟不沾□□□泽，臣亦无以见于地下矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278337_comment'></div>况自立朝，委是尸素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278337_comment'></div>区区欲望圣慈矜怜衰谢，来日不多，特与祠禄差遣一次，使得展墓焚黄，少慰存没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278337_comment'></div>臣不胜祈天望圣，激切屏营之至！</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278337_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年12月</a>　权中书舍人任上，作奏状札子。作品：缴奏安定郡王子涛赐宅状。缴奏刑部大理寺易大明阿王断案状。缴奏傅昌朝转官状。缴奏蓝嗣祖转官状。缴奏率逢原除都统制状二首。<div id='poem_1278340' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278340' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278340?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏安定郡王子涛赐宅状<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月六日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278340")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278340_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278340'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278340'>准中书门下省送到录黄一道节文，为利州观察使安定郡王子涛奏：「今踏逐到宅子一所，乞照令德等例拨赐居止，以便祭享」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278340_comment'></div>十二月三日三省同奉圣旨依，令臣书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278340_comment'></div>右，臣窃以为安定郡王见无住宅以便祭享，殊失严奉之意，合从朝廷拨赐宅子一所，永充见任安定郡王居住，以存事体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278340_comment'></div>今来所有子涛奏请临安府府衙后宅子，未审堪与不堪永充严奉香火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278340_comment'></div>欲乞更降指挥，下临安府契勘闻奏，取旨拨赐，仍不许其他官员指占，亦不许将后子孙认为己业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278340_comment'></div>如此，则前后承袭，庶免叠有烦渎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278340_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278340_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278340_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278341' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278341' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278341?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏刑部大理寺易大明阿王断案状<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月十六日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278341")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278341_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278341'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278341'>准中书门下省送到录黄一道节文，为刑部、大理寺状，舒州申，勘到百姓易大明并汪清妻阿王断案事，令臣书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278341_comment'></div>右，臣窃谓人之亲，莫切于夫妻，妻而与人谋其夫，则生人无措身之所矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278341_comment'></div>照得阿王嫁汪清，生一女三子，自绍熙元年与易大明通奸以来，凡其夫汪清所与疑虑易大明者，皆密以告；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278341_comment'></div>凡易大明所与谋害汪清者，未尝一以告也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278341_comment'></div>据案，阿王尝受易大明之谋，醉其夫以酒，又从之学作麻索套子，将以勒死汪清，不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278341_comment'></div>如是者又一年，而后卒杀汪清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278341_comment'></div>当杀汪清也，易大明虽以铁尺打伤仆地，未曾气绝，令阿王快取索来，阿王纪恨汪清节次打骂，亦有心要勒死汪清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278341_comment'></div>手解布机上麻绳，付易大明勒死之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278341_comment'></div>是不谓之同杀其夫乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278341_comment'></div>在律「谋杀」条：「奸人杀其夫，所奸妻妾虽不知情，与同罪」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278341_comment'></div>昔人之意，所为斯人虑者甚严密也，况同杀之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278341_comment'></div>《春秋》之义，鲁夫人与弑公，绝不为亲礼也，圣人岂忍绝人母哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278341_comment'></div>与杀其夫，虽子犹不得以为母，以是为王法所当诛耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278341_comment'></div>而贷不杀，是无三纲，而十恶之条废矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278341_comment'></div>臣自摄乏，书奸人杀其夫之案，或贷死者有之，而未有如阿王之幸免者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278341_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈参酌经律，令有司别行议断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278341_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278341_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278341_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278343' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278343' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278343?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏蓝嗣祖转官状<span class='inlineComment2'>（十一月二十三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278343")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278343_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278343'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278343'>准中书门下省送到录黄，奉圣旨：「进义副尉蓝嗣祖昨在潜邸服勤有劳，可特与转承信郎」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278343_comment'></div>令臣书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278343_comment'></div>右，臣据都官供到状称：「昨绍熙元年六月内给帖补该遇潜藩应奉推恩人共四名，蓝嗣祖、章显祖、颜守忠、王演各系白身，并补进义副尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278343_comment'></div>数内王演系收使昨该皇太子宫祗应《陆宣公奏议》终篇赏转进武副尉，又收使皇后受册推恩赏转承信郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278343_comment'></div>颜守忠系收使皇太子宫祗应《陆宣公奏议》终篇赏转进武副尉，又收使高宗梓宫发引赏转承信郎，见得二人各系收使两宫赏方转承信郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278343_comment'></div>今来蓝嗣祖与二人补授年月事体一同，即无上件合该收使赏典，径与特转，显是不均，恐非公朝待人无私之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278343_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278343_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278343_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278345' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278345' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278345?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏率逢原除都统制第二状<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月二十六日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278345")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278345_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278345'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278345'>准中书门下省送到臣所缴率逢原除都统制奏状，</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1278345_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　作家书与兄长。作品：与国举兄家书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（书中论及刘炜与监司，并言“近复有御笔，陈源除押班。张子仁除节度使”，故当在本年9月以后。）</span><div id='poem_1278457' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278457' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278457?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与国举兄家书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278457")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278457_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278457'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278457'>书黄事，前日不及细□。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278457_comment'></div>淮上有刘炜运判者，以禁私铸太急，几生事，遭论罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278457_comment'></div>久之，私铸戢，留丞相追论其功，遂画旨再与监司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278457_comment'></div>楼大防驳还，□者旨令以次官书行，即是傅良，遂竟书过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278457_comment'></div>盖以为刘炜不是罪人赃吏，罢去年岁，再与差遣，此何不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278457_comment'></div>而纷纷云耳，后生小子妄相訾毁，不足听也，不足听也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278457_comment'></div>近复有御笔，陈源除押班<span class='inlineComment2'>（内侍官，比外执政。）</span>，又张子仁除节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278457_comment'></div>此事所系甚重，谢给事已放过押班事，傅良独缴之，朝论甚以为危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278457_comment'></div>乃蒙圣恩容纳，至今不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278457_comment'></div>至除节钺，合先送给事，却直付舍人<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，亦独缴上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278457_comment'></div>次日，御笔封付陈傅良：「可与书行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278457_comment'></div>再缴上，亦蒙圣恩寝之不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278457_comment'></div>此两事系朝廷，非寻常事之比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278457_comment'></div>至此，公论方信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278457_comment'></div>劣弟不论其细，而论其大，舍易而犯难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278457_comment'></div>恐家兄不知端的，见谓苟且，有玷家传，特此详报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278457_comment'></div>却勿令一人见，虑有人谗谤，以弟为好名，漏泄上旨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278457_comment'></div>至祝至祝。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278457'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_1278457_0'>⑴ 或说谢给事有人主张，故令劣弟当此重难。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1278457_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　上奏状言朝政。作品：奏乞褒录傅察宗泽娄寅亮子孙札子。<div id='poem_1278348' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278348' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278348?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏乞褒录傅察宗泽娄寅亮子孙劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278348")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278348_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278348'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278348'>窃睹近者赠岳霖焕章阁待制，与张某一子官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278348_comment'></div>仰见公朝旌念旧臣，苟有劳烈，即录其子孙，承袭重爵，以此劝士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278348_comment'></div>天下知尊君亲上之报不薄，而徇国者众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278348_comment'></div>幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278348_comment'></div>臣尝论本朝圣圣相承，每遇大事，则有先见特立之臣奋不顾身，为国建事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278348_comment'></div>臣不暇远论，姑述宣和以来三朝所睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278348_comment'></div>在徽宗时，则有傅察以死事为节义之功之首；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278348_comment'></div>高宗中兴时，则有宗泽以留行为翊载之功之首；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278348_comment'></div>寿皇入继大统时，则有娄寅亮以建储为定策之功之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278348_comment'></div>然而傅察赠典虽甚优渥，宗泽致仕亦颇通贵，而两家子孙未蒙旌异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278348_comment'></div>弃善录瑕，令人于邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278348_comment'></div>至于寅亮初以上虞县丞敢建大议，高宗嘉纳，擢为御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278348_comment'></div>其后时议不同，竟死小官，泽不及后，遂以乏祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278348_comment'></div>若以至和、嘉祐故事言之，宜在褒崇之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278348_comment'></div>一切勿问，臣恐伤忠厚之风，塞敢言之路，上无以发明高宗至公之心，下无以对扬寿皇善继之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278348_comment'></div>欲望圣慈以所以褒赏岳飞子孙之意推及三家，以广恩惠，以劝忠力。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1278348_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　权中书舍人任上，拟写制诰。作品：王进之知德庆府。张*知宜州。皇子嘉王府翊善黄裳兼侍讲。从政郎建康府江宁县尉赵汝章收使谢赏转文林郎。降授朝奉郎徐峣特复朝散郎致仕。泉州同安县尉钟安老增强盗希赏本州录参郑继功符同结录继功降两资放罢。前提举广南市舶江文叔纵容押纲官移易香纲降一官。武经郎李存道和籴淮西总领米般量少欠降一官。入内内侍省东头供奉官毛居实转归吏部授从义郎。赵盛吴璹并除职事官。大理少卿许及之奉使回转一官。閤门舍人蒋介奉使回转一官。带御器械蔡必胜除知閤门事。倪思复朝散大夫。陈岘复通奉大夫。郑侨复正议大夫。楼钥磨勘转朝议大夫。曾集知严州。林大中磨勘转官。夏执中所生母郡夫人沈氏赠崇国夫人。夏执中故妻郡夫人谌氏赠宁国夫人。<div id='poem_1278059' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278059' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278059?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝散大夫王进之知德庆府制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278059")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278059_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278059'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278059'>敕具官某：尔顷以天府贰车，往守武陵，突不得黔，已复报罢，朕心悯焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278059_comment'></div>晋康虽远，实高皇兴王之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278059_comment'></div>举以授汝，以观汝能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278059_comment'></div>尚其懋哉，毋替朕命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278059_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278059_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278060' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278060' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278060?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张某知宜州制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278060")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278060_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278060'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278060'>敕具官某：自桂林以南之州，宜为大；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278060_comment'></div>其与蛮人邻也，宜为迩，置侯固圉，重于他邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278060_comment'></div>举以付尔，不谓之选择而使子欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278060_comment'></div>尚对明恩，无乏边事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278060_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278060_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278061' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278061' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278061?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝散郎充显谟阁待制兼皇子嘉王府翊善黄裳兼侍讲制<span class='inlineComment2'>（五年正月二十日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278061")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278061_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278061'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278061'>敕：朕每岁仲春，诏诸儒讲路门，将修故事，有日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278061_comment'></div>比览名籍，为之矍然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278061_comment'></div>昔者所进，今安在耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278061_comment'></div>而不为予讲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278061_comment'></div>具官某以六学之醇，长于劝诵，尝发明《春秋》之旨，纚纚可听也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278061_comment'></div>何恙不已，而悯劳以大夫之事，但与吾儿游乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278061_comment'></div>夫文帝能前席贾生于久不见之馀，而武帝不能留汲黯于出入禁闼之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278061_comment'></div>两君治效，较然可睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278061_comment'></div>尔不当起为予讲耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278061_comment'></div>《诗》不云乎：「素丝祝之，良马六之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278061_comment'></div>彼姝者子，何以告之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278061_comment'></div>此朕所以责望汝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278061_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1278061_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278062' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278062' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_5_1278072_comment'></div>云胡吏议，及此上闻，乃不知猾吏之为，而徒录名臣之后，或者爱博，至于言私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278072_comment'></div>虽薄示惩章，岂遽忘于善类？<div class='inline'
