id='poem_sentence_6_1278073_comment'></div>及此上闻，挂于吏议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278073_comment'></div>既往不咎，朕所以舍旧而图新；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278073_comment'></div>永矢弗谖，尔无为矫枉而过直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278073_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278073_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278074' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278074' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278074?labeling=true' target='_blank'>显谟阁学士降授通奉大夫知建康府郑侨举淳安令舒光改官不当降官满一期叙复正议大夫制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278074")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278074_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278074'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278074'>敕具官某：淳安令之狱，至今人疑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278074_comment'></div>朕徐考其所为主，则皆吾贤卿大夫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278074_comment'></div>吾贤卿大夫也，而坐以缪举之罚，毋乃已重乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278074_comment'></div>以尔经明行脩，为海内所称数，而阅天下之士多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278074_comment'></div>门生故吏，必善推择而不苟取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278074_comment'></div>乃者所举令，其具如刑书邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278074_comment'></div>则与其进，不保其往，孔子有是言矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278074_comment'></div>不如刑书，则是即墨大夫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278074_comment'></div>岂以微文而废善类？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278074_comment'></div>爰弃前咎，俾还故官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278074_comment'></div>其继自今，毋以精失士之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278074_comment'></div>益举所知，是谓忠报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278074_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1278074_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278075' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278075' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278075?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请大夫中书舍人楼钥磨勘转朝议大夫制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278075")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278075_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278075'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278075'>敕：计日，非所以处贤才也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278075_comment'></div>书劳，非所以待法从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278075_comment'></div>而有司以功令来上，曰：「某人当进其官」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278075_comment'></div>则朕亦重改焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278075_comment'></div>具官某以文墨议论，方代予言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278075_comment'></div>自吾与丞相执政进退群臣，当不当功罪，尔皆得以可否是正于其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278075_comment'></div>分职授任，亦异于百辟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278075_comment'></div>绩用益彰，声望益茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278075_comment'></div>则等而上之，不过三数官，皆将以待汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278075_comment'></div>何屑屑以课日月增秩为事？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278075_comment'></div>尚服训辞，以须明陟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278075_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278075_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278076' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278076' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278076?labeling=true' target='_blank'>曾集知严州制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278076")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278076_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278076'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278076'>敕具官某：赣川之曾，人物相望，仕至二千石者，前后以十数，厥声茂焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278076_comment'></div>尔习于家传，有志于古，试以郡寄，有志于民，还奏便朝，嘉其详练。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278076_comment'></div>惟严陵之辅郡，实高庙之潜藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278076_comment'></div>分以左符，用抚吾民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278076_comment'></div>由小州得大州，盖亦宠矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278076_comment'></div>益勉厥职，以大尔家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278076_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1278076_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278077' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278077' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278077?labeling=true' target='_blank'>林大中磨勘转官制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278077")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278077_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278077'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278077'>敕：计日，非所以待贤能也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278077_comment'></div>循次，非所以优法从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278077_comment'></div>而有司以功令告，是为旧章，庸可废乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278077_comment'></div>具官某以直道正台纲，至于累岁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278077_comment'></div>以勇退纡州组，殆将终更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278077_comment'></div>槩之，懋官一阶，不足酬也，况夫训词深厚，駮议剀切，朕甚嘉之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278077_comment'></div>而有司会课，姑惟增秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278077_comment'></div>其尚钦承，以须殊奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278077_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278077_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278078' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278078' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278078?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉国军节度使开府仪同三司充万寿观使夏执中所生母郡夫人沈氏赠崇国夫人制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278078")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278078_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278078'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278078'>敕：诗人诵后夫人之贤，必以为某人之子、之孙、之甥、之妹，盖推本其所从来，不一而足也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278078_comment'></div>具官某所生母具位沈氏，作配名门，雅有淑德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278078_comment'></div>是生贤嗣，为国元舅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278078_comment'></div>日者，朕缘申伯之谊，加锡命数，视仪鼎司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278078_comment'></div>夫宠其身，而不及其母，岂所以宏贲外氏之祧乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278078_comment'></div>是生不沾膏沐之赐，而死无以慰蓼莪之思也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278078_comment'></div>爰自郡封，升华上国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278078_comment'></div>尚歆明恩，永缓尔后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278078_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278078_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278079' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278079' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278079?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夏执中故妻郡夫人谌氏赠宁国夫人制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278079")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278079_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278079'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278079'>敕：公卿将相，处贵倨之势而不骄，非独其身贤也，警戒相成，厥有内助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278079_comment'></div>具官某故妻具位谌氏，尝为吾舅氏之配，与之共隐约矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278079_comment'></div>今以吾舅，申锡命数，视仪鼎司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278079_comment'></div>敬共不违，退若初筮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278079_comment'></div>推本所自，非有如《齐风·鸡鸣》之配然耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278079_comment'></div>夫生有中馈之劳，而不及从夫之爵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278079_comment'></div>死祔于姑之室，犹未离于郡小君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278079_comment'></div>则吾外氏之祧，尚有遗恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278079_comment'></div>晋陟上国，庸慰幽冥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278079_comment'></div>尚歆明恩，益相夫子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278079_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278079_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年2月</a>　权中书舍人任上，作奏状札子。作品：缴奏册宝官吏推恩状。缴奏孙拱之转官状。缴奏册宝承受官免减一员状。再缴奏孙拱之转官及册宝承受官免减一员状。缴奏饶州奏勘程廷倚断案状。<div id='poem_1278349' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278349' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278349?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏册宝官吏推恩状<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙五年二月十一日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278349")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278349_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278349'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278349'>准中书门下省送到录黄一道节文，为册宝都大主管所申奉上尊号册宝了毕，被差一行官吏推恩事，二月六日，三省同进呈，奉圣旨：「除已推赏人外，馀并特与三分减一推赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278349_comment'></div>内第一等转一官，减二年磨勘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278349_comment'></div>第二等转一官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278349_comment'></div>第三等减三年磨勘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278349_comment'></div>其军兵愿换犒赏者听」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278349_comment'></div>令臣书行，须至奏闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278349_comment'></div>右，臣恭睹上件圣旨指挥，系是依绍熙元年体例三分减一推赏施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278349_comment'></div>臣检照绍熙元年正月一日修制奉上寿圣皇太后尊号、至尊寿皇圣帝、寿成皇后尊号册宝行礼了毕，并正月十九日修制中宫册宝行礼了毕推恩等第人数，第一等五人，转两官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278349_comment'></div>第二等十二人，转一官，减二年磨勘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278349_comment'></div>第三等四十三人，转一官资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278349_comment'></div>今来所降上件推恩指挥内人数比绍熙元年第一等承受官多一员；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278349_comment'></div>第二等除贴去外照管事务官尚多一员，行遣书写奏报文字官多一员；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278349_comment'></div>第三等承受并诸司行遣人多一员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278349_comment'></div>已上共多四员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278349_comment'></div>臣窃详绍熙元年推恩之人，系是修制奉上三宫四册四宝，事务繁重，职掌稠叠，计日甚久，为劳亦多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278349_comment'></div>所以当来恩数特异常典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278349_comment'></div>今来修制奉上慈福宫尊号册宝，虽曰千载一时非常之庆，然而干当臣寮偶被驱使，只合课计心力，以为酬奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278349_comment'></div>所是一宫一册一宝，既与三宫四册四宝体例迥然不同，伏缘近日都大主管官不候一等具申尚书省取旨推恩，先次获降圣旨指挥转行两官，一时后省皆失契勘，只作特旨放行，以致逐人妄援前例，保明陈乞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278349_comment'></div>今来虽经朝廷裁酌，将都大主管官止转一官，馀人三分减一推赏，比之元年，委是太滥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278349_comment'></div>以此始知都大主管所申，首为身谋，上欺圣听，因芘侪辈，大启倖门，而又增添员数至五六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278349_comment'></div>恭惟国家对天下之休，庆事未已，窃恐滥恩寝广，官爵益轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278349_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈轸矜民力，吝惜名器，将上件指挥除军兵听换犒设一项外，其馀更加裁损，务令允当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278349_comment'></div>仍将所增添人只依旧数，不许增多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278349_comment'></div>庶几日后无疆之庆，侥倖衰少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278349_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278349_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278349_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1278349'>〔贴黄〕检准绍熙三年十二月二十二日圣旨指挥，玉牒所进《寿皇圣帝玉牒》，会要所进《寿皇圣帝会要》了毕，与减半推恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278349_comment'></div>缘上项进书篇帙少似已前，特行减半推赏，与今来事体一同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278349_comment'></div>伏乞睿照。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1278349_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278350' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278350' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278350?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏孙拱之转官状<span class='inlineComment2'>（二月二十日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278350")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278350_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278350'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278350'>准中书门下省送到录黄一道，枢密院关：「奉圣旨：忠训郎御前祗应孙拱之为□□有劳，可特与转行一官」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278350_comment'></div>令臣书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278350_comment'></div>右，臣取到吏部状，见得孙拱之自授承信郎以后，十年之间已转五官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278350_comment'></div>数内淳熙十六年转了三官，又自绍熙二年九月磨勘转忠训郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278350_comment'></div>至今年十二月，才及两年有馀，更转一官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278350_comment'></div>臣不知其有何功劳，被此恩数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278350_comment'></div>岁月未久，侥倖太多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278350_comment'></div>坏武臣年劳之法，长亵近私谒之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278350_comment'></div>臣不得不为陛下惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278350_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278350_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278350_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278351' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278351' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278351?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏册宝承受官免减一员状<span class='inlineComment2'>（二月二十日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278351")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278351_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278351'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278351'>准中书门下省送到录黄，枢密院关：「二月十四日奉圣旨：已降指挥，寿圣隆慈备福皇太后尊号册宝承受官，依淳熙十二年、绍熙元年体例差置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278351_comment'></div>缘各已经大典，职事与其他不同，特与兑减一员，馀依已得指挥施行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278351_comment'></div>令臣书行，须至奏闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278351_comment'></div>右，臣照得绍熙元年修制奉上四册四宝，差人管干不得不多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278351_comment'></div>今来修制奉上一册一宝，若初间从公差置，便合取旨省员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278351_comment'></div>却乃比如旧数增多六人，其为欺罔，不待力辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278351_comment'></div>徒缘业已施行，重于痛有镌减。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278351_comment'></div>此臣所以从宽论奏，乞只依元年员额，已荷宸聪悉垂采听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278351_comment'></div>不审何故复有上件指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278351_comment'></div>以臣窥度，必非圣意自欲反汗，以长倖臣，只是此曹耻于退听，求胜公论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278351_comment'></div>且夫行法自贵近始，今承受官系是第一等推恩人，若许存留，即其馀小官岂无辞说？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278351_comment'></div>则是身为贵近者，乱法度也，恐非古人患不均之谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278351_comment'></div>臣欲望圣慈将上件指挥特赐收寝，令照应已降指挥施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278351_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278351_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1278351_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278352' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278352' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278352?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再缴奏孙拱之转官及册宝承受官免减一员状<span class='inlineComment2'>（二月二十四日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278352")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278352_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278352'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278352'>准中书门下省送到臣所缴孙拱之转官奏状并录黄一道，</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1278352_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278353' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278353' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278353?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏饶州奏勘程廷倚断案状<span class='inlineComment2'>（三月二十九日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278353")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278353_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278353'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278353'>准中书门下省送到录黄节文，为饶州奏勘到程廷倚断案，令臣书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278353_comment'></div>右，臣照元案，见得程廷倚高祖程节，曾祖程邻，皆官至宝文阁待制，内高祖正议大夫，祖、父皆命官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278353_comment'></div>今廷倚以僧惠深受其赁钱，诬以占屋而讼之县，又辱骂其骨肉，迫逐起遣，不胜忿耻，倩人打僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278353_comment'></div>其下手人王念四，本州已从徒三年，髡发居役定断，即廷倚元谋，减一等徒二年半，赎铜五十斤，罪止于此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278353_comment'></div>本州复引敕有「荫人犯徒流罪，情不可赎」者奏裁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278353_comment'></div>臣不识廷倚所犯，何以谓情不可赎乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278353_comment'></div>徇一僧之欲，而辱两制之故家者，是州司不平也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278353_comment'></div>从一州之请，而废千载之荫法者，是刑部不审也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278353_comment'></div>且夫情重奏裁，必有大不得已者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278353_comment'></div>近年守臣倚法作威，往往多是以此藉口，捃摭细故，污蔑衣冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278353_comment'></div>今若复因饶州所奏，有此行遣，臣恐郡守之专恣者，援此为例，操切士大夫之族矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278353_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈将上件指挥特从末减。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278353_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278353_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1278353_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年4月</a>　上奏状议朝政。作品：入奏札子。<div id='poem_1278354' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278354' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278354?labeling=true' target='_blank'>入奏劄子<span class='inlineComment2'>（四月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278354")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278354_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278354'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278354'>臣不胜蝼蚁之忠，辄有愚言，仰干天听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278354_comment'></div>如蒙省览，即臣虽就诛戮不悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278354_comment'></div>臣闻：父子，天性也，孝慈之道，不待教而能者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278354_comment'></div>自士庶人皆然，而况于人主乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278354_comment'></div>然考之载籍，则有尊为人主，而隙开于父子之间，至于祸败，反不若士庶人之家者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278354_comment'></div>贱者群居，其势易亲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278354_comment'></div>贵者异宫，其势易疏故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278354_comment'></div>夫惟其势易疏，则离间之言易入；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278354_comment'></div>离间一入，则父之情不欲自疏于其子，子之情不欲自明于其父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278354_comment'></div>由是愈难于言，而父子之隙开矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278354_comment'></div>父子之隙开，而祸败至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278354_comment'></div>唐之西内，则李辅国之徒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278354_comment'></div>前日之龙德宫，则梁师成之徒是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278354_comment'></div>论至于此，可为寒心！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278354_comment'></div>恭惟陛下父子之间一同舜、禹，而比年以来，稍亏定省之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278354_comment'></div>臣诚卑贱，不能知宫禁间事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278354_comment'></div>若以前鉴观之，或者亦当有离间两宫者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278354_comment'></div>陛下孝谨，本自无他，偶以纤介，动成疑阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278354_comment'></div>寿皇恐伤陛下之意，不欲自察察言之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278354_comment'></div>陛下恐伤寿皇之意，又不敢自察察言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278354_comment'></div>而左右之臣，各惮天威，又亦以传言为讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278354_comment'></div>由是礼文寖疏，情好日隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278354_comment'></div>积成因循，实骇闻听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278354_comment'></div>此臣所以不避万死而辄言之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278354_comment'></div>言之也者，将以通之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278354_comment'></div>有如天意信谓如此，即下臣此章，明诏大臣，使两宫左右晓然知此，务通二圣之情，则舜、禹之德，千载同符矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278354_comment'></div>臣无任拳拳激切祈垦之至！</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1278354_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年4月</a>　上奏状乞祠。作品：乞祠申省状。<div id='poem_1278391' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278391' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278391?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞祠申省状<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙五年四月六日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278391")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278391_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278391'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278391'>伏念某一介疏庸，重以衰病，误被使令，身兼数职，皆是文字之官，关系事体，而心力不逮，瘝旷实多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278391_comment'></div>稍涉岁时，曾亡报效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278391_comment'></div>尝闻诸夫子曰：「血气既衰，戒之在得」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278391_comment'></div>又曰：「陈力就列，不能者止」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278391_comment'></div>若某者，所谓乏陈力之劳，违戒得之训者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278391_comment'></div>内负初心，外惭公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278391_comment'></div>夙夜念此，诚不自安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278391_comment'></div>区区欲望朝廷检会前后陈乞在外或祠禄差遣状劄，特赐敷奏，早从所乞，以安愚分，以全晚节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278391_comment'></div>伏候指挥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278391_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278391'><span class='label'>按：</span>四月七日，三省同奉圣旨不允。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278391_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年4月</a>　上奏状乞对。作品：乞对状。<div id='poem_1278355' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278355' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278355?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞对状<span class='inlineComment2'>（四月十四日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278355")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278355_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278355'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278355'>臣近者不识忌讳，幸蒙赐对，辄论及两宫事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278355_comment'></div>仰荷圣慈阔略愚直，曲垂清问，备尽恳悃，仍令臣入文字指罪离间之人，将有施行，以释疑阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278355_comment'></div>即古所谓狂夫之言，圣人择焉，殆不过此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278355_comment'></div>臣虽糜捐，不足以报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278355_comment'></div>然比至奏入，却留不下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278355_comment'></div>十二日又幸同班奏事，复蒙圣慈谕臣，以向来文字说得未详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278355_comment'></div>臣切自咎责，不足以仰承明诏，以致尚稽顺动，枉招谤讟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278355_comment'></div>臣若不务自殚竭，以补聪明，则非陛下之不听用臣，而臣实负陛下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278355_comment'></div>欲望更赐以燕间之顷，令臣缕缕言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278355_comment'></div>苟以蝼蚁之微，感动天听，于是二圣重欢，四方相贺，则臣之志愿毕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278355_comment'></div>除已诣閤门进榜子乞奏事外，谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278355_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年4月</a>　上直前札子。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年4月</a>　上奏状乞致仕。作品：乞致仕状。<div id='poem_1278357' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278357' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278357?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞致仕状<span class='inlineComment2'>（四月二十三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278357")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278357_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278357'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278357'>右，臣伏以车驾久不过重华宫起居，实皆群臣之罪，而罪莫甚于臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278357_comment'></div>身为近侍，而陷君父于失德，有臣如此，将安用之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278357_comment'></div>今欲守本官致仕，伏望圣慈特降指挥施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278357_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1278357_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年4月</a>　再上奏状乞对。作品：再乞对札子。<div id='poem_1278358' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278358' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278358?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再乞对劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278358")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278358_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278358'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278358'>臣十八日进对劄子，乞以此月扈从车驾，过重华宫起居为期，若犹未也，则臣实负陛下，将退就诛戮矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278358_comment'></div>二十三日，遂具奏乞守本官致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278358_comment'></div>二十五日准尚书省劄子：「三省同奉圣旨不允」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278358_comment'></div>臣迫于威命，当日乞直前奏事，更竭狂愚，以毕区区之义而后去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278358_comment'></div>欲望圣慈赦其万死，速赐指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278358_comment'></div>臣不胜祈天俟命之至！</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1278358_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年4月</a>　上直前札子。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年4月</a>　上三省枢密院札子。作品：奏事后申三省枢密院札子。<div id='poem_1278392' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278392' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278392?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏事后申三省枢密院劄子<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙五年四月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278392")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278392_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278392'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278392'>某辄有管见，僣越申禀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278392_comment'></div>二十六日直前奏事，尝乞差近上臣寮调护两宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278392_comment'></div>上云：「此却是好商量，朕里面人不中使，不会说话，不能委曲道朕意思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278392_comment'></div>待差文臣，恐他辈不肯檐荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278392_comment'></div>如此等事，如何则好」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278392_comment'></div>某奏：「陛下高爵重禄，养许多士大夫，虽使犯难赴死，亦当向前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278392_comment'></div>况是诣重华宫传旨圣意，有何不测，不肯檐负？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278392_comment'></div>但乞宣谕大臣，如此处置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278392_comment'></div>上极以为然，且云：「待谕与宰执」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278392_comment'></div>某因检照得《中兴会要》，在孝宗时，以参知政事钱端礼充德寿宫使，一时应合奏禀事件，多藉端礼之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278392_comment'></div>有此故事，可以举行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278392_comment'></div>今来若于亲王、执政、宗室、戚里中，差近上臣寮一人充重华宫使，自后应合奏禀事件，令得往来传旨，庶几不至阻隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278392_comment'></div>某以管见如此，适以上达天听，欲乞朝廷特赐敷奏施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278392_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1278392'>〔小帖子〕靖康初，显谟阁待制谭世绩、李熙靖主管龙德宫，资政殿大学士王易简提举龙德宫，并乞钧照。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1278392_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年4月</a>　再上奏状乞致仕。作品：再乞致仕申省状。再乞致仕状。<div id='poem_1278393' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278393' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278393?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再乞致仕申省状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278393")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278393_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278393'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278393'>照对某昨具奏申乞守本官致仕，今月二十三日准尚书省劄子：「三省同奉圣旨不允」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278393_comment'></div>又于二十六日直前奏事，面纳劄子以申请，欲望朝廷特赐敷奏，速降指挥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1278393_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278394' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278394' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278394?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再乞致仕状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278394")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278394_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278394'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278394'>右，某再具奏，申乞守本官致仕，今月二十七日再准省劄：「备奉圣旨，依已降指挥不允」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278394_comment'></div>某非不知隆天厚地之恩，何敢更有烦渎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278394_comment'></div>伏念某自今春四次请对，颇竭愚忠，诚冀幸上意开悟，父子如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278394_comment'></div>而天听甚卑，反覆咨度，盖已确许矣，而竟中辍，某是以痛自咎责，上孤任使，而有此请，不谓圣度宽容，再降不允指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278394_comment'></div>感极涕零，未知所报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278394_comment'></div>重念某危恳若此，傥若诚意学术，尚有毫发可以自效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278394_comment'></div>岂忍纳禄谢事，求便其身？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278394_comment'></div>区区迫切，姑附「不能者止」之义，欲望朝廷再赐敷奏，早降指挥施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278394_comment'></div>谨具申三省枢密院，伏候指挥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278394_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　上奏状言事。作品：奏事札子。奏事乞休致札子。<div id='poem_1278361' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278361' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278361?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏事乞休致劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278361")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278361_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278361'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278361'>臣辄有迫切之恳，仰干天听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278361_comment'></div>臣凡再乞休致，再准省劄，奉圣旨不允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278361_comment'></div>伏念臣心力衰惫，难以复备使令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278361_comment'></div>欲望圣慈速赐处分，取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1278361_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278361'><span class='label'>按：</span>五月四日读前奏事劄子毕，即面纳休致劄子，得旨云：「甚好，甚好。」当日解官，缴纳告劄五件，申尚书省枢密院。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278361_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　上奏辞免秘阁修撰嘉王府赞读。作品：辞免秘阁修撰嘉王府赞读申省状。<div id='poem_1278395' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278395' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278395?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免秘阁修撰嘉王府赞读申省状<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙五年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278395")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278395_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278395'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278395'>准温州进奏官递到省劄一道：「五月二十八日三省同奉圣旨：陈傅良除秘阁修撰、嘉王府赞读」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278395_comment'></div>伏念某立朝无补，分当斥诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278395_comment'></div>圣恩宽大，许还田里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278395_comment'></div>退惟侥倖，感极涕零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278395_comment'></div>不谓纳禄未久，成命已下，宠以秘府论撰之名，专以亲王劝诵之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278395_comment'></div>自昔宽朝，无此恩意，人非土木，岂不知奋？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278395_comment'></div>重念某学术衰落，不堪复备使令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278395_comment'></div>加以匆匆去国，适当夏潦，暑湿相搏，遂成脾泄之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278395_comment'></div>虽欲勉强，支持不前，所有上件恩除，无缘可以祗受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278395_comment'></div>除已将省劄送温州，乞备所申缴纳外，欲望朝廷特依所乞，令守本官致仕，追寝上件□□，缴奏施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1278395_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　上言事札子。作品：辞免秘阁修撰与庙堂札子。<div id='poem_1278396' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278396' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278396?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免秘阁修撰赞读与庙堂劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278396")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278396_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278396'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278396'>某辄有迫切之恳，仰干钧听：伏念某一介疏庸，及此衰晚，误玷朝列，迄无补报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278396_comment'></div>内负初心，外惭公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278396_comment'></div>惟有去官，庶安愚分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278396_comment'></div>况自陈乞休致以来，叠奉隆旨，未遂其私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278396_comment'></div>及再请直前奏事，庶尽拳拳之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278396_comment'></div>必以学术空疏，天听高邈，幸蒙从欲，分当永弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278396_comment'></div>今者休致未久，除书已下，宠以论撰之章，专以劝诵之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278396_comment'></div>在君父可谓隆天厚地之恩，在臣子益有深渊薄冰之惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278396_comment'></div>沥诚蕲免，所以九顿首于洪造也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278396_comment'></div>恭惟少保大丞相先生谅人心之不同，期时事之攸济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278396_comment'></div>夫人心不同，则匹夫之操不可夺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278396_comment'></div>时事难济，则书生之才不足用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278396_comment'></div>有如某，宜置闲散，又况玉音在耳，不敢诬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278396_comment'></div>干冒钧严，无任皇惧陨越之至！</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1278396_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　作书与丘崇。作品：与丘宗卿。<div id='poem_1278456' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278456' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278456?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与丘宗卿书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278456")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278456_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278456'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278456'>某衰暮之迹，向缀班行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278456_comment'></div>伏蒙眷遇特厚，言念畴昔，何可弭忘？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278456_comment'></div>某官才猷器业蔚然为当代第一，方被选入蜀，无几微不自得意，旌麾下压境三陲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278456_comment'></div>然世将之后，人将谓何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278456_comment'></div>重以疑阻，半年无帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278456_comment'></div>盖朝野凛凛然，而迄无西顾之忧，非公门有重臣，其克底此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278456_comment'></div>顷因内引，尝遵勋业泰安，喜见天颜，且曰当用汉赐金故事，旦劳还房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278456_comment'></div>虽事不果，亦足见九重倚赖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278456_comment'></div>甚盛甚盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278456_comment'></div>三事递迁，还归补□庭之阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278456_comment'></div>而识者谓无先于门下，非但交游之私言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278456_comment'></div>圣明后□，视听一新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278456_comment'></div>伏惟欢庆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1278456_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　作书与史浩。作品：与史丞相。<span class='inlineComment2'>（光宗即位（1189）后，史浩进官太师，信中称呼太师，当系绍熙年间所写。）</span><div id='poem_1278442' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278442' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278442?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与史丞相书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278442")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278442_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278442'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278442'>某顿成衰眊，不能细书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278442_comment'></div>区区归德请罪之诚，辄凭楷牍，布之隶人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278442_comment'></div>至于管见，敢复以寸楮申言之，惟钧慈勿以为咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278442_comment'></div>幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278442_comment'></div>昔者卫武公逮事东周之初，晚而就国，年且百岁，而《抑》之作，《宾之初筵》之作，拳拳爱君，与年少气锐、敢言之士无异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278442_comment'></div>盖尝读周公《无逸》、《七月》，召公《公刘》、《泂酌》与《抑》、《初筵》，乃知卜年八百，皆一时元老，世为弼亮，以身任天下之力，非爵赏刑禁所能为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278442_comment'></div>方今圣明相继，对于典谟，而太师实与终始其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278442_comment'></div>天寿平格，岂独私公之身哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278442_comment'></div>则卫武之托，于是焉在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278442_comment'></div>愿勿以造朝不造朝当介钧念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278442_comment'></div>若某者，无能为矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278442_comment'></div>赋《淇澳》之诗，乐道切磋󸐅磨之美，尚图附名《国风》之末，与卫之旅贲亵御同不朽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278442_comment'></div>某僭越死罪，皇恐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1278442_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年5月</a>　上休致札子，缴上诰敕，出城待罪。作品：奏事乞休致札子。<div id='poem_1278361' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278361' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a
