href='/Writing/1278306?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢中书舍人表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278306")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278306_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278306'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278306'>代言之任，与政相通；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278306_comment'></div>顾惟何人，亦在此选<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278306_comment'></div>臣闻惟虞、夏、商、周之世，有谟、训、诰、命之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278306_comment'></div>至于两都，亦称七制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278306_comment'></div>要是人主猷为之盛，见于儒臣文字之工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278306_comment'></div>惟其相遭，是以不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278306_comment'></div>然则邹、枚而下，词藻岂谓之乏人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278306_comment'></div>魏、晋以来，号令不闻于传世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278306_comment'></div>虽仅存于职掌，曾何补于治功？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278306_comment'></div>洪惟本朝，追并隆古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278306_comment'></div>庆历、元祐之际，岂非千载之一时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278306_comment'></div>欧阳、苏轼之徒，故有六经之遗意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278306_comment'></div>式至今日，作兴斯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278306_comment'></div>由此观之，则臣幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278306_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇皇帝陛下虚心无我，立政惟人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278306_comment'></div>方且视民而如伤，未尝以位而为乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278306_comment'></div>凡所播告，无非休明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278306_comment'></div>臣敢不益励初心，以期后效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278306_comment'></div>必也缉熙光明之学，至于令终；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278306_comment'></div>庶乎草创润色之文，可以行远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278306_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1278306_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　作朝对奏状札子。作品：中书舍人供职后初对札子二首。请对札子二首。<div id='poem_1278367' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278367' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278367?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中书舍人供职后初对劄子<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278367")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278367_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278367'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278367'>臣闻人主有大举动，必有以新天下之耳目，而大慰民望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278367_comment'></div>恭惟陛下始自宅恤移御广内，此大举动也，正天下颙颙望治之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278367_comment'></div>伏想圣心先定，将有仁声德意之事，感悦士夫，兼被黎庶者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278367_comment'></div>臣不肖，辄有管见一二，仰裨圣明，惟陛下财幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278367_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1278367'>一、乞三宫各置使领，以尽孝养之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278367_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1278367'>一、乞降诏问民疾苦，仍申儆见行赈济州县官吏，谕以赏罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278367_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1278367'>一、乞自宰臣以至侍从管军，次第宣引，从容赐坐，访以军国机务，以示责成之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278367_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1278367'>一、乞抚问沿边诸将并帅臣，仍量加锡赉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278367_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1278367'>一、乞增置谏官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278367_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1278367'>一、乞收拾恬退滞淹之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278367_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1278367'>一、乞稍出内帑钱，以助版曹经费，少宽催理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278367_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1278367'>已上特臣区区愚虑所及，未足以广宣主德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278367_comment'></div>如蒙采纳，见之施行，则嗣此有乐告陛下以治安之策者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278367_comment'></div>臣不胜拳拳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278367_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1278367_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278368' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278368' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278368?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278368_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278368'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278368'>臣闻今之献计者，类曰陛下宜以孝宗为法、太上皇为鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278368_comment'></div>臣切以为是说也，唯孝养三宫当如此耳，而非通论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278368_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278368_comment'></div>孝宗盛德大业，不可胜纪，固皆足法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278368_comment'></div>若夫上皇，徒以积忧成疾，浸不视事，不可以为宗庙社稷主，而非其治皆无足法者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278368_comment'></div>陛下嗣守丕图，凡所施设，诚参酌两朝之盛典，择其为天下后世便者兼行之，则可谓集大成矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278368_comment'></div>臣浅陋不能尽识两朝之意，辄以管见条上一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278368_comment'></div>恭惟孝宗锐意恢复，耻于苟安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278368_comment'></div>虽以德寿在宥，不敢北伐，而追怀陵庙，闵念中原之志，枕戈尝胆，日不遑暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278368_comment'></div>训练储峙，常若临敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278368_comment'></div>此一可法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278368_comment'></div>早朝晏罢，寒暑不渝，引见臣工，省阅章奏，日了一日，勿问休暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278368_comment'></div>至于暮夜，必宣召入直官赐坐，从容议论时事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278368_comment'></div>此二可法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278368_comment'></div>留意人才，求之如弗及，一语契合，立致通显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278368_comment'></div>所言不酬，始督过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278368_comment'></div>取舍以公，明白洞达，而无猜虑关防之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278368_comment'></div>此三可法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278368_comment'></div>俭于用度，一金不以滥予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278368_comment'></div>内帑之积，累数钜万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278368_comment'></div>唯是振荒右武，无所爱惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278368_comment'></div>盖以天下之财为天下用，而不用诸己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278368_comment'></div>此四可法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278368_comment'></div>监司、帅守，见辞之际，各访其处民间利病，有以便民为请，随即施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278368_comment'></div>蠲除贷宥，曾无留难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278368_comment'></div>未尝辄怒官吏，独以贪虐获罪于民者，必罚无赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278368_comment'></div>此五可法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278368_comment'></div>臣以为孝宗之治，可为法者非一，而陛下宜法此五者，帝王之盛美也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278368_comment'></div>恭惟太上皇无事付之外庭，采于公论，左右便嬖，绝不预政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278368_comment'></div>不唯不听其言，又禁切之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278368_comment'></div>而金缯酒食之赐，则不吝啬，此一可法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278368_comment'></div>八厢渥土之人，置而不用，未尝以浮言危动群臣，此二可法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278368_comment'></div>行都守臣，两浙漕臣，三总领所，悉以士人为之，不以交结，不以诞谩，此三可法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278368_comment'></div>管军臣僚及沿边帅守，不以为御前差遣，皆从三省降诏除授，此四可法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278368_comment'></div>给舍封驳，台谏论事，虽累上迫，终不以言为罪，此五可法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278368_comment'></div>臣尝谓太上皇之治，可为法者非一，而陛下宜法此五者，亦帝王之盛美也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278368_comment'></div>陛下诚上稽孝宗明断总揽之政，兼体上皇隆宽不自用之意，则天下可得而理矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278368_comment'></div>臣所谓集大成者以此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278368_comment'></div>盖举偏而补其弊，则能全两朝之美；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278368_comment'></div>矫枉而过其直，则反有一偏之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278368_comment'></div>臣恐议者不察，妄分取舍，以惑圣聪，敢昧死一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278368_comment'></div>唯赦其狂愚而采择之，则天下幸甚<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278368_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_1278368'>此句疑有误。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1278368_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278368'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_41_1278368_0'>⑴ 《止斋先生文集》卷二六。又见《历代名臣奏议》卷六九。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1278368_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1278369' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278369' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278369?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请对劄子<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278369")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278369_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278369'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278369'>人主心术必有所尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278369_comment'></div>何谓所尚？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278369_comment'></div>先定其志，而后力行之者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278369_comment'></div>臣不暇远引前古，且以高宗德业为陛下诵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278369_comment'></div>方高宗艰难百战之初，欲复大雠，欲定中原，欲还谒九庙，则其志尚在恢复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278369_comment'></div>及大母已归，徽庙之梓宫已还，南北之势已成，高宗之责少塞，而天下亦倦于用兵矣，则其志尚在和好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278369_comment'></div>方志在恢复则用赵鼎，用张浚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278369_comment'></div>自退朝之后，延见臣下，省阅章奏，游戏翰墨，至于燕私，皆恢复之谋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278369_comment'></div>及志在和好，则用秦桧，自退朝之后，延见臣下，省阅章奏，游戏翰墨，至于燕私，皆和好之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278369_comment'></div>高宗所以享国之久，动无过举者，以有定尚，不杂不怠而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278369_comment'></div>虽然，此臣借以为喻之说，而非劝陛下之说也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278369_comment'></div>今陛下春秋鼎盛，锐意于学，而又圣禀纯素，绝无嗜好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278369_comment'></div>臣切以为陛下之心方如止水，方如明鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278369_comment'></div>以此为尧舜，以此为三王，无不可者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278369_comment'></div>臣独未知陛下之心所尚者何事，欲先定者何志耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278369_comment'></div>不尚一事，则将并进人之言而无适从；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278369_comment'></div>不先定一志，则将汎汎然日复一日，而无用力之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278369_comment'></div>且夫人主，天下之利势也，富贵尊荣之所自出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278369_comment'></div>倘陛下将听并进之言而无适从，汎汎然日复一日，而无用力之地，臣恐有乘间而入陛下之心者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278369_comment'></div>陛下此心方如止水，方如明鉴，可以为尧舜，可以为三王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278369_comment'></div>或万有一先入者，得陛下之心而用之，臣恐陛下圣明，虽锐意于学，无他嗜好，而此心已有所偏尚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278369_comment'></div>此臣私忧过计，欲劝陛下耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278369_comment'></div>以拯民穷为所尚，此志先定，则陛下始有用力之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278369_comment'></div>自退朝之后，以此意引见臣下，以此意省阅章奏，至于游戏翰墨，至于燕私，此忧此念，造次不忘，臣切以为是亦陛下养心之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278369_comment'></div>不杂不怠，充而大之，尧、舜、三王之治，可由是而致也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278369_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278369_comment'></div>以救民穷为所尚，即是仁心，仁心即是尧、舜、三王之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278369_comment'></div>孟子尝言之，臣尝发明之，陛下尝深信之矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1278369_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278370' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278370' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278370?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278370_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278370'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278370'>臣切谓今天下亦多故矣，臣未暇缕数，独念民力之困，于此为极，而莫与陛下救之者耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278370_comment'></div>贤士大夫不为不多，曾莫与陛下救斯民者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278370_comment'></div>势不行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278370_comment'></div>何谓势不行？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278370_comment'></div>欲救民穷，必为帅、为漕、为总领而后可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278370_comment'></div>而三数官者，虽贤士大夫不乐为之故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278370_comment'></div>既曰贤士大夫，而不乐为帅、漕、总领，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278370_comment'></div>外权太轻，虽欲有所设施，而不得骋故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278370_comment'></div>是故不为法令之所束缚，则为浮言之所动摇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278370_comment'></div>不为时政之所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1278370", 1278370, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>讳恶</span>，则为宦游于其处而不得志者之所中伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278370_comment'></div>有是四患，虽贤者亦忍事苟岁月耳，而况其馀人乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278370_comment'></div>且夫人情，谁不喜迁而恶滞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278370_comment'></div>谁不好伸而耻屈？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278370_comment'></div>谁不趋利而避害？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278370_comment'></div>今也立朝，自郎察不一二年，可至卿监；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278370_comment'></div>又不一二年，鲜不得为从官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278370_comment'></div>若夫帅、漕，则有奔走遍天下，而无一日朝迹者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278370_comment'></div>其间侥倖或得贴职，自直阁积而至修撰极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278370_comment'></div>而所谓修撰者，又必尝为卿监而后得之，是终身无复从官之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278370_comment'></div>臣所谓喜迁而恶滞，人情之不乐，一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278370_comment'></div>今夫立朝，苟有亲故，欲入馆阁，则可以移书帅、漕若总领而坐取之，无不如意者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278370_comment'></div>至为帅、漕，连衔剡牍，奏辟一属官若准备差遣之类，辄不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278370_comment'></div>若平平也，则不过送部勘当，讫于陆沉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278370_comment'></div>若稍有过差之请，往往省部诘难回复，甚者至被论列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278370_comment'></div>臣所谓好伸而耻屈，人情之不乐，二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278370_comment'></div>今夫立朝，自釐务职事官，皆得以亲族子弟牒国子监补解试；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278370_comment'></div>及监司、帅臣，苟非在川、广二千里外，即子弟无收试之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278370_comment'></div>每遇大比，无所附着，稍知谨畏者，大率无故而殿一举，不然则为谬巧迁就，以避贡举条制，斯可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278370_comment'></div>臣所谓趋利而避害，人情之不乐，三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278370_comment'></div>如前四患，则是事权太轻，虽贤者犹不乐为之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278370_comment'></div>如后三说，则是恩数太薄，而人不乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278370_comment'></div>夫可与救斯民者，必帅也、漕也、总领也，而人不乐为之至此，奈何惮改乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278370_comment'></div>臣窃以为今日之势，莫若稍稍重外，重外之术，必使帅、漕、总领皆可驯致于从官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278370_comment'></div>可以驯致于从官，而后可久任；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278370_comment'></div>可久任，而后可责事功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278370_comment'></div>如此，则帅、漕、总领始晓然知朝廷委寄不轻矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278370_comment'></div>则夫前四患者，次第自去，而有为陛下出力救斯民者矣。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1278370'></div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1278370_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年10月</a>　上札子言朝政。作品：乞蠲放身丁钱札子。<div id='poem_1278371' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278371' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278371?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞放身丁钱劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278371")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278371_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278371'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278371'>《真宗实录》：大中祥符四年秋七月壬申朔诏曰：「朕临御万邦，厉精庶政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278371_comment'></div>一夫不获，尚切于忧劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278371_comment'></div>九赋用均，唯思于宽简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278371_comment'></div>惜其物力，以厚民生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278371_comment'></div>眷惟浙江之区，介彼东南之域，而自祖宗恢复，声教诞敷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278371_comment'></div>去率敛以居多，俾乐康之斯洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278371_comment'></div>洪惟利泽，已浃编氓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278371_comment'></div>然计口算缗，尚存于伪制；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278371_comment'></div>治财吝纳，仍限于岁输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278371_comment'></div>特俾蠲除，式申旷荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278371_comment'></div>其两浙、福建、荆湖南北路身丁钱，并特除放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278371_comment'></div>如有元以钱折征物色，亦与除放<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278371_comment'></div>凡岁免缗钱四十五万四百六贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278371_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1278371'>身丁钱，不知所始，臣伏读御札，则知其为东南伪制也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278371_comment'></div>本朝六路次第归化，所以加惠之者甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278371_comment'></div>往者妇人有之，至淳化三年免<span class='inlineComment2'>（见十月四日琼州敕。）</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278371_comment'></div>寺院行者有之，至咸平五年免<span class='inlineComment2'>（见七月四日两浙、福建路敕。）</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278371_comment'></div>摄官有之，至至道二年免<span class='inlineComment2'>（见正月十五日广南敕。）</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278371_comment'></div>盐亭户有之，至太平兴国元年免<span class='inlineComment2'>（见九月福州路敕。）</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278371_comment'></div>赁舍寄住者有之，至咸平六年免<span class='inlineComment2'>（见四月二日广州敕。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278371_comment'></div>死丁自咸平二年始与除放<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>，逃丁自咸平四年始与检阁<span class='inlineComment2'>（见七月十一日荆湖南、北路敕。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278371_comment'></div>又伪命日，如福州每丁三百二十五，自太平兴国五年定纳钱一百<span class='inlineComment2'>（七月高象先奏请。）</span>，福州长溪有温、台等州投过一千七百馀户、二千馀丁，每丁亦三百二十五，自景德二年定依温、台州，见纳钱二百五十<span class='inlineComment2'>（四月二十日刘炤奏请。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278371_comment'></div>苏州每丁纳米，自淳化五年定纳钱二百<span class='inlineComment2'>（见八月十七日苏州敕。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278371_comment'></div>睦州每丁六百九十五，处州每丁五百九十四，自咸平三年，许将绢折纳<span class='inlineComment2'>（五月二十三日两浙路敕。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278371_comment'></div>抑见伪制各出一时，颇亦不等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278371_comment'></div>前后敕命，大抵多者使寡，难者使易，不宜有者使无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278371_comment'></div>而诸国苛歛，渐趋于平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278371_comment'></div>至是乃一切蠲去，与民更始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278371_comment'></div>天圣间，侍御史章频言：「先帝除放伪命身丁，东南之区，圣德所被，十六年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278371_comment'></div>放过钱七百馀万贯，而军国之须，不闻申匮乏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278371_comment'></div>可谓至论！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278371_comment'></div>然臣又按《实录》，明道元年三月，两浙转运司言：「大中祥符五年已放诸路身丁钱，而婺、秀州尚输如故」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278371_comment'></div>乃蠲除之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278371_comment'></div>蔡襄亦尝言：伪命日，诸州各有丁钱，唯漳、泉州、兴化三郡折作米七斗五升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278371_comment'></div>真宗皇帝哀矜困穷，蠲放两浙、福建身丁钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278371_comment'></div>其时漳、泉、兴化是亦丁钱折变作米，无人论奏因依，遂至先朝大惠不及三郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278371_comment'></div>以此见祥符放丁溥及六路，其间犹有至今输纳者，皆府县占吝，奉行不虔之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278371_comment'></div>推而广之，宜在今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278371_comment'></div>恭惟陛下仁圣在上，轸忧民瘼，欲省赋甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278371_comment'></div>间者断自渊衷，量减折帛之估。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278371_comment'></div>有司以阙经费为言，其议遂寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278371_comment'></div>以臣愚见，折帛固宜减，不如身丁切于穷民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278371_comment'></div>且其为钱，视祖宗折帛之估才十之一；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278371_comment'></div>而其为丁，视纳折帛之家殆累数万缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278371_comment'></div>陛下寻祥符之诏，断而行之，幸甚。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_1278371'></div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1278371_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278371'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278371_1'>⑴ 自「如有」以下十三字，据福州法册添入。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_1278371_0'>⑵ 八月二十日杭、越、明、睦、台、温、处、衢、婺、秀、苏、湖十二州敕。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1278371_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　中书舍人任上所作奏状札子。作品：缴奏罗良臣供给免折酒状。缴奏谢渊请给合支本色状。缴奏朱熹宫观状。缴奏紫霄宫免科敷等事状。缴奏陈岘知赣州状。<div id='poem_1278372' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278372' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278372?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏罗良臣供给免折酒状<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙五年闰十月三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年闰10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278372")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278372_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278372'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278372'>准中书门下省送到录黄：「临安府状：『今月二十八日承修内司提辖刘信之白劄子，得旨宣谕安抚，令临安府宣借厢军一十五人，付浙西总管罗良臣使唤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278372_comment'></div>所有罗良臣每月供给免折酒，与依韩侂胄例支破，仍具知委闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278372_comment'></div>本府除已恭禀圣旨指挥施行，从条合行奏审，伏候指挥』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278372_comment'></div>闰十月一日奉圣旨：依已得指挥」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278372_comment'></div>令臣书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278372_comment'></div>右，臣不知罗良臣为何人，但为陛下爱惜此圣旨指挥，不敢不具奏耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278372_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278372_comment'></div>差兵士十五人与之使唤，此至猥琐也，请受不折酒，此至微末也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278372_comment'></div>今也遣中使传隆旨下谕天府之尹，而及此至猥琐至微末之事，岂不亏损国体，玩渎主威乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278372_comment'></div>臣忝为词掖，论驳此等小事，固有惭色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278372_comment'></div>区区愿望陛下以此类推之，特垂省察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278372_comment'></div>继今或有无厌之辈敢复以此干冒天听，并勿施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278372_comment'></div>如至再三，即须行遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278372_comment'></div>使天下晓然知陛下一号一令皆有关系，不出于私谒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278372_comment'></div>皆足耸动，不至于徒行，幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278372_comment'></div>臣愚欲望睿慈将上件指挥特赐追寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278372_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278372_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278372_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278373' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278373' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278373?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏谢渊请给合支本色状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278373")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278373_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278373'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278373'>准中书门下省送到录黄一道：「中奉大夫、守给事中、兼直学士院、兼实录院同修撰臣楼钥奏：『准中书门下省送到录黄，为知閤门事谢渊为系皇太后亲弟，其请给等可依韩侂胄例，特与依禄格全支本色，日后迁转准此』事，令臣书读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278373_comment'></div>臣仰惟陛下奉承三宫，惟恐不能顺适圣意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278373_comment'></div>然法制之设，所以公天下而共守之，有不可踰者，知閤谢渊为皇太后亲弟，请给等依韩侂胄例，特与依禄格全支本色，有以见陛下奉祖后之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278373_comment'></div>然真俸之支，则有不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278373_comment'></div>吴瑰、吴琚，同为太皇太后之亲侄，同为检校少保、节度使，可谓事体至切矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278373_comment'></div>然吴瑰之请真俸已久，无有议者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278373_comment'></div>而吴琚之请，太上皇为之降旨，则黄裳以给事中力陈者三四；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278373_comment'></div>陛下为之降旨，则黄由以摄给事中又至于再三论奏而后止，疑若有甚异者，无他，瑰在绍熙元年十月指挥之前，而琚在指挥之后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278373_comment'></div>指挥既定之后，若又开此门，则戚里扳援，何时而已？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278373_comment'></div>两朝圣明，终允其奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278373_comment'></div>韩侂胄之真俸，以淳熙十五年十一月降旨，正与吴瑰事体一同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278373_comment'></div>谢渊之请，切似吴琚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278373_comment'></div>臣是以不容不论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278373_comment'></div>欲望圣慈收寝前项内批指挥，自后若不系南班随龙统兵战守之人，以真俸为请者，一切以定制裁之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278373_comment'></div>既以杜侥倖之门，于节用之政，不为小补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278373_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278373_comment'></div>谨随状缴奏以闻，伏候敕旨』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278373_comment'></div>闰十月十一日，三省同奉圣旨：『谢渊为系皇太后亲弟，可特与书者，馀人不得援例』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278373_comment'></div>令臣书行，须至奏闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278373_comment'></div>右，臣昨来已尝书行谢渊录黄去讫，今窃见给事中楼钥缴驳文字委是允当，始知臣当来卤莽，失于检照，不及论奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278373_comment'></div>今臣若但奉御笔指挥，准前书行，即臣实有三罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278373_comment'></div>一则迎合圣意，不敢执争；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278373_comment'></div>二则冲改绍熙元年十月指挥，使自今有司无所凭守；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278373_comment'></div>三则耻过遂非，无见善则迁之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278373_comment'></div>此臣所以须至烦渎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278373_comment'></div>欲望圣慈特赐追寝上件御笔指挥，仍将臣当来卤莽之罪并行谴责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278373_comment'></div>抑臣区区更有愚见：恭惟陛下临御未久，每事只宜遵守法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278373_comment'></div>窃见近来多因臣下妄有陈乞，直降内批，或与差遣，或添请给人从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278373_comment'></div>今来御笔又有馀人不得援例之文，臣窃以为此等指挥，皆是人主在位日久，快意尚恩，浸开倖门，自乱成宪，岂容初政有此不肃？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278373_comment'></div>更乞陛下念付托之重，正当加兢惧之时，思调护之难，未暇及闲慢之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278373_comment'></div>除却朝廷公众启拟即与施行，应干宫禁小可请求断勿垂听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278373_comment'></div>所贵凡事务令整齐，毋使外人辄有指议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278373_comment'></div>则宗社幸甚，天下幸甚！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278373_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278373_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1278373_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278374' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278374' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278374?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏朱熹宫观状<span class='inlineComment2'>（闰十月二十四日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278374")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278374_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278374'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278374'>准中书门下省送到录黄一道：「三省同奉圣旨：朱熹依旧焕章阁待制、提举隆兴府玉隆万寿宫，任便居住」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278374_comment'></div>又准送到并免朱熹谢辞录黄一道，令臣书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278374_comment'></div>右，臣窃以为朱熹者，三朝故老，难进易退，二十馀年多任祠禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278374_comment'></div>今也欣慕圣明，幡然一出，天下相贺，以为得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278374_comment'></div>则进退之间，岂宜容易？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278374_comment'></div>未审何故，遂听退闲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278374_comment'></div>除目之颁，满朝失色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278374_comment'></div>一则归咎宰执不能回密旨于未出之初；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278374_comment'></div>一则交讥给舍不能还成命于已行之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278374_comment'></div>纷纷之言，其来未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278374_comment'></div>臣所以才有所闻，一一具奏，未蒙报可，方切惶惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278374_comment'></div>今此录黄，当臣书行，臣若严惮天威，俯首惟命，则是上累主德，下喧士论，皆臣之故，臣必不敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278374_comment'></div>区区欲望圣慈追寝上件指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278374_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278374_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278374_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1278374'>〔贴黄〕臣伏思念，若但宠其行，未足以彰陛下不吝之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278374_comment'></div>莫若留之，方慰人望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278374_comment'></div>伏乞睿照。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278374_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278375' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278375' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278375?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏紫霄宫免科敷等事状<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙五年闰十月二十九日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278375")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278375_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278375'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278375'>准中书门下省录黄一道，奉圣旨：「紫霄宫五岳殿系专一崇奉太上皇帝及御前本命香火去讫，除依条送纳二税外，特与蠲免诸般科敷、措借指占安泊等事」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278375_comment'></div>令臣书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278375_comment'></div>右，臣尝论奏初政不宜以小可陈乞，直降内旨，已蒙开纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278375_comment'></div>今紫霄宫复有御笔指挥，特与蠲免科敷措借等事，可谓烦渎天听，玩狎主威矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278375_comment'></div>况今贫民困于科折，若更令游手坐食之徒反得幸免，即本宫递年合输财赋官司难与除豁，须至均敷在人户名下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278375_comment'></div>是恩足以及游手，而不至于百姓，尤臣所深惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278375_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈更不施行上件指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278375_comment'></div>仍自今后似此陈乞，一切断绝，天下幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278375_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278375_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1278375_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278376' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278376' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278376?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴奏陈岘知赣州状<span class='inlineComment2'>（十一月十日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278376")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278376_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278376'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278376'>准中书门下省送到录黄节文：「三省同奉圣旨：陈岘差知赣州，填见阙，不候受告，疾速之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278376_comment'></div>候任满，前来奏事」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278376_comment'></div>令臣书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278376_comment'></div>右，臣窃以为陈岘早为从官，素号鄙俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278376_comment'></div>多历方牧，篾闻廉称，前后臣寮屡有论奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278376_comment'></div>而岘贪不知止，谋欲复用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278376_comment'></div>睥睨累岁，经营万端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278376_comment'></div>今若果如所欲，则是朝廷真无公论，士大夫真不必事廉耻，而巧宦者皆有侥倖之图，益无靖共之操矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278376_comment'></div>然则臣岂与岘争区区一郡哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278376_comment'></div>况岘自駮罢帅广西之命，不闻务自洗濯，省愆迁善，但闻其身为次对，谄事太守，以为诸儿求权局而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278376_comment'></div>共惟始初之政，方尚旌别，似此不知厌足之人，岂宜奖用？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278376_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈将陈岘知赣州指挥特赐寝罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278376_comment'></div>所有录黄，臣未敢书行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278376_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1278376_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年11月</a>　除兼实录院同修撰，请辞。作品：辞免实录院同修撰第一状。<div id='poem_1278377' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278377' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278377?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免实录院同修撰第一状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278377")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278377_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278377'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278377'>准尚书省劄子，三省同奉圣旨，差臣兼实录院同修撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278377_comment'></div>臣闻命震惊，罔知所措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278377_comment'></div>伏缘尚有管见，不敢辄冒受上件兼职，须至烦渎，乞赐寝免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278377_comment'></div>盖臣自为郎官，即兼检讨，几涉三年，未尝得效铅椠之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278377_comment'></div>以臣平生辛苦，颇好编述，比入史院，无以自效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278377_comment'></div>何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278377_comment'></div>史院无专官故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278377_comment'></div>三年之间，修撰、同修撰官，繇今丞相赵汝愚以来，继以尤袤、倪思、李巘、沈揆及近来朱熹，无虑数人，检讨官亦自章颖、黄艾、沈有开、黄由、薛叔似及叶适，无虑数人，皆不甚久，别有迁除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278377_comment'></div>所谓实录，缺然如故，与臣未入院以前无所增益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278377_comment'></div>以此灼见，若无专官，则一朝大典，卒无就篇之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278377_comment'></div>臣尝论奏，虽蒙上皇嘉纳，未见施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278377_comment'></div>今臣谨缴进向来劄子，欲望圣慈特垂省览，令提领大臣勿拘近例，别置专职一二人，使其他兼官以时入局，同共商量，分擘修纂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278377_comment'></div>庶几年岁，稍见次第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278377_comment'></div>若不课其效，但添兼职，是恩宠之而非事实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278377_comment'></div>臣不敢奉明诏，所有上件劄子，未敢祗受，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1278377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278377'><span class='label'>按：</span>十一月二十七日，三省同奉圣旨不允。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278377_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年11月</a>　再上奏请辞免实录院同修撰。作品：辞免实录院同修撰第二状。<div id='poem_1278378' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278378' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278378?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免实录院同修撰第二状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278378")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278378_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278378'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278378'>臣昨具状奏乞寝罢兼实录院同修撰指挥，准尚书省劄子：「今月二十七日三省同奉圣旨不允」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278378_comment'></div>伏缘臣当来辞免文字且申前请乞置专官，不宜但添兼职以为恩宠，而未尝及臣不堪使令之故，致蒙天意未遽从欲，则臣岂敢冒昧，不尽其情？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278378_comment'></div>盖见今史官皆极天下之选，徒以各有攸司，各率其职，志虑所分，精力不逮，是以具员虽众，成书尚难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278378_comment'></div>如臣于今朝行，最为衰退，旧学昏忘，前闻遗失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278378_comment'></div>已试罔功，方切自讼，岂可复玷此选乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278378_comment'></div>以臣所见，当今良史之才，莫如朱熹、叶适，其馀如吴人杰、王明清之徒，皆有志于此者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278378_comment'></div>朱熹、叶适，近尝入院，未几而熹帅江陵，适总淮饷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278378_comment'></div>秉笔之士，相顾嗟惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278378_comment'></div>陛下诚听臣言，以一朝大典之重，不吝改作，复用此二人者，使之专领，将天下皆以为得人，岂非圣朝之美事，明主之盛举哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278378_comment'></div>但熹既去国，假如强起，犹在数月之后；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278378_comment'></div>而适尚未朝辞，足可下留行之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278378_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣明发于英断，以所除臣同修撰一官改作右文殿修撰或秘阁名目，以留叶适，则不过年岁，可冀奏篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278378_comment'></div>恭惟高宗中兴盛德大业可传万世，陛下何爱此一官，不以择才？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278378_comment'></div>臣备员法从，而隐默不言，亦有蔽贤之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278378_comment'></div>兼臣缘多病，正欲少须别求一在外差遣，以便休养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278378_comment'></div>所有上件兼职指挥，臣不敢祗受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278378_comment'></div>伏候敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278378_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1278378'>〔贴黄〕照对叶适与臣有乡曲朋友之好，臣以公论，不敢避嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278378_comment'></div>如蒙采听之后，有以为其人不堪此选，即臣当伏罔上之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278378_comment'></div>伏乞睿照。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1278378_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278378'><span class='label'>按：</span>十二月二日，三省同奉圣旨，依已降指挥，不允。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278378_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年11月</a>　作诗送陈持中赴四明。作品：送陈持中赴四明节推二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（据《南宋馆阁续录》卷八《官联·著作佐郎》，陈柄（持中）绍熙五年十一月除庆元。）</span><div id='poem_161750' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161750' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161750?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送陈持中赴四明节推二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161750")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161750_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161750'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161750'>更无人未识东州，晚得吾宗第一流。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161750_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161750'>编磬在县金奏合，清冰出壑玉壶秋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161750_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161750'>喜才一见还分袂，怀欲多言但倚楼。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161750_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161750'>亦有鄮山三四友，可令观政话然不。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161750_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161750'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161750_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_161749' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161749' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161749?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161749_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161749'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161749'>前修恨不为同姓，更有跫然喜似人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161749'>岁晏得君颜面好，天涯从此尺书频。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161749'>政须有力同扶世，业已将名自绊身。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161749'>它日云台勋绩上，南阳应记旧比邻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161749_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161749'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161749_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年12月</a>　应诏作荐状。作品：应诏荐宗室赵师虙赵师渊状。<div id='poem_1278379' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278379' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278379?labeling=true' target='_blank'>应诏荐宗室赵师虙赵师渊状<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙五年十二月三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278379")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278379_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278379'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278379'>准绍熙五年闰十月二十一日，三省同奉圣旨：「比来宗室在朝者少，可令两省台谏、侍从各举有文学器识者二人，以备选擢」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278379_comment'></div>右，臣仰惟明诏，深切事情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278379_comment'></div>伏缘近来不以宗室与庶姓同进，是致在朝稀少，上关宸虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278379_comment'></div>但以臣所识，仍加访问，欲如诏指求备，颇难其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278379_comment'></div>伏见其中尚沉下僚、最有士誉如宣教郎、新知袁州宜春县事赵师虙，文林郎、前宁海军节度推官赵师渊，行谊修饬，趣操廉静，可以仰备选擢，敢以上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278379_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1278379_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='d3001015d4774fc3816ce1352d3f53fd_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d3001015d4774fc3816ce1352d3f53fd");'><span id='d3001015d4774fc3816ce1352d3f53fd_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>，58岁</div><div id='d3001015d4774fc3816ce1352d3f53fd' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　中书舍人任上，拟写制诰。作品：庆元改元诏。哲文神武成孝皇帝梓宫启攒涂前奏告祝文。启攒毕梓宫还殿皇帝行祭奠礼祝文。发引前一日初更总护史行夜祭礼祝文。发引前一日祭告钱塘钱清江龙神祝文。发引迁奠祝文。掩攒前一日奏告帝后攒宫祝文。掩攒祝文。九虞祭祝文九首。掩攒毕谢土神祝文。安南国王李龙翰加恩制。赐知襄阳府张枃辞免改差知建康府恩命不允诏。赐宰臣赵汝愚等上表请皇帝还内不允批答。赐赵汝愚等再上表请皇帝还内宜允批答。皇后初册封赠三代。少保观文殿大学士充醴泉观使益国公周必大登极恩赠三代。观文殿学士宣奉大夫致仕李彦颖登极恩转光禄大夫。资政殿大学士通奉大夫知潭州王蔺登极恩转正议大夫。资政殿大学士通议大夫提举洞霄宫黄洽登极恩转通奉大夫。朝散郎焕章閤待制朱熹登极恩转朝请郎。户部侍郎梁总登极恩转官。在外侍从登极恩赠父。在外侍从登极恩赠母。在外宰执登极恩封妻。在外侍从登极恩封妻。焕章閤学士洪迈弟邃登极恩母楚国夫人沈氏加赠魏国夫人。右丞相赵汝愚初拜赠三代并妻。李巘除宝文阁学士知婺州改知太平州。吏部尚书郑侨明堂加恩进封开国子。礼部尚书黄裳封普成县开国男。工部尚书赵彦逾封祥符县开国男。权刑部尚书京镗进封开国伯。试御史中丞谢深甫封临海县开国男。吏部侍郎彭龟年封清江县开国男。给事中兼直学士院楼钥封奉化县开国男。中书舍人林大中封永康县开国男。右谏议大夫张叔椿封永嘉县开国男。吏部侍郎孙逢吉封庐陵县开国男。工部侍郎黄艾封莆田县开国男。户部侍郎袁说友进封开国子。户部侍郎梁总进封开国子。礼部侍郎许及之封永嘉县开国男。侍讲朱熹封婺源县开国男。特进观文殿大学士葛邲明堂加恩食邑实封。在外宰执明堂加恩。在外侍从明堂加恩。张淑妃明堂加恩赠三代。右丞相赵汝愚明天加恩赠三代并妻。知枢密院事兼参知政事陈骙明堂加恩赠三代封妻。给事中兼直学士院楼钥明堂恩父加赠正议大夫。权吏部侍郎孙逢吉等明堂恩赠父。焕章閤待制侍讲朱熹明堂恩赠父母。右谏议大夫张叔椿明堂恩赠母并妻。孙逢吉明堂恩妻恭人李氏封令人。在外侍从明堂恩赠父。在外侍从明堂恩封妻。汪大定知江州。仓部员外郎汪梓升郎中。江西提举汪逵除礼部员外郎。丰谊除礼部郎官王闻诗除考功郎官。同知枢密院事京镗初除赠三代。工部尚书赵彦逾除端明殿学士知建康府恩数依执政。右正言黄度除直显谟阁知平江府乞祠禄差主管冲佑观。王闻诗覃恩转官。知宁国府木待问除焕章閤待制。尚书吏部员外郎林季友除右司员外郎。韩彦直致仕。知叙州府庆符县谢辛讨叛身死赠官。知鄂州王信改知池州。新知建康府赵彦逾改除三川安抚制置使兼知成都府。新出江东提刑陈公亮除福建转运副使。赵涣补官。潜邸有劳转官。薛登降两官。骨舜辅随金国贺正使充引接仪范回程循修职郎。赵公介知舒州。赵谟知嘉定府。淮西提举张同之磨勘合转一官乞回授封母。江东提举陈士楚除吏部郎官。湖北提刑陈谦收捕猺寇有劳特除直焕章阁。汪楚材王圭收捕猺寇特转三官。知宜州沙世坚收捕猺寇有劳转团练使。知饶州乐平县杨简除国子博士。广西提刑胡长卿除广西运判主管冲祐观张玠除广西提刑。国子正陈希点太学录汤璹并除太学博士。秘书省正字李璧除校书郎。主管架阁文字陈武除国子正戴溪除太学录。端明殿学士四川安抚制置使赵彦逾赠三代并妻。龙图阁待制知潼川府阎苍舒除焕章閤直学士提举太平兴国宫。知成州宇文子震知潼川府。新知真州权安节除利路运判朝奉大夫徐楠除广东运判。司农寺丞李大异除夔路运判。籍田令费士寅除太学博士。武学谕黄袖然除武学博士主管架阁文字蒋来叟除武学谕。知信州石画问除司封郎官淮西提举张同之转一官再任。军器监主簿王恬除司农寺丞将作监主簿刘三杰除太府寺丞。主管官告院李孟传除将监簿干办粮料院张震除军器监簿。浙西提举郑公显改除湖南提举。知襄阳府张枃知建康府。朝散大夫知南外宗正事赵不溯换右监门卫大将军濠州团练使权知大宗正事。直秘阁刘颖除显谟阁江东运判。浙西提刑黄遹知赣州。太学上舍生李斗南叶元英赐释褐出身。侍卫步军司后军统领戚拱宿卫部辖官兵特转一官。湖南提刑赵不逿除江西提刑寺丞赵頙除江西提举。张演除直秘阁宫观。江东运判刘颖知平江府。李嘉谋知襄阳府。新除福建提刑卢彦德改江东提刑。权户部侍郎梁总除刑部侍郎。司农寺主簿张孝伯除国子监丞。诸王宫大小教授姚愈除司农寺丞国子监主簿罗克开除军器监丞。直秘阁两浙转运判官黄黼除直龙图阁升副使再辞改直显谟阁。仓部郎中汪梓以赵汝愚亲嫌除淮东提举。大理正闾丘泳除利州路提刑。秘书监薛叔似除权户部侍郎。起居舍人刘光祖除起居郎司农少卿邓驲除起居舍人。国子祭酒彭椿年除直龙图阁江东运副。大理寺丞林思齐除大理正。户部郎中王溉除直秘阁知平江府。太府寺簿范荪除大理寺丞。知滁州石崇昭除度支郎官浙西提举吴镒除司封郎官。军器少监兼权司封郎官李大性除浙东提举知常州黄灏除浙西提举。太学博士陈岘武学博士陈邕除秘书省正字。监登闻检院杨大全除宗正寺主簿主管官告院傅伯成除司农寺主簿监都进奏院孟浩除国子监主簿。太学正孙元卿除武学博士。李知己陈景俊并除大理寺丞。国子司业叶适除太府卿淮东总领。杨源转一官。杨纬引嫌知阆州。主管冲佑观黄度知婺州。高宗周押马赏转官。武节郎提辖御前军器所曹组职事脩举转一官。沈槐胡仲衡吕友直并除大理评事。前知抚州赵彦绳知赣州。宗正少卿李祥除国子祭酒。虞俦知湖州。张宗况张宗愈转一官与干官差遣。倪思知泉州。乡贡进士方权输米补迪功郎。程需输米特补承信郎。马大同特复元官致仕。著作佐郎王奭除著作郎。秘书丞陈柄除著作佐郎。太常博士邵康除秘书丞。太常寺主簿刘诚之除太常博士刘孟容除秘书省正字。中书门下省检正诸房公事权刑部侍郎徐谊除权工部侍郎兼知临安府。袁燮除太学正。添差台州通判吕祖俭除太府寺丞浙东常平司干办官孟猷除籍田令。<div id='poem_1277914' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277914' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277914?labeling=true' target='_blank'>庆元改元诏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277914")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277914_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277914'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277914'>敕门下：朕以眇身，托于兆人之上，惟日兢兢，惧无以绍列圣之休，而对扬上皇之慈训也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277914_comment'></div>永惟当今之务，何者为急？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277914_comment'></div>非欲百官修辅而民力裕欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277914_comment'></div>夫亲君子，远小人，庆历、元祐之所以尊朝廷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277914_comment'></div>省刑罚，薄税歛，庆历、元祐之所以惠天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1277914_comment'></div>是彝是训，历年弥长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1277914_comment'></div>肆于中兴，举偏补敝，皆于此乎取法，克至今日，中外乂宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1277914_comment'></div>朕幸蒙遗业，绳祖武，而敢一日忘此乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1277914_comment'></div>掇取美号于纪元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1277914_comment'></div>《诗》云：「不愆不忘，率由旧章」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1277914_comment'></div>盖庶几周成焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1277914_comment'></div>其以明年为庆元元年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1277914_comment'></div>故兹诏示，想宜知悉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1277914_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278819' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278819' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278819?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哲文神武成孝皇帝梓宫启攒涂前奏告祝文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278819")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278819_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278819'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278819'>伏以两楹启殡，六引徂东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278819_comment'></div>欲迁仍几之神，以即因山之吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278819_comment'></div>敢先虔告，用冀安行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278819_comment'></div>尚享。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1278819_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278820' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278820' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278820?labeling=true' target='_blank'>启攒毕梓宫还殿皇帝行祭奠礼祝文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278820")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278820_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278820'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278820'>伏以厌世上宾，终天永叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278820_comment'></div>撤攒涂而即吉，罄薄海以攀号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278820_comment'></div>酹奠虽虔，瞻言何及！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278820_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1278820_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278821' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278821' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278821?labeling=true' target='_blank'>发引前一日初更总护使行夜祭祀祝文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278821")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278821_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278821'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278821'>伏以三年之制，念在终丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278821_comment'></div>七月有期，忍当明发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278821_comment'></div>共修祭事，曷究哀悰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278821_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1278821_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278823' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278823' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278823?labeling=true' target='_blank'>发引迁奠祝文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278823")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278823_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278823'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278823'>伏以仰止龙輴，临于丘隧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278823_comment'></div>方少须于筮日，庶永妥于宾天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278823_comment'></div>昭告何云？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278823_comment'></div>哀摧罔极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278823_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278823_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278824' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278824' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278824?labeling=true' target='_blank'>掩攒前一日奏告昭慈献圣皇后徽宗皇帝显恭皇后显肃皇后显仁皇后高宗皇帝宪节皇后攒宫祝文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_1277915' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277915' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277915?labeling=true' target='_blank'>安南国王李龙翰加恩制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277915")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277915_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277915'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277915'>敕门下：朕宣室受釐，言念梯航之远；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277915_comment'></div>扬廷孚号，载疏纶綍之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277915_comment'></div>以昭烈祖之宏谟，以笃价藩之丕祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277915_comment'></div>推诚顺化，秉信守义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277915_comment'></div>奉国履常，怀德谨度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1277915_comment'></div>思忠功臣、特进、检校太尉、充静海军节度观察处置等使、兼御史大夫、上柱国、安南国王、食邑一万户、食实封三千八百户李龙翰，恪勤厥服，绍美于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1277915_comment'></div>克提千里之封，勿替累朝之好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1277915_comment'></div>霜露所坠，固同洽于至仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1277915_comment'></div>沧海不波，盖良繇于多助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1277915_comment'></div>维时嗣服，有事合宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1277915_comment'></div>亦遐想于弥恭，莫共陪于肇祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1277915_comment'></div>骏奔在庙，虽阻脩黼哻之仪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1277915_comment'></div>旅实充庭，尝与备萧茅之享。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1277915_comment'></div>肆朌新渥，爰广旧封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1277915_comment'></div>裒载籍之名言，侈元勋之显号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1277915_comment'></div>于戏！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1277915_comment'></div>闵予访落，畴在公助祭之劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1277915_comment'></div>嘉乃象贤，谨与国咸休之度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1277915_comment'></div>于焉申锡，其尚钦承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1277915_comment'></div>可依前特进、检校太尉、充静海军节度观察处置等使、兼御史大夫、上柱国、安南国王，加食邑一千户，食实封四百，仍加济美功臣，散官、勋如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1277915_comment'></div>主者施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1277915_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277916' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277916' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277916?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐徽猷阁学士太中大夫知襄阳府张枃辞免改差知建康府恩命乞在外宫观不允诏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1277916_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277916'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277916'>敕具官某：省所上表辞免恩命事具悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277916_comment'></div>尔独不闻故国世臣之说乎，而来谂疾也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277916_comment'></div>夫保坟墓，孰与成先正之美？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277916_comment'></div>休祠馆，孰与图累朝之报？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277916_comment'></div>智者当有所择矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1277916_comment'></div>式遄其驱，毋事多逊！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1277916_comment'></div>所辞宜不允。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1277916_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277917' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277917' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277917?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐文武百寮宰臣赵汝愚等上表请皇帝还内不允批答</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277917")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277917_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277917'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277917'>省表具之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277917_comment'></div>朕遭家多难，懔乎惧不足以当大事，赖天之灵、宗庙之祐，乃者壬寅，获与同轨祔烈祖于思陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277917_comment'></div>而遣车徂东，虞主未返，仰止稽山，明发不寐，皇皇望望，未知所为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277917_comment'></div>公卿百辟，其何以慰朕，而欲徇故常之请，还广内乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277917_comment'></div>方将禀命于上皇以供养，仍九虞侍两宫为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1277917_comment'></div>所请宜不允。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1277917_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1277918' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1277918' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1277918?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐赵汝愚等再上表请皇帝还内宜允批答</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1277918")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1277918_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1277918'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1277918'>省表具之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1277918_comment'></div>夫会朝之嚣欢，非所以示下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1277918_comment'></div>宿卫之暴露，非所以持久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1277918_comment'></div>朕岂不熟虑此欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1277918_comment'></div>但以任、姒之养，未忍违离；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1277918_comment'></div>阜陵复土，盍亦宿留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1277918_comment'></div>是用却前请而勿听也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1277918_comment'></div>今承命三宫，皆曰不可，百辟卿士又恳恳以为言，朕惟舍独见以从众允，徇大权而胜私谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1277918_comment'></div>自古后王鲜不由此，顾如冲人，其敢咈亲尊之意，抑臣庶而弗省乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1277918_comment'></div>所请宜允。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1277918_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278093' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278093' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278093?labeling=true' target='_blank'>观文殿学士宣奉大夫致仕李彦颖登极恩转光禄大夫制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278093")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278093_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278093'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278093'>敕：朕以眇躬，嗣膺丕绪，阙焉惧无以绍列圣之休，访落求助，庶几周成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278093_comment'></div>公卿大夫，其将何以佐朕也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278093_comment'></div>具官某历事三朝，蔚为元老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278093_comment'></div>夫致位丞弼，方倚为相，而不为苟同，竟于谢事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278093_comment'></div>昔萧望之意轻丞相，而位不过御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278093_comment'></div>以为身计则不工，以为道谊计，多见其可尚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278093_comment'></div>肆予绍服，久矣里居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278093_comment'></div>以卿忠谅，则《敬之》之颂，《七月》、《公刘》之风雅，能忘于心乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278093_comment'></div>爰因旧章，序进厥秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278093_comment'></div>亦示永怀，以冀乐告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278093_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278093_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278094' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278094' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_0_1278094_comment'></div>公卿大夫，其将何以佐朕也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278094_comment'></div>具官某历事两朝，孤立一意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278094_comment'></div>方其受重华之托，而光辅上皇始初之政，忠言谠论，不自同于众人，盖天下叹其难，长虑却顾，不苟安于一时，又天下服其远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278094_comment'></div>肆于绍休，适分帅阃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278094_comment'></div>式昭永怀，亦冀乐告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278094_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278094_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278095' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278095' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278095?labeling=true' target='_blank'>资政殿大学士通议大夫提举临安府洞霄宫黄洽登极恩转通奉大夫制</a><span id='poem_sentence_3_1278095_comment'></div>至于行藏，庶几前朝孙文懿、张退傅之伦矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278095_comment'></div>肆予绍服，均佚外祠，以卿忠谅，则《敬之》之颂，《七月》、《公刘》之风雅，能忘于心乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278095_comment'></div>爰因旧章，序进厥秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278095_comment'></div>亦示永怀，以冀乐告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278095_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278095_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278096' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278096' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278096?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝散郎焕章阁待制兼侍讲朱熹登极恩转朝请郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278096")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278096_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278096'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278096'>敕：朕以眇躬，嗣膺丕绪，阙焉惧无以绍列圣之休，访落求助，庶几周成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278096_comment'></div>子大夫，其将何以佐朕也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278096_comment'></div>具官某学先圣之道，而明于当世之务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278096_comment'></div>三仕三已，义不苟合，天下高之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278096_comment'></div>盖累朝之所嘉叹而不忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278096_comment'></div>长沙谋帅，强为时起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278096_comment'></div>肆予初政，式遄其归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278096_comment'></div>虽曰旧章，亦朕美意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278096_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278096_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278097' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278097' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278097?labeling=true' target='_blank'>权户部侍郎梁总登极恩转官制</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278097'>敕：朕以眇躬，嗣膺丕绪，阙焉惧无以绍列圣之休，访落求助，庶几周成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278097_comment'></div>卿大夫，其将何以佐朕也？<div class='inline' id='poem_1278098' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278098' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278098?labeling=true' target='_blank'>在外侍从登极恩赠父制</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278098'>敕：朕方访落求助，自公卿大夫，各加地进律矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278098_comment'></div>则推本其世而褒大其家，虽礼未有，可不以义起乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278098_comment'></div>具官某故父具官某，生有种德之劳，而位不称，殁享义方之报，而何其流之长也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278098_comment'></div>以尔某论思献纳，著节两朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278098_comment'></div>肆予嗣服，心在王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278098_comment'></div>非忠孝之传，有自来欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278098_comment'></div>增贲祢庙，追锡崇阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278098_comment'></div>虽曰旧章，亦以示劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278098_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278098_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278099' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278099' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278099?labeling=true' target='_blank'>在外侍从登极恩赠母制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278099")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278099_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278099'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278099'>敕：朕既本之经谊，为卿大夫崇建祢庙，以侈移忠之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278099_comment'></div>则母氏与享，以次申锡，使之匹休，亦古道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278099_comment'></div>具官某母某氏，来自名门，作配君子，是生贤嗣，蔚为从臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278099_comment'></div>夫《鸡鸣》警戒之道不笃，则过庭之训不严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278099_comment'></div>蘋藻不共，则甘旨不谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278099_comment'></div>尔某何以能移孝为忠也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278099_comment'></div>因其旧号，易以新封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278099_comment'></div>虽曰邦彝，亦足用劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278099_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278099_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278100' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278100' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278100?labeling=true' target='_blank'>在外宰执登极恩赠妻制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278100'>敕：昔成王践祚，世修忠厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278100_comment'></div>其诗曰：「孝子不匮，永锡尔类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278100_comment'></div>其类维何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278100_comment'></div>室家之壶」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278100_comment'></div>盖施及臣子，不但其身，而亦被于室家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278100_comment'></div>具官某妻某氏，克相夫子，蔚为宗工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278100_comment'></div>积行累劳，致位孤棘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278100_comment'></div>惟周人克广孝思，慰满梱内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278100_comment'></div>肆予嗣服，繄尔臣邻多助之至，则为之推恩，燕及闺门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278100_comment'></div>虽祔于姑，亦胙大国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278100_comment'></div>非苟为私，盖周道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278100_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278100_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278101' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278101' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278101?labeling=true' target='_blank'>在外侍从登极恩封妻制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278101")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278101_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278101'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278101'>敕：朕观二《南》之诗，《关雎》为皇后，《鹊巢》、《采蘋》为君大夫妻作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278101_comment'></div>则正家之化，君臣一体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278101_comment'></div>然则，方定长秋之位，而可无以为尔内劝乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278101_comment'></div>具官某妻某氏，以尔夫子，尝为从臣，献纳论思，夙夜匪懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278101_comment'></div>则入朝有《鸡鸣》之戒，退食有《羔羊》之德，非尔之助？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278101_comment'></div>申锡命书，晋之美号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278101_comment'></div>则在初政，岂曰不宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278101_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278101_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278102' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278102' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278102?labeling=true' target='_blank'>焕章阁学士宣奉大夫提举隆兴府玉隆万寿宫洪迈弟朝散大夫新知陕州邃登极恩母楚国夫人沈氏加赠魏国夫人制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278102")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278102_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278102'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278102'>敕：朕访落求助，自卿大夫，皆加地进律矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278102_comment'></div>士有能尊祢庙，至官一品，斯足以报本矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278102_comment'></div>而母氏与享，为君夫人，犹视列国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278102_comment'></div>宜益褒崇，使之匹美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278102_comment'></div>具官某母具位某氏，聿自名门，作配君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278102_comment'></div>遭时不淑，万里违离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278102_comment'></div>而勉正劝义，庶几风人所诵「汝水之坟」、「南山之侧」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278102_comment'></div>天命弗僣，宜享后福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278102_comment'></div>肆予践祚，益大尔封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278102_comment'></div>晋之魏邦，庸示光宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278102_comment'></div>庶克用劝，岂徒旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278102_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278102_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278110' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278110' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278110?labeling=true' target='_blank'>翰林学士承旨李巘除宝文阁学士知婺州改知太平州制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278110")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278110_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278110'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278110'>敕：夫厌直玉堂之庐而纡郡绂，士之操也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278110_comment'></div>闵劳豹尾之班而便私计，上之恩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278110_comment'></div>具位某，早以英华，简在烈祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278110_comment'></div>晚益蕴藉，眷于上皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278110_comment'></div>遭逢两朝，自守一节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278110_comment'></div>盖高文大册，天下传诵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278110_comment'></div>而微辞几谏，世莫得闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278110_comment'></div>肆朕纂绪，人惟求旧，胡然勇退，曳铃其空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278110_comment'></div>朕亦惟自古词臣，一视中外，子羽修令，兼为行人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278110_comment'></div>相如视草，尝使于蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278110_comment'></div>朕独可以弄翰墨苛留久处卿乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278110_comment'></div>峻延閤之班，均便藩之佚，不以宝婺，而以当涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278110_comment'></div>去繁就简，冀尔整暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278110_comment'></div>夫下无怀宠之心，而上有从欲之意，君臣俱美，不其韪欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278110_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1278110_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278111' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278111' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278111?labeling=true' target='_blank'>正奉大夫吏部尚书兼侍读莆田县开国男食邑二百户郑侨明堂加恩进封开国子加食邑二百户制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_0_1278111_comment'></div>远惟孝武，始建汉家之封，而太史谈留滞周南，不与从事，议者惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278111_comment'></div>朕敢忘儒先乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278111_comment'></div>具官某经明行修，士所高仰，不但擢科为天下第一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278111_comment'></div>越从留钥，晋长天官，上皇意也，至朕而决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278111_comment'></div>迨及盛典，式遄其归，盖视汉有光焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278111_comment'></div>增衍封畬，第循故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278111_comment'></div>方资告猷，嗣有显擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278111_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278111_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278112' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278112' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278112?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请郎试礼部尚书兼侍读黄裳封普成县开国男食邑三百户制</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278121'>敕：朕新嗣服，日有事于合宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278121_comment'></div>兢兢焉，惧不闲于礼，而无以接三才之奥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278121_comment'></div>《诗》不云乎：「相维辟公，天子穆穆」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278121_comment'></div>朕嘉赖焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278121_comment'></div>具官某，以轶群之才，有言有绩，辇下弹压，外户不闭，民曹之令，郡国晏然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278121_comment'></div>乃若论思，义形于色，贤劳忠瘁，世莫得闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278121_comment'></div>肆相予祀，克辑上仪，增衍封腴，第循故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278121_comment'></div>方图尔功，嗣有显擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278121_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278121_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278122' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278122' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278122?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中大夫权尚书户部侍郎西安县开国男食邑三百户梁总进封开国子加食邑二百户制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_0_1278122_comment'></div>远惟孝武，始建汉家之封，而太史谈以留滞周南，不得从行为恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278122_comment'></div>朕敢忘从臣乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278122_comment'></div>具官某积有民誉，晋贰地官，盖方尽瘁于朝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278122_comment'></div>衔命北庭，越在万里之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278122_comment'></div>肆予肇禋，独不侍祠，朕是以于汉事有感也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278122_comment'></div>增大食采，庸示永怀。<div class='inline' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278124'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278124'>敕：朕新嗣服，将有事于合宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278124_comment'></div>兢兢焉，惧无以接三才之奥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278124_comment'></div>爰求儒先，来相予祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278124_comment'></div>具官某经明行修，士所高仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278124_comment'></div>而越在藩服，朕敢忘之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278124_comment'></div>昔者孝文受釐，宣室召见贾谊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278125_comment'></div>兢兢焉，惧无以接三才之奥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278125_comment'></div>骏奔在庙，岂无辟公？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278125_comment'></div>盖尝温恭朝夕，执事有恪，侍我烈祖，爰暨上皇，执圭币见上帝者屡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278125_comment'></div>肆予肇禋，均佚就国。<div class='inline' id='poem_1278127' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278127' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278127?labeling=true' target='_blank'>在外侍从明堂加恩制</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278127'>敕：朕新嗣服，日有事于合宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278127_comment'></div>兢兢焉，惧无以接三才之奥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278127_comment'></div>具官某简在烈祖，蔚为名臣，盖尝齐明盛服，习于侍祠之礼矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278127_comment'></div>肆予肇禋，均佚殊馆<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，相维穆穆，于以永怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278127_comment'></div>夫留太史于周南，自昔浩叹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278127_comment'></div>对贾生于宣室，至今美谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278127_comment'></div>朕览汉事，岂能恝然于卿等乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278127_comment'></div>爰因旧章，增大食采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278127_comment'></div>非苟为惠，盖示不遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278127_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278127'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_1278127_0'>⑴ 或云越在辅郡，或云越在外服，或云亦既谢事。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1278127_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1278148' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278148' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278148?labeling=true' target='_blank'>给事中兼直学士院楼钥明堂恩父赠通奉大夫璩加赠正议大夫制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278148")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278148_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278148'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278148'>敕：朕既舍爵书劳，自卿大夫以次第赏矣，则推其世家，为之报本，虽礼未有，独不可以义起乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278148_comment'></div>具官某故父具官某，生为才大夫，而用不尽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278148_comment'></div>殁为贤考，而何其流之长也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278148_comment'></div>属予初禋，百执事在庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278148_comment'></div>尔钥不但骏奔匪懈，而发挥润色，凡祀之大号，皆称朕意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278148_comment'></div>非尔素教而克然欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278148_comment'></div>追锡有彝，爰进厥秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278148_comment'></div>非以为生，亦德之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278148_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278148_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278149' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278149' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278149?labeling=true' target='_blank'>权吏部侍郎孙逢吉等明堂恩赠父制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278149'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278149'>敕：朕既舍爵书劳，自卿大夫以次第赏矣，则推其世家，为之报本，虽礼未有，独不可以义起乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278149_comment'></div>具官某故父具官某，生有种德之美，而位不称；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278149_comment'></div>殁享义方之报<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，而何其流之长也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278149_comment'></div>属予初禋，百执事在庙，尔某不但骏奔匪懈，而敬之显，思之戒，日彻于听闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278149_comment'></div>劬躬焘后，非尔素教之所自来欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278149_comment'></div>追锡有彝，爰进厥秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278149_comment'></div>非以为生，亦德之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278149_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278149_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278149'><div class='inline1'><div class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278150?labeling=true' target='_blank'>焕章阁待制侍讲朱熹明堂恩赠父制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278150")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278150_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278150'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278150'>敕：朕方舍爵书劳，自吾从臣，以次第报，则推本世系，及其祢庙，皆宠绥之，亦祭泽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278150_comment'></div>具官某故父具官某，少而英发，晚益深造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278150_comment'></div>渡江诸老，多其师友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278150_comment'></div>尝历郎闱秉史笔，力诋和议，绪正谤史，盖官虽薄，而志在于天下后世也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278150_comment'></div>位不称德，识者恨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278150_comment'></div>属予肇禋，有严美报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278150_comment'></div>则尔有贤子，劝讲路门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278150_comment'></div>可无褒典，以慰罔极之怀乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278150_comment'></div>追锡崇阶，用贲泉壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278150_comment'></div>非以为生，亦德之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278150_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278150_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278152' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278152' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278152?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右谏议大夫张叔椿明堂恩赠母制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278152")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278152_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278152'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278152'>敕：朕方舍爵书劳，自卿大夫以次第赏，则为之报本，及于母氏，使匹休于祢庙，不亦可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278152_comment'></div>具官某故母具位某氏，克相大雅，如商甘盘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278152_comment'></div>复生贤嗣，如唐阳子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278152_comment'></div>然而生不得与于从爵之荣，晚不得享大五鼎之养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278152_comment'></div>傥无悯章，以贲幽壤，何以慰尔之废蓼莪也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278152_comment'></div>因其旧号，益以新封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278152_comment'></div>虽曰邦彝，亦足用劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278152_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278152_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278154' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278154' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278154?labeling=true' target='_blank'>孙逢吉明堂恩妻恭人李氏封令人制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278154'>敕：朕诵《二南》之诗，至于流荇采蘩，相与共祭，自天子达，皆内助也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278154_comment'></div>故诗人诵之，仲尼定为篇首，其意深矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278154_comment'></div>具官某妻具位某氏，以尔夫子，为吾从臣，肆予初禋，执事有恪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278154_comment'></div>以朕之获助于长秋，则尔亦可以受不失职之赏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278154_comment'></div>晋封美号，庸示宠光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278154_comment'></div>虽曰旧章，实应经谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278154_comment'></div>可<span class='inlineComment2'>（《止斋先生文集》卷一六。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278154_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1278154'>妻：原脱，据道光本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278154_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278155' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278155' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278155?labeling=true' "poem_title_1278155")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278155_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278155'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278155'>敕：朕既舍爵书劳，自卿大夫以次第赏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278155_comment'></div>则推其世家，为之报本，《诗》不云乎：「孝子不匮，永锡尔类」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278155_comment'></div>盖周道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278155_comment'></div>具官某故父具官某，生有种德之勤，而位不称；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278155_comment'></div>没飨义方之报，而何其流之长也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278155_comment'></div>属予初禋，有严美报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278155_comment'></div>生民尊祖，视古不惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278155_comment'></div>而可以忘尔某之祢庙乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278155_comment'></div>本之经谊，追锡崇阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278155_comment'></div>非以为生，亦礼之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278155_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278155_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278156' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278156' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_2_1278158_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278159' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278159' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278159?labeling=true'
