id='poem_1278167' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278167' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278167?labeling=true' target='_blank'>工部尚书赵彦逾除端明殿学士知建康府恩数依执政制<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278167'>敕：维我烈祖，作新同姓，使与天下寒士共趋功名之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278167_comment'></div>盖一时兴起，蔼然多名卿大夫矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278167_comment'></div>朕方相其魁杰而次第用之，以昭我烈祖作人之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278167_comment'></div>具官某奋自儒科，积有民誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278167_comment'></div>盖拔膏粱之习，而独清修苦节，甚于布衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278167_comment'></div>岂惟不以高帝子孙自居？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278167_comment'></div>而谦谦唯谨，不敢遗于僮仆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278167_comment'></div>肆朕嗣服，而忠劳见于大节之际，夷考周汉，同姓有几？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278167_comment'></div>则朕将何以对扬烈祖之意？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278167_comment'></div>昔周人叙康王之事，而孜孜于仲山、南宫毛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278167_comment'></div>汉录代来之功，而额独后朱虚之赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278167_comment'></div>二代治效醇疵与其俗薄厚，于是乎见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278167_comment'></div>是用极之以秘殿之隆名，申之以丞辖之异数，分釐留都，增大食采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278167_comment'></div>凡所以尊宠卿至矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278167_comment'></div>尚其懋哉，毋忘忠报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278167_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1278167_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278168' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278168' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278168?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右正言黄度除直显谟阁知平江府乞祠禄差主管冲佑观制</a><span id='poem_1278170' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278170' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278170?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知宁国府木待问除焕草阁待制制</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278170'>敕：朕方隆孝治，瞻言慈扆，昔者所进，今谁在乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278170_comment'></div>将第其功，而何旧学越在外服也？<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278171?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尚书吏部员外郎林季友除右司员外郎制<span class='inlineComment2'>（九月二十一日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278171")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_1278171'>敕具官某：《诗》不云乎：「彼都人士，狐裘黄黄，其容不改，出言有章」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278171_comment'></div>尔某似之。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278172?labeling=true' target='_blank'>韩彦直致仕制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278172")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278172_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278172'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278172'>敕：三朝法从，方钦企于告猷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278172_comment'></div>奕世贤劳，何遽闻于谢事？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278172_comment'></div>姑惟从欲，盍亦疏恩？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278172_comment'></div>具官某显允材猷，懋昭声闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278172_comment'></div>以云台功臣之后，奋自儒科；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278172_comment'></div>以璧水寒畯之交，明于世务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278172_comment'></div>践更中外，尝试险夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278172_comment'></div>投之于拨烦而咸宜，强之以易武而不愠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278172_comment'></div>至于归休殊馆，殆遗簪绂之荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278172_comment'></div>论次本朝，雅有简编之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278172_comment'></div>肆予初政，怀此旧人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278172_comment'></div>属抱沉痾，竟安居里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278172_comment'></div>亟须新渥，犹阻侍朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278172_comment'></div>览奏牍之所陈，想拖绅之何及！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278172_comment'></div>晚节末路，固莫夺于忱辞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278172_comment'></div>故国世臣，尚益绥于寿嘏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278172_comment'></div>于焉增秩，抑又念功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278172_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278172_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278174' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278174' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278174?labeling=true' target='_blank'>焕章阁待制知鄂州王信知池州制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278174'>敕：故事，以待制而上官典于大州，大抵以望郡多宿兵耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278174_comment'></div>朕方以此意择牧，敢轻授乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278174_comment'></div>具官某奋于书生，而为才大夫，肆我烈祖，简在法从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278174_comment'></div>代言掖垣，□敕琐闼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278174_comment'></div>议论风指，耸闻一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278174_comment'></div>盖荐绅翕然以为落笔妙天下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278174_comment'></div>晚领名藩，屡闻最课。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278174_comment'></div>夫鄂渚池阳，今江湖重兵处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278174_comment'></div>万灶与民居相错，而介士往往不乐于文吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278174_comment'></div>朕即已试，自鄂徙池，尔其深知托重之意而不厌薄，以是为烦调护也，而非苟易置，则予汝嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278174_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278174_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278175' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278175' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278175?labeling=true' target='_blank'>端明殿学士中大夫新知建康府赵彦逾改除四川安抚制置使兼知成都制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278175")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278175_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278175'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278175'>敕：分阃于外，蜀为专；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278175_comment'></div>宿师于边，蜀为重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278175_comment'></div>欲省赋以裕民，又蜀为急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278175_comment'></div>而比年谋帅，多辍从臣，朕择其人，班在丞辖，尤所以加惠蜀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278175_comment'></div>具官某廉足以律百吏之贪，静足以应多故之变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278175_comment'></div>简在两朝，绩用甚茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278175_comment'></div>至于试之拨烦而无难辞，居之绝远而无愠色，又何其过人也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278175_comment'></div>羽仪禁涂，物望愈伟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278175_comment'></div>肆朕嗣服，益见忠操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278175_comment'></div>引以自近，宜在本朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278175_comment'></div>朕亦惟自昔功业之臣，一视中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278175_comment'></div>郑武相周，义和就国；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278175_comment'></div>酂侯当轴，平阳徂齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278175_comment'></div>以卿一意首公，无有遐迩，其为朕崎岖万里，以宽西顾，岂顾介然于怀欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278175_comment'></div>昔在神考，亦强赵抃，而今朕所以烦卿，又自有意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278175_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278175_comment'></div>周以宗强，苟不居中，必为二伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278175_comment'></div>此王道也，非朕所以烦卿之意乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278175_comment'></div>式遄其归，日月可冀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278175_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1278175_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1278198_comment'></div>具官某故妻具位某氏，仪于前人，克济其美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278198_comment'></div>遂相夫子，曳履从班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278198_comment'></div>夫与之处约于鸡鸣盥栉之初，而不与之处乐于象服委蛇之后，傥微追锡，得无若汝水之坟、南山之侧，遭世不淑，咏歌辛苦者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278198_comment'></div>粤自命妇，疏以郡封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278205_comment'></div>尔画问以郡太守，同之以州刺史，当岁不淑，克究尔心，使境内无菜色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278205_comment'></div>计书来上，朕甚嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278205_comment'></div>朕意攸属，无有内外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278205_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278205_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278206' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278206' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278206?labeling=true' target='_blank'>军器监主簿王恬除司农寺丞将作监主簿刘三杰除太府寺丞制<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278206'>敕具官某等：列寺丞，非所以见才也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278206_comment'></div>以今仕版，徒劳州县，盖未尝有一日朝迹者而校数之，则是亦足以致身矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278206_comment'></div>尔恬、尔三杰，非尝淹恤于州县者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278206_comment'></div>顷因□扬簿正二监，今以恬丞大农，三杰丞外府，岂足见汝才哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278206_comment'></div>尚务靖共，以须器使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278206_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1278206_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1278207_comment'></div>尔孟传、震，无以为序进而不加勉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278207_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1278207_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278208' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278208' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278208?labeling=true' target='_blank'>浙西提举郑公显改除湖南提举制</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278208'>敕具官某：汉三互之禁，吾本朝莫之行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278208_comment'></div>至士大夫以嫌自言，则亦从欲以便其私尔。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278210?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝散大夫知南外宗正事赵不溯换右监门卫大将军濠州团练使擢知大宗正事制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> target='_blank'>湖南提刑赵不逿除江西提刑寺丞赵□除江西□□提举制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278215'>敕具官某等：自江以西，绵地数千里，其吏善读律，其商善趋鹾茗之利，而其田畴多旱潦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278215_comment'></div>部使者得其人，则刑罚中而讼缿之俗易，禁弛散歛行，而民不失业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278215_comment'></div>以尔不逿详刑湖湘，不偏听于单辞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278215_comment'></div>尔□率职省寺，谨厚而无失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278215_comment'></div>其以不逿序迁臬司；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278215_comment'></div>□为庾氏，皆王人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278215_comment'></div>观省风谣，布宣德意，可不勉乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278215_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278215_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278216' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278216' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278216?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张演除直秘阁宫观制</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278216'>敕具官某：以熙宁论事之臣之后，其文足以自见，其学足以自饬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278216_comment'></div>此吾烈祖所以寘诸册府，上皇以为郎若卿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278216_comment'></div>晚分郡符，数上奏计，虽不见察于部使者，而见直于言路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278216_comment'></div>而秉心无竞，固请解组。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278216_comment'></div>成尔素履，归休外祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278216_comment'></div>还尔旧著，寓直延阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278216_comment'></div>尚对新渥，以为后图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278216_comment'></div>毋若《考槃》，永矢弗告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278216_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278216_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278217' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278217' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278217?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江东转运判官刘颖知平江府制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278217'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278217'>敕具官某：将输江东，方锡赞书，择牧吴门，又分符竹，尔亦喻朕指乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278217_comment'></div>以尔才足以拨烦，且宜引以自近也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278217_comment'></div>夫足以拨烦，则弥节而为剧郡，所以发游刃之有馀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278217_comment'></div>引以自近，则置诸扶风、冯翊之间，盖鸿渐之序也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278217_comment'></div>深喻此指，无非简记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278217_comment'></div>盍疾其驱，以对新渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278217_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1278217_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278218' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278218' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278218?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李嘉谋知襄阳府制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278218")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278218_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278218'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278218'>敕具官某：维烈祖旁求西州之士，几无遗材，用以为公卿大夫多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278218_comment'></div>而一时同进，宿留州县，位卑官薄，声闻蔼然者，犹一二数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278218_comment'></div>朕所以式遄其归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278218_comment'></div>会乏襄阳之帅，佥谋惟久，而又中道辍汝，以宽顾忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278218_comment'></div>是岂朕初意乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278218_comment'></div>夫旅进周行，每恨非功名之会；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278218_comment'></div>久劳外服，又怀无拾补之益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278218_comment'></div>有能于此，何乡不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278218_comment'></div>则通儒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278218_comment'></div>尔其钦承，以图忠报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278218_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278218_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278219' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278219' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278219?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278219'>敕具官某：观《蜀道》之歌、湘累之赋，则知士大夫不乐久宦于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278219_comment'></div>尔某，崎岖荆益，至于累年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278219_comment'></div>晚归郎闱，意不自得，恳章亟上，持节七闽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278219_comment'></div>夫安于平进而乐远外，曾无纤芥见于词色，是不谓之吉士欤？<div class='inline' href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278220")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278220_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278220'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278220'>敕：朕诵周书，至《立政》，用人之戒详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278220_comment'></div>而三致意于庶狱，至于卒章，独告司寇苏公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278220_comment'></div>夫皆准人也，他无所概见，而司寇独明言其人，何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278220_comment'></div>盖谨而书之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278220_comment'></div>具官某以宽厚长者名当世，而以法士名其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278220_comment'></div>夫法士则深于文，而长者则伤于惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278220_comment'></div>二者皆偏才也，而卿独兼二美焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278220_comment'></div>顷为理官，空圄累月，及掌邦计，郡国晏然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278220_comment'></div>衔命来归，备见忠瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278220_comment'></div>晋贰秋官，此苏公之职也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278220_comment'></div>式敬尔狱，以长我王国，尔尚无愧于周书哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278220_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278220_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278221' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278221' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278221?labeling=true' target='_blank'>司农寺主簿张孝伯除国子监丞制<span class='inlineComment2'>（十月十一日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_0_1278221_comment'></div>胄监有丞，与闻学政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278221_comment'></div>以尔孝伯，雅致不渝，肆用命尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278221_comment'></div>其益好修，以须明陟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278221_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278221_comment'></div></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278222'>敕：具官尔愈、尔克开，皆以文雅尝与闻学政矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278222_comment'></div>而以愈丞农扈，克开丞戎监，盖试烦事，益究尔能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278222_comment'></div>左右具宜，则有明陟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278222_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1278222_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278223' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278223' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278223?labeling=true' target='_blank'>直秘阁两浙转运判官黄黼除直龙图阁升副使再辞龙图改除直显谟阁制<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278223'>敕：具官某以元祐名宦之后，而其学足以自立，才足以自见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278223_comment'></div>将漕郊畿，燕及三辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278223_comment'></div>朕图尔功，正名使华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278223_comment'></div>晋职牺阁，是岂谓之过欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278223_comment'></div>而何逊章来上，至于再三也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278223_comment'></div>益嘉廉操，少却文谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278223_comment'></div>虽不偿劳，亦足厉世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278223_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278223_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278224' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278224' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278224?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仓部郎中汪梓以赵汝愚亲嫌除淮东提举制<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278224'>敕具官某：朕不以防禁遇臣下，而或自言嫌，则亦从欲，以便其私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278224_comment'></div>尔大臣之子，克世其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278224_comment'></div>比解州绂，遄归郎舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278224_comment'></div>尝试未久，誉处有闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278224_comment'></div>顾以当路之嫌，愿就外服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278224_comment'></div>改畀淮节，以华其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278224_comment'></div>虽徇尔怀，亦足风厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278224_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278224_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278225' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278225' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278225?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大理正闾丘泳除利州路提刑制<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278225'>敕具官某：夫持节行郡国，是为周王人，汉部刺史也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278225_comment'></div>然周以下士，汉才秩六百石，何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278225_comment'></div>深知此意，宜何以图报乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278225_comment'></div>尔为理官，亦既累岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278225_comment'></div>博文敏事，似不能言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278225_comment'></div>会择蜀使，咸曰汝可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278225_comment'></div>若尔者，足以循周、汉之制，越次而持节矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278225_comment'></div>详刑于蜀，庸究尔能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278225_comment'></div>往其钦承，以须明陟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278225_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1278225_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278226' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278226' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278226?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秘书监兼实录院检讨官薛叔似除权户部侍郎制<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278226'>敕：朕欲省赋，甚而用不足，盖尝叹息，安得执古以御今之士，与之共图邦计乎而泽下究也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278226_comment'></div>具官某习于六经之道，而明当世之务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278226_comment'></div>自荐绅先生下逮新进，称尔不容口也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278226_comment'></div>属兹衔命，万里来归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278226_comment'></div>革带蔬食，行乎蛮貊，朕甚嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278226_comment'></div>曾未复命，擢贰民曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278226_comment'></div>夫从班岂所以偿劳乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278226_comment'></div>可使治赋，孔门之学；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278226_comment'></div>何以利国？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278226_comment'></div>孟子不对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278226_comment'></div>于斯二者，并行不悖，此朕之所图于汝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278226_comment'></div>尚其懋哉，以永士誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278226_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1278226_comment'></div></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278227'>敕具官某：左、右史，朕所嘉赖，以谨言动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278227_comment'></div>爰自嗣服，仪图其人，皆旧学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278227_comment'></div>尔光祖、驲，顷在储寮，蔚为国士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278227_comment'></div>而光祖繇霜台，驲繇骑省，各以论事，不避权近，俄而去国，朕甚怀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278227_comment'></div>盖尝叹息，安得三益以自近也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278227_comment'></div>今兹归止，实慰我心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278227_comment'></div>其以光祖序进左坳，驲擢居右陛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278227_comment'></div>岂徒以是为私乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278227_comment'></div>其继自今，直笔在前，则出入不钦，号令不臧，将惧思焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278227_comment'></div>尔其懋哉，勿替初意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278228_comment'></div>方在诸生，及见故老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278228_comment'></div>比为博士，独抱遗经。<div class='inline' id='poem_content_1278232'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278232'>敕具官某等：以吾册府校雠之臣，而越在外服，不知其反期何时，非所以为经生、学士劝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278232_comment'></div>尔宗昭、镒，尝同日给笔札，试于玉堂之庐，观如堵墙，其美无度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278232_comment'></div>而何宗昭在淮、镒在湘之久也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278232_comment'></div>夫合江之水，环滁之山，将指承流，尔固乐此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278232_comment'></div>公论不置，盍归郎闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278232_comment'></div>其亟来朝，以对新渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278232_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1278232_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1278233_comment'></div>吴越之间，民无菜色，我有褒玺，必不尔后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278233_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278233_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278246_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278246'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278246'>敕具官某：士行莫高于知止，庙谟莫急于留贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278246_comment'></div>一举而二美附，此朕所以用尔祥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278246_comment'></div>以尔议论接于前闻，行藏备于素履，见推文行，多士攸同，粤从枢属，擢贰胄监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278246_comment'></div>而秉心无竞，陈谊甚高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278246_comment'></div>盖旬岁之间，亡虑数请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278246_comment'></div>以年为解，怀不自安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278246_comment'></div>朕为此风不作，深用嘉尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278246_comment'></div>爰酬已试，晋长司成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278246_comment'></div>本之诸生，以重两学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278246_comment'></div>夫人臣守谊，人主尚德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278246_comment'></div>是足以明教化矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278246_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278246_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278247' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278247' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278247?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虞俦知湖州制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278247'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278247'>敕具官某：以尔尝入霜台，持玉节，风绩甚茂，淹恤云久，尚徒劳州组乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278247_comment'></div>夫仁不异远，义不辞难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278247_comment'></div>乃苕霅之间，自昔乐土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278247_comment'></div>维年不逢，民有菜色，荒政十二，朕靡所爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278247_comment'></div>苟非其人，是将焉寄，此朕所以用汝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278247_comment'></div>寓直延阁，姑宠尔行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278247_comment'></div>亟图民庸，以计来上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278247_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278247_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278248' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278248' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278248?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张宗况张宗愈转一官与干官差遣制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278248'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278248'>敕具官某等：劝分之令下，未有帅先为吾元元输粟于县官者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278248_comment'></div>而尔以勋阀世臣，能奉明诏，朕甚嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278248_comment'></div>爰进厥秩，俾属外台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278248_comment'></div>非苟为恩，将以风厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278248_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278248_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278249' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278249' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278249?labeling=true' target='_blank'>倪思知泉州制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278249'>敕具官某：朕观周诗，至于廷臣徂齐入谢，为之作诵，勤勤劳苦，然后知官人之道焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278249_comment'></div>尔蚤以英声，颖脱时辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278249_comment'></div>浸即膴仕，蔚为国华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278249_comment'></div>日者方憩征骖，俄而去国，顾乃愿休祠馆，不就郡章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278249_comment'></div>以若所为，岂必待仕而后慊于心欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278249_comment'></div>而朕自不能忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278249_comment'></div>维闽山乐土，温陵佳郡，成尔素履，姑惟迟次，事简赋宽，可践所学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278249_comment'></div>往其钦承，益自明试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278249_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278249_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278250' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278250' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278250?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乡贡进土方权输米补迪功郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278251?labeling=true' target='_blank'>程需输米特补承信郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278251'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278251'>敕某：劝分之令下，未有帅先为吾元元输粟于县官者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278251_comment'></div>而尔能奉明诏，是足嘉与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278251_comment'></div>官以右选，以劝后来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278251_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1278251_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278252' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278252' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278252?labeling=true' target='_blank'>马大同特复元官致仕制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278252'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278252'>敕：霜台有请，固不可屈于恩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278252_comment'></div>泉壤可怀，亦不容废以法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278252_comment'></div>爰弃前咎，遂还故官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278252_comment'></div>以昭念旧之仁，以示劝能之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278252_comment'></div>具官某信己之学，兼人之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278252_comment'></div>粤自少年，意已轻于先达；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278252_comment'></div>浸更膴仕，耻徒事于清谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278252_comment'></div>盖时出其抱负之长，而概见于设施之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278252_comment'></div>修明臬事，有发伏擿奸之功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278252_comment'></div>论建版曹，皆足用长财之画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278252_comment'></div>肆予初政，荐有烦言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278252_comment'></div>属尔沉痾，姑从薄责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278252_comment'></div>谅兼忘于宠辱，何遽隔于幽明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278252_comment'></div>东首拖绅，曷慰九原之恨？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278252_comment'></div>西清持橐，尚歆再命之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278252_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1278252_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278253' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278253' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278253?labeling=true' target='_blank'>著作佐郎王奭除著作郎制<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月二十三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278253'>敕具官某：雍也仁而不佞，仲尼所以第德行之科也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278253_comment'></div>尔群居则寡言，旅进则却立，不几乎所谓仁而不佞者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278253_comment'></div>久游册府，殊无兢心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278253_comment'></div>比上著庭，见谓直笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278253_comment'></div>于焉序迁，未足以究尔能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278253_comment'></div>朕方识之，行有简擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278253_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1278253_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278254' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278254' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278254?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秘书丞陈柄除著作佐郎制<span class='inlineComment2'>（十一月二十二日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278254")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278254_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278254'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278254'>敕具官某：载笔东观，极天下之选矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278254_comment'></div>官资崇卑、岁月久近不足论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278254_comment'></div>尔尝奉大对，亚乎褒然之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278254_comment'></div>才长文富，不自衒鬻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278254_comment'></div>从其所好，翱翔著庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278254_comment'></div>以昌令名，以就远器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278254_comment'></div>《诗》不云乎：「潜虽伏矣，亦孔之炤」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278254_comment'></div>尔亦喻此指乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278254_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278254_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278255' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278255' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278255?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太常博士邵康除秘书丞制<span class='inlineComment2'>（十一月二十三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278255")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278255_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278255'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278255'>敕具官某：筮仕学省，遂入容台，遂上册府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278255_comment'></div>士而能致身如此，盖亡几人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278255_comment'></div>以尔奏名南宫，尝为天下第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278255_comment'></div>种学绩文，益务持养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278255_comment'></div>次第及此，朝无异言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278255_comment'></div>往其懋哉，以就远器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278255_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1278255_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278256' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278256' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278256?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太常寺主簿刘诚之除太常博士刘孟容除秘书省正字制<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278256")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278256_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1278256_0'>① 十一月二十三日。孟容，二十七日。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278256'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278256'>敕具官某：朕每讲至于《春秋》一书，则闻刘氏之说，本朝经学，未能或之先也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278256_comment'></div>访求其家，则尔诚之、孟容，皆世科第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278256_comment'></div>诚之方簿正曲台，雅有誉处；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278256_comment'></div>而孟容淹恤在外，称者尤不容口也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278256_comment'></div>其以诚之为礼博士，而特招孟容寘诸册府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278256_comment'></div>《诗》不云乎：「凡周之士，不显亦世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278256_comment'></div>世之不显，厥犹翼翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278256_comment'></div>思皇多士，生此王国」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278256_comment'></div>朕盖庶几于此焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278256_comment'></div>可。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1278256'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1278256_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278257' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278257' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278257?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中书门下省检正诸房公事兼权刑部侍郎徐谊除权工部侍郎兼知临安府制<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278257")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278257_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278257'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278257'>敕：商邑翼翼，四方之极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278257_comment'></div>夫为内史，而无尊重难危之势，非所以览示海内、壮京室也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278257_comment'></div>具官某外宽而中刚，末详而本约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278257_comment'></div>能通当今之务，而不失古意；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278257_comment'></div>能得君子之心，而不忿疾于顽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278257_comment'></div>比尝试对，赋奏闿切，朕识之久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278257_comment'></div>会谋畿帅，而简之庶僚，贰于起部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278257_comment'></div>盖闻冀里言之助者，开群枉之门；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278257_comment'></div>怀危得之情者，持自营之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278257_comment'></div>内史不竞，职此之由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278257_comment'></div>仪图其人，无以易汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278257_comment'></div>是用蔽自朕志，度越故常，以论思之班，行弹压之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278257_comment'></div>往其懋哉，以振首善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278257_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1278257_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278258' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278258' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278258?labeling=true' target='_blank'>袁燮除太学正制<span class='inlineComment2'>（十二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278258")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278258_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278258'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278258'>敕具官某：今周行之士，可以为人师者不乏，而朕取诸远，至于一再。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278258_comment'></div>尔燮亦喻此指乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278258_comment'></div>夫行修于家，而未施用于世，名闻于州里，而未有著于朝列，此人主之所务白也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278258_comment'></div>宜益懋官，以副朕不遐遗之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278258_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278258_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278259' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278259' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278259?labeling=true' target='_blank'>添差台州通判吕祖俭除太府寺丞浙东常平司干官孟猷除籍田令制<span class='inlineComment2'>（猷，闰十月三日。祖俭，十二月。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1194年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278259")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278259_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278259'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278259'>敕：用人之弊，其惟泄迩而忘远乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278259_comment'></div>肆朕嗣服，览示无外，间有遗材，取之下国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278259_comment'></div>尔祖俭、尔猷，皆以故家子孙，雅有誉处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278259_comment'></div>孝友行于穷约，而趣尚不专于科第也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278259_comment'></div>徒劳州县，未究尔能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278259_comment'></div>以尔祖俭丞外府，猷令籍田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278259_comment'></div>其益好修，以称朕意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278259_comment'></div>可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278259_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1194&endYear=1194')">1194年</a>　上嘉王札子。作品：上嘉王札子三首。<br /><a href="javascript: 福州

ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278467")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278467_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_sentence_1_1278467_comment'></div>偃四海之经纶，需一方之膏泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278467_comment'></div>善类太息，下僚敢私？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278467_comment'></div>某官刚大而沉潜，高明而慈惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278467_comment'></div>贵极三台之上，犹如书生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278467_comment'></div>谦无一日之长，隐若敌国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278467_comment'></div>事有关于消长，身不顾于是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278467_comment'></div>猝遇人情之未尝，徐图天意之自定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278467_comment'></div>勋业藏于不睹，议论付之将来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278467_comment'></div>昔王文正之终相天禧，爰弭寇、丁之争；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278467_comment'></div>韩忠献之独留康定，式遄范、富之归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278467_comment'></div>盖尝夷考旧闻，仰止先哲，怅此意之莫嗣，微我公而安归？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278467_comment'></div>是宜再调化元，一定国是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278467_comment'></div>肃□群□，□□□之雨风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278467_comment'></div>朝宗百川，作中流之砥柱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278467_comment'></div>某适与走趋之□，□□□在之详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278467_comment'></div>与其从元戎十乘之游，辉光自近；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278467_comment'></div>孰令在□□□□之数，穹壤攸同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278467_comment'></div>暄冷未齐，霖潦将作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278467_comment'></div>伏乞俯从民□，□□太和。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1278467_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278468' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278468' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278468?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与福建柴运副启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1179年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278468")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278468_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278468'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278468'>风宪一台，□归于正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278468_comment'></div>岂□□□，复与驱驰？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278468_comment'></div>载惟幸会之深，莫喻忻愉之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278468_comment'></div>某官刑于太□，老成典刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278468_comment'></div>挺松柏而后凋，抱圭璋而不琢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278468_comment'></div>承宣淮右，□□□□之言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278468_comment'></div>入觐明廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278468_comment'></div>尝建久长之策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278468_comment'></div>所以不□推爱，爰命□□。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278468_comment'></div>□□□□，尝中于机会；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278468_comment'></div>薄物细故，不登于简书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278468_comment'></div>眷言其□之可，莫若国家之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278468_comment'></div>然居纠缪绳愆之任，则无服谗蒐恶之讽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278468_comment'></div>方平之遣发大臣，□景仁深陈其非是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278468_comment'></div>邢恶之追穷往事，□□□尤论其不公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278468_comment'></div>于大雅之寂寥，俾善类之安辑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278468_comment'></div>意已□□，俗难异言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278468_comment'></div>某既畴昔之依仁，矧继今而受令？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278468_comment'></div>愿言终教，吾之全归。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1278468_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278469' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278469' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278469?labeling=true' "poem_title_1278469")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278469_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278469'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278469'>功名富贵，不知几人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278469_comment'></div>儒雅风流，自有定论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278469_comment'></div>当致后生之敬，岂云属吏之仪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278469_comment'></div>某官志古而通今，方中而圆外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278469_comment'></div>词章近于大雅，议论接乎前闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278469_comment'></div>及从南渡之老成，不数东州之辈行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278469_comment'></div>馀辉映物，有晋七贤之遗风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278469_comment'></div>数语名家，非唐诸子之末伎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278469_comment'></div>是宜次《玄鸟》、《生民》之作，荐圜丘清庙之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278469_comment'></div>而乃袖手旁观，用心更苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278469_comment'></div>退老鉴湖之曲，与世相忘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278469_comment'></div>行歌蜀道之难，令人太息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278469_comment'></div>万里来归之晚，群公迎劳之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278469_comment'></div>胡然湖山，忽已岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278469_comment'></div>虽所临之幸甚，将有识之云何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278469_comment'></div>某志在从游，乃今受察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278469_comment'></div>十年始见，尝有感于斯文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278469_comment'></div>一纸自通，辄遂忘于不肖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278469_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1278469_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278470' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278470' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278470?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与福建钱运判启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1179年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278470")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278470_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278470'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278470'>为贫择禄，幸察于宽朝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278470_comment'></div>同正置员，获依于德宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278470_comment'></div>忘其恐惧，继以欢愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278470_comment'></div>某官老成典刑，儒术润色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278470_comment'></div>自昔连萼，世有令名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278470_comment'></div>于今荐绅，孰为先进？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278470_comment'></div>荐扬华贯，甫直禁林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278470_comment'></div>方阔步宠光之时，乃远怀流俗之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278470_comment'></div>自揽湖湘之辔，复还闽越之辕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278470_comment'></div>清风弥高，善类太息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278470_comment'></div>然而弭伏浇讹之习，布宣宽大之条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278470_comment'></div>若有隐忧，不事表襮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278470_comment'></div>虽周王人特序诸侯之上，居之甚谦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278470_comment'></div>有汉刺史不察黄绶之风，欺者岂忍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278470_comment'></div>眷此意之常在，当古人之与求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278470_comment'></div>某昔尝侍瞻，今在按抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278470_comment'></div>愿言终惠，式俾依归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278470_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278470_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278411' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278411' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278411?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与闽帅梁丞相论耆长壮丁事书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1179年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278411")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278411_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278411'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278411'>切见熙宁保甲法行，始以保正、副、大小保长代耆户长、壮丁，承引催科之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278411_comment'></div>至元祐间，复差耆户长、壮丁法，其旧以保正、长代者，并罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278411_comment'></div>绍圣复雇役法，再以保正、长催科，其保正、长不愿就顾者，依旧召募耆户长、壮丁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278411_comment'></div>以此，福建路耆户长、壮丁往往与保正、长并行不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278411_comment'></div>然其所以不为民病者，以其犹有顾钱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278411_comment'></div>自绍兴十年以耆户长顾钱拨入经、总制司窠名，十二年，又并壮丁顾钱拨入总制窠名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278411_comment'></div>由是江浙诸州耆户长、壮丁并废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278411_comment'></div>惟福建诸州至今有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278411_comment'></div>某照得福州官司检验缉捉催率勘会烦重之事，必责之保正、副、大小保长，而耆壮时时以县司帖引，追系搔扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278411_comment'></div>夫役不给禄，诚未易论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278411_comment'></div>然州县曹吏，日在官府，犹可以绳检谴诃之，又不比耆壮散居乡村，为害编户，莫知禁止也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278411_comment'></div>以某短见，宜如江浙间事例，一切废罢，毋重为民害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278411_comment'></div>亦仁政实惠之一端矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1278411_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年</a>　右正言黄洽劾以专擅，被罢。<br /></div>
-----end

id='poem_title_1278261_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278261'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278261'>湛恩所被，乐岁相仍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278261_comment'></div>边境晏然，书生幸甚<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278261_comment'></div>伏念臣起于寒远，持是空虚，憖尝试之罔功，欲自新而无路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278261_comment'></div>粤惟郴桂，介在湖湘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278261_comment'></div>周职方之所未闻，汉刺史之所不察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278261_comment'></div>惟本朝之建国，合四海以为家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278261_comment'></div>盖壤地仅同于附庸，则简书皆听其专达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278261_comment'></div>如臣疵贱，际此休明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278261_comment'></div>虽贪假守之荣，但求便道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278261_comment'></div>亦有来王之问，爰至公车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278261_comment'></div>诚世所谓谨守三尺之常，而臣实为上通九重之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278261_comment'></div>譬诸稚子，得言笑于亲前；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278261_comment'></div>意者孤根，有发生之天幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278261_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇皇帝陛下不居其圣，无斁于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278261_comment'></div>凡试其外服之劳，皆待以晚成之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278261_comment'></div>遂令庸冗，亦与宠光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278261_comment'></div>臣敢不言念昨非，务收后效？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278261_comment'></div>毋以己见，纷更已便之教条；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278261_comment'></div>尚于公馀，增益未能之问学。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1278261_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　和王教授谦叔述郡圃韵。作品：和王教授谦叔述郡圃韵。<span class='inlineComment2'>（王益祥（字谦叔）淳熙进士，历桂阳、建康教授。与陈傅良为郡僚当在本年。）</span><div id='poem_161906' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161906' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161906?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_0_161906'>守边岂无事，治圃亦有说。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161906'>朝看士饮羽，暮与客投辖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161906'>且以示多暇，且以劳同列。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161906'>我生肠九回，世故肱三折。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161906'>环堵仅寻丈，短亭聊岁月。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_161906'>忽蒙当宁记，滥补专城缺。<div id='poem_sentence_5_161906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_161906'>区区自米盐，在在欲黼黻。<div id='poem_sentence_6_161906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_161906'>矧惟有兹山，未省从何月。<div id='poem_sentence_7_161906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_161906'>张罗上空庭，寻斧及劲节。<div id='poem_sentence_8_161906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_note_161906_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　与林渊叔书信往来。作品：与林懿仲书二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（林渊叔字懿仲，林元章次子，林正仲之弟。登淳熙十一年进士第，庆元元年九月壬辰卒于扬州司户，年五十二。）</span><div id='poem_1278429' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278429' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278429?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与林懿仲书<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278429")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278429_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278429'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278429'>某凡八十馀日始达官下，一冬雨雪，难阻万状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278429_comment'></div>回想闲居士友团头之乐，不可得已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278429_comment'></div>桂阳本一县，置吏养兵与赋输视他大郡，民力重困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278429_comment'></div>至于甚不能平，则或骚动，非其俗喜乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278429_comment'></div>至此逾月，犴无见囚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278429_comment'></div>而讼牍但田土典卖不明等事，盖朴鲁耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278429_comment'></div>唯是帑藏尽虚，荡无纲目，而漕檄如织，官兵持逋券责偿者累月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278429_comment'></div>正使收拾得到，亦无以供之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278429_comment'></div>是则可忧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278429_comment'></div>湖南诸郡，刘子澄最善政，竟不能免；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278429_comment'></div>蔡直之邵阳次之，亦有不乐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278429_comment'></div>今春臧状，未必调一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278429_comment'></div>劳者何以劝乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278429_comment'></div>勿为他人道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278429_comment'></div>幸幸。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1278429_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278430' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278430' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278430?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278430_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278430'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278430'>淮甸不知此去当如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278430_comment'></div>钱币一事，想已动摇了人情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278430_comment'></div>朝家方救过不暇，应置此未经念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278430_comment'></div>要是便钱务最佳，俟稍定，试拈出此话头也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278430_comment'></div>某荷上眷不薄，然竭尽区区，无毫发之补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278430_comment'></div>至乞休致，其情可想。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278430_comment'></div>朋友宦游四方，虽时时上心，亦未有馀力相照烛，非忘之也。</div><div id='poem_title_161968' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161968?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送杨渭夫归省</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161968")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_161968_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161968'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161968'>应侯气盖百粤小，朱侯谊与漓江长。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161968_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161968'>两侯爱士早成癖，怪甚渭夫怀故乡。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161968_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161968'>士穷万事一不就，就得一事穷何伤。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161968_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161968'>渭夫壮者忍穷久，老骥欲秣胡沙霜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161968_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161968'>吾家何在云横岭，赵媪不冤刘儿瞑，孰与亲旁煮汤饼<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161968_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_161968'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_161968_0'>⑴ 自注：渭夫初至临桂，刘氏儿被杀，贼不获，不数日渭夫竟得之。既而权义宁令，复有杀赵氏妪者，或执平人将处死，人以为非渭夫莫能辨，府召渭夫与议，旬日又得之。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_161968_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　作诗咏南岳圣业寺柏树。作品：南岳圣业寺禹柏。<div id='poem_161948' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161948' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161948?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南岳圣业寺禹柏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161948")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_161948_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161948'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161948'>久与林壑居，所见皆众稚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161948'>岂无寿千年，未有此柏异。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161948'>壮而尝参天，晚乃但仆地。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161948'>定非风雨摧，殆是斤斧弃。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161948'>其本则离披，其末则倒植。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_161948'>其枯如残蘖，而蔚有新意。<div id='poem_sentence_5_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_161948'>其靡如弱植，而凛有高致。<div id='poem_sentence_6_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_161948'>将前复却行，宜右忽左次。<div id='poem_sentence_7_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_161948'>骧龙或俯顾，遁虎或回眙。<div id='poem_sentence_8_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_161948'>陨石或猛起，飞翚或颠坠。<div id='poem_sentence_9_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_161948'>山立或磬折，尸寝或拳跽。<div id='poem_sentence_10_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_161948'>断支或强附，横陈或巽避。<div id='poem_sentence_11_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_161948'>绸缪情不狎，颓堕力未瘁。<div id='poem_sentence_12_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_161948'>朴略自光怪，挺持匪标置。<div id='poem_sentence_13_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_161948'>终焉人伪尽，独以天巧遂。<div id='poem_sentence_14_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_161948'>吾闻古有道，纯朴去故智。<div id='poem_sentence_15_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_161948'>与世每如此，全身亦几是。<div id='poem_sentence_16_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_161948'>疑将问岁月，缺弗见载记。<div id='poem_sentence_17_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_161948'>谁言导江时，手植特嬉戏。<div id='poem_sentence_18_161948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161628'>我在穷山人迹罕，亦蒙惟错馈甘鲜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　九日与僚属唱和。作品：酬王判官和九日韵一以归德于部使者二寄郴州使君三以为谢四奉留也。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年10月</a>　为高宗驾崩周年作文上孝宗。作品：高宗小祥慰皇帝。<div id='poem_1278262' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278262' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278262?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高宗小祥慰皇帝表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278262")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278262_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278262'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278262'>铺筵仍几，方笃时思；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278262_comment'></div>钻燧新烟，忽更岁序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278262_comment'></div>九重号恸，率土悲摧<span class='inlineComment2'>（中慰。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278262_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下道对百王，识高千载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278262_comment'></div>谅闇如古，不拘易月之文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278262_comment'></div>练祥于今，尚损踰年之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278262_comment'></div>追惟愈远，痛甚何堪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278262_comment'></div>伏乞少抑圣怀，绍世德作周之孝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278262_comment'></div>特垂天听，徇同心戴舜之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278262_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1278262_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年12月</a>　腊月下雪作诗抒怀。作品：戊申腊桂阳喜雪。<div id='poem_161648' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161648' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161648?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戊申腊桂阳喜雪</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161648")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161648_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161648'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161648'>月不能明雨却稀，山容野色夜辉辉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161648_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161648'>清霄下际双琼阙，仙仗前驱万玉妃。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161648_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161648'>亘古岭旁冬不到，从今湖外岁无饥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161648_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161648'>来年此日吾何适，蓑笠寒江一钓矶。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161648_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161648'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161648_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年12月</a>　喜雪作诗抒怀。作品：再用喜雪韵一以抒怀，一以喜客。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　为重修岳麓书院作记。作品：潭州重修岳麓书院记。<div id='poem_1278735' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278735' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278735?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潭州重脩岳麓书院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙十五年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278735")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278735_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278735'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278735'>自唐季至于五代，用兵而教事阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278735_comment'></div>圣人作，四方次第平，以俎豆胜干戈，而天下靡然日趋于文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278735_comment'></div>盖宋受命四年，遂平荆湖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278735_comment'></div>又十有一年，尚书朱洞来守长沙，作书院岳麓山下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278735_comment'></div>朱在国史，其行事不甚较著，足以考见上意所乡，为吏者皆承休德，知所先后如此，岂不盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278735_comment'></div>而其风动抑何速也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278735_comment'></div>五六十载之间，教化大洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278735_comment'></div>学者皆振振雅驯，行艺脩好，庶几于古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278735_comment'></div>当是时，州县犹未尽立学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278735_comment'></div>所谓十九教授，未有显者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278735_comment'></div>而四书院之名，独闻天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278735_comment'></div>上方崇长褒异之者甚至，则其成就之效博矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278735_comment'></div>熙宁初行三舍之法，颇欲进士尽繇学校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278735_comment'></div>而乡举益重教官之选，举子家状，必自言尝受业某州教授，使不得人自为说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278735_comment'></div>崇宁以后，舍法加密，虽里闾句读童子之师，不关白州学者，皆有禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278735_comment'></div>诏令诚甚美，然由是文具胜，而利禄之意多，老师宿儒尽向之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278735_comment'></div>书院不知起何时，以余所闻，汉初郡国，往往有夫子庙，而无教官，且不置博士弟子员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278735_comment'></div>其学士，尝课试，供养与否，阙不见传记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278735_comment'></div>然诸儒以明经教于其乡，率从之者数十百人，辄以名其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278735_comment'></div>齐鲁燕赵之间，《诗》、《书》、《礼》《、易》、《春秋》、《论语》，家各甚盛，则今书院近之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278735_comment'></div>县官时时遣守相劳问，致馈为礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278735_comment'></div>其门生皆世守师说，更相传受不易业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278735_comment'></div>盖至孝武帝时，郡国始稍稍有学校官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278735_comment'></div>由今观汉晚出，视其初，儒者术业，工楛优劣，可知也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278735_comment'></div>方大中祥符间，天子使使召见山长周氏式，拜国子主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278735_comment'></div>诏留讲诸王宫，式固谢不应诏，卒还山肄习如初，至赐对衣、鞍马、内府书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278735_comment'></div>而宋有戚氏，吴有胡氏，鲁有孙、石二氏，各以道德为人师，不苟合于世著名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278735_comment'></div>余以是益叹国初士风之厚，本之师道尊，而书院为不可废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278735_comment'></div>乾道元年，故帅枢密刘公珙克复开宝之旧，已浸费治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278735_comment'></div>今直徽猷阁潘公畤，亟践脩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278735_comment'></div>某得官桂阳，于长沙为属邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278735_comment'></div>始诣大府请事，时公至镇适数月矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278735_comment'></div>与九郡守要束，咸以宽简，阖部晏然，民吏意得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278735_comment'></div>曾无凡目，可以再三于有司者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278735_comment'></div>因得陪别驾后，至书院谒诸先生□祠下，会修事且辑，诸生穆然而志专，徘徊乐之，不忍去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278735_comment'></div>既去，州教授兼山长顾𣏌、堂长吴猎，以讫役，属为之记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278735_comment'></div>某尝获诵侍讲张先生所为记，及于治心修身之要，湖湘之俊，亦既知所指归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278735_comment'></div>近岁，以其论述，由大学礼部奏名，及对大廷，连为天下第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278735_comment'></div>他未试，可略睹矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278735_comment'></div>虽欲有言，无以出讲闻之外者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278735_comment'></div>而公于今卿大夫为先进，年益高，闻望益尊重，人人能道之，又何待余言者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278735_comment'></div>故但次书院所从废兴之故，系以岁月，而强附名焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278735_comment'></div>是岁，淳熙十有五年。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1278735_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　与桂阳赵守书信往复。作品：答桂阳赵守。<div id='poem_1278472' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278472' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278472?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答桂杨赵守启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278472")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278472_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278472'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278472'>交贽闽山，幸彻名之惟旧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278472_comment'></div>问津湘水，将观政之有期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278472_comment'></div>辱笺翰之先施，缅风猷而增感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278472_comment'></div>某官宗盟领袖，朝路羽仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278472_comment'></div>典刑盖得之前闻，事业未量其远到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278472_comment'></div>温恭尔雅，在《二南》公子之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278472_comment'></div>乐易宜民，真两汉循吏之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278472_comment'></div>永惟昭代，克壮维城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278472_comment'></div>大连十州，小乘一障。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278472_comment'></div>以固磐石之势，以绵瓜瓞之祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278472_comment'></div>眷言贤劳，越在边琐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278472_comment'></div>有书生而继此，将舆论之谓何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278472_comment'></div>如某者筮仕匪多，才赋甚拙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278472_comment'></div>徒以诸公久怜其家食，遂令一介尝试于邦条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278472_comment'></div>欲其蒙成，可不终惠？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278472_comment'></div>方剖竹合符之始，罙切凌兢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278472_comment'></div>惟甘棠所茇之馀，尚堪凭藉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278472_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278472_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　与湖南安抚潘畤书信往复。作品：与湖南潘安抚畤。<div id='poem_1278473' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278473' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278473?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与湖南潘安抚畤启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278473'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278473'>燕及庶邦，实恃元侯之重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278473_comment'></div>瞻言当代，谁如旧德之尊？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278473_comment'></div>乃以诸生，来为属邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278473_comment'></div>心独自喜，口不能宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278473_comment'></div>某官以大雅之英，得中庸之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278473_comment'></div>跂彼群老，凄其百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278473_comment'></div>自昔声名，非故国乔木之谓；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278473_comment'></div>于今辈行，在中流砥柱之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278473_comment'></div>永惟衡岳以南，荆州之镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278473_comment'></div>荒地弗治，欲稍如闽浙之区；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278473_comment'></div>足兵何先？正急此湖广之赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278473_comment'></div>孰为二者之善计，以副九重之至仁？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278473_comment'></div>于以烦公，盖将托国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278473_comment'></div>有如朴樕，亦预驱驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278473_comment'></div>上之不能宣中和乐易之风，下之不能及期会簿书之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278473_comment'></div>爰从初□，良有后忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278473_comment'></div>□□□□，未知安仰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278473_comment'></div>□缘幸会，忽过所图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278473_comment'></div>逝将听謦欬以自宽，抑□□分守而不敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278473_comment'></div>□怜拙学，乏由求从政之长；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278473_comment'></div>庶俾愚踪，□□□□讥之致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278473_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1278473_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　作书答复杨知录。作品：答杨知录。<div id='poem_1278474' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278474' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278474?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答杨知录启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1278474'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278474'>地方千里，岂无问政之人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278474_comment'></div>天各一涯，未有纳交之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278474_comment'></div>繇渊源之实学，出文字之绪馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278474_comment'></div>阅过千帆，不作积薪之叹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278474_comment'></div>功收百战，益知游刃之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278474_comment'></div>盖有志于淑人，亦何心于试吏？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278474_comment'></div>永惟旧郡，粤自熙朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278474_comment'></div>与计偕者间岁有之，能宦达者于今罕甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278474_comment'></div>文物不竞，国风所关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278474_comment'></div>不资先进之贤，曷振清流之望？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278474_comment'></div>□□可式，庶几多干木之风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278474_comment'></div>狱市所容，奚止问盖公之道<span class='inlineComment2'>（《止斋先生文集》卷三二。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278474_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1278474'>缙绅：原缺，据道光本、永嘉本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1278474_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　作书答复郑教授。作品：答郑教授。<div id='poem_1278475' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278475' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278475?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答郑教授启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278475")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278475_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278475'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278475'>不图行李，遽辱华笺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278475_comment'></div>以高谊之相先，知衰悰之不敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278475_comment'></div>喜于既见，诚无异于《菁莪》之诗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278475_comment'></div>愧在后来，恐未免有积薪之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278475_comment'></div>某官汲古之学，济时之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278475_comment'></div>蔼然桑梓之课，籍甚缙绅之誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278475_comment'></div>循次而进，宜在衮衮台省之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278475_comment'></div>有怀不伸，尚为青青衿佩之伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278475_comment'></div>虽名教之可乐，而师言之不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278475_comment'></div>顾此面墙，曷堪乘障？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278475_comment'></div>闻风而悦，乃于此以定交；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278475_comment'></div>寡过未能，宜如何而加教？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278475_comment'></div>徒藻饰之已过，曾切磋之不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278475_comment'></div>傥未瘝官，尚可及横经之日；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278475_comment'></div>庶其问政，幸毋如倾盖之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278475_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1278475_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　作书答桂阳吴赡军几。<div id='poem_1278477' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278477' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278477?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答桂阳吴赡军畿启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript:
