id='poem_content_1278477'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278477'>思先生而不见，雅有典刑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278477_comment'></div>以平昔之所闻，今为僚友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278477_comment'></div>方将分半席之共事，□□贻朋缄之过嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278477_comment'></div>虽以自宽，未知所报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278477_comment'></div>某官汲古之业，济世之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278477_comment'></div>渊源所渐，接岳麓再传之绪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278477_comment'></div>指顾而定，成桂林三捷之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278477_comment'></div>虽文章不露，而世已惊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278477_comment'></div>然礼义无愆，而人何恤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278477_comment'></div>徒以同门之故，肯为筦库之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278477_comment'></div>怅此风之缺然，得吾党而幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278477_comment'></div>矧惟乘障，忧在面墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278477_comment'></div>拨烦攸难，寡过则未。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278477_comment'></div>事皆隃度，孰如既见之详；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278477_comment'></div>理亦空谈，未必可行之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278477_comment'></div>政惟求助，奚止纳交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278477_comment'></div>以先辱之勤斯，知遄归之迩止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278477_comment'></div>可与共学，傥惟尝事洙泗之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278477_comment'></div>不卑小官，则岂但为赵魏之老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278477_comment'></div>行以为请，言不能宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278477_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1278477_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　到任桂阳作启谢宰相。作品：桂阳谢宰执。<div id='poem_1278478' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278478' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278478?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂阳谢宰执启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278478")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278478_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278478'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278478'>起家为守，曾何劳能？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278478_comment'></div>便道之官，徒以贫病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278478_comment'></div>虽君恩之丕冒，皆庙议之独怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278478_comment'></div>窃以自昔大臣，加惠多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278478_comment'></div>凡待以晚成之器，则养于烦使之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278478_comment'></div>功如曹参，才若贾谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278478_comment'></div>开清净之道，必去齐而后能；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278478_comment'></div>陈治安之书，非渡湘则弗克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278478_comment'></div>矧惟此意，施及中人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278478_comment'></div>自匪偷安，宁不感慨？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278478_comment'></div>某官以毋我之学，成代天之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278478_comment'></div>一纪于兹，曾莫窥其愠喜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278478_comment'></div>百工所职，初不失于重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278478_comment'></div>乃如疏愚，尤所幸蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278478_comment'></div>虽尝试之不效，而作成之有加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278478_comment'></div>某敢不佩服深仁，图惟薄效？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278478_comment'></div>傥报三年之政，遂及终更；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278478_comment'></div>苟有一日之长，敢忘大造？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278478_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1278478_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　到桂阳任上作文乞画一状。作品：桂阳军乞画一状。<div id='poem_1278311' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278311' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278311?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂阳军乞画一状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278311")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278311_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278311'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278311'>一、臣照对本军以银为税，自天禧间行之，民以为便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278311_comment'></div>但银价不等，折纳亦随时高下，官吏未免以意增损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278311_comment'></div>绍兴奉行经界，本路漕臣见得银价太重，遂立条约，每两折钱二贯八百文足，自此始有定数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278311_comment'></div>乾道六年正月一十九日，因前知平阳县罗公旦劄子，准都省批状指挥行下本路，于每两价钱上减钱一百文足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278311_comment'></div>至淳熙二年六月三十日，因转运副使李椿奏，尚书省劄子，三省同奉圣旨指挥行下本路，于每两价银上减钱三百三十六文七分足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278311_comment'></div>今每两折钱二贯三百六十三文二分足，至与市估低平相等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278311_comment'></div>远方之民，鼓舞圣恩，老稚相传，无有穷已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278311_comment'></div>然臣区区，尚有□□□，不敢隐默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278311_comment'></div>窃缘节次裁减银价内一项，转运副使李椿所乞，共减去岁收钱一万二千贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278311_comment'></div>而当时先乞于月桩大军钱内减放上件钱数，纽计银价除落，故所行乃为实惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278311_comment'></div>知县罗公旦所乞，共减去岁收钱二千七百四十一贯四百九十文足，而当时即不曾乞于月桩大军钱内减放上件钱数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278311_comment'></div>虽曰减价，而其钱至今犹是随钞敷纳，故其所行但为虚文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278311_comment'></div>臣究见本末，李椿以具奏，出于宸断，故虽以一万二千贯之多，捐之为易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278311_comment'></div>罗公旦以不曾具奏，出于省部，故虽以二千七百馀贯之少，损之为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278311_comment'></div>臣窃思念本军财计支数渐增，收数渐减，势不获已，必取之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278311_comment'></div>臣已将乾道六年正月二十九日、淳熙二年六月三十日所降指挥申尚书省，欲望圣慈特与行下本路转运司，将乾道六年正月二十九日已降都省批状指挥所减银价一百文足，止共无收钱二千七百四十一贯四百九十文足，照淳熙二年六月三十日圣旨指挥一般事理，每岁于月桩钱数减放二千七百四十一贯四百九十文足，却将见今税户随抄收钱均掯蠲免，庶使德泽下流，不为文具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278311_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1278311'>一、臣检会到淳熙五年正月空日守臣徐大观奏：「昨准圣旨指挥，减收银价钱一万二千贯，每贯元收经、总制头子钱四十八文五厘省，共计钱五百七十六贯六百文省；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278311_comment'></div>每贯元收勘合钱二十文足，计钱三百一十二贯文足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278311_comment'></div>两项共钱八百八十八贯六百文省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278311_comment'></div>今既减放银税正钱，其上项经、总制钱亦无名色可收，已是一例除放之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278311_comment'></div>欲望特降一睿旨，与随数除豁」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278311_comment'></div>当年五月二十二日都省批状：「户部勘当，行下湖南提刑司，更切取见桂阳军所收经、总制钱勘合钱，委是于人户折银钱上□□所收，即将今来本军前项合放钱数并行除豁」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278311_comment'></div>本军自此并不起发去讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278311_comment'></div>今来所乞减放二千七百四十八贯，亦有每贯上收经、总制头子钱四十八文五厘省，共计无收一百七十一贯二百五十文省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278311_comment'></div>如蒙施行，并乞照淳熙五年五月二十二日已降都省批状指挥，并行除豁施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278311_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1278311'>一、臣照对桂阳虽小垒，实边徭峒，顷年郴寇，盖尝上烦南顾之忧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278311_comment'></div>稽其兵籍，最为单弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278311_comment'></div>见管禁军一百九十八人，厢军一百二人，牢城七十四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278311_comment'></div>牢城一营既不在准备缓急之数，则通厢禁军止三百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278311_comment'></div>而其接送守臣各九十六人，提刑、提举司各四十人，干办公事官二十一人，诸司占破二十人，率每岁用一百七十八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278311_comment'></div>又有押部纲运、赍擎文书之类，差拨不足，不免通那禁军应副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278311_comment'></div>臣之到官，亦欲略行整龊教阅，然常不满百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278311_comment'></div>臣因根检询究，自绍兴十一年史愿措置量屯军马于管下平阳县临武峒诸处弹压，至十四年抽回临武峒戍兵，差拨鄂州军五百人前来军城屯驻，至二十一年复抽回鄂州军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278311_comment'></div>寻有李金之寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278311_comment'></div>乾道元年贼平之后，再差鄂州军五百人，以二分屯本军，一分屯临武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278311_comment'></div>淳熙十一年十一月二日，枢密院降圣旨指挥，抽回鄂州兵，差拨潭州飞虎军三百人于郴州，黄沙寨亲兵一百人于宜章县，忠义军一百人于本军临武县驻劄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278311_comment'></div>自此军城遂无戍兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278311_comment'></div>契勘平阳县自旧有临武县杨梅寨巡检土军一百人，绍兴十六年析平阳之临武置县，遂以「平阳、临武两县巡检」带衔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278311_comment'></div>今来临武县见有戍兵一百人，弓手七十人，稍成次第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278311_comment'></div>所是旧管平阳巡检土军一百人，合还本县管内置司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278311_comment'></div>臣今相度：平阳、临武两县巡检就移在城内外置司，仍旧以「平阳、临武两县巡检」带衔，以所管土军一百人相兼教阅，稍壮军垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278311_comment'></div>猝有抽唤，止六十里，往来应接，管无缺误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278311_comment'></div>如臣所乞，即不敢引用绍兴、乾道事例增添军马，亦不曾违戾淳熙十一年二十日已降圣旨指挥，只是军县一体，务令均平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278311_comment'></div>伏乞圣慈详酌施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278311_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_1278311'>一、臣伏见前后臣僚屡言郴、桂之间宜兴学校，以柔人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1278311_comment'></div>寻准淳熙八年八月二十一日敕节文：「三省同奉圣旨，依礼、户部勘会事理施行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1278311_comment'></div>行下本路，于郴之宜章、本军临武两县创建县学，所以劝奖风厉，条目甚备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1278311_comment'></div>仰见睿明旁烛幽照，欲使边氓同被文化，幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1278311_comment'></div>今来两县虽各有学，然而无训导之官，无供亿之具，名存实亡，不足以仰称明诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1278311_comment'></div>以臣愚见，所在县学多是文具，莫若只就州军学展套斋舍，增养生员；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1278311_comment'></div>责之教授，诱进义社豪民或边峒子弟孙侄入学听读；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1278311_comment'></div>仍以县令、佐兼管干赡学钱粮事，措置应副；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1278311_comment'></div>专委本路提举学事司常切点检，别为一籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1278311_comment'></div>如教养到生员一百人或一百五十人以来，许将见任教授并赡学钱粮官理为劳绩，量立赏典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1278311_comment'></div>如此，则事体归一，庶可就绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1278311_comment'></div>惟陛下财幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1278311_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_1278311'>臣检到本军准本路安抚牒：「备准淳熙八年八月二十一日敕指挥，申尚书省去讫」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1278311_comment'></div>乞赐检会施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1278311_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_1278311'>一、臣照对本军祖来年额，系招趁住卖茶引二十二道，每道一百斤，价钱二十三贯四百一十九文省，一年计二千二百斤，共价钱五百一十五贯二百一十八文省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1278311_comment'></div>分系三县，并在军合同场招趁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1278311_comment'></div>缘本军非产茶地分，又非商旅孔道，自旧将买引价钱均敷于民，历年弥久，不以为病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1278311_comment'></div>至淳熙元年，守臣妄希增羡之赏，于任内添起年额茶引二十三道，作四十五道，增及一倍之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1278311_comment'></div>计价钱通五百一十八贯六百三十七文省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1278311_comment'></div>其钱无所从出，却于输纳仓库收趁内，折银场每钞三文足，和籴场每石九文足，常平仓每石二十文足，苗仓每石三文足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1278311_comment'></div>犹未及额，敷及合干等人，至今十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1278311_comment'></div>凡科歛民钱八千七十九贯五百五十五文省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1278311_comment'></div>臣虽已具申本路提举司，乞覈实申奏除豁去讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1278311_comment'></div>臣愚窃谓国家岁计宜不藉此琐琐，欲望朝廷详酌指挥，行下本路提举司，将淳熙元年以来增起一倍年额茶引二十三道特与免行招趁，令臣将见今仓场受纳钞面所收茶引一项钱尽数除落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1278311_comment'></div>虽其事微细，亦足以彰陛下加惠元元之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1278311_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_69_1278311'>一、臣将本军牢城指挥兵士见管七十四人，逐一契勘元来断由，见得内系窃盗二十五人、强盗十二人、劫盗八人、渡淮作过一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1278311_comment'></div>窃缘本军被边，其民习见剽夺之利，乃以四方强恶之人配隶于此，间者往往佚去，散入村聚，率人以为盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1278311_comment'></div>臣因捕盗，尝获郴之逃军数人，皆故江浙间强盗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1278311_comment'></div>臣愚以为本军无城壁开闭之节，无营房出入之限，居民荒凉，官府不威重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1278311_comment'></div>兼厢、禁军人数稀少，部辖不前，凡此等配隶之人，实难关防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1278311_comment'></div>欲望圣慈特赐指挥，自今应盗贼并渡淮作过等人，住配本军，庶久安静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1278311_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_75_1278311'>臣检准淳熙十四年四月十一日枢密院批状指挥：「知郴州王薰申乞诸州盗贼不须配隶郴、桂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1278311_comment'></div>大理寺看详：淳熙十三年六月十一日指挥：『诸州牢城人数如溢及五分，仰先申本路提刑司，照应诣实保明，备申省部，以凭行下住配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1278311_comment'></div>自合遵依施行，难从所乞』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1278311_comment'></div>伏念本军事体，又与他郡不同，伏望圣慈特赐矜允。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1278311_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　到桂阳谒宣圣孔庙，为作文。作品：到桂阳谒宣圣文。<div id='poem_1278836' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278836' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278836?labeling=true' target='_blank'>到桂阳谒宣圣文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278836")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278836_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278836'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278836'>共惟夫子之言曰：「有一言而可以终身行之者，其恕矣乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278836_comment'></div>某质簿气觕，误有民社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278836_comment'></div>愿事斯语，以免于戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278836_comment'></div>敢告。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1278836_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　桂阳任上为上元设醮作青词。作品：桂阳上元设醮青词。<div id='poem_1278840' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278840' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278840?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂阳上元设醮青词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278840")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278840_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278840'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278840'>乃者庶證非常，连阴不解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278840_comment'></div>爰方假守，何以召和？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278840_comment'></div>会玉历之初颁，虽修故事，面天威之甚迩，实贡忱辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278840_comment'></div>恭愿哀矜一方，嘉惠百谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278840_comment'></div>事关民命，宁使臣沾侥倖之恩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278840_comment'></div>咎在臣躬，毋令民被阽危之患。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1278840_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　桂阳任上为中秋设醮作青词。作品：桂阳中秋设醮青词。<div id='poem_1278841' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278841' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278841?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂阳中秋设醮青词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278841")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278841_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278841'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278841'>疾痛呼天，辄自忘其僣越；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278841_comment'></div>高明覆物，终不忍于颠隮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278841_comment'></div>永惟返风灭火之祥，何啻虚谷应声之速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278841_comment'></div>敢凭羽侣，式谢鸿私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278841_comment'></div>恭愿不异尘凡，有来肸蚃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278841_comment'></div>怜臣斗筲之器，虽负民社而不胜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278841_comment'></div>念臣葵藿之诚，盖填沟壑而未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278841_comment'></div>遂无它咎，以迄终更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278841_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1278841_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　桂阳军任上为修城隍作祝文。作品：桂阳军修城隍祝文。<div id='poem_1278837' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278837' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278837?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂阳军修城隍祝文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278837")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278837_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278837'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278837'>有屹崇墉，尔神主之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278837_comment'></div>彼圮而阙，宜崇补之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278837_comment'></div>筑之阗阗，尚呵护之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278837_comment'></div>允也有成，维皇其嘉与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278837_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278837_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　桂阳军任上为祷雨作祝文。作品：桂阳军祷雨祝文。<div id='poem_1278838' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278838' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278838?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂阳军祷雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278838")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278838_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278838'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278838'>某假守于此，大惧凉薄，不足以□□□用，昭事明神，以祈岁事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278838_comment'></div>乃者烈风荐作，嘉泽弗周，粟□□□，禾且憔悴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278838_comment'></div>夫为吏之日短，神与民相依之日长，奈何以吏之不德，而为斯民病也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278838_comment'></div>敬申前请，敢告终惠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1278838_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　桂阳军任上作文谢龙山渡明应侯。作品：谢龙山渡明应侯文。<div id='poem_1278839' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278839' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278839?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢龙山渡明应侯文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278839")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278839_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278839'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278839'>维侯所宅，桂阳之望，风雨不时，于是焉祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278839_comment'></div>其诸古之所谓境内名山川欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278839_comment'></div>兹者，嘉泽弗周，烈风荐作，菽粟几空，禾且就槁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278839_comment'></div>固宰物者所以谪吏，而侯亦岂遂忘此土也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278839_comment'></div>遣官乞灵，斋宿以俟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278839_comment'></div>侯不督过，而辱霈施之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278839_comment'></div>某虽无以愈人，犹足以伐石撰词，昭示后来，永永无怠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1278839_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　桂阳军任上作告谕百姓榜文。作品：桂阳军告谕百姓榜文。<div id='poem_1278400' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278400' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278400?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂阳军告谕百姓榜文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278400")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278400_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278400'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278400'>照会当职到任，欲得民间通晓法意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278400_comment'></div>检坐到见行条法如右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278400_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1278400'>父子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278400_comment'></div>《律》：「子孙违犯教令及供养有阙者，徒二年」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278400_comment'></div>《敕》：「子孙违犯教令及供养有阙，情重者邻州，凶恶者千里，并编管」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278400_comment'></div>《敕》：「诸生子孙而弃之者，徒二年；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278400_comment'></div>杀者，徒三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278400_comment'></div>收生人共犯，虽为从杀者，与同罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278400_comment'></div>弃者徒二年半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278400_comment'></div>并许人告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278400_comment'></div>若地分及邻保知而不告，杀者徒一年，弃者减一等」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278400_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1278400'>夫妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278400_comment'></div>《律》：「诸妻无七出及义绝之状而出之者，徒一年半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278400_comment'></div>虽犯七出，有三不去而去之者，杖一百，追还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278400_comment'></div>若犯恶疾及奸者，不用此律」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278400_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1278400'>房族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278400_comment'></div>《律》：「诸同居若大功以上亲及外祖父母、外孙若孙之妇、夫之兄弟及兄弟妻有罪，相为隐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278400_comment'></div>部曲奴婢为主隐，皆勿论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278400_comment'></div>即漏露其事，及擿语消息，亦不坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278400_comment'></div>其小功以下相隐，减凡人三等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278400_comment'></div>若犯谋叛以上者，不用此律」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278400_comment'></div>《律》：「诸告周亲尊长、外祖父母、夫之祖父母，虽得实，徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278400_comment'></div>其告重者，减所告罪一等；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278400_comment'></div>即诬告重者，加所诬罪三等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278400_comment'></div>告大功尊长，各减一等；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278400_comment'></div>小功、缌麻，减二等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278400_comment'></div>诬告重者，各加所诬罪一等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278400_comment'></div>即非相容隐被告者，论如律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278400_comment'></div>其相侵犯，自理诉者，听」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278400_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1278400'>邻里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278400_comment'></div>《敕》：「诸讦告之罪，若于法不应告之人，虽系厢耆邻保，亦不得告」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278400_comment'></div>《敕》：「诸事不干己，辄告论者，杖一百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278400_comment'></div>其所告之事，各不得受理」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278400_comment'></div>《律》：「诸邻里被强盗及杀人，告而不救助者，杖一百；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278400_comment'></div>闻而不救助者，减一等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278400_comment'></div>力势不能赴救者，速告附近官司；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278400_comment'></div>若不告者，亦以不救助论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278400_comment'></div>其官司不即救助者，徒一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278400_comment'></div>窃盗者各减二等」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278400_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1278400'>窝藏、匮头、诱略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278400_comment'></div>《敕》：「知人犯罪而藏匿，过致资给，令得隐避者，不须事发被追藏，依匿罪人法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278400_comment'></div>其知情停止人犯徒以上罪者，准此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278400_comment'></div>《律》：「知情藏匿罪人，若过致资给令得隐避者，各减罪人罪一等」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278400_comment'></div>《律》：「诸博戏赌财物者，各杖一百<span class='inlineComment2'>（举博为例，馀戏皆是。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278400_comment'></div>赃重者，各依己分准盗论<span class='inlineComment2'>（输者亦依己分，为从坐。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1278400_comment'></div>其停止主人及□力若和合者，各如之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1278400_comment'></div>《敕》：「诸开匮坊，停止赌博财物者，邻州编管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1278400_comment'></div>于出军营内停止者，配本城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1278400_comment'></div>并许人告，厢耆巡察看营一宿，提举人失觉察者，杖八十」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1278400_comment'></div>《律》：「诸略人、略卖人<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>为奴婢者，绞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1278400_comment'></div>为部曲者，流三千里；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1278400_comment'></div>为妻妾子孙者，徒三年<span class='inlineComment2'>（因而杀伤人者，）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1278400_comment'></div>依强盗法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1278400_comment'></div>和诱者，各减一等」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1278400_comment'></div>《敕》：「诸略若和诱人因而取财及雇卖或得财者，计入己之赃<span class='inlineComment2'>（在一名处频犯人不倍。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1278400_comment'></div>略人者，以不持仗强盗论，一贯皆配千里，妇人五百里编管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1278400_comment'></div>因而奸者，依强奸法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1278400_comment'></div>和诱者，以不持仗窃盗论，五贯配五百里，妇人邻州编管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1278400_comment'></div>其知情引领牙保若藏匿被略诱者，各依藏匿犯人法」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1278400_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_1278400'>右，仰汝等百姓各详立法之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1278400_comment'></div>欲汝慈孝，父子有恩，故有供养有缺及违法教令，及不举子之法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1278400_comment'></div>欲汝安错，夫妇相保，故有七出三不去之法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1278400_comment'></div>欲汝和协，宗族如一，故有相容隐不相告之法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1278400_comment'></div>欲汝交通，邻里无争，故有不得告讦及相救助之法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1278400_comment'></div>欲汝守己，不务贪婪、但利其家，却为众害，故有停藏、开匮、诱略之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1278400_comment'></div>乃至斗殴奸盗，每事有条，意在禁汝为非，劝汝为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1278400_comment'></div>当职今节取数项，系父子、夫妇、房族、邻里要切事理，明以教谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1278400_comment'></div>汝等皆有良心，其俗质朴，比之诸处，公事最稀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1278400_comment'></div>若更遵从，不致违戾，虽有官府，刑何所施？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1278400_comment'></div>更冀得力之家津遣子弟，从师就学，兴起门户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1278400_comment'></div>其馀勤谨农桑，爱惜钱谷，祭享翁祖，看守坟墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1278400_comment'></div>如此，则骨肉相劝，里巷无怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1278400_comment'></div>和气所积，天道不差，风雨必调，五谷必熟，可使此邦永为乐土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1278400_comment'></div>至如徭人，实同省地，久来往还，何分彼此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1278400_comment'></div>设若军县催科，或公人下乡，恐吓保社，复相追扰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1278400_comment'></div>或揽寄等家兜收过多，或代纳上户利息太重之类，凡有枉塞，并仰披陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1278400_comment'></div>当于当职自有过差，诸县不能体恤，傥以看望，未欲兴词，但希书简相投，或因寄居学职，过厅见谕，庶几通知，从汝之便。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_76_1278400'></div><div id='poem_sentence_76_1278400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278400'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_49_1278400_2'>⑴ 不和为略，十岁以下，虽和亦同略法。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1278400_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　桂阳军任上作告谕纳税榜文。作品：桂阳军告谕纳税榜文。<div id='poem_1278401' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278401' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278401?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂阳军告谕纳税榜文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278401")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278401_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278401'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278401'>照对军县每年起发省部总领诸司钱粮并支给官兵钱粮贯万浩瀚，别无课入，全藉税户夏秋银钱分擘应副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278401_comment'></div>当职到任，据平阳县丞状申：驱磨见得自淳熙十一年秋至十四年夏六料银钱欠数不少，除十一年已准赦文自第五等已下除放外，馀四等以上，并十一年夏至十四年夏三料，理合拘催。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278401_comment'></div>切虑税户不易，难以一并了纳，当职今同众官计度，将十一年四等以上户共欠一千二百八两有零，并十二年夏十二年秋共欠一千五百七十四两有零，共欠三料未纳之数，时暂住催。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278401_comment'></div>自十三年夏料为始催理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278401_comment'></div>又虑税户日前已将钱米交托与揽子店户等人，却被兜收入己，致作名下挂欠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278401_comment'></div>已行下知丞，分乡具出长名帖子，付逐都保正户长，仰各巡问甲内人户，如委曾交纳托与人，见有干照，即仰保正类聚姓名，保明申县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278401_comment'></div>切待于交揽人名下追理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278401_comment'></div>自馀委系本户，即仰趁时赴军输纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278401_comment'></div>今立宽限：十三年夏秋二料，限二月终；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278401_comment'></div>十四年夏料，限三月终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278401_comment'></div>更不准前遣官差人下乡搔扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278401_comment'></div>乃已约束受纳等处，每银一两减五文足，掐子钱减三文足，役钱一百文足，收会钱八十三文足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278401_comment'></div>每一贯减五文足，掐子钱减三文足，苗米、官田职田米每石减十二文足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278401_comment'></div>每石仓用米减十五升，揽子米减五升，和粜米每石减七文足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278401_comment'></div>每石仓用米减十三升，揽子米减五升省，义仓米每钞减五文足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278401_comment'></div>每石仓用钱减十三文足，仓用米减二十二升省，揽子减五升省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278401_comment'></div>银自一钱以上、米自一㪷以上准此，晓示去讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278401_comment'></div>候至限满，见得钱物次第，若是正税自足；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278401_comment'></div>办一年支遣，当议再将本县久例无名科歛并行蠲减，以便人户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278401_comment'></div>若致限满拖延，不肯了纳，仰本县将欠数多人申军点追，别有行遣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1278401_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　桂阳军任上作劝农文。作品：桂阳军劝农文。<div id='poem_1278402' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278402' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278402?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂阳军劝农文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278402")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278402_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278402'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278402'>照对守令劝农，国有常典，循习之久，但为空文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278402_comment'></div>当职以里巷通晓之言，劝谕汝等，开具下项：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1278402'>一、闽浙之土，最是瘠薄，必有锄耙数番，加以粪溉，方为良田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278402_comment'></div>此间不待施粪，锄耙亦希，所种禾麦自然秀茂，则知其土膏腴胜如闽浙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278402_comment'></div>然闽浙上田收米三石，次等二石，此间所收却无此数，当是人力不到，子课遂减。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278402_comment'></div>奉劝自今更加勤勉，勿为惰农，坐视丰歉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278402_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1278402'>一、门房邻里，切须和睦，莫与争讼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278402_comment'></div>界至田塍，各据永业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278402_comment'></div>火下牛畜，迭相借助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278402_comment'></div>少有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1278402", 1278402, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>言气</span>，且务休和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278402_comment'></div>才到讼庭，便妨日子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278402_comment'></div>况复般裹，倍有劳费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278402_comment'></div>假如有田十亩，岁收不过十石，供输之外，赡养良难，岂宜因讼耗财，自取狼狈？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278402_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1278402'>一、了纳租税，务在及时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278402_comment'></div>今来受纳仓场，并是当日给钞销簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278402_comment'></div>如有农家或将银米凭托揽子铺户等人，须是便取去赤钞为凭，不可信受手会、白关之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278402_comment'></div>所虑揽铺兜收过己，致作挂欠，正当农务，忽被追呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278402_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1278402'>一、陂塘水利，宜从古来上流下接，公共分使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278402_comment'></div>若甲家占吝，害及乙丙，群聚争夺，甚者到官，期集邻保，追逮證佐，动经旬月，方得事明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278402_comment'></div>本欲独得便宜，却被两相妨废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278402_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1278402'>一、生借种粮，贫者不免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278402_comment'></div>先须量力，莫据眼前，借贷太多，债还不易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278402_comment'></div>及至空穷，却谋昏赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278402_comment'></div>所是富家，亦合量本收息，除豁积欠，难以递年登带，恣为贪婪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278402_comment'></div>若贫者昏赖不还，富者贪婪已甚，日致兴讼，罪有所归，即非主客相资、邻里相保之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278402_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1278402'>一、此间典买产业，或瞒昧卑幼，或不尽问亲邻，或因抱种交业不时，或因白契投印违限之类，缘此无赖等辈执占争论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278402_comment'></div>先自莳种，径行收采，比至到官，惟凭契约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278402_comment'></div>往往得产之家虽用见钱，反以违法失理遭罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278402_comment'></div>请自今遇有交易，子细审度，凡涉前项数端之类，幸勿向前，以贻后患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278402_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1278402'>一、此间多有无籍之人告人绝产，及至到官，或有恩养子孙承代，或有吐退近亲遗嘱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278402_comment'></div>其初官司未知来由，须至行遣，甚者抄估。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278402_comment'></div>比至给还，动经年岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278402_comment'></div>以此失业，深属可怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278402_comment'></div>除已行下诸县，自今如有的是绝户，即仰都保连名结罪，保明具申，方与受理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278402_comment'></div>自馀勿干涉人妄有告诉，重行科断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278402_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1278402'>一、诸县夫递除是般辇纲运钱米，虽当忙月，亦或不免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278402_comment'></div>其馀杂役，宜且暂停。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278402_comment'></div>如官司差使重叠，或无轮次，苦乐不均，及承行等人取乞搔扰，乃至应干赋役有妨农蚕，使汝失所，并仰陈诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278402_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1278402'>右，仰汝等递相劝谕，务在遵从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278402_comment'></div>庶克有年，毋令后悔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1278402_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　与吕子约书信往复。作品：与吕子约书二首。<div id='poem_1278435' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278435' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278435?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与吕子约书<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278435")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278435_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278435'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278435'>某自离上饶以后，□□申问启处，不任悁企。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278435_comment'></div>罙入湖湘，凡八十六日始达官所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278435_comment'></div>桂阳盖一大县，而置官养兵如他郡，又以敝政，荡无纲纪，交割之日，见缗不能百千；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278435_comment'></div>而漕檄如织，官兵持券索旧逋如所□，□主之说，于是俱废，未必能免于戾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278435_comment'></div>奈何奈何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278435_comment'></div>老兄年衰，读书得趣，而门庭反狭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278435_comment'></div>陈义愈高，而意气略肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278435_comment'></div>夫门庭狭则风流不接，意气肆则士友不附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278435_comment'></div>所冀追绍前绪，旁求后来，所谓坐进此道者，非君尚谁堪耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278435_comment'></div>六经之义，兢业为本，《诗》可以言，《礼》可以立，玩味服行，自觉粗厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278435_comment'></div>此某近所窥见，且以勉同志者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278435_comment'></div>刘衡州言笑自由，动多触忤，亦尝造膝共，语深切，此公矍然若有失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278435_comment'></div>堂堂晦翁，亦复少此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278435_comment'></div>乃知前修端不可议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278435_comment'></div>某老矣，望兄最厚，勿罪喋喋为祝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278435_comment'></div>赵推官《易说》自成一家，可以相资，亦未可为准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278435_comment'></div>杜伯高兄弟文字，正使往时诸公亦见领略，何遽绝之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278435_comment'></div>再及此事，欲以实前所云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278435_comment'></div>千万至思，傥有疑，勿惜往复也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1278435_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278436' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278436' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278436?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278436_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278436'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278436'>某空餐负愧，义当弛去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278436_comment'></div>然未能自由也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278436_comment'></div>每蒙见嘱与临漳同论，若某何足以堪之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278436_comment'></div>衰晚无志，务为自全，闻此悚畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278436_comment'></div>名为国士，自古患之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278436_comment'></div>萧、曹旧知，房、杜同舍，所成就独如许，要是金兰耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278436_comment'></div>团沙作饭，遗恨极多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278436_comment'></div>此所以贵力学，唯力学则卒然相值，必有以处此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278436_comment'></div>东撞西突，谁能料之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278436_comment'></div>但平时朋友共持兢业之律，务令后辈趋于静重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278436_comment'></div>是则可为耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278436_comment'></div>容易放开，养成虚骄，即一不获，而万有馀丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278436_comment'></div>老兄以为然否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278436_comment'></div>象先别后，不及闻其论议，如何一见，便许以为有异昔日，切磋何神耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278436_comment'></div>所欲言无限，非书所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278436_comment'></div>临纸惘惘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1278436_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　桂阳军任上为文与岳漕论移运事。作品：桂阳与岳漕论移运事。<div id='poem_1278437' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278437' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278437?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂阳与岳漕论移运事书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278437")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278437_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278437'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278437'>伏蒙矜恻小邦，移运郴米三千斛，虽已一一具申般跋次第去后，其间有不敢不以情告者，辄不避罪私布之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278437_comment'></div>本军旧有夫递之则，某到官来，不置夫簿，今弥年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278437_comment'></div>及此运米，若复调民，虽与僦金，恐复多事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278437_comment'></div>不免诱谕诸卒，添贴粮屦之费以渐致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278437_comment'></div>自禁旅外卒苦不多，部押等人，堪托尤少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278437_comment'></div>度尽此岁，郴米方可齐集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278437_comment'></div>若某诚愚陋，亦岂不知速办之利？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278437_comment'></div>顾见小垒事力如此，重以拙滞，实难如意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278437_comment'></div>以此深虑淹费日月，有违简书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278437_comment'></div>王判官在馆，备见区区艰勤之状，非敢饰说，上欺威尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278437_comment'></div>傥蒙台慈录其不忍为扰之情，而赦其不善集事之罪，特赐宽假，所无阙误，岂唯某，将此邦同戴德无穷已也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278437_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　为灵润庙赐敕额作跋文。作品：跋灵润庙赐敕额。<div id='poem_1278552' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278552' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278552?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋灵润庙赐敕额</a><span class='authorDate'>（1188年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278552")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278552_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278552'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278552'>桂阳之民，虽贫而有常产，父子孙、兄弟多族居，或至百口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278552_comment'></div>重丧祭，有丧，哭泣过时，必葬埋，未有火化者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278552_comment'></div>逾久展奉，犹哭泣，如新丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278552_comment'></div>祭事谨洁，至不敢粪瓜菜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278552_comment'></div>尤耻为人隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278552_comment'></div>饥年，不得已鬻子，舍曰奴婢，而以养子为约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278552_comment'></div>盖其俗朴，近古然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278552_comment'></div>然拙而惰农，耕器绝苦窳，犁刃入土才三四寸，终岁置田勿问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278552_comment'></div>及春，耨去陈草，曾不待破块，辄下种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278552_comment'></div>水在田上，节级溉注之，是为良田；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278552_comment'></div>水在田下，虽咫尺，不能辘轳使之逆上，往往夹江之田，与并山同为瘠薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278552_comment'></div>易苦旱，率十年八九耕不获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278552_comment'></div>每旱，即立视苗槁，而乞哀于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278552_comment'></div>无问在不在祀典，日击羊豕，聚群巫，鼓舞象龙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278552_comment'></div>或燃指，以膏火薄肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278552_comment'></div>供佛类不效，则祷于龙渡山之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278552_comment'></div>山在县境内最著名，其神邦人尊事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278552_comment'></div>非已甚，不敢辄祷，祷无不应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278552_comment'></div>今夏旱，凡民之祠事且遍，不雨，于是属军教授、县令谒祠下，以灵润源之水归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278552_comment'></div>又兼旬不雨，某遂宿戒，亲谒祠下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278552_comment'></div>三鼓方作，星河弥天；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278552_comment'></div>行数里，渐摵摵有声；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278552_comment'></div>鸡初鸣，至青莲寺，为位望拜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278552_comment'></div>迟明，登山，俄时雨大至；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278552_comment'></div>达城下，已乃三日雨，岁及下熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278552_comment'></div>吏与民德侯之赐，推本所始，得绍兴十四年赐庙额敕黄一道于掌故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278552_comment'></div>仰惟国家为民秩祀，笃于报功，宜诏万世，敬摹之石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278552_comment'></div>某为长吏，不能履阡陌，为方略，教民治田，而徒干神之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278552_comment'></div>又以穷自归于当道，连帅、部使者咸以钱粟来周急，可以免岁月矣，要不可久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278552_comment'></div>方将趣丞史以龙骨车若桔槔法下之乡聚，使民稍自力，不但以渎神，益永尊事无怠，故因对神之休与国家所以褒大之者，并道其土俗善否，为劝励，著之下方。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1278552_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
长沙
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='fb214720d5044967bcb9f06d5a2b0417_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("fb214720d5044967bcb9f06d5a2b0417");'><span id='fb214720d5044967bcb9f06d5a2b0417_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　任湖南提举，时率诸生与同僚之好学者讲道岳麓。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　周必大为左相，作贺启。作品：贺周左相。<span class='inlineComment2'>（本年正月，孝宗以周必大为左相，留正为右相，王蔺为参知政事，葛邲为同知枢密院事。二月内禅。）</span><div id='poem_1278484' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278484' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278484?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺周左相启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1189年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278484")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278484_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278484'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278484'>伏审对扬大号，晋陟上公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278484_comment'></div>宗社宠嘉，华夷震叠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278484_comment'></div>共惟某官才足以缉熙于天绎，学足以润色于皇猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278484_comment'></div>自秉国钧，独行儒术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278484_comment'></div>许身衮职，则近古社稷之臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278484_comment'></div>借誉布衣，如久要平生之友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278484_comment'></div>至于一意孤立，三辞弥高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278484_comment'></div>于人情之已安，以世道而自任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278484_comment'></div>遭时其盛，亲承二典之都俞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278484_comment'></div>临事加详，大明九变之忧患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278484_comment'></div>以其难进之节，定此非常之元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278484_comment'></div>是以简在帝心，托之圣子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278484_comment'></div>甘盘之为旧学，未常入总于百官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278484_comment'></div>酂侯之为宗臣，盖亦借烦于四皓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278484_comment'></div>孰与早翊储闱之善，晚陪神器之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278484_comment'></div>于以嗣万世无疆之休，于以起先王未有之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278484_comment'></div>弼谐昌运，度越前闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278484_comment'></div>永惟载籍以来，鲜出勋劳之右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278484_comment'></div>如某者不足比数，最蒙保持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278484_comment'></div>每□纶告之四驰，喜福等夷而百倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278484_comment'></div>况每蒙慰藉，有周南留滞之词；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278484_comment'></div>而迄值亨嘉，在沔水朝宗之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278484_comment'></div>辄因贺牍，并叙感悰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278484_comment'></div>□倾之私，敷宣罔既。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278484_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1278484_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　留正任右相，作贺启。作品：贺留右相。<span class='inlineComment2'>（本年正月，孝宗以周必大为左相，留正为右相，王蔺为参知政事，葛邲为同知枢密院事。二月内禅。）</span><div id='poem_1278485' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278485' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278485?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺留右相启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1189年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278485")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278485_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278485'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278485'>恭审涣扬大号，晋陟中台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278485_comment'></div>以薄海之具瞻，知本朝之永赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278485_comment'></div>共惟某官蔚于雅望，度越前修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278485_comment'></div>明允而宽慈，精微而广大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278485_comment'></div>德兼众美，在伊尹、惠、夷之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278485_comment'></div>学贯群儒，无程氏、苏臣之辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278485_comment'></div>若论行藏之晚节，则明义利于秋毫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278485_comment'></div>自其厌直于甘泉，亦既见思于宣室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278485_comment'></div>而乃越在外服，殊无里言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278485_comment'></div>独上简于帝心，迄共图于邦采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278485_comment'></div>永惟论相，粤若淳熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278485_comment'></div>弄印十年，曾缺员之弗补；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278485_comment'></div>致身二府，必详试而为真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278485_comment'></div>率以序迁，谁其特起？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278485_comment'></div>召从帅阃，谓见大夫之无人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278485_comment'></div>擢贰枢庭，出诸君子之不意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278485_comment'></div>吁谟属耳，绩用蔼然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278485_comment'></div>遂繇同列以先登，竟与旧劳而并命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278485_comment'></div>昔有因梦卜而见用，世曰宜哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278485_comment'></div>公不以日月而为劳，事适类此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278485_comment'></div>矧属寿皇之高蹈，欲传神器于初潜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278485_comment'></div>断自渊衷，托之圣子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278485_comment'></div>可谓千载明良之会，两朝社稷之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278485_comment'></div>廊庙为之光辉，华夷为之震叠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278485_comment'></div>某尝瞻英衮，及听明纶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278485_comment'></div>累洽重熙，何幸值九官之盛？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278485_comment'></div>至愚极陋，庶将安一介之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278485_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1278485_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278486' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278486?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺王参政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1189年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278486")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278486_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278486'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278486'>召从外阃，入告嘉猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278486_comment'></div>擢寘上宗，晋参大政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278486_comment'></div>共惟某官受天间气，为世宗工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278486_comment'></div>粤来脩门，以践禁严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278486_comment'></div>率本直道，而闻海内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278486_comment'></div>每陪国论，持平于左右大夫之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278486_comment'></div>及沃上聪，致戒于君子小人之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278486_comment'></div>仁必有勇，知无不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278486_comment'></div>是宜简在于帝心，相与仪图于宰事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278486_comment'></div>盖册书所纪，亟称节谊之闲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278486_comment'></div>然世道相违，鲜值明良之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278486_comment'></div>永惟前代，孰与熙朝？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278486_comment'></div>尝于畴昔以观人，不待急难而求士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278486_comment'></div>庆历全盛，则范、韩四杰之为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278486_comment'></div>元祐清明，亦刘、吕诸公之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278486_comment'></div>徒以行藏之节，初无梦卜之符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278486_comment'></div>有如下风，无愧先进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278486_comment'></div>矧属寿皇之独断，欲传神器于初潜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278486_comment'></div>亦既多贤，能堪大计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278486_comment'></div>先定朕志，虽佥共于询谋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278486_comment'></div>素高此人，乃卒烦于调护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278486_comment'></div>可谓非常之寄托，又将之心，泰道方亨，宜上体朋亡之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278486_comment'></div>故但申于贺幅，不敢布于私衷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1278486_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　葛邲任同知枢密院事，作贺启。作品：贺葛同知。<span id='poem_content_1278487'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278487'>大号之敷，元枢攸寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278487_comment'></div>宗社于焉增重，华夷之所具瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278487_comment'></div>某官天下达尊，生民先觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278487_comment'></div>才济其美，可谓故国之世臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278487_comment'></div>行归于周，不忘平生之久要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278487_comment'></div>至于善藏诸用，自牧以谦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278487_comment'></div>本其视韩、魏欿然之资，养其过孟贲远矣之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278487_comment'></div>利惑而不动，位尊而弥恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278487_comment'></div>与人同功，则急所当先之义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278487_comment'></div>下士折节，有施于不报之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278487_comment'></div>盖昔或以一长而过人，而公乃兼众善以名世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278487_comment'></div>足以任重，穆乎师言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278487_comment'></div>是宜简在于帝心，相与仪图于兵本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278487_comment'></div>况甘盘之为旧学，初无《说命》之三篇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278487_comment'></div>酂侯之为宗臣，亦藉商山之四皓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278487_comment'></div>未有早翊储闱之正，晚陪神器之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278487_comment'></div>宠光独隆，载籍鲜俪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278487_comment'></div>必有非常之报称，又将不次以登庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278487_comment'></div>某久辱下交，最蒙异顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278487_comment'></div>附青云而后显，惭非士君子之伦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278487_comment'></div>藏尺牍以为荣，徒有儿女曹之感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278487_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1278487_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　与湖南监司贺冬。<div id='poem_1278488' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278488' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278488?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与湖南监司贺冬启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1189年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1278488'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278488'>观台以望日，增一线之功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278488_comment'></div>衡岳而南天，与九州之幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278488_comment'></div>皇华所庇，福履攸同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278488_comment'></div>属乘障之有拘，欲称觞而靡及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278488_comment'></div>某官当今先进，薄海令名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278488_comment'></div>以宣慈惠和之资，膺咨度询谋之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278488_comment'></div>将明主德，既孳育于群萌；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278488_comment'></div>对越天休，斯朋来于丕社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278488_comment'></div>凡在具依之列，咸输善颂之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278488_comment'></div>宁复久居鸿雁劬劳之野，定应亟入骐驎供奉之班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278488_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278488_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年？</a>　与湖南监司贺正。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年？</a>　除提举，作启谢宰执。作品：除提举谢宰执。<div id='poem_1278490' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278490' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278490?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除提举谢宰执启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1189年？）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278490")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278490_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278490'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278490'>旌之边琐，畀以使华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278490_comment'></div>已弗理于专城，将何施于列郡？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278490_comment'></div>虽极矜怜之感，曷胜惭愧之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278490_comment'></div>切以蕞尔桂杨，介于湖岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278490_comment'></div>中兴至此，凡六十载之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278490_comment'></div>善治为谁？才一二人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278490_comment'></div>率皆久次，然后序迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278490_comment'></div>末有辄为当路之联，越在它邦之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278490_comment'></div>重念某疏愚如故，衰惰有加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278490_comment'></div>徒缘知己之多，亦忝牧民之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278490_comment'></div>惟其迂阔，初无文具之可观；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278490_comment'></div>或有便宜，正恐官谤之不免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278490_comment'></div>及此殊渥，曾未前闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278490_comment'></div>虽幸拙诚，见录于清明之始；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278490_comment'></div>但虞小量，自颠于盈满之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278490_comment'></div>以宠为惊，未知所称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278490_comment'></div>某官弼亮二圣，整齐百工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278490_comment'></div>秉国之钧，目具瞻而下逮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278490_comment'></div>使人以器，尝易事而兼容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278490_comment'></div>故所甄收，及于微陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278490_comment'></div>某敢不更坚晚节，上体深知？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278490_comment'></div>平易近民，以将明于隆指；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278490_comment'></div>劬劳安宅，庶补报于秋毫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278490_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1278490_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　作书与交代张提举。<div id='poem_1278491' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278491' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278491?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与交代张提举启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1189年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_1278491_comment'></div>矧尝受察，以公叔而同升；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278491_comment'></div>竟复蒙成，荷子文之必告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278491_comment'></div>积此私感，难于具陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278491_comment'></div>某官大雅典刑，故家文物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278491_comment'></div>造微之学，至于殊涂而同归；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278491_comment'></div>正始之音，可以一唱而三叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278491_comment'></div>所宜路门委讲，词掖敷言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278491_comment'></div>可使书生不立五经之异，庶几帝制尚追三代之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278491_comment'></div>方当归报而停骖，姑自总铨而寄政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278491_comment'></div>某最为晚出，辱在后陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278491_comment'></div>周雅肄三，偶值劳还之日；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278491_comment'></div>萧规画一，遂为代匮之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278491_comment'></div>敢论伯仲之间，但有子孙之托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278491_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1278491_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a id='poem_sentence_1_1278493_comment'></div>况尝试之尤难，实讲明之是赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278493_comment'></div>蓄疑欲问，请间可期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278493_comment'></div>某官年高德邵，实大声宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278493_comment'></div>老成典刑，非乔木之谓故国；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278493_comment'></div>师表言行，乃砥柱之在中流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278493_comment'></div>正虚当宁之怀，聊借上游之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278493_comment'></div>昔者高宗之思旧学，光武之访故人，恨不同朝，与之分国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278493_comment'></div>如公闻望，视古等夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278493_comment'></div>方两地之阙员，必九重之深意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278493_comment'></div>某从游最久，联事奚堪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278493_comment'></div>以乘障之未能，而察州之岂易？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278493_comment'></div>亡专对四方之具，自视歉然；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278493_comment'></div>惟元戎十乘之依，愿安承教。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1278493_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　作书与湖南张运判交割。作品：交割谢张运判。<div id='poem_1278494' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278494' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_3_1278494_comment'></div>某官特达之资，后彫之操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278494_comment'></div>绩用莫详于已试，风流盖接于前闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278494_comment'></div>老成典刑，非乔木之谓故国；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278494_comment'></div>师表言行，如砥柱之在中流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278494_comment'></div>方虚当宁之怀，暂借外台之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278494_comment'></div>自其弭节，曾不厌时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278494_comment'></div>五岭衡山，野无旷土；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278494_comment'></div>三江彭蠡，步有新船。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278494_comment'></div>以当路之谁如？宜他官之不置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278494_comment'></div>如某者依仁则可，联事奚堪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278494_comment'></div>虽骖乘以甚荣，而面墙之加惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278494_comment'></div>不能专对，况询谋爰度五善之难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278494_comment'></div>何以克终？惟直谅多闻三益之助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278494_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278494_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a id='poem_content_1278496'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278496'>治状不如，宠光先被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278496_comment'></div>揆之愚分，岂无愧于积薪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278496_comment'></div>意者德邻，尝有心于推毂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278496_comment'></div>粤来谦问，益感衰悰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278496_comment'></div>某官大雅不群，成功可纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278496_comment'></div>本其素履，有嗟兮麟趾之风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278496_comment'></div>试以专城，殆筦尔牛刀之戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278496_comment'></div>期年于此，绩用谁如？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278496_comment'></div>以颂声载路之传，宜召节自天而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278496_comment'></div>如某者学非适用，才不逮中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278496_comment'></div>曷堪一障之乘，徒藉馀波之及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278496_comment'></div>遂令不敏，亦幸苟安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278496_comment'></div>郐以下而无讥，自知甚审；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278496_comment'></div>郑有功而见后，公论云何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278496_comment'></div>尚期未替于邦交，庶几可明于使指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278496_comment'></div>会言伊迩，属望惟深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278496_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1278496_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　作书与湖南范仲艺提刑。作品：与湖南范提刑仲艺。<div id='poem_1278497' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278497' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278497?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与湖南范提刑仲艺启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1189年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1278497'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278497'>寄旅不居，过家蜀道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278497_comment'></div>师言未穆，弭节湖阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278497_comment'></div>夫人以引去为高，吾党以留行为幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278497_comment'></div>矧如联事，昔在从游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278497_comment'></div>某官经明而行修，宇定而光发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278497_comment'></div>以《中庸》、《大学》之旨，究观九流；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278497_comment'></div>以《国风》、《雅》、《颂》之文，奄有众作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278497_comment'></div>周行斯久，誉处谁如？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278497_comment'></div>遍䌷石室之藏，分治天官之目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278497_comment'></div>上方乡用，胡自喜于怀章？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278497_comment'></div>公固倦游，然重违于追玺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278497_comment'></div>永惟先正，名满天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278497_comment'></div>亦越太史，动合古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278497_comment'></div>时则有若熙宁、元祐之间，位皆不过学士、谏官之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278497_comment'></div>犹未大用，顾且遐征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278497_comment'></div>四方典狱之官，于今不乏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278497_comment'></div>故国世臣之谓，舍此安归？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278497_comment'></div>某空疏如初，衰惰已甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278497_comment'></div>自别修门之后，浸亡当世之交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278497_comment'></div>曾谓盍簪，于焉秉传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278497_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1278497_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　作书与左相周必大。作品：与周丞相。<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙元年以前。）</span><div id='poem_1278434' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278434' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278434?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与周丞相书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1189年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278434")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278434_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278434'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278434'>伏自相公参预以来，奏记非一，间亦及于管见，而徒依善颂以为言，不敢妄陈当世之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278434_comment'></div>今相公独运大柄，无所避屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278434_comment'></div>顷读谢表，尝略窥钧意所向矣，故敢僭言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278434_comment'></div>往者渡江诸老，知讨贼而不知立国；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278434_comment'></div>绍兴季年，知保境而不知尊君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278434_comment'></div>夫惟不知立国，故保境之说胜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278434_comment'></div>不知尊君，故讨贼之义高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278434_comment'></div>二者相持，至今未解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278434_comment'></div>王公将相，往往以此代为进退者，五六十年于此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278434_comment'></div>虽比岁以来，此义磨灭殆尽，而朝野之情终未但已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278434_comment'></div>伏惟相公兼而收之，次而举之，勿使忠□之臣，以国家为忘天下之大义，静重之士，以朝廷为徇匹夫之狂言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278434_comment'></div>此固当今风厉自营，消伏党论之所务白也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278434_comment'></div>夫兼而收之，则助之者众；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278434_comment'></div>次而举之，则沮之者难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278434_comment'></div>惟相公留意，幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278434_comment'></div>若夫薄物细故，各有司存，付之责成而已，非所以烦精神，分志虑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278434_comment'></div>冒犯威尊，皇恐死罪。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1278434_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　光宗即位，作贺表。作品：贺登极。谢登极赦。<div id='poem_1278263' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278263' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278263?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺登极表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278263")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278263_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278263'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278263'>揖逊相承，乾坤嘉赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278263_comment'></div>讴歌所暨，夷夏宗依<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278263_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下笃生元良，遵养浚哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278263_comment'></div>鸡鸣而起，方趋问寝之时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278263_comment'></div>龙跃以飞，俄继中天之统。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278263_comment'></div>彝伦秩叙，历服延洪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278263_comment'></div>永惟《二典》，以还，亦既千载于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278263_comment'></div>高皇于汉，无神器之传；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278263_comment'></div>太宗于唐，非储闱之正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278263_comment'></div>孰与以明述圣，自祖及孙？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278263_comment'></div>当垂拱以袭尧，尽君之道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278263_comment'></div>爰询谋而命禹，若帝之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278263_comment'></div>独冠百王，同符隆古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278263_comment'></div>臣适际离亨之会，叨分边琐之麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278263_comment'></div>跂望清光，欣沾殊渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278263_comment'></div>但与林篁之众，咸有葵藿之心。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1278263_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1278264' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278264' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278264?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢登极赦表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278264")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278264_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278264'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278264'>维帝出震，与物为春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278264_comment'></div>在舜绍尧，眚灾肆赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278264_comment'></div>爰孚大号，实本旧章<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278264_comment'></div>共惟皇帝陛下，诚足以格幽明，德足以侔高厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278264_comment'></div>养以天下，嗣万世无疆之休；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278264_comment'></div>洽于民心，思匹夫不被其泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278264_comment'></div>聿观载籍，具任典仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278264_comment'></div>周有大赉，盖惟初基；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278264_comment'></div>汉与更始，但为故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278264_comment'></div>未有重规叠矩，一视同仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278264_comment'></div>率循继照之初，备举好生之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278264_comment'></div>臣遭时华旦，假守遐方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278264_comment'></div>葵藿倾阳，式谨朝宗之义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278264_comment'></div>蓼萧零露，敢忘渗漉之恩？</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1278264_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　光宗即位，为寿宗上尊号作贺表。作品：贺寿皇圣帝尊号。<div id='poem_1278265' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278265' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278265?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺寿皇圣帝尊号表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278265")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278265_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278265'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278265'>舜荐之天，以禹传九畴之正；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278265_comment'></div>乾称乎父，则震成六子之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278265_comment'></div>夷夏荣怀，宗社嘉赖<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278265_comment'></div>恭惟至尊寿皇圣帝陛下德及动植，孝通神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278265_comment'></div>素隆艺祖之丕图，昭受高宗之大烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278265_comment'></div>方边鄙不耸，盖闻中国之至仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278265_comment'></div>而羹墙靡忘，欲行天下之达礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278265_comment'></div>遂辞尊于南面，爰致养于东朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278265_comment'></div>况夫历数有归，彝伦攸叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278265_comment'></div>惟圣知圣，继今实为万世之休；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278265_comment'></div>可名非名，舍此曷表一人之意？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278265_comment'></div>虽六言而甚约，与二典以相辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278265_comment'></div>臣假守遐方，遭时盛事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278265_comment'></div>上未央之寿，正隔于清光；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278265_comment'></div>说稽古之书，尚修于薄伎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278265_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1278265_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　光宗即位，为皇太后移宫作贺表。作品：皇太后移御慈福宫贺皇帝。皇太后移御慈福宫贺寿皇圣帝。<div id='poem_1278266' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278266' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278266")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278266_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278266'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278266'>历数有托，而伸尧母之尊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278266_comment'></div>讴歌攸归，则本禹畴之叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278266_comment'></div>粤惟自昔，莫若方今<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278266_comment'></div>共惟皇帝陛下恭敬温文，聪明睿智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278266_comment'></div>乃眷寿皇之顾，聿怀神器之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278266_comment'></div>为天下得其人，遂忘南面；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278266_comment'></div>为人子止于孝，式奉东朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278266_comment'></div>惟太极之生两仪，与三圣之守一道，未之尝见，可以拟伦。<div class='inline' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278267'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278267'>尧天逾远，方切于追怀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278267_comment'></div>文母弥尊，益隆于夤奉<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278267_comment'></div>恭惟至尊寿皇圣帝陛下躬上圣之质，嗣中兴之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278267_comment'></div>历年于兹，薄海无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278267_comment'></div>粤从恭默，极为人子孝之思；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278267_comment'></div>竟托倦勤，决以天下逊之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278267_comment'></div>欲备东朝之甘旨，不知南面之崇高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278267_comment'></div>二典所无，百王何取？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278267_comment'></div>臣叨分符守，阻簉周行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278267_comment'></div>富贵无足解忧，幸粗知于大义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278267_comment'></div>讴歌咸曰与子，愿永暨于同心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278267_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278267_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　光宗立后，作贺表。作品：立后贺皇帝。<div id='poem_1278268' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278268' class='poemTitle id='poem_content_1278272'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278272'>一元之建，虽曰旧章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278272_comment'></div>二美之并，兹惟盛事<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278272_comment'></div>窃以策书所记年号，则多有以守成而愧揖逊之君；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278272_comment'></div>至于更化，则非沿袭之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278272_comment'></div>未若二圣亲传于大宝，两朝兼著于隆名，播告多方，超踰前古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278272_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下审时所上，亲政于初。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　光宗即位，作表贺寿圣皇太后从吉。<div id='poem_1278274' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278274' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278274?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺寿圣皇太后从吉表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1278274'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278274'>舜毕三年，共为子职；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278274_comment'></div>汉朝五日，燕及孙谋<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278274_comment'></div>恭惟寿圣皇太后殿下维德是行，以慈为宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278274_comment'></div>亲见重华之盛，永膺至养之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278274_comment'></div>长乐东朝，肇称于吉礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278274_comment'></div>瑶池西母，茂介于修龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278274_comment'></div>臣属于隰之载驰，喜旧仪之复见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278274_comment'></div>龙旗凤扇，想浮慈福之春；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278274_comment'></div>宝殿玉卮，莫扈未央之驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278274_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1278274_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　光宗即位，作表贺寿成皇后从吉。<div id='poem_1278275' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278275' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278275?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺寿成皇后从吉表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_1278275'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278275'>式协灵辰，肇称吉礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278275_comment'></div>天人底豫，宗社延休<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278275_comment'></div>恭惟寿成皇后殿下周母嗣音，虞嫔著德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278275_comment'></div>长乐宫之养，尚小前规；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278275_comment'></div>内司服之衣，率循彝典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278275_comment'></div>亲见累朝之盛，永陪慈极之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278275_comment'></div>臣属职驰驱，阻前贺舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278275_comment'></div>衮龙相映，想观广内之仪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278275_comment'></div>韶凤来翔，仰祝后天之算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278275_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1278275_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　光宗即位，作至尊寿皇圣帝册宝贺皇帝表。<div id='poem_1278276' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278276' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278276?labeling=true' target='_blank'>至尊寿皇圣帝册宝贺皇帝表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278276'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278276'>亲传大宝，惧功德之不宣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278276_comment'></div>恭上鸿名，质诗书而何愧？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278276_comment'></div>重闱燕喜，率土荣怀<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278276_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下道配唐、虞，行殊曾、闵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278276_comment'></div>谓孝非直养，莫如得四海九州之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278276_comment'></div>谓礼有常尊，孰与兼五典三坟之号？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278276_comment'></div>写之琬琰，炳若丹青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278276_comment'></div>以弥隆报之文，以永昭垂之闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278276_comment'></div>昔汉之尊太上，与唐之事明皇，群臣万岁之称，早尝拥彗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278276_comment'></div>二圣重欢之颂，竟亦磨崖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278276_comment'></div>以方熙朝，皆有惭德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278276_comment'></div>臣欣逢庆事，越在遐方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278276_comment'></div>虽扬厉铺张，莫预观光之列；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278276_comment'></div>而咏歌嗟叹，曷胜报上之诚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1278276_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　光宗即位，作贺寿皇圣帝表。<br /><a href="javascript:
