showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278296?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湖南提举谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278296'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278296'>重明丽正，方此第功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278296_comment'></div>五□在边，□然冒宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278296_comment'></div>业未免宜黜得迁之仪，臣不胜以荣为惧之情<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278296_comment'></div>窃以蕞尔桂阳，邻于岭表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278296_comment'></div>自升军额，将五十载之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278296_comment'></div>可纪守臣，才一二人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278296_comment'></div>然必宣劳而满岁，乃能循次以为州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278296_comment'></div>未有即赐除书，遂将使指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278296_comment'></div>辄衡陈于当路，皆度越于它邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278296_comment'></div>周会王人，微亦序诸侯之上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278296_comment'></div>汉置刺史，始皆属丞相之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278296_comment'></div>岂容如臣，亦预兹选？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278296_comment'></div>重念臣腐儒无用，假守罔功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278296_comment'></div>勤不足以盖荒政之愆，廉不足以塞旷官之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278296_comment'></div>顾专城而不理，况阖部以安施？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278296_comment'></div>虽幸遭时，以政拙心劳而见录；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278296_comment'></div>未知善后，将力小任重之为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278296_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇皇帝陛下自天出宁，如日委照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278296_comment'></div>敬识百辟之举，无有幽深；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278296_comment'></div>允釐庶绩之熙，不遗微细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278296_comment'></div>遂令庸冗，辄沐恩荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278296_comment'></div>臣敢不懋明诏条，采听谣俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278296_comment'></div>平颁兴积，庶将自古以有年；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278296_comment'></div>懋迁化居，不失与民而共利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278296_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1278296_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　赐历日，作谢表。作品：提举司谢赐历日。<div id='poem_1278297' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278297' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278297?labeling=true' target='_blank'>提举司谢赐历日表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278297")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278297_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278297'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278297'>夏时三之日，振古如兹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278297_comment'></div>周历万斯年，自今以始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278297_comment'></div>凡蒙敬授，悉赖裁成<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278297_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下得圣之传，为天所命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278297_comment'></div>受三朝之图籍，罔不朝宗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278297_comment'></div>在七政之玑衡，皆如轨度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278297_comment'></div>乃颁初政，爰布新书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278297_comment'></div>臣滥职将明，当思考协。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278297_comment'></div>不违咫尺，既同拜赐之荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278297_comment'></div>敢离须臾，而怠观风之事？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278297_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278297_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　湖南转运判官到任，作谢表。作品：湖南转运判官谢到任。<div id='poem_1278298' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278298' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278298?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湖南转运判官谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278298")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278298_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278298'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278298'>乘传弥年，缺然补报；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278298_comment'></div>将输所部，滋甚光华<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278298_comment'></div>惟本朝行仁政之原，自诸道置计司而始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278298_comment'></div>孰为之说，浸失其传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278298_comment'></div>不知国家之意，本以胜暴残；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278298_comment'></div>但曰藩镇之财，聚而归公上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278298_comment'></div>由是多故，至于中兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278298_comment'></div>虽怀恻怛之心，莫奉丁宁之诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278298_comment'></div>惟圣有作，视民如伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278298_comment'></div>畴咨廷绅，申固邦本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278298_comment'></div>方当讲求民瘼之际，宜得布宣主德之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278298_comment'></div>深明盈虚，稍务损益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278298_comment'></div>顾以兹事，付之臣愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278298_comment'></div>伏念臣学不过于虚谈，仕未离乎尝试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278298_comment'></div>曷期衰暮，偶际休明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278298_comment'></div>且治郡徒劳，初无毫发之效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278298_comment'></div>况察州不敏，近在目睫之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278298_comment'></div>以自知之甚明，将大幸之难再。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278298_comment'></div>云胡隆委，得以次迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278298_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下岂弟作人，高明覆物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278298_comment'></div>谓旷日持久，或有尽知情伪之长；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278298_comment'></div>谓便道之官，庶无数易将迎之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278298_comment'></div>遂令庸冗，有此侥踰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278298_comment'></div>臣敢不对越龙光，勉旃驽力？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278298_comment'></div>苟不至乏绝，以深贻屯所之忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278298_comment'></div>则有条便宜，当渐为来者之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278298_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1278298_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年9月</a>　贺光宗诞辰重明节。作品：湖南运判贺重明节。<div id='poem_1278300' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278300' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278300?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湖南运判贺重明节表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278300")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278300_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278300'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278300'>地辟天开，圣作明述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278300_comment'></div>于赫重离之运，有来载震之祥<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278300_comment'></div>伏臣禹相舜，历年之多；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278300_comment'></div>武继文，受命之固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278300_comment'></div>昔尝闻于六艺，今亲见于一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278300_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下允执其中，聿修厥德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278300_comment'></div>歛时五福，岂惟叙有夏之畴？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278300_comment'></div>与我九龄，抑又遇成周之历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278300_comment'></div>臣滥将使指，尝简睿知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278300_comment'></div>若帝之初，虽阻阙庭之观礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278300_comment'></div>如山之寿，但瞻衡岳以为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278300_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1278300_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年10月</a>　贺孝宗诞辰会庆节。作品：湖南提举贺会庆节。<div id='poem_1278299' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278299' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278299?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湖南提举贺会庆节表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278299")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278299_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278299'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278299'>太极之生两仪，尊无与并；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278299_comment'></div>嵩高之呼万岁，喜不自胜<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278299_comment'></div>恭惟至尊寿皇圣帝陛下德配百王，心游太古，行尧之道，莫测于圣神；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278299_comment'></div>荐禹于天，复□于顺受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278299_comment'></div>适纪诞弥之旦，永膺滋至之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278299_comment'></div>臣将指荆湖，驰心魏阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278299_comment'></div>□□为寿，虽莫缀于清班；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278299_comment'></div>石崖可鑴，岂敢忘于善颂。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1278299_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年9月</a>　贺光宗诞辰重明节。作品：重明节进奉银。<div id='poem_1278301' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278301' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278301?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重明节进奉银表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278301")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278301_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278301'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278301'>后天祝算，既同嵩岳之呼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278301_comment'></div>任土贡珍，爰致荆州之品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278301_comment'></div>前件银，气钟清淑，产类朱提。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278301_comment'></div>侑万年之觞，深惭微币；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278301_comment'></div>得诸山之瓮，愿赋休祥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1278301_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　湖南提举任上作举刺列郡太守状。作品：湖南提举举刺列郡太守状。<div id='poem_1278312' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278312' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278312?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湖南提举刺列郡太守状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278312")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278312_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278312'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278312'>臣照对湖南治郡，莫难于永，莫易于全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278312_comment'></div>臣取十年以来事关本司，至于目即，反覆参考，见得永州实是匮乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278312_comment'></div>积而至于淳熙十五年终，大军月桩，常拖下七个月不解，共为钱三万五千贯文，馀逋称此；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278312_comment'></div>而又民俗强悍，动多嚣讼，此所以为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278312_comment'></div>全州素号仅足，自淳熙十三年后，大军月桩，每孟月钱季月起发，并无缺误，他亦齐整；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278312_comment'></div>而又壤地褊小，公事甚稀，此所以为易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278312_comment'></div>今来知永州赵谧，自到任之后，每月纲运已起至绍熙元年五月分，若从今八月理起，较之累政，趱前三个月；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278312_comment'></div>却又补带旧欠，凡为钱二万贯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278312_comment'></div>使知永州者皆如赵谧，则永虽凋郡，可以渐宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278312_comment'></div>知全州施广文，自到任之后，每月纲运初颇如期，洎至今年四月以后，于本司新故交承之际，顿不起解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278312_comment'></div>若从今八月理起，较之累政，更拖下三个月，凡为钱一万二千贯文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278312_comment'></div>又官吏久无俸给，军人冬衣才支一半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278312_comment'></div>使知全州者皆如施广文，则全虽乐土，又必彫敝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278312_comment'></div>近者朝廷集议蠲减，臣实奉行宽大之诏，数内永州减月桩钱岁五千贯，亦是谧率先他郡，将所蠲减之数分为等第，均与诸邑，必欲上泽下及于民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278312_comment'></div>今之州郡，大抵上欺监司而下不恤民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278312_comment'></div>自非谧有志爱民，安能如此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278312_comment'></div>臣以为若谧者，可谓不负陛下使令矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278312_comment'></div>施广文虽本书生，顾为鄙猥之计，及此垂满，略无顾惮，自上供军须至官吏之俸，一切勿问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278312_comment'></div>臣尚以为行且受代，或是储积以遗后人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278312_comment'></div>比及体访，累月以来，郡帑并无见管钱物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278312_comment'></div>且财赋若不在官，即须在民，而广文已将今年民户秋苗创行预借一半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278312_comment'></div>方禾未登场之时，民正艰食，柰何有此暴歛？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278312_comment'></div>全之民力，自是困矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278312_comment'></div>臣以为若广文者，可谓负陛下使令矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278312_comment'></div>至如知武冈军王公弼，亦有治状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278312_comment'></div>武冈军虽小垒，自公弼为之，阖郡之事，井井有条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278312_comment'></div>士人悦之，军人安之，旁及猺峒，悉听约束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278312_comment'></div>观其才，有过人者，但视永州不为甚难，劳效差小耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278312_comment'></div>以臣愚陋衰疾，实不足任刺举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278312_comment'></div>如此三郡治否之状，盖久而后得之，已忝耳目之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278312_comment'></div>今三人者，各及满替，若更隐默，遂使施广文侥倖善罢，再窃官职，何以为负使令者之戒？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278312_comment'></div>赵谧、王公弼不蒙旌别，稍异伦辈，何以为不负使令者劝？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278312_comment'></div>已具状奏闻，欲望圣慈加惠此方，首正诸郡，将施广文特赐黜责，赵谧、王公弼特赐擢用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278312_comment'></div>伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1278312_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278312'><span class='label'>按：</span>绍熙元年十月二十二日有旨，赵谧、王公弼各减二年磨（原误作应）勘，施广文与宫观。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278312_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　湖南提举任上作荐士状。作品：湖南提举荐士状。<div id='poem_1278313' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278313' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278313?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湖南提举荐士状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278313")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278313_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278313'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278313'>臣恭睹明诏，搜罗湖广遗材，窃见通直郎、知潭州长沙县宋文仲有通务之材，而发于谦和；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278313_comment'></div>有及物之志，而安于静退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278313_comment'></div>盖文仲虽生长南土，其家学则中原文献也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278313_comment'></div>顷丞萍乡，蔼有民誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278313_comment'></div>方臣假守桂阳，得其为人，就访之，而文仲尝为桂阳录事参军，授臣本军会计录一卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278313_comment'></div>臣遵行之，所以能蠲除宿负，罢弛斜科，不得罪于其民者，文仲之助也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278313_comment'></div>寻领使事，访以九郡利病，无不周知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278313_comment'></div>前者仓司籴补诸郡米仅十万斛，今者漕司蠲残亦数万缗，皆文仲发之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278313_comment'></div>臣以为文仲虽衡阳人，实国士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278313_comment'></div>奉议郎、知常州无锡县吴猎，学问本于纯实，器识期于远大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278313_comment'></div>所居阖郡宗为师友，凡与之游，类多自爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278313_comment'></div>而猎于其交，有善称之不容口，有过戒之不遗力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278313_comment'></div>有急难，虽不利于其身，赴之不恤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278313_comment'></div>顷从事桂林幕府，与平李接之乱，未尝言功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278313_comment'></div>已而帅臣刘焞不理于口，而猎谊不避罪，屡讼其冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278313_comment'></div>人臣如此，其不负国必矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278313_comment'></div>臣守桂阳，猎适为赡军酒官，助讲荒政，甚于饥渴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278313_comment'></div>桂阳故事，遇皇帝登极，奉表进银三千两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278313_comment'></div>属方救荒之际，力不办此，臣惧无以塞责，猎实教臣申请减额，迄蒙睿旨损三之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278313_comment'></div>为惠一方，猎与有力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278313_comment'></div>臣以为猎虽长沙人，亦国士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278313_comment'></div>文林郎、知潭州攸县蒋砺，素禀端亮，耻为苟简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278313_comment'></div>往岁江陵，今兹攸县，廉惠之誉，两邑同辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278313_comment'></div>观其为吏，苟不便于民，虽上官令之不听；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278313_comment'></div>苟便于民，虽匹夫不获伸则身任其责也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278313_comment'></div>臣尝见其诣阙所上书，论广右利害，有四救弊之说；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278313_comment'></div>及与提点刑狱司论经、总制钱，其言恻怛，可以施用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278313_comment'></div>则迩臣所谓远方因革、可备咨访者，在静江则砺其人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278313_comment'></div>奉议郎、知全州清湘县杨炤，赋受沉审，济以通练，亦佐桂幕，与平李接之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278313_comment'></div>随宜知变，见谓善谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278313_comment'></div>而其操履，自不可夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278313_comment'></div>及今为县，益著吏绩，郡实赖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278313_comment'></div>臣得其《岭外盐筴本末》一书，自开宝讫于淳熙，上下二百馀年，灿然明白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278313_comment'></div>其论以政和蔡京变法实为咎根，驯致二广连年多盗，官般客贩，迭为民扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278313_comment'></div>盖利东路则西人被其害，利西路则东人被其害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278313_comment'></div>宜为损益，兼惠两路，斯可以便公私，息纷更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278313_comment'></div>以臣所见，广盐之说十数家，未有如炤之平者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278313_comment'></div>则迩臣所谓远方因革，可备咨访者，在临贺则炤其人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1278313_comment'></div>如臣不肖，非有知人之明，能得此数子于众人未识之先，正以久居于此，或闻之公论之熟，或见之同事之详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1278313_comment'></div>如宋文仲、吴猎之在湖南，蒋砺、杨炤之在广右，朋侪乡党，咸所推先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1278313_comment'></div>牧守宾僚，无不器重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1278313_comment'></div>臣如隐嘿，不惟负蔽贤之罪，是不奉明诏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1278313_comment'></div>已于今年某月某日具状奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1278313_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈特赐甄录，以昭示公朝不遐遗之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1278313_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1278313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278313'><span class='label'>有旨：</span>吴猎、蒋砺、杨炤、宋文仲，并赴都堂审察。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278313_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　作书与湖南运判张演。作品：与湖南张运判演。<div id='poem_1278479' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278479' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278479?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与湖南张运判演启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278479")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278479_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278479'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278479'>三馆题名，谁非后进？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278479_comment'></div>六条问事，日有先声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278479_comment'></div>凡同衡岳之盟，悉仰皇华之庇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278479_comment'></div>乃如独喜，则倍群瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278479_comment'></div>某官当代典刑，本朝经行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278479_comment'></div>卓尔达尊之德，蔼然尔雅之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278479_comment'></div>方独步于英躔，已遍仪于清贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278479_comment'></div>富贵利达，不知两蜀之几何；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278479_comment'></div>议论风流，当自三苏而至此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278479_comment'></div>是宜次《玄鸟》、《生民》之颂，荐圜丘清庙之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278479_comment'></div>胡然江湖，久矣岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278479_comment'></div>还驱九折，流俗以衣锦而为荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278479_comment'></div>阅过千帆，善类于积薪而加叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278479_comment'></div>万里来归之近，诸公迎劳之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278479_comment'></div>岂外计之无人，况里言之有味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278479_comment'></div>推之在昔，多收岁晏之功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278479_comment'></div>意者由今，竟为海内之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278479_comment'></div>某以空疏之学，当凋敝之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278479_comment'></div>每事面墙，所忧末路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278479_comment'></div>孰谓夤缘之幸，迄应慕用之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278479_comment'></div>自其初筮以微名，亦既终更之知免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278479_comment'></div>然而愿言受业，曾未及门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278479_comment'></div>与学省之青衿，摩挲石刻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278479_comment'></div>及天涯之白发，奔走学□。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278479_comment'></div>永惟修敬之□，并诵属心之久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278479_comment'></div>傥辱以书生之故，不宜□□；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278479_comment'></div>若责其□□□□，则有馀罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278479_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1278479_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　作书与衡州刘守。<div id='poem_1278480' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278480' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278480?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与衡州刘守启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278480")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278480_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278480'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278480'>进谒宾墀，图纳交而弗果；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278480_comment'></div>分符郡寄，欣问政之有邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278480_comment'></div>爰修使聘之仪，以笃邦联之敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278480_comment'></div>某官绝人德业，康世才猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278480_comment'></div>有闻无声，擅圭璋颙卬之望；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278480_comment'></div>何乡不可，见渊泉溥博之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278480_comment'></div>谓宜上庙朝论思献纳之班，何独宣湖海岂弟和平之化？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278480_comment'></div>方当综核，尤重外庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278480_comment'></div>盖国家所以进贤，而皇上于焉注意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278480_comment'></div>况江亭遗咏，邦君实王佐之才；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278480_comment'></div>且郴岸瞻言，刺史有岩廊之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278480_comment'></div>永帷自昔，是用烦公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278480_comment'></div>将期年报政之时，奉尺一赐环之诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278480_comment'></div>若某者空疏末学，龌龊散材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278480_comment'></div>乘障何堪？面墙是惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278480_comment'></div>譬诸弱植，固欣依松柏之高；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278480_comment'></div>正使澡身，犹惭厕珠玉之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278480_comment'></div>伫诲言之惟服，傥官谤之可逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278480_comment'></div>同寅协恭，匪一人之私义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278480_comment'></div>比小事大，尚往昔之通规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278480_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1278480_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　作书与郴州守丁逢。作品：与郴州丁守逢。<div id='poem_1278481' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278481' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1278481'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278481'>一星于兹，久不造下风之请；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278481_comment'></div>百里而近，今乃同与国之盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278481_comment'></div>即其讲德之详，重以纳交之早。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278481_comment'></div>心独自喜，书不能宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278481_comment'></div>某官学本六经，才兼数器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278481_comment'></div>每怀往事，欲收南渡之功名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278481_comment'></div>若论后来，不数东州之辈行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278481_comment'></div>越在外服，竟无里言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278481_comment'></div>宣劳盖自于青衫，养望殆几于白发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278481_comment'></div>升华延阁，盍归西省之班？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278481_comment'></div>服美长淮，乃掌北门之管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278481_comment'></div>胡然自诡，复此遐征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278481_comment'></div>避名湖岭之间，用意市朝之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278481_comment'></div>令人高仰，举世谁如？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278481_comment'></div>若某者疵吝之馀，空疏如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278481_comment'></div>冒来乘障，忧在面墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278481_comment'></div>不图雅故之交，而托抚封之近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278481_comment'></div>屈公于此，将物论之云何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278481_comment'></div>知我者谁，亦己分之幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278481_comment'></div>何繇隙地之遇，薄叙小邦之怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278481_comment'></div>滕间于齐楚之间，盛衰则异；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278481_comment'></div>江别为沧浪之水，源委攸同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278481_comment'></div>彻名之初，归德弥切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278481_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1278481_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　作书谢潘安抚推荐。作品：谢潘安抚列荐。<div id='poem_1278482' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278482' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278482?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢潘安抚列荐启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278482'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278482'>举最有三，罔功第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278482_comment'></div>虽未尝于推择，终自切于依归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278482_comment'></div>伏以蕞尔桂阳，已非古郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278482_comment'></div>析郴置县，与广为邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278482_comment'></div>周职方之所未闻，汉刺史之所不察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278482_comment'></div>盖厥壤处诸华之裔，而其君视大国之孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278482_comment'></div>尝因壁记以泛观，自升军额而枚数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278482_comment'></div>中兴至此，凡六十载之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278482_comment'></div>善状为谁？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278482_comment'></div>才一二人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278482_comment'></div>间或收效于毫发，曷尝挂名于齿牙？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278482_comment'></div>未有当路为之同辞，剡章至于尊达，越在它邦之上，突如今日之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278482_comment'></div>岂无贤劳，堪此宠异？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278482_comment'></div>昔方岳考绩，于佥言以见公；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278482_comment'></div>《春秋》予人，至特书以为贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278482_comment'></div>傥凡流而与此，将公论之云何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278482_comment'></div>如某者才不逮中，学非适用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278482_comment'></div>早尝困于铅椠，晚但谋于稻粱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278482_comment'></div>岂谓误恩，遽叨假守？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278482_comment'></div>意所勇敢，动违小吏之规；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278482_comment'></div>理当便宜，辄束拘儒之见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278482_comment'></div>徒勤无补，将罪是求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278482_comment'></div>矧惟郡计之空，重以岁功之薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278482_comment'></div>欲罔民而何敢？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278482_comment'></div>怀言上以无繇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278482_comment'></div>惟有再三以乞怜，庶几万一于免戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278482_comment'></div>居常自谓，殆非巧宦之宜为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278482_comment'></div>已乃不然，竟以拙诚而见录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1278482_comment'></div>某官当今先进，薄海达尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1278482_comment'></div>覆护诸生，不遗馀力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1278482_comment'></div>扶持斯道，如有隐忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1278482_comment'></div>每于众好恶之言，独有公是非之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1278482_comment'></div>始以致曲，将如万折之必东；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1278482_comment'></div>迨其既孚，则并一谈而弗破。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1278482_comment'></div>遂令庸陋，亦被甄明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1278482_comment'></div>某敢不更体深知，益坚晚操？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1278482_comment'></div>处非其据，幸而转败以为功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1278482_comment'></div>归洁其身，当务以退而为进。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1278482_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　作书与湖南安抚沈枢。作品：与湖南沈安抚枢。<div id='poem_1278483' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278483' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278483?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与湖南沈安抚枢启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278483")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278483_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278483'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278483'>大邦维屏，眷言衡岳之雄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278483_comment'></div>元老壮犹，简在甘泉之旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278483_comment'></div>先声所暨，群听已孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278483_comment'></div>连十国以相欢，独二天而尤幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278483_comment'></div>某官居今大雅，当代达尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278483_comment'></div>风流盖接于前闻，绩用莫详于已试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278483_comment'></div>世方倚重，俨然绮里之衣冠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278483_comment'></div>人忽为危，阅尽翟公之宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278483_comment'></div>虽三已而何愠？无一辞以自明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278483_comment'></div>上独知心，晚将共事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278483_comment'></div>况民庸之愈伟，曾物望之谁如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278483_comment'></div>啸咏东嘉，粲廛闾而可数；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278483_comment'></div>指麾鄂渚，寂井灶以无哗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278483_comment'></div>爰进陟于西清，尚来宣于南服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278483_comment'></div>求之舆诵，谓归衮之奚迟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278483_comment'></div>揆以比年，宜召还之相继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278483_comment'></div>盖有定论，岂曰遐征？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278483_comment'></div>某甚矣面墙，于焉乘障。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278483_comment'></div>意所勇敢，动违小吏之规；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278483_comment'></div>理当便宜，或束拘儒之见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278483_comment'></div>徒勤无补，将败是求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278483_comment'></div>岂期末路之难，乃有万间之庇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278483_comment'></div>顾惟列郡，共瞻周使之光华；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278483_comment'></div>孰与诸生，尝近鲁侯之色笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278483_comment'></div>其为欣抃，实倍等伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278483_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1278483_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年1月</a>　作书与赵善俊安抚贺正。作品：与赵安抚贺正。<div id='poem_1278502' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278502' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278502?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答赵安抚贺正启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278502")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278502_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278502'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278502'>元年正月，肇开与物之春；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278502_comment'></div>同姓一家，均被自天之禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278502_comment'></div>乃如胥庆，矧在焉依？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278502_comment'></div>某官以当代之英，作大宗之翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278502_comment'></div>如晋二文，而受彤弓之赐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278502_comment'></div>如武五宗，而分赤社之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278502_comment'></div>方茂对于宠光，用亶乘于谷旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278502_comment'></div>某幸联小事，窃借馀光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278502_comment'></div>喧马盍簪，遥想朋来之颂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278502_comment'></div>燕毛序齿，宜遄天揖之班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278502_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1278502_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　作书与王蔺荐郴州守丁逢。作品：与王谦仲参政荐郴守丁端叔。<span class='inlineComment2'>（王蔺为参政在绍熙元年7月之前。）</span><div id='poem_1278444' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278444' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278444?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与王谦仲参政荐郴守丁端叔书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278444")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278444_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278444'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278444'>某辄有冒昧之恳，窃伏自念，于门下宜不自他，而敢言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278444_comment'></div>某与郴守丁直阁虽有雅故，然未熟其为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278444_comment'></div>同官湘中，适相邻比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278444_comment'></div>通财僇力，两年如一家，然后见其心与才诚有过人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278444_comment'></div>他未暇遍举，以桂阳之民得免转徙者，则皆郴守之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278444_comment'></div>桂，山邑，率岁仰米于郴，每郴闭籴，则桂人坐困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278444_comment'></div>去岁旱歉，两郡特甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278444_comment'></div>丁守既自措置条□，沛然多备，则下令许桂人般贩巨室之积，令行而民信之，故桂市米不绝，此一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278444_comment'></div>郴饥则民流入桂，桂饥则民流入郴，不能相容，继以剽略而为盗，自昔如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278444_comment'></div>某与丁守约，各自拊其境内，讫今春夏皆按堵，此二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278444_comment'></div>桂尝乞米于漕司，今就郴拨三千斛应副，桂去郴，陆行六十里，舟行弥旬而后至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278444_comment'></div>般津之费，几半所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278444_comment'></div>丁守遂移苗米输之，桂阳由此省费，而又及期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278444_comment'></div>此三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278444_comment'></div>每惟今岁救荒，艰辛万状，傥郴稍有壑邻之意，则某何以塞责？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278444_comment'></div>必且罪去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278444_comment'></div>因人免罪，又蒙朝廷不次擢用，列之诸司，而郴守独未见旌异，同劳偏赏，心甚愧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278444_comment'></div>秋间帅漕相约同荐，奏牍已就，适闻列荐之禁，诸司皆相顾失色，至今民言陈乞不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278444_comment'></div>某与丁守别久，不知其别后为安丰及得简、得盱眙、复徙郴本末何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278444_comment'></div>就今观之，则一路郡守，留意民瘼，理财以宽而用足，听讼以恕而刑省，待僚属以礼，而人趋事，郴当为第一矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278444_comment'></div>朝廷录功，当以实事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1278444_comment'></div>有人如此，若与碌碌者同视，将何以劝劳者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1278444_comment'></div>况某实赖其力，礼尚施报，但恨疏贱，不足动人，不敢率先为朝廷诵言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1278444_comment'></div>然丁守母甚老，一子多病，在数千里外，诚使某得效柳子厚事，以官逊之，谊所不辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1278444_comment'></div>又恐以矫激取讥，故但私布之门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1278444_comment'></div>恭惟门下爱惜人才，凡可为斯世驱使者，何所不当素蓄？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1278444_comment'></div>又辱知幸，必不以鄙言为不实，或阿所好，或出于不得已，宜勿惜启齿为丞相白发其事，岂唯某，将四海九州之吏，于门下归心矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1278444_comment'></div>某干犯钧严，临纸不胜惓惓。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1278444_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年1月</a>　作书与张演贺正。作品：与张运判贺正。<div id='poem_1278503' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278503' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1278503'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278503'>元年春正月，式会乾初；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278503_comment'></div>名卿材大夫，宜居泰内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278503_comment'></div>乃如胥庆，矧在同寅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278503_comment'></div>某官累朝故家，多士先进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278503_comment'></div>以道山蓬莱之旧，出董计书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278503_comment'></div>以《国风》、《雅》、《颂》之流，下行吏事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278503_comment'></div>方亶乘于谷旦，将茂对于龙光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278503_comment'></div>某偶托下风，每资馀润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278503_comment'></div>岂徒使骋，致忆别之双鱼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278503_comment'></div>所冀工歌，听劳还之四牡<span class='inlineComment2'>（《止斋先生文集》卷三四。）</span>。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　除湖南转运判官到任，与同僚通信。作品：除运判与交代傅提举伯寿。<div id='poem_1278507' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278507' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278507?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除运判与交代傅提举伯寿启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278507")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278507_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278507'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278507'>簉迹周行，辱为后进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278507_comment'></div>观风汉部，愧在前陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278507_comment'></div>虽忻道旧之有期，亦惧告新之无状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278507_comment'></div>静言久要，钦迟肯来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278507_comment'></div>某官学优古人，文妙天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278507_comment'></div>以《大学》、《中庸》之旨，究观九流；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278507_comment'></div>以《国风》、《雅》、《颂》之音，奄有众作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278507_comment'></div>科名甚伟，誉处谁如？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278507_comment'></div>遍䌷石室之藏，分治天官之目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278507_comment'></div>爰方乡用，胡乃倦游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278507_comment'></div>永惟先正徇国之风，不数宣和在庭之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278507_comment'></div>忠孝奕世，莫盛于一门；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278507_comment'></div>出入三朝，未离于五品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278507_comment'></div>士方太息，公已遄归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278507_comment'></div>某瘝旷之馀，覆护何幸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278507_comment'></div>况尚联于小事，而近托于下风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278507_comment'></div>然阳子之去舂陵，遂著坏麻之节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278507_comment'></div>而贾生之对宣室，讫蒙前席之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278507_comment'></div>恐公此行，孤我所望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278507_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1278507_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　作书与丁逢，贺其除湖北提刑。作品：贺丁郴州除湖北提刑。<div id='poem_1278510' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278510' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278510?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺丁郴州除湖北提刑启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278510")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278510_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278510'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278510'>筮言谷旦，涖止崇台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278510_comment'></div>便道之官，不待上汉庭之计；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278510_comment'></div>入境问俗，已来宣周隰之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278510_comment'></div>先声所孚，群听咸若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278510_comment'></div>某官器愈大而能受，才无施而不宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278510_comment'></div>欲请长缨，宜云霄之可上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278510_comment'></div>尚分半竹，胡州县之徒劳？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278510_comment'></div>盖□□□其老成，而上益详于试可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278510_comment'></div>果烦以四方之典狱，俾洽乎累政之深仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278510_comment'></div>问平反几何人，岂特庭闱之喜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278510_comment'></div>得参错十数辈，当知江汉之宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278510_comment'></div>某阻自□车，欲驰聘介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278510_comment'></div>以浙东西之雅故，晚更知心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278510_comment'></div>于湖南北之司存，今当取法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278510_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1278510_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年7月</a>　作书贺留正升任左相。作品：贺留左相。<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙元年7月光宗以留正为左相，王蔺为枢密院使，胡晋臣为签书枢密院事。）</span><div id='poem_1278511' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278511' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278511?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺留左相启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278511")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278511_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278511'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278511'>孚号昕朝，正名台极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278511_comment'></div>两宫嘉与，四海荣怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278511_comment'></div>共惟某官德盛而礼恭，功大而心小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278511_comment'></div>诚身有道，非声音笑貌之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278511_comment'></div>事君以忠，在期会簿书之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278511_comment'></div>自持国柄，益叶师言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278511_comment'></div>至于散植坏群而无智名，哀穷悼屈而无德色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278511_comment'></div>燕及幽隐，薰为丰穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278511_comment'></div>于以成正始之风，于以答重华之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278511_comment'></div>爰被殊常之眷，竟膺虚左之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278511_comment'></div>夷考前朝，盖有不备官而专美；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278511_comment'></div>乃如近制，率尝与次辅以同升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278511_comment'></div>举世翕然，惟公宜此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278511_comment'></div>某辱知最厚，颂美尤勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278511_comment'></div>况未免于驱驰，尚有烦于顾恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278511_comment'></div>虽多病早衰之故，欲陈力以无堪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278511_comment'></div>然大书深刻之传，或托名于不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278511_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1278511_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年7月</a>　作书贺王蔺任枢密使。作品：贺王枢使。<div id='poem_1278512' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278512' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278512?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺王枢使启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278512")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278512_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278512'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278512'>畴庸左辖，正位中权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278512_comment'></div>涣号之孚，群听惟允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278512_comment'></div>某官直方以大，中正而通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278512_comment'></div>德虽盛而愈恭，义可为而必勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278512_comment'></div>功名自许，无愧社稷之臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278512_comment'></div>富贵不渝，尚馀湖海之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278512_comment'></div>自参大政，益展壮猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278512_comment'></div>苟利公家，宁顾便文之计；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278512_comment'></div>务先天下，不知折节之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278512_comment'></div>于以成正始之风，于以答重华之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278512_comment'></div>爰被便蕃之宠，进专宥密之司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278512_comment'></div>闻之师言，久矣上意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278512_comment'></div>盖小宰若今中丞，未曰柄臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278512_comment'></div>而太尉为右丞相，厥有故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278512_comment'></div>将以托国，岂惟本兵？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278512_comment'></div>伫听文德之麻，以祚中兴之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278512_comment'></div>某辱知最厚，颂美尤勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278512_comment'></div>况未免于驱驰，尚有烦于顾恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278512_comment'></div>虽多病早衰之故，欲陈力以无堪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1278512_comment'></div>然大书深刻之传，或托名于不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1278512_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1278512_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年7月</a>　作书贺胡某任参知政事。作品：贺胡参政。<div id='poem_1278513' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278513' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278513?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺胡参政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278513")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278513_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278513'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278513'>擢陪大政，就翊洪枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278513_comment'></div>二柄同归，四方归重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278513_comment'></div>某官才全而德懋，实大而声闳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278513_comment'></div>尚友其人，皆前修之辈行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278513_comment'></div>事君以道，必平昔之之规模。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278513_comment'></div>永惟绝俗之资，亶有格天之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278513_comment'></div>宜简知于睿主，遂夹辅于昌期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278513_comment'></div>而况瞻言坤维，代有人杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278513_comment'></div>范、苏二氏，缉熙元祐之休；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278513_comment'></div>雍、卫两公，弼亮重华之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278513_comment'></div>以是邦之问学，知今日之吁谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278513_comment'></div>若乃大明生于东，伏群阴于将旦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278513_comment'></div>九河注之海，屹砥柱于中流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278513_comment'></div>则在公身，尤关世道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278513_comment'></div>某侧闻涣号，倍激懦衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278513_comment'></div>虽深知久要之心，而敢犯朋亡之义？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278513_comment'></div>爱之莫助，有怀未免于感兴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278513_comment'></div>老矣无能，所恨不堪于驱使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278513_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1278513_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　喜雨作诗寄朋友。作品：行湘喜雨简刘公度周明叔。<div id='poem_161886' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161886' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161886?labeling=true' target='_blank'>行湘喜雨简刘公度周明叔</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_161886'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161886'>将行客有戒，正热人不禁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161886'>出门一昔雨，解缆十日阴。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161886'>湘山益以碧，湘水益以深。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161886'>天光接云梦，野暝蒙衡郴。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161886'>蝇无盘中迹，蝉有木末音。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_161886'>顾乃废枕簟，爰方索衣衾。<div id='poem_sentence_5_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_161886'>我起问夹岸，往岁孰与今。<div id='poem_sentence_6_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_161886'>衡茅或数间，丛竹皆十寻。<div id='poem_sentence_7_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_161886'>蒲莲间华实，鸥鹭时浮沉。<div id='poem_sentence_8_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_161886'>老稚各有得，渔樵不相侵。<div id='poem_sentence_9_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_161886'>早插禾欲孕，新炊粟如金。<div id='poem_sentence_10_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_161886'>为之失倦游，于以成孤斟。<div id='poem_sentence_11_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_161886'>永怀泛湘人，屈贾多愁吟。<div id='poem_sentence_12_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_161886'>时哉不可失，浯溪更骎骎。<div id='poem_sentence_15_161886_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_161886'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_161886_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　与刘公度诗歌唱和。作品：刘连州和前韵因道湘中之乐以谢。<div id='poem_161878' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161878' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161878?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刘连州和前韵因道湘中之乐以谢</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_161878'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161878'>湘中足可乐，谁苦愁不禁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161878_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_161878'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_161878_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　与叶适诗歌酬赠。作品：闻叶正则阅《藏经》次其《送客》韵以问之。<div id='poem_161995' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161995' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_1_161995'>万古逆顺舟，以斗占旦昏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161995'>曩余好百家，信不及鲁论。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161995'>初亦半喜愕，久之乍亡存。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161995'>白发一无成，颇识委与源。<div id='poem_sentence_4_161995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_161995'>风停波自平，却视消长痕。<div id='poem_sentence_5_161995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_161995'>六经夫如何，夫子手所翻。<div id='poem_sentence_6_161995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_161995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_161995'>经成今几年，尝试以是观。<div id='poem_sentence_12_161995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161923'>巡檐索之笑，但不禁冷蕊。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161923_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161923'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161712'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161712_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　作诗题耒阳黄宰诗卷。<div id='poem_162034' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_162034' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/162034?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题耒阳黄宰诗卷</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_162034")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_162034_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_162034'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_162034'>诗卷来何处，棠阴日夕佳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_162034_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_162034'>令人添白发，及此有黄花。<div id='poem_sentence_1_162034_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_162034'>事业谁千载，文章各一家。<div id='poem_sentence_2_162034_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_162034'>何时定还阙，解柂向长沙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_162034_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_162034'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_162034_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　作诗送黄元吉。作品：送黄元吉。<span class='inlineComment2'>（黄元吉是陆九渊门人。《象山语录》卷二云：有传黄元吉别长沙，陈君举有诗送行……。）</span><div id='poem_161767' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161767' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161767?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送黄元吉<span class='inlineComment2'>（陆子静门人）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161767")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161767_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161767'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161767'>荷君来意固非轻，曾未深交意便倾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161767_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161767'>语到七篇无欠少，学从三画已分明。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161767_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161767'>每怀前此伤标置，颇欲从今近老成。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161767_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161767'>为谢荆门三益友，何时尊酒话生平。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161767_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161767'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161767_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年秋</a>　辞免乞祠不允，作诗抒怀。作品：怀归丐祠。<div id='poem_161680' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161680' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/161680?labeling=true' target='_blank'>怀归丐祠</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_161680")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_161680_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_161680'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_161680'>久矣怀归曷月哉，冠缨吾欲濯吾埃。<div id='poem_sentence_0_161680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_161680'>天寒病马尚远放，日夕罢牛宜下来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_161680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_161680'>名家翰墨书还蠹，盖世功名骨已苔。<div id='poem_sentence_2_161680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_161680'>孰与东篱访黄菊，柴门终不为人开。<div id='poem_sentence_3_161680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_161680'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_161680_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　辞官乞祠作申省状。作品：辞免浙西提刑乞祠申省状。<div id='poem_1278382' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1278382' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1278382?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免浙西提刑乞祠申省状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34539, "南宋", "陈傅良", "poem_title_1278382")'>陈傅良</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1278382_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1278382'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1278382'>某一介庸陋，本不适用，偶际休明，荐叨器使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1278382_comment'></div>自守军垒，就除本路监司之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1278382_comment'></div>一岁而迁将漕，又一岁而迁按刑，可谓宠光狎至，私计兼足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1278382_comment'></div>方宠光狎至，而无图报之心，私计兼足，遽为求便之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1278382_comment'></div>苟非至愚，岂敢犯此不韪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1278382_comment'></div>而某祠禄之请，不避烦渎，至于再三，实非获已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1278382_comment'></div>伏念某秋初心痛，至不省事，当仓皇回司之时，卢检院、范少卿俱来相问，薾然一榻，不能交谈，舁入廨舍，尽室惊恻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1278382_comment'></div>仅逃鬼录，赖有天幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1278382_comment'></div>以此心气衰惫，目力短昏，虽极勉强，尝虑妨阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1278382_comment'></div>重念某才有一儿，尤不敏事，书问满前，莫能报谢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1278382_comment'></div>米盐琐碎，时复关决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1278382_comment'></div>夫多病早衰，傍无佽助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1278382_comment'></div>在官则以奉公不办为忧，在家则以应俗不周为愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1278382_comment'></div>若不乞假岁月，务近医药，贪恋禄食，必致自毙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1278382_comment'></div>区区欲望检照前请，特赐敷奏，别与祠禄差使一次，则未尽之命，皆生成之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1278382_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1278382'>小帖子称：照得某蒙恩，改除上件差遣，系是替应孟明资阙，初以待次岁月足便休养，故不敢辄有陈请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1278382_comment'></div>今来应孟明已除郎官，即成见次，所以须至烦渎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1278382_comment'></div>若未欲便与祠禄，即乞与一般待阙差遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1278382_comment'></div>某见迤逦前去衢、婺州，听候指挥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1278382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1278382'><span class='label'>按：</span>十月二十九日，三省同奉圣旨不允，依已降指挥疾速赴行在奏事讫之任。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1278382_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　辞免不允赴阙奏事，作诗抒怀。作品：除浙西宪舟过钓台有感。<div id='poem_161778' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_161778' class='poemTitle
